Abathur.name: Abathur
Abathur.title: Evolution Master
Abathur.SearchText: Abathur Zerg Swarm HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 SC slug
Abathur.Description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.
Abathur.InfoText: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Symbiote
AbathurSymbiote.ShortTooltip: Assist an ally and gain new abilities
AbathurSymbiote.FullTooltip: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

AbathurToxicNest.name: Toxic Nest
AbathurToxicNest.FullTooltip: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">153~~0.04~~</c> damage and reveals the enemy for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">90</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.name: Evolve Monstrosity
AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.ShortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.FullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Basic Attack damage, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

AbathurUltimateEvolution.name: Ultimate Evolution
AbathurUltimateEvolution.ShortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
AbathurUltimateEvolution.FullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Spell Power, <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus Attack Damage, and <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

AbathurSpawnLocusts.name: Locust Strain
AbathurSpawnLocusts.ShortTooltip: Spawn locusts that attack down the nearest lane
AbathurSpawnLocusts.FullTooltip: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. Locusts last for <c val="bfd4fd">16</c> seconds, have <c val="bfd4fd">350~~0.04~~</c> health and deal <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage with each Basic Attack, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> bonus damage to enemy Structures.

AbathurDeepTunnel.name: Deep Tunnel
AbathurDeepTunnel.FullTooltip: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AbathurEvolveMonstrosityActiveSymbiote.name: Evolve Monstrosity Active
AbathurEvolveMonstrosityActiveSymbiote.FullTooltip: Activate to cast Symbiote on Abathur's Monstrosity.

AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.name: Pressurized Glands
AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.ShortTooltip: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and decreases the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

AbathurMasteryEnvenomedNestsToxicNest.name: Envenomed Nest
AbathurMasteryEnvenomedNestsToxicNest.ShortTooltip: Toxic Nests deal more damage, reduce Armor
AbathurMasteryEnvenomedNestsToxicNest.FullTooltip: Toxic Nests deal <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and reduce the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

AbathurReinforcedCarapace.name: Reinforced Carapace
AbathurReinforcedCarapace.FullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 40%.

AbathurCombatStyleSurvivalInstincts.name: Survival Instincts
AbathurCombatStyleSurvivalInstincts.FullTooltip: Increases Locust's Health by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

AbathurSymbioteAdrenalOverload.name: Adrenal Overload
AbathurSymbioteAdrenalOverload.FullTooltip: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Attack Speed.

AbathurMasteryNeedlespine.name: Needlespine
AbathurMasteryNeedlespine.FullTooltip: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

AbathurMasteryProlificDispersal.name: Prolific Dispersal
AbathurMasteryProlificDispersal.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Toxic Nests by <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, and add <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges.

AbathurMasteryVileNestsToxicNest.name: Vile Nest
AbathurMasteryVileNestsToxicNest.FullTooltip: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

AbathurSymbioteCarapaceNetworkedCarapace.name: Networked Carapace
AbathurSymbioteCarapaceNetworkedCarapace.FullTooltip: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

GenericTalentCalldownMULE.name: Calldown: MULE
GenericTalentCalldownMULE.FullTooltip: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds, healing for <c val="bfd4fd">90</c> Health every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.name: Ultimate Evolution
AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.ShortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.FullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Spell Power, <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus Attack Damage, and <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.name: Evolve Monstrosity
AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.ShortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.FullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Basic Attack damage, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

AbathurMasterySpatialEfficiency.name: Spatial Efficiency
AbathurMasterySpatialEfficiency.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Stab gains <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">.5</c> seconds.

AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.name: Soma Transference
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.ShortTooltip: Spike Burst heals for each Hero hit
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for <c val="bfd4fd">64~~0.04~~</c> Health per enemy Hero hit.

AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.name: Bombard Strain
AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.ShortTooltip: Locusts gain a ranged attack, increased duration
AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.FullTooltip: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

AbathurMasteryEnvenomedSpikes.name: Envenomed Spikes
AbathurMasteryEnvenomedSpikes.FullTooltip: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AbathurMasteryAdrenalineBoost.name: Adrenaline Boost
AbathurMasteryAdrenalineBoost.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds.

AbathurVolatileMutation.name: Volatile Mutation
AbathurVolatileMutation.FullTooltip: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage dealt.

AbathurCombatStyleLocustBrood.name: Locust Brood
AbathurCombatStyleLocustBrood.FullTooltip: Activate to spawn <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Locusts at a nearby location.

AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.name: Evolutionary Link
AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.ShortTooltip: Ultimate Evolution target gets a Shield
AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of their maximum Health. Refreshes every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AbathurMasteryEvolutionComplete.name: Evolution Complete
AbathurMasteryEvolutionComplete.FullTooltip: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

AbathurSymbioteHivemind.name: Hivemind
AbathurSymbioteHivemind.FullTooltip: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero. This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

AbathurMasteryLocustMaster.name: Locust Nest
AbathurMasteryLocustMaster.FullTooltip: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

AbathurSymbioteStab.name: Stab
AbathurSymbioteStab.ShortTooltip: Shoots a spike that deals damage to the first enemy it contacts.
AbathurSymbioteStab.FullTooltip: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">119~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurst.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurst.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbioteCarapace.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbioteCarapace.FullTooltip: Shields the assisted ally for <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c>. Allied Heroes are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">22~~0.04~~</c> Health per second while the Shield is active. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

AbathurMonstrosityDeepTunnel.name: Deep Tunnel
AbathurMonstrosityDeepTunnel.FullTooltip: Order your Evolved Monstrosity to quickly tunnel to a visible location

Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
Alarak.SearchText: Alarak Ascendant Protoss SC SC2 StarCraft Star2 Starcraft2 II 2 Legacy of the Void LotV Covert Ops CO
Alarak.Description: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.
Alarak.InfoText: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.

AlarakDiscordStrike.name: Discord Strike
AlarakDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
AlarakDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage and are silenced for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

AlarakTelekinesis.name: Telekinesis
AlarakTelekinesis.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">48~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.

AlarakLightningSurge.name: Lightning Surge
AlarakLightningSurge.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> health for each Hero hit.

AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AlarakSadism.name: Sadism
AlarakSadism.ShortTooltip: Each point of Sadism increases Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing against enemy Heroes by 1%Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.
AlarakSadism.FullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AlarakDeadlyChargeExecute.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeExecute.FullTooltip: Unleash Alarak's Deadly Charge.<n/><n/>Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakLightningSurgeLightningBarrage.name: Lightning Surge
AlarakLightningSurgeLightningBarrage.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> health for each Hero hit.

AlarakDeadlyChargeExecute2ndHeroic.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeExecute2ndHeroic.FullTooltip: Unleash Alarak's Deadly Charge.<n/><n/>Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate2ndHeroic.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate2ndHeroic.ShortTooltip: Deal increased ability damage to Heroes
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate2ndHeroic.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Sadism</s><n/><n/>Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> against enemy Heroes.<n/><n/>Takedowns increase Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted2ndHeroic.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted2ndHeroic.ShortTooltip: Deal increased ability damage to Heroes
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted2ndHeroic.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Sadism</s><n/><n/>Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> against enemy Heroes.<n/><n/>Takedowns increase Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

AlarakOverwhelmingPowerDiscordStrike.name: Overwhelming Power
AlarakOverwhelmingPowerDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Discord Strike grants Attack Speed, Lifesteal
AlarakOverwhelmingPowerDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed and causes Basic Attacks to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

AlarakRuthlessMomentum.name: Ruthless Momentum
AlarakRuthlessMomentum.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">20.</c> Telekinesis's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> faster while above <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> Health.

AlarakExtendedLightning.name: Extended Lightning
AlarakExtendedLightning.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
AlarakExtendedLightning.FullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%.Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

AlarakChaosReigns.name: Chaos Reigns
AlarakChaosReigns.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to increase Discord Strike damage
AlarakChaosReigns.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

AlarakNegativelyCharged.name: Negatively Charged
AlarakNegativelyCharged.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Lightning Surge center damage
AlarakNegativelyCharged.FullTooltip: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

AlarakShowofForce.name: Show of Force
AlarakShowofForce.ShortTooltip: Ability combos deal bonus damage, grant Sadism
AlarakShowofForce.FullTooltip: Heroes hit with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> of Alarak's Abilities within <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">61~~0.04~~</c> damage and increase Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c>, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. <n/><n/>Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

AlarakDissonance.name: Dissonance
AlarakDissonance.FullTooltip: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

AlarakHinderedMotion.name: Hindered Motion
AlarakHinderedMotion.FullTooltip: Telekinesis Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AlarakAppliedForce.name: Applied Force
AlarakAppliedForce.ShortTooltip: Reduce Sadism, increase Telekinesis distance, range
AlarakAppliedForce.FullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>, but Telekinesis pushes <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> further and has <c val="bfd4fd">20% </c>increased range.

AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AlarakBladeoftheHighlord.name: Blade of the Highlord
AlarakBladeoftheHighlord.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

AlarakPureMalice.name: Pure Malice
AlarakPureMalice.FullTooltip: Increase Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> any time an allied Hero dies, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

AlarakRiteofRakShir.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
AlarakRiteofRakShir.ShortTooltip: Mark and damage Hero to increase Sadism
AlarakRiteofRakShir.FullTooltip: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">300</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.name: Lethal Onslaught
AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Discord Strike grants Sadism bonus to Basic Attacks
AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

AlarakLightningBarrage.name: Lightning Barrage
AlarakLightningBarrage.ShortTooltip: Center hits grant free Lightning Surge cast
AlarakLightningBarrage.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

AlarakMockingStrikes.name: Mocking Strikes
AlarakMockingStrikes.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AlarakCounterStrikeItem.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakCounterStrikeItem.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakCounterStrikeItem.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.</c>

AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakLastLaugh.name: Last Laugh
AlarakLastLaugh.ShortTooltip: Cleanse and teleport, but reduce Health
AlarakLastLaugh.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times with Basic Abilities within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>.

AlarakHastyBargain.name: Hasty Bargain
AlarakHastyBargain.ShortTooltip: Activate to reduce Sadism bonus and reset Basic Ability cooldowns
AlarakHastyBargain.FullTooltip: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.title: The Life-Binder
Alexstrasza.SearchText: Alexstraza Alekstrasza Alekstraza Warcraft 2 WC2 WoW Cataclysm Wrath of the Lich King WotLK dragon elf Queen of Dragons
Alexstrasza.Description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.
Alexstrasza.InfoText: Alexstrasza, the queen of dragons, was empowered by the titans to be the guardian of all life on Azeroth. She has aided mortals time and again, even at great personal cost. Now, she soars across the Nexus, protecting life wherever she finds it.

AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.name: Gift of Life
AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Give a portion of Health to an allied Hero
AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: Sacrifice <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> of that amount.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Dragonqueen: Breath of Life</c><n/>Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

AlexstraszaAbundance.name: Abundance
AlexstraszaAbundance.ShortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
AlexstraszaAbundance.FullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of their maximum Health.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Dragonqueen: Preservation</c><n/>Heal area and amount greatly increased.

AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.name: Flame Buffet
AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.ShortTooltip: Launch a fireball that ignites enemies and can Slow them
AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">5.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet</c><n/>Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

AlexstraszaLifebinder.name: Life-Binder
AlexstraszaLifebinder.ShortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
AlexstraszaLifebinder.FullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, take to the sky and drop <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> fireballs over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

AlexstraszaDragonqueen.name: Dragonqueen
AlexstraszaDragonqueen.ShortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
AlexstraszaDragonqueen.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, transform into a dragon and gain <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/>While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">143~~0.04~~</c> damage and heal allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">43~~0.04~~</c> in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.name: Live and Let Live
AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: High Health reduces Gift of Life cooldown
AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

AlexstraszaCircleOfLifeAbundance.name: Circle of Life
AlexstraszaCircleOfLifeAbundance.FullTooltip: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.name: Flames of Fury
AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen cooldown
AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

AlexstraszaSurgeOfVitalityAbundance.name: Surge of Vitality
AlexstraszaSurgeOfVitalityAbundance.FullTooltip: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaHeatExhaustionFlameBuffet.name: Heat Exhaustion
AlexstraszaHeatExhaustionFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and cause it to no longer decay.

AlexstraszaExuberance.name: Exuberance
AlexstraszaExuberance.FullTooltip: While above <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, gain <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed.

AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.name: Lifeblossom
AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at high Health
AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.name: Verdant Flourish
AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.ShortTooltip: Regen Globe and Abundance healing increased
AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.FullTooltip: Alexstrasza receives <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more healing from Abundance and <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more healing from Regeneration Globes.

AlexstraszaFireWithinFlameBuffet.name: Fire Within
AlexstraszaFireWithinFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of her maximum Health.

AlexstraszaLifebinder.name: Life-Binder
AlexstraszaLifebinder.ShortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
AlexstraszaLifebinder.FullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, take to the sky and drop <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> fireballs over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

AlexstraszaDragonScales.name: Dragon Scales
AlexstraszaDragonScales.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after. Can only trigger once every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaPacify.name: Pacify
AlexstraszaPacify.ShortTooltip: Slow an enemy Hero and reduce their damage
AlexstraszaPacify.FullTooltip: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.name: Life Unbound
AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.ShortTooltip: Heal an ally and damage enemies
AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.FullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of their maximum Health and deal <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.</c>

AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.name: Tough Love
AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Gift of Life grants Armor at high Health
AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life grants its target <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaOverprotectiveAbundance.name: Overprotective
AlexstraszaOverprotectiveAbundance.FullTooltip: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds equal to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the amount healed.

AlexstraszaDraconicDisciplineDragonqueen.name: Draconic Discipline
AlexstraszaDraconicDisciplineDragonqueen.FullTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaRitualOfLife.name: Ritual of Life
AlexstraszaRitualOfLife.FullTooltip: Life-Binder activates <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaOnRubyWingsCleansingFlame.name: On Ruby Wings
AlexstraszaOnRubyWingsCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: Healing or damaging Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds upon landing.

AlexstraszaAncientFlameFlameBuffet.name: Ancient Flame
AlexstraszaAncientFlameFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.

AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.name: Blessing of the Red
AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.ShortTooltip: Grant bonus Health to an ally
AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.FullTooltip: Activate to grant an allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">500</c> bonus maximum Health until they die.<n/><n/>Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

AlexstraszaBreathOfLife.name: Breath of Life
AlexstraszaBreathOfLife.FullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of Alexstrasza's current Health.

AlexstraszaPreservation.name: Preservation
AlexstraszaPreservation.ShortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
AlexstraszaPreservation.FullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of their maximum Health.

AlexstraszaWingBuffet.name: Wing Buffet
AlexstraszaWingBuffet.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaLifebinder.name: Life-Binder
AlexstraszaLifebinder.ShortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
AlexstraszaLifebinder.FullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.FullTooltip: Take to the sky and drop <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> fireballs over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

AlexstraszaDragonqueenDragonFormPassive.name: Dragonqueen
AlexstraszaDragonqueenDragonFormPassive.ShortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
AlexstraszaDragonqueenDragonFormPassive.FullTooltip: Alexstrasza has transformed into a powerful dragon aspect, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.04~~</c> Health, resistance to disabling effects, and empowered Basic Attacks and Abilities.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

Amazon.name: Cassia
Amazon.title: Amazon Warmatron
Amazon.SearchText: Casia Amazon Javazon D2 Diablo 2 II Diablo2 Human
Amazon.Description: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.
Amazon.InfoText: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.

AmazonLightningFury.name: Lightning Fury
AmazonLightningFury.ShortTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that splits upon impact
AmazonLightningFury.FullTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in their path.

AmazonBlindingLight.name: Blinding Light
AmazonBlindingLight.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage and Blind enemies in the target area for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Cassia deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage to Blinded targets.

AmazonFend.name: Fend
AmazonFend.ShortTooltip: Charge at a target and rapidly attack nearby enemies
AmazonFend.FullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in front of Cassia every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> reduced damage to non-Heroes. Avoidance remains charged while Channeling.

AmazonBallLightning.name: Ball Lightning
AmazonBallLightning.FullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit.

AmazonValkyrie.name: Valkyrie
AmazonValkyrie.ShortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
AmazonValkyrie.FullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

AmazonAvoidance.name: Avoidance
AmazonAvoidance.FullTooltip: While moving, Cassia gradually gains up to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. After being stationary for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, the Armor is rapidly lost over <c val="bfd4fd">.5</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Avoidance remains charged while Fending.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AmazonSurgeOfLight.name: Avoidance
AmazonSurgeOfLight.FullTooltip: While moving, Cassia gradually gains up to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. After being stationary for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, the Armor is rapidly lost over <c val="bfd4fd">.5</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Avoidance remains charged while Fending.

AmazonThunderstroke.name: Thunderstroke
AmazonThunderstroke.FullTooltip: Increase the damage of Lightning Fury by 25.Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.

AmazonImpale.name: Impale
AmazonImpale.FullTooltip: Increase Fend's cast range and area of effect by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. It deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to enemies below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

AmazonChargedStrikes.name: Charged Strikes
AmazonChargedStrikes.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Attack Speed. Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes.

AmazonPlateoftheWhale.name: Plate of the Whale
AmazonPlateoftheWhale.FullTooltip: Regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">7~~0.04~~</c> Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged, gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">14~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

AmazonRingoftheLeech.name: Ring of the Leech
AmazonRingoftheLeech.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against your primary target heal for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of their damage. If an enemy is Blinded, this also affects Lightning Fury and Fend.

AmazonInnerLight.name: Inner Light
AmazonInnerLight.FullTooltip: Activate to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of your maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

AmazonFendGroundingRod.name: Grounding Rod
AmazonFendGroundingRod.ShortTooltip: Lightning Fury and Fend Slow enemies
AmazonFendGroundingRod.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by Lightning Fury or Fend are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AmazonSeraphsHymn.name: Seraph's Hymn
AmazonSeraphsHymn.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against your primary enemy Hero grant <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana and reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

AmazonSurgeOfLight.name: Surge of Light
AmazonSurgeOfLight.FullTooltip: After taking <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.04~~</c> damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies around her.

AmazonBallLightning.name: Ball Lightning
AmazonBallLightning.FullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit.

AmazonValkyrie.name: Valkyrie
AmazonValkyrie.ShortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
AmazonValkyrie.FullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

AmazonFendWarMatron.name: War Matron
AmazonFendWarMatron.FullTooltip: Cassia becomes Protected while Channeling Fend and for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second if the Channel is completed.

AmazonWarTraveler.name: War Traveler
AmazonWarTraveler.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.

AmazonFendGlovesOfAlacrity.name: Gloves Of Alacrity
AmazonFendGlovesOfAlacrity.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Basic Attack range. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Basic Attack range.

AmazonPowerStrike.name: Power Strike
AmazonPowerStrike.ShortTooltip: Lightning Fury pierces and casts Blinding Light
AmazonPowerStrike.FullTooltip: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Heroes hit by it are marked for <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. Upon reaching <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> marks, remove the marks and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.

AmazonStaticElectricity.name: Static Electricity
AmazonStaticElectricity.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.

AmazonMartialLaw.name: Martial Law
AmazonMartialLaw.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of their maximum Health. Increase this to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> if they are Stunned, Rooted or Slowed.

AmazonInfiniteLightning.name: Infinite Lightning
AmazonInfiniteLightning.FullTooltip: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AmazonImprisoningLight.name: Imprisoning Light
AmazonImprisoningLight.FullTooltip: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AmazonTitansRevenge.name: Titan's Revenge
AmazonTitansRevenge.FullTooltip: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor and while Avoidance is fully charged, they deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus damage.

Amazon-AvoidanceRockstopper.name: Rockstopper
Amazon-AvoidanceRockstopper.FullTooltip: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.

Ana.name: Ana
Ana.title: Veteran Sniper
Ana.Description: A burst Healer who uses precise skillshots to heal allies and can deny enemy healing.
Ana.InfoText: As a founding member of Overwatch and one of the world's best snipers, Ana Amari uses her skills to protect the innocent. Though she went MIA after losing her eye, Ana's sense of duty and responsibility has brought her back to the fight.

AnaHealingDart.name: Healing Dart
AnaHealingDart.ShortTooltip: Shoot a dart that heals an Ally
AnaHealingDart.FullTooltip: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for <c val="bfd4fd">195~~0.04~~</c> Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

AnaBioticGrenade.name: Biotic Grenade
AnaBioticGrenade.ShortTooltip: Toss a grenade that heals allies, prevents enemy healing
AnaBioticGrenade.FullTooltip: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">152~~0.04~~</c> Health and receive <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased healing from Ana for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Enemies hit take <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> damage and receive <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> less healing for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AnaSleepDart.name: Sleep Dart
AnaSleepDart.ShortTooltip: Fire a dart that puts enemies to Sleep
AnaSleepDart.FullTooltip: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Vehicles.</c>

AnaNanoBoost.name: Nano Boost
AnaNanoBoost.ShortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
AnaNanoBoost.FullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring <c val="bfd4fd">200</c> Mana. For the next <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, they gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> faster.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Ana.</c>

AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.name: Eye of Horus
AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.ShortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.FullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> and enemies are damaged for <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c>. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

AnaAimDownSightsActivate.name: Shrike
AnaAimDownSightsActivate.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal damage over time
AnaAimDownSightsActivate.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, plus additional damage equal to the current number of stacks on the target, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times. Every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Ana is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the damage dealt by Shrike.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Aim Down Sights</s><n/><n/>Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing.ShortTooltip: Increase Biotic Grenade healing on multiple Heroes
AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing.FullTooltip: Biotic Grenade heals for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

AnaSleepingDartSlumberShells.name: Slumber Shells
AnaSleepingDartSlumberShells.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AnaShrikeVampiricRounds.name: Vampiric Rounds
AnaShrikeVampiricRounds.FullTooltip: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.

AnaBioticGrenadeBioticEnhancements.name: Biotic Enhancements
AnaBioticGrenadeBioticEnhancements.FullTooltip: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AnaOverdose.name: Overdose
AnaOverdose.FullTooltip: Sleep Dart applies <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Doses. While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

AnaDebilitatingDart.name: Debilitating Dart
AnaDebilitatingDart.ShortTooltip: Fire a dart that reduces damage and Slows

AnaBioticGrenadeAntiHealer.name: Anti-Healer
AnaBioticGrenadeAntiHealer.FullTooltip: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and the duration of the healing reduction by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

AnaSleepDartNightTerrors.name: Night Terrors
AnaSleepDartNightTerrors.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds for every Hero hit by Sleeping Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of their Maximum Health in damage.

AnaMindNumbingAgent.name: Mind-Numbing Agent

AnaHeroicAbilityNanaBoost.ShortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns

AnaHealingDartSpeedSerum.name: Speed Serum
AnaHealingDartSpeedSerum.FullTooltip: Healing Dart grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed to affected Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AnaHealingDartPurifyingDarts.name: Purifying Darts
AnaHealingDartPurifyingDarts.FullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more when doing so.

AnaHealingDartSmellingSalts.name: Smelling Salts
AnaHealingDartSmellingSalts.FullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds when doing so.

AnaHealingDartSharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
AnaHealingDartSharpshooter.FullTooltip: Healing Dart's healing is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> if it heals a Hero, up to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

AnaHealingDartConcentratedDoses.name: Concentrated Doses
AnaHealingDartConcentratedDoses.FullTooltip: Increase Healing Dart's healing by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

AnaDetachableBoxMagazine.name: Active Reload

AnaNanoInfusion.name: Nano Infusion

AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.name: Deadeye
AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases healing and damage
AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.FullTooltip: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

AnaShrikeArmoredStance.name: Armored Stance
AnaShrikeArmoredStance.FullTooltip: Increase Shrike's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor.

AnaDynamicOptics.name: Dynamic Optics
AnaDynamicOptics.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c>.

Anduin.name: Anduin
Anduin.title: King of Stormwind
Anduin.SearchText: Human Wrynn Priest Stormwind Alliance WoW World of Warcraft Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS BFA Battle for Azeroth
Anduin.Description: A ranged Healer with the ability to pluck an ally from danger.
Anduin.InfoText: As a young man, Anduin sought peace as a priest of the Holy Light and an envoy of the Alliance. After his father, Varian, fell to the Burning Legion, Anduin took up the crown as High King of the Alliance. He soon learned that peace must be fought for, even in the Nexus.

AnduinFlashHeal.name: Flash Heal
AnduinFlashHeal.ShortTooltip: Cast a heal on an Ally
AnduinFlashHeal.FullTooltip: Cast for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds to heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinDivineStar.name: Divine Star
AnduinDivineStar.ShortTooltip: Send a heavenly bolt that damages and heals
AnduinDivineStar.FullTooltip: Send light that deals <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> in a wider path. Healing increases by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> per enemy Hero hit.

AnduinChastise.name: Chastise
AnduinChastise.FullTooltip: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">155~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

AnduinHolyWordSalvation.name: Holy Word: Salvation
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.ShortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of their max Health and are Protected.

AnduinLightBomb.name: Lightbomb
AnduinLightBomb.FullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, it explodes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The target gains a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.name: Leap of Faith
AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.ShortTooltip: Pull an allied Hero to your location
AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.FullTooltip: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AnduinFlashHealRenew.name: Renew
AnduinFlashHealRenew.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AnduinPursuedByGrace.name: Pursued by Grace
AnduinPursuedByGrace.ShortTooltip: Damage Heroes to heal nearby allies
AnduinPursuedByGrace.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinBoldStrategy.name: Bold Strategy
AnduinBoldStrategy.ShortTooltip: Weaken Flash Heal to gain extra Talents
AnduinBoldStrategy.FullTooltip: Anduin gains his other level <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.name: Moral Compass
AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.ShortTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at its apex
AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.FullTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes close to its apex for <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> damage.

AnduinChastiseHolyReach.name: Holy Reach
AnduinChastiseHolyReach.FullTooltip: Increase the Root duration of Chastise from <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more damage and heals allied Heroes near him for <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinInnerFire.name: Inner Fire
AnduinInnerFire.FullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

AnduinFlashHealBindingHeal.name: Binding Heal
AnduinFlashHealBindingHeal.FullTooltip: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.name: Power Word: Shield
AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.ShortTooltip: Divine Star can grant Anduin a Shield
AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.FullTooltip: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">185~~0.04~~</c> damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

AnduinBlessedRecovery.name: Blessed Recovery
AnduinBlessedRecovery.ShortTooltip: Recover Health after taking high damage
AnduinBlessedRecovery.FullTooltip: If Anduin loses more than <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> of his maximum Health at once, recover <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. <n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> second cooldown.<n/><n/>Current Health required: <c val="bfd4fd">133~~0.04~~</c>

AnduinHolyWordSalvation.name: Holy Word: Salvation
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.ShortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of their max Health and are Protected.

AnduinLightBomb.name: Lightbomb
AnduinLightBomb.FullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, it explodes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The target gains a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.name: Speed of the Pious
AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.ShortTooltip: Divine Star grants Move Speed, reduce cooldown
AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.FullTooltip: While Divine Star is traveling, gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed. Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

AnduinPushForward.name: Push Forward!
AnduinPushForward.ShortTooltip: Damage Heroes for Move Speed, reduce cooldown<n/>
AnduinPushForward.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero grants <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. While gaining <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed, Chastise's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> faster.

AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.ShortTooltip: Leap of Faith grants Move Speed, heals
AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available. Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">280~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.name: Evenhanded Blessings
AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.ShortTooltip: Refund Flash Heal cooldown on new targets
AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.FullTooltip: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and refund <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its cooldown.

AnduinDivineStarHolyNova.name: Holy Nova
AnduinDivineStarHolyNova.FullTooltip: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> and damaging enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.name: Inner Focus
AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.ShortTooltip: Activate to reset Flash Heal cooldown
AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more.<n/><n/>Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

AnduinLightwell.name: Lightwell
AnduinLightwell.ShortTooltip: Activate to summon a healing Lightwell
AnduinLightwell.FullTooltip: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c>. The well only fades after healing <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times or when recast.<n/><n/>This cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.name: Light of Stormwind
AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.ShortTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation grants allies Invulnerability
AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.FullTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.

AnduinLeapOfFaithGlyphOfFaith.name: Glyph of Faith
AnduinLeapOfFaithGlyphOfFaith.ShortTooltip: Leap of Faith gains a charge
AnduinLeapOfFaithGlyphOfFaith.FullTooltip: Leap of Faith gains a <c val="bfd4fd">2nd</c> charge.

AnduinVariansLegacy.name: Varian's Legacy
AnduinVariansLegacy.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks burn enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">87~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and Anduin heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt.

AnduinFlashHealDesperatePrayer.name: Desperate Prayer
AnduinFlashHealDesperatePrayer.ShortTooltip: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero
AnduinFlashHealDesperatePrayer.FullTooltip: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">540~~0.04~~</c>, but kneel for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, unable to act.

Anubarak.name: Anub'arak
Anubarak.title: Traitor King
Anubarak.SearchText: Anub'arak Anubarak Noob Nub Undead Crypt Lord World of WoW Warcraft III 3 War3 WC3 Warcraft3 Frozen Throne FT WotLK Wrath of the Lich King
Anubarak.Description: A Tank who specializes against Mages.
Anubarak.InfoText: Once a proud nerubian king, Anub'arak dared to stand against the Lich King's invasion, but despite his bravery, he too fell to the unrelenting Scourge. Resurrected into undeath, the Traitor King now serves as a towering weapon of destruction.

AnubarakImpale.name: Impale
AnubarakImpale.ShortTooltip: Shoot line of spikes that damages and stuns enemies
AnubarakImpale.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> damage. Stuns for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

AnubarakHardenCarapace.name: Harden Carapace
AnubarakHardenCarapace.FullTooltip: Gain a Shield that grants <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Spell Armor and absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">340~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AnubarakBurrowCharge.name: Burrow Charge
AnubarakBurrowCharge.ShortTooltip: Burrow underground and charge in a direction
AnubarakBurrowCharge.FullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

AnubarakLocustSwarm.name: Locust Swarm
AnubarakLocustSwarm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores <c val="bfd4fd">24~~0.04~~</c> Health. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

AnubarakCocoon.name: Cocoon
AnubarakCocoon.FullTooltip: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

AnubarakLegionOfBeetlesVisual.name: Scarab Host
AnubarakLegionOfBeetlesVisual.ShortTooltip: Spawn a Beetle whenever an Ability is cast
AnubarakLegionOfBeetlesVisual.FullTooltip: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, attacking nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone

AnubarakNerubianArmor.name: Nerubian Armor

AnubarakCombatStyleLegionOfBeetles.name: Legion of Beetles

GenericTalentRegenerationMaster.name: Regeneration Master

GenericTalentRegenerationMaster.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

AnubarakMasteryBedOfBarbs.name: Bed of Barbs
AnubarakMasteryBedOfBarbs.ShortTooltip: Impale slows and damages over time
AnubarakMasteryBedOfBarbs.FullTooltip: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and deals <c val="bfd4fd">21~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Spikes persist for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds.

AnubarakMasteryShedExoskeletonHardenCara.name: Shed Exoskeleton
AnubarakMasteryShedExoskeletonHardenCara.FullTooltip: Harden Carapace grants <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AnubarakMasteryUnderkingBurrowCharge.ShortTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge range and damage
AnubarakMasteryUnderkingBurrowCharge.FullTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge range by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

AnubarakCombatStyleChitinousPlating.name: Chitinous Plating
AnubarakCombatStyleChitinousPlating.FullTooltip: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AnubarakSubterraneanShield.name: Subterranean Shield
AnubarakSubterraneanShield.FullTooltip: Burrow Charge also grants a <c val="bfd4fd">345~~0.04~~</c> point Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AnubarakMasteryLeechingScarabs.name: Leeching Scarabs
AnubarakMasteryLeechingScarabs.FullTooltip: Beetles gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

AnubarakLocustSwarm.name: Locust Swarm
AnubarakLocustSwarm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores <c val="bfd4fd">24~~0.04~~</c> Health. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

AnubarakHeroicAbilityCocoon.name: Cocoon
AnubarakHeroicAbilityCocoon.FullTooltip: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

GenericTalentBurningRage.name: Burning Rage
GenericTalentBurningRage.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">23~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

AnubarakMasteryUrticatingSpines.name: Urticating Spines
AnubarakMasteryUrticatingSpines.FullTooltip: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

AnubarakAcidDrenchedMandibles.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
AnubarakAcidDrenchedMandibles.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

AnubarakMasteryEpicenterBurrowCharge.name: Epicenter
AnubarakMasteryEpicenterBurrowCharge.ShortTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge area and reduces cooldown
AnubarakMasteryEpicenterBurrowCharge.FullTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> and lowers the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second for each Hero hit.

AnubarakDebilitation.name: Debilitation
AnubarakDebilitation.ShortTooltip: Burrow Charge decreases enemy Spell Power
AnubarakDebilitation.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AnubarakScarabHostBeetleJuiced.name: Beetle, Juiced
AnubarakScarabHostBeetleJuiced.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks to Heroes spawn Beetles
AnubarakScarabHostBeetleJuiced.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Beetles gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> increased health.<n/><n/>Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

AnubarakLocustSwarmHiveMaster.name: Hive Master
AnubarakLocustSwarmHiveMaster.FullTooltip: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. The Vampire Locust deals <c val="bfd4fd">153~~0.04~~</c> damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> health.

AnubarakCocoonCryptweave.name: Cryptweave
AnubarakCocoonCryptweave.FullTooltip: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds per Cocoon.

GenericTalentHardenedShield.name: Hardened Shield
GenericTalentHardenedShield.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, taking <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> less damage.

GenericTalentRewind.name: Rewind
GenericTalentRewind.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Artanis.name: Artanis
Artanis.title: Hierarch of the Daelaam
Artanis.SearchText: Artanis Protoss Aiur LotV Legacy of the Void StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2
Artanis.Description: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.
Artanis.InfoText: Despite his relative youth, Artanis was named Hierarch of the Daelaam after the fall of Aiur. Driven by the promise of a brighter future, he hopes to reclaim the protoss' fallen home world and rebuild their once glorious civilization.<n/><n/>Artanis is FREE to purchasers of StarCraft® II: Legacy of the Void™

ArtanisBladeDash.name: Blade Dash
ArtanisBladeDash.ShortTooltip: Dash forward then back again, damaging enemies along the way
ArtanisBladeDash.FullTooltip: Dash forward and deal <c val="bfd4fd">57~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies, then return and deal <c val="bfd4fd">171~~0.04~~</c> damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, and Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ArtanisTwinBlades.name: Twin Blades
ArtanisTwinBlades.FullTooltip: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.

ArtanisPhasePrism.name: Phase Prism
ArtanisPhasePrism.ShortTooltip: Swap positions with an enemy Hero
ArtanisPhasePrism.FullTooltip: Fire a Phase Prism that deals <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeam.name: Purifier Beam
ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeam.ShortTooltip: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam
ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeam.FullTooltip: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">184~~0.04~~</c> damage per second for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulse.name: Suppression Pulse
ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulse.ShortTooltip: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area
ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulse.FullTooltip: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage and Blinding enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Unlimited range.

ArtanisShieldOverloadDummy.name: Shield Overload
ArtanisShieldOverloadDummy.ShortTooltip: Gain a Shield when attacked at low Health
ArtanisShieldOverloadDummy.FullTooltip: After taking damage while below <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, Artanis gains a <c val="bfd4fd">385~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

ArtanisTwinBladesPrimed.name: Twin Blades (Primed)
ArtanisTwinBladesPrimed.FullTooltip: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.

ArtanisTwinBladesReactiveParry.name: Reactive Parry
ArtanisTwinBladesReactiveParry.FullTooltip: Damaging enemies with the first slash of Twin Blades grants Artanis <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. If the target is an enemy Hero, then the second slash grants Artanis an additional stack.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

ArtanisTwinBladesAmateurOpponent.FullTooltip: Twin Blades attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> bonus damage to non-Heroes.

ArtanisProtectorOfAiur.name: Protector Of Aiur
ArtanisProtectorOfAiur.ShortTooltip: Quest: Attacks against Heroes increase damage
ArtanisProtectorOfAiur.FullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Artanis's Attack damage by 0.1%. Takedowns grant 1% bonus damage.

ArtanisPhasePrismPsionicSynergy.name: Psionic Synergy

ArtanisHeroicAbilitySpearofAdunSuppressi.FullTooltip: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage and Blinding enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Unlimited range.

ArtanisHeroicAbilitySpearofAdunPurifierB.name: Purifier Beam
ArtanisHeroicAbilitySpearofAdunPurifierB.ShortTooltip: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam

ArtanisBladeDashTemplarsZeal.ShortTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash
ArtanisBladeDashTemplarsZeal.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

ArtanisTwinBladesTripleStrike.name: Triple Strike
ArtanisTwinBladesTripleStrike.FullTooltip: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c>, but increase its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ArtanisPhasePrismGravitonVortex.name: Graviton Vortex
ArtanisPhasePrismGravitonVortex.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

ArtanisShieldOverloadPhaseBulwark.name: Phase Bulwark
ArtanisShieldOverloadPhaseBulwark.FullTooltip: Shield Overload grants <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor while active and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after it expires.

ArtanisTwinBladesTitanKiller.name: Titan Killer
ArtanisTwinBladesTitanKiller.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to<c val="bfd4fd"> 0.5%</c> of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c> when empowered by Twin Blades.

ArtanisShieldOverloadForceofWill.name: Force of Will
ArtanisShieldOverloadForceofWill.FullTooltip: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ArtanisTwinBladesBladesofaTemplar.name: Blades of a Templar
