ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulseOrbita.name: Orbital Bombardment
ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulseOrbita.ShortTooltip: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge
ArtanisSpearofAdunSuppressionPulseOrbita.FullTooltip: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge. There is a <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> second cooldown between uses.

ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeamTargetPuri.name: Target Purified
ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeamTargetPuri.ShortTooltip: Purifier Beam is faster, recasts if target dies
ArtanisSpearofAdunPurifierBeamTargetPuri.FullTooltip: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

ArtanisTwinBladesZealotCharge.name: Zealot Charge
ArtanisTwinBladesZealotCharge.FullTooltip: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

ArtanisPlasmaBurn.name: Plasma Burn
ArtanisPlasmaBurn.FullTooltip: While Shield Overload is active, deal <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

Arthas.name: Arthas
Arthas.title: The Lich King
Arthas.SearchText: Arthas Lich King Artas LK Prince Menethil Death Knight Undead WoW World of Warcraft III 3 War3 WC3 Warcraft3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT WotLK Wrath of the Lich King Hearthstone HS
Arthas.Description: A Tank who is proficient against melee Physical Attackers, slowing them.
Arthas.InfoText: Once the crown prince of Lordaeron, and protégé of Uther the Lightbringer, Arthas was corrupted by the cursed blade Frostmourne in a bid to save his people. Now he rules over the damned as the Lich King and all shall know his wrath.

ArthasDeathCoil.name: Death Coil
ArthasDeathCoil.ShortTooltip: Deals damage to a target or heal Arthas
ArthasDeathCoil.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">164~~0.04~~</c> damage to target enemy.<n/><n/>Can be self-cast to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">262~~0.04~~</c> Health.

ArthasHowlingBlast.name: Howling Blast
ArthasHowlingBlast.ShortTooltip: Root and damage enemies in an area
ArthasHowlingBlast.FullTooltip: Root enemies within the target area for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds and deals <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ArthasFrozenTempest.name: Frozen Tempest
ArthasFrozenTempest.ShortTooltip: Damage and slow nearby enemies. Drains Mana while active
ArthasFrozenTempest.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> per second, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> per second, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Frozen Tempest's effects last for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ArthasArmyOfTheDead.name: Army of the Dead
ArthasArmyOfTheDead.ShortTooltip: Raise ghouls that fight enemies, heal Arthas
ArthasArmyOfTheDead.FullTooltip: Summons Ghouls that last <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds and atttack for <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">267~~0.04~~</c> Health.

ArthasSummonSindragosa.name: Summon Sindragosa
ArthasSummonSindragosa.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

ArthasFrostmourneHungers.name: Frostmourne Hungers
ArthasFrostmourneHungers.ShortTooltip: Activate to empower the next attack and restore Mana on hit
ArthasFrostmourneHungers.FullTooltip: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately and deal <c val="bfd4fd">99~~0.04~~</c> increased damage. Dealing damage restores <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone

ArthasArmyOfTheDeadSacrifice.name: Sacrifice
ArthasArmyOfTheDeadSacrifice.FullTooltip: Sacrifice a Ghoul to restore <c val="bfd4fd">267~~0.04~~</c> Health.

ArthasFrostmourneHungersPrimed.name: Frostmourne Hungers Primed
ArthasFrostmourneHungersPrimed.FullTooltip: The next basic attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">99~~0.04~~</c> increased damage and restores <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana.

ArthasMasteryFrostPresenceHowlingBlast.name: Frost Presence
ArthasMasteryFrostPresenceHowlingBlast.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Root Heroes to empower Howling Blast
ArthasMasteryFrostPresenceHowlingBlast.FullTooltip: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

ArthasMasteryEternalHungerFrostmourneHun.name: Eternal Hunger

ArthasRime.name: Rime

ArthasDeathlord.name: Deathlord

ArthasMasteryImmortalCoilDeathCoil.name: Immortal Coil

ArthasShatteredArmor.name: Shattered Armor
ArthasShatteredArmor.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ArthasMasteryBitingColdFrozenTempest.name: Biting Cold
ArthasMasteryBitingColdFrozenTempest.FullTooltip: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals <c val="bfd4fd">12.5%</c> bonus damage, up to a <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> bonus.

ArthasMasteryFrostStrikeFrostmourneHunge.name: Frost Strike
ArthasMasteryFrostStrikeFrostmourneHunge.ShortTooltip: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers cooldown and adds Slow
ArthasMasteryFrostStrikeFrostmourneHunge.FullTooltip: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ArthasMasteryEmbraceDeathDeathCoil.name: Embrace Death
ArthasMasteryEmbraceDeathDeathCoil.ShortTooltip: Death Coil deals more damage when missing Health
ArthasMasteryEmbraceDeathDeathCoil.FullTooltip: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage and healing.

ArthasMasteryRemorselessWinterFrozenTemp.name: Remorseless Winter
ArthasMasteryRemorselessWinterFrozenTemp.ShortTooltip: Frozen Tempest can Root enemy Heroes
ArthasMasteryRemorselessWinterFrozenTemp.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds are Rooted for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ArthasMasteryFrostmourneFeedsFrostmourne.name: Frostmourne Feeds
ArthasMasteryFrostmourneFeedsFrostmourne.ShortTooltip: Increases number of Frostmourne Hungers attacks
ArthasMasteryFrostmourneFeedsFrostmourne.FullTooltip: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>.

ArthasMasteryLegionOfNorthrendArmyoftheD.name: Legion of Northrend
ArthasMasteryLegionOfNorthrendArmyoftheD.ShortTooltip: Ghouls last longer and more are created
ArthasMasteryLegionOfNorthrendArmyoftheD.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage, heal for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and last <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds longer.

ArthasMasteryAbsoluteZeroSummonSindragos.name: Absolute Zero
ArthasMasteryAbsoluteZeroSummonSindragos.ShortTooltip: Increases Sindragosa range and disable duration
ArthasMasteryAbsoluteZeroSummonSindragos.FullTooltip: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, and then Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ArthasDeathsAdvance.name: Death's Advance
ArthasDeathsAdvance.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increases Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

ArthasAntiMagicShell.name: Anti-Magic Shell
ArthasAntiMagicShell.ShortTooltip: Activate to become immune to Spell Damage
ArthasAntiMagicShell.FullTooltip: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds and heal Arthas for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage prevented.

Auriel.name: Auriel
Auriel.title: Archangel of Hope
Auriel.SearchText: Ariel Angel Archangel Diablo 3 III D3 Diablo3
Auriel.Description: A Healer that excels when paired with a high-octane damage dealer.
Auriel.InfoText: It is through the archangel Auriel that the power of hope flows into the fabric of creation. Her eternal light illuminates even the darkest souls. Seeking harmony in all things, she is a mediator, a counselor, and when the need arises, a fearless warrior.

AurielSacredSweep.name: Sacred Sweep
AurielSacredSweep.ShortTooltip: Damages enemies in an a wide arc, bonus damage to enemies in the center
AurielSacredSweep.FullTooltip: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies caught in the center.

AurielRayOfHeaven.name: Ray of Heaven
AurielRayOfHeaven.ShortTooltip: Spend all energy to heal allied Heroes in an area
AurielRayOfHeaven.FullTooltip: Consume Auriel's stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

AurielDetainmentStrike.name: Detainment Strike
AurielDetainmentStrike.ShortTooltip: Knock an enemy Hero back, stunning them if they collide with terrain
AurielDetainmentStrike.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds and take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AurielResurrect.name: Resurrect
AurielResurrect.ShortTooltip: Bring an allied Hero back to life
AurielResurrect.FullTooltip: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. After a <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> second delay, they are brought back to life with <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of their maximum Health at the location where they died.<n/><n/>Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.

AurielCrystalAegis.name: Crystal Aegis
AurielCrystalAegis.ShortTooltip: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes
AurielCrystalAegis.FullTooltip: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals <c val="bfd4fd">255~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies.

AurielBestowHope.name: Bestow Hope
AurielBestowHope.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy.<n/><n/>Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near Auriel, <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of their damage to Heroes and <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> ally at a time.<n/><n/>Auriel can store up to <c val="bfd4fd">475~~0.04~~</c> energy.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AurielResurrectSelf.name: Resurrect
AurielResurrectSelf.ShortTooltip: Bring an allied Hero back to life
AurielResurrectSelf.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> second delay, you are brought back to life with <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of maximum Health at the location where you died.

AurielSwiftSweepSacredSweepTalent.name: Swift Sweep
AurielSwiftSweepSacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

AurielIncreasingClaritySacredSweepTalent.name: Increasing Clarity
AurielIncreasingClaritySacredSweepTalent.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increases center damage by hitting Heroes
AurielIncreasingClaritySacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

AurielRighteousAssaultSacredSweepTalent.name: Righteous Assault
AurielRighteousAssaultSacredSweepTalent.ShortTooltip: Reduce Sacred Sweep cooldown by hitting Heroes
AurielRighteousAssaultSacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

AurielSearingLightRayOfHeavenTalent.name: Searing Light
AurielSearingLightRayOfHeavenTalent.ShortTooltip: Ray of Heaven also damages enemies in the area
AurielSearingLightRayOfHeavenTalent.FullTooltip: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of the energy consumed.

AurielMajesticSpanSacredSweepTalent.name: Majestic Span
AurielMajesticSpanSacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

AurielHeavyBurdenDetainmentStrikeTalent.name: Heavy Burden
AurielHeavyBurdenDetainmentStrikeTalent.ShortTooltip: Detainment Strike slows enemies after stun
AurielHeavyBurdenDetainmentStrikeTalent.FullTooltip: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after the stun.

AurielRepeatedOffenseDetainmentStrikeTal.name: Repeated Offense
AurielRepeatedOffenseDetainmentStrikeTal.ShortTooltip: Increases Detainment Strike range<n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increases damage when Heroes are stunned
AurielRepeatedOffenseDetainmentStrikeTal.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

AurielGlimmerofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.name: Glimmer of Hope
AurielGlimmerofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.ShortTooltip: Regen Globes reduce Ray of Heaven energy cost
AurielGlimmerofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.FullTooltip: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

AurielEmpathicLinkBestowHopeTalent.name: Empathic Link
AurielEmpathicLinkBestowHopeTalent.FullTooltip: Auriel stores <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

AurielEnergizedCordRayOfHeavenTalent.name: Energized Cord
AurielEnergizedCordRayOfHeavenTalent.ShortTooltip: Increases energy from Auriel Basic Attacks
AurielEnergizedCordRayOfHeavenTalent.FullTooltip: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to <c val="bfd4fd">120%</c> of the damage against Heroes and <c val="bfd4fd">55%</c> of the damage against non-Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.</c>

AurielHeroicResurrect.name: Resurrect
AurielHeroicResurrect.ShortTooltip: Bring an allied Hero back to life
AurielHeroicResurrect.FullTooltip: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. After a <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> second delay, they are brought back to life with <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of their maximum Health at the location where they died.<n/><n/>Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.

AurielHeroicCrystalAegis.name: Crystal Aegis
AurielHeroicCrystalAegis.ShortTooltip: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes
AurielHeroicCrystalAegis.FullTooltip: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals <c val="bfd4fd">255~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies.

AurielBlindingFlashSacredSweepTalent.name: Blinding Flash
AurielBlindingFlashSacredSweepTalent.ShortTooltip: Sacred Sweep blinds enemies in the center
AurielBlindingFlashSacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

AurielConvergingForceSacredSweepTalent.name: Converging Force
AurielConvergingForceSacredSweepTalent.ShortTooltip: Sacred Sweep pushes enemies towards the center
AurielConvergingForceSacredSweepTalent.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

AurielPiercingLashDetainmentStrikeTalent.name: Piercing Lash
AurielPiercingLashDetainmentStrikeTalent.ShortTooltip: Detainment Strike hits all enemy Heroes in a line
AurielPiercingLashDetainmentStrikeTalent.FullTooltip: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds for each Hero hit.

AurielReservoirofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.name: Reservoir of Hope
AurielReservoirofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increases maximum Ray of Heaven energy
AurielReservoirofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent.FullTooltip: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

AurielWillofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.name: Will of Heaven
AurielWillofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.ShortTooltip: Bestow Hope ally gains Attack Speed
AurielWillofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.FullTooltip: Allies with Bestow Hope gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Attack Speed.

AurielWrathofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.name: Wrath of Heaven
AurielWrathofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.ShortTooltip: Bestow Hope ally gains Spell Power
AurielWrathofHeavenBestowHopeTalent.FullTooltip: Allies with Bestow Hope gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Spell Power.

AurielLightSpeedResurrectTalent.name: Light Speed
AurielLightSpeedResurrectTalent.ShortTooltip: Resurrected allies gain Move Speed, reduce cooldown
AurielLightSpeedResurrectTalent.FullTooltip: Resurrected allies gain <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> increased Movement Speed, decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

AurielDiamondResolveCrystalAegisTalent.name: Diamond Resolve
AurielDiamondResolveCrystalAegisTalent.FullTooltip: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

AurielAngelicFlightTalent.name: Angelic Flight
AurielAngelicFlightTalent.ShortTooltip: Activate to fly to a location
AurielAngelicFlightTalent.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, fly to a target location.

AurielShieldOfHopeTalent.name: Shield of Hope
AurielShieldOfHopeTalent.ShortTooltip: Shield nearby allies based on their missing Health
AurielShieldOfHopeTalent.FullTooltip: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds equal to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the amount of Health they are missing.

Azmodan.name: Azmodan
Azmodan.title: Lord of Sin
Azmodan.SearchText: Azmodan Demon Lord Sin D3 Diablo3 Diablo 3 III dunk
Azmodan.Description: A Summoner that can also deal high damage from far away.
Azmodan.InfoText: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of Hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary.

AzmodanGlobeOfAnnihilation.name: Globe of Annihilation
AzmodanGlobeOfAnnihilation.ShortTooltip: Launch a long range orb of destruction dealing area damage
AzmodanGlobeOfAnnihilation.FullTooltip: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 184~~0.025~~ damage on impact.Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation.Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases the damage of Globe of Annihilation by 1, up to 400.

AzmodanSummonDemonWarrior.name: Summon Demon Warrior
AzmodanSummonDemonWarrior.FullTooltip: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches forward. Warriors deal <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c> damage per Attack and <c val="bfd4fd">18~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every second. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

AzmodanAllShallBurn.name: All Shall Burn
AzmodanAllShallBurn.ShortTooltip: Channel a beam of death on an enemy
AzmodanAllShallBurn.FullTooltip: Channel a beam of death on an enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">128~~0.04~~</c> damage per second for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. If the Channel lasts its full duration, deal an extra <c val="bfd4fd">340~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target.<n/><n/>Azmodan's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> while Channeling.

AzmodanDemonicInvasion.name: Demonic Invasion
AzmodanDemonicInvasion.ShortTooltip: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
AzmodanDemonicInvasion.FullTooltip: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">65~~0.04~~</c> damage per impact. Grunts deal <c val="bfd4fd">42~~0.04~~</c> damage, have <c val="bfd4fd">750~~0.04~~</c> Health and last up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">98~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

AzmodanTideOfSin.name: Tide of Sin
AzmodanTideOfSin.FullTooltip: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

AzmodanDemonLieutenant.name: Demon Lieutenant
AzmodanDemonLieutenant.ShortTooltip: Azmodan summons a Demon Lieutenant to assist Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons
AzmodanDemonLieutenant.FullTooltip: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

AzmodanTideOfSinPassive.name: Tide of Sin
AzmodanTideOfSinPassive.FullTooltip: Your next Globe of Annihilation costs no Mana and deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage.

AzmodanGreed.name: Greed
AzmodanGreed.ShortTooltip: Increase Globe damage to non-Heroes<n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase All Shall Burn range
AzmodanGreed.FullTooltip: Globe of Annihilation deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, increase the range of All Shall Burn by 25% and Demon Warriors gain 20% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

AzmodanGluttony.name: Gluttony
AzmodanGluttony.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Annihilation from hitting Heroes
AzmodanGluttony.FullTooltip: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3.Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

AzmodanWrath.name: Wrath
AzmodanWrath.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

AzmodanArmyOfHell.name: Army of Hell
AzmodanArmyOfHell.FullTooltip: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

AzmodanHellforgedArmor.name: Hellforged Armor
AzmodanHellforgedArmor.FullTooltip: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor and last <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds longer.

AzmodanBattleborn.name: Battleborn
AzmodanBattleborn.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Summon Demon Warrior from <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">20</c>. Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and Demon Lieutenant by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

AzmodanArtOfChaos.name: Art of Chaos
AzmodanArtOfChaos.FullTooltip: If Globe of Annihilation hits <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Heroes, restore <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Mana and gain an extra <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Annihilation.

AzmodanBombardment.name: Bombardment
AzmodanBombardment.FullTooltip: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds have an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> range and can hit <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Annihilation.

AzmodanMasterofDestruction.name: Master of Destruction
AzmodanMasterofDestruction.FullTooltip: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Annihilation per Hero hit.

AzmodanHeroicAbilityDemonicInvasion.name: Demonic Invasion
AzmodanHeroicAbilityDemonicInvasion.ShortTooltip: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
AzmodanHeroicAbilityDemonicInvasion.FullTooltip: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">65~~0.04~~</c> damage per impact. Grunts deal <c val="bfd4fd">42~~0.04~~</c> damage, have <c val="bfd4fd">750~~0.04~~</c> Health and last up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">98~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

AzmodanTideOfSin.name: Tide of Sin
AzmodanTideOfSin.FullTooltip: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage.<n/><n/>Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

AzmodanBrutishVanguard.name: Brutish Vanguard
AzmodanBrutishVanguard.ShortTooltip: Demons have more Health, Warriors Slow
AzmodanBrutishVanguard.FullTooltip: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

AzmodanCydaeasKiss.name: Cydaea's Kiss
AzmodanCydaeasKiss.ShortTooltip: Reduce All Shall Burn Channel, final damage heals
AzmodanCydaeasKiss.FullTooltip: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> of his maximum Health.

AzmodanChainOfCommand.name: Chain of Command
AzmodanChainOfCommand.FullTooltip: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and they grant <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

AzmodanTotalAnnihilation.name: Total Annihilation
AzmodanTotalAnnihilation.FullTooltip: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of their maximum Health.

AzmodanHellRift.name: Hell Rift
AzmodanHellRift.ShortTooltip: All Shall Burn summons and buffs Demon Warriors
AzmodanHellRift.FullTooltip: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> increased damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

AzmodanTrample.name: Trample
AzmodanTrample.FullTooltip: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> second.

AzmodanSiegebreaker.name: Siegebreaker
AzmodanSiegebreaker.FullTooltip: Azmodan's Demons deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage to Structures.

AzmodanBlackPool.name: Black Pool
AzmodanBlackPool.ShortTooltip: Tide of Sin damages and reduces Armor over time
AzmodanBlackPool.FullTooltip: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Enemies within the pool lose <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> Armor per second, up to <c val="bfd4fd">15</c>, and take <c val="bfd4fd">56~~0.04~~</c> damage per second.

AzmodanPride.name: Pride
AzmodanPride.FullTooltip: After gaining <c val="bfd4fd">400</c> Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> and it deals <c val="bfd4fd">100</c> additional damage.

AzmodanSinsGrasp.name: Sin's Grasp
AzmodanSinsGrasp.ShortTooltip: All Shall Burn Slows, reduce cooldown
AzmodanSinsGrasp.FullTooltip: All Shall Burn Slows enemy Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> during its Channel. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration on an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and the target is Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

Barbarian.name: Sonya
Barbarian.title: Wandering Barbarian
Barbarian.SearchText: Sonya Sonia Barbarian Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS
Barbarian.Description: A Bruiser that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and likes to dive into the enemy team.
Barbarian.InfoText: From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.

BarbarianAncientSpear.name: Ancient Spear
BarbarianAncientSpear.ShortTooltip: Throw a spear and pull self to the first enemy hit, stunning and dealing damage
BarbarianAncientSpear.FullTooltip: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">173~~0.04~~</c> damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Fury.

BarbarianSeismicSlam.name: Seismic Slam
BarbarianSeismicSlam.ShortTooltip: Damage an enemy and splash damage behind them
BarbarianSeismicSlam.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">176~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target enemy, and <c val="bfd4fd">44~~0.04~~</c> to enemies behind the target.

BarbarianWhirlwind.name: Whirlwind
BarbarianWhirlwind.ShortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal for a percentage of damage dealt
BarbarianWhirlwind.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">138~~0.04~~</c> damage a second to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, healing for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

BarbarianLeap.name: Leap
BarbarianLeap.ShortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
BarbarianLeap.FullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

BarbarianWrathoftheBerserker.name: Wrath of the Berserker
BarbarianWrathoftheBerserker.ShortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
BarbarianWrathoftheBerserker.FullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds, and extends by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second for every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Fury gained.

BarbarianFury.name: Fury
BarbarianFury.ShortTooltip: Generate Fury in combat. All Abilities grant Move Speed
BarbarianFury.FullTooltip: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

BarbarianShotofFury.name: Fury
BarbarianShotofFury.FullTooltip: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

BarbarianFuriousBlow.name: Furious Blow
BarbarianFuriousBlow.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">4th</c> cast of Seismic Slam deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

BarbarianWarPaint.name: War Paint
BarbarianWarPaint.FullTooltip: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of the damage dealt.

BarbarianToughAsNails.name: Tough As Nails
BarbarianToughAsNails.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">16</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges. Charges refresh <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

BarbarianShatteredGround.name: Shattered Ground
BarbarianShatteredGround.FullTooltip: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by <c val="bfd4fd">66%</c> and increase its splash damage to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of its base damage.

BarbarianHurricane.name: Hurricane
BarbarianHurricane.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

BarbarianShotOfFury.name: Shot Of Fury
BarbarianShotOfFury.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage.

BarbarianPoisonedSpear.name: Poisoned Spear
BarbarianPoisonedSpear.ShortTooltip: Ancient Spear deals damage over time
BarbarianPoisonedSpear.FullTooltip: Ancient Spear deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

BarbarianLifeFunnel.name: Life Funnel
BarbarianLifeFunnel.FullTooltip: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of damage dealt.

BarbarianBattleRage.name: Battle Rage
BarbarianBattleRage.ShortTooltip: Increase damage to Mercenaries, activate to heal
BarbarianBattleRage.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Sonya deals <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage to Mercenaries.

BarbarianHeroicAbilityLeap.name: Leap
BarbarianHeroicAbilityLeap.ShortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
BarbarianHeroicAbilityLeap.FullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

BarbarianHeroicAbilityWrathoftheBerserke.name: Wrath of the Berserker
BarbarianHeroicAbilityWrathoftheBerserke.ShortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
BarbarianHeroicAbilityWrathoftheBerserke.FullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds, and extends by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second for every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Fury gained.

BarbarianMysticalSpear.name: Mystical Spear
BarbarianMysticalSpear.ShortTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls, cooldown reduced
BarbarianMysticalSpear.FullTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

BarbarianRuthless.name: Ruthless
BarbarianRuthless.ShortTooltip: Increase Whirlwind damage to low Health targets
BarbarianRuthless.FullTooltip: Whirlwind deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to Heroes below <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> Health. Does not generate additional healing.

BarbarianNoEscape.name: No Escape
BarbarianNoEscape.FullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

BarbarianGiantSlammer.name: Giant Slammer
BarbarianGiantSlammer.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal bonus damage
BarbarianGiantSlammer.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1.25%</c> of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

BarbarianRampage.name: Rampage
BarbarianRampage.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Ancient Spear cooldown
BarbarianRampage.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

BarbarianNervesOfSteel.name: Nerves of Steel
BarbarianNervesOfSteel.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of your maximum Health as a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

BarbarianArreatCrater.name: Arreat Crater
BarbarianArreatCrater.ShortTooltip: Leap creates a crater and has reduced cooldown
BarbarianArreatCrater.FullTooltip: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Reduces Leap's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

BarbarianStridingGiant.name: Striding Giant
BarbarianStridingGiant.ShortTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker can grant Unstoppable
BarbarianStridingGiant.FullTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> second cooldown.

BarbarianCompositeSpear.name: Composite Spear
BarbarianCompositeSpear.ShortTooltip: Increase Ancient Spear range, grants Armor
BarbarianCompositeSpear.FullTooltip: Increases Ancient Spear's range by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

BarbarianIgnorePain.name: Ignore Pain
BarbarianIgnorePain.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, taking <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

Butcher.name: The Butcher
Butcher.title: Flesh Carver
Butcher.SearchText: The Butcher TheButcher Demon D1 D3 Diablo 1 3 I III Diablo1 Diablo3
Butcher.Description: An Assassin who starts slow, but deals extreme damage after collecting enough Meat.
Butcher.InfoText: An unrelenting hacking echoed off the walls of the Cathedral and as Prince Aidan made his way through its depths, the sound only grew louder. There were no screams; just that dreadful sound... over and over.

ButcherHamstring.name: Hamstring
ButcherHamstring.ShortTooltip: Deals damage in an area and slows enemies
ButcherHamstring.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage and slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> fading over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

ButcherButchersBrand.name: Butcher's Brand
ButcherButchersBrand.ShortTooltip: Brand an enemy, granting Life Steal against them
ButcherButchersBrand.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">37~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and Brand them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage done.<n/><n/>Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

ButcherRuthlessOnslaught.name: Ruthless Onslaught
ButcherRuthlessOnslaught.ShortTooltip: Charges at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage
ButcherRuthlessOnslaught.FullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and take <c val="bfd4fd">119~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ButcherFurnaceBlast.name: Furnace Blast
ButcherFurnaceBlast.ShortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
ButcherFurnaceBlast.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.<n/><n/>Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

ButcherLambToTheSlaughter.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
ButcherLambToTheSlaughter.ShortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
ButcherLambToTheSlaughter.FullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second delay. This deals <c val="bfd4fd">171~~0.04~~</c> damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ButcherFreshMeatDummy.name: Fresh Meat
ButcherFreshMeatDummy.ShortTooltip: Gather strength by killing enemies and collecting their meat
ButcherFreshMeatDummy.FullTooltip: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ButcherMasteryHamstringInvigoration.name: Invigoration
ButcherMasteryHamstringInvigoration.FullTooltip: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GenericTalentBlock.name: Block
GenericTalentBlock.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

ButcherMasteryHamstringChopMeat.name: Chop Meat
ButcherMasteryHamstringChopMeat.FullTooltip: Increases Hamstring damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

ButcherMasteryHamstringFlailAxe.name: Flail Axe
ButcherMasteryHamstringFlailAxe.FullTooltip: Increases the length of Hamstring by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtUnrelenti.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtUnrelenti.ShortTooltip: Reduces Ruthless Onslaught cooldown on impact
ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtUnrelenti.FullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> upon impact.

ButcherMasteryHamstringCheapShot.name: Cheap Shot
ButcherMasteryHamstringCheapShot.ShortTooltip: Increase Hamstring damage to disabled targets
ButcherMasteryHamstringCheapShot.FullTooltip: Hamstring does <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

ButcherMasteryButchersBrandInsatiableBla.name: Insatiable Blade
ButcherMasteryButchersBrandInsatiableBla.ShortTooltip: Increases Move Speed while enemies are branded
ButcherMasteryButchersBrandInsatiableBla.FullTooltip: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

ButcherMasteryFreshMeatVictuals.name: Victuals
ButcherMasteryFreshMeatVictuals.FullTooltip: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of his maximum health.

ButcherMeatShield.name: Meat Shield
ButcherMeatShield.FullTooltip: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

ButcherHeroicAbilityButcherFurnaceBlast.name: Furnace Blast
ButcherHeroicAbilityButcherFurnaceBlast.ShortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
ButcherHeroicAbilityButcherFurnaceBlast.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.<n/><n/>Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

ButcherHeroicAbilityLambToTheSlaughter.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
ButcherHeroicAbilityLambToTheSlaughter.ShortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
ButcherHeroicAbilityLambToTheSlaughter.FullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second delay. This deals <c val="bfd4fd">171~~0.04~~</c> damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ButcherCleaver.name: Cleaver
ButcherCleaver.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtSavageCha.name: Savage Charge
ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtSavageCha.FullTooltip: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of their maximum Health.

ButcherMasteryHamstringBrutalStrike.name: Brutal Strike
ButcherMasteryHamstringBrutalStrike.FullTooltip: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Basic Attacks within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> damage.

ButcherMasteryHamstringCripplingSlam.name: Crippling Slam
ButcherMasteryHamstringCripplingSlam.ShortTooltip: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
ButcherMasteryHamstringCripplingSlam.FullTooltip: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

ButcherTalentEnraged.name: Enraged
ButcherTalentEnraged.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed and Armor at low Health
ButcherTalentEnraged.FullTooltip: While below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> second cooldown.

ButcherMasteryFreshMeatBloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
ButcherMasteryFreshMeatBloodFrenzy.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
ButcherMasteryFreshMeatBloodFrenzy.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> increased Attack and Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

ButcherMasteryFiresofHell.name: Fires of Hell
ButcherMasteryFiresofHell.FullTooltip: Furnace Blast explodes a second time <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after the initial explosion.

ButcherMasterySlaughterhouse.name: Slaughterhouse
ButcherMasterySlaughterhouse.ShortTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
ButcherMasterySlaughterhouse.FullTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

GenericTalentNexusBlades.name: Nexus Blades
GenericTalentNexusBlades.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
GenericTalentNexusBlades.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.name: Bolt of the Storm
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Chen.name: Chen
Chen.title: Legendary Brewmaster
Chen.SearchText: Chen Shen Stormstout Pandaren WoW World of Warcraft WC3 Warcraft3 Warcraft III 3 War3 Frozen Throne FT Mists of Pandaria MoP
Chen.Description: A potent Bruiser that wears downs enemies and is resistant to burst damage.
Chen.InfoText: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.

ChenFlyingKick.name: Flying Kick
ChenFlyingKick.FullTooltip: Kick through target enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ChenKegSmash.name: Keg Smash
ChenKegSmash.ShortTooltip: Drench enemies in a nearby area with Brew, Slowing them
ChenKegSmash.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage and soak enemies in Brew for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, the Slow is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.<n/><n/>After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire.<n/><n/><c val="ff0000">Breath of Fire</c><n/>Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.

ChenStagger.name: Stagger
ChenStagger.ShortTooltip: Become immune to damage, then convert it to damage over time
ChenStagger.FullTooltip: Damage taken over the next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds is prevented. Once this effect ends, Chen receives <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage taken over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. This damage cannot be modified.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
ChenStormEarthFire.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds, each with <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability. The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.<n/><n/><c val="00ffff">Storm</c> can grant the spirits a Shield. <n/><c val="00ff00">Earth</c> can leap to an area and Slow enemies. <n/><c val="ff6600">Fire</c> can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

ChenWanderingKeg.name: Wandering Keg
ChenWanderingKeg.ShortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
ChenWanderingKeg.FullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> increased Movement Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">59~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChenFortifyingBrew.name: Fortifying Brew
ChenFortifyingBrew.ShortTooltip: Gain Brew and a Shield while drinking
ChenFortifyingBrew.FullTooltip: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Brew and <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">540~~0.04~~</c> while drinking. Shields persist for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds after he stops drinking.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Brew.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ChenStorm.name: Storm
ChenStorm.FullTooltip: The spirits gain a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">400~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If this is the final Ability cast, the shield amount is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">750~~0.04~~</c> with no limited duration, and the duration of Storm, Earth, Fire is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChenEarth.name: Earth
ChenEarth.ShortTooltip: Leap to a location, damaging and Rooting enemies
ChenEarth.FullTooltip: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">32~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies in a large area by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If this is the final Ability cast, increase the damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">300%</c> and instead of Slowing, the leap Roots enemy Heroes hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

ChenFire.name: Fire
ChenFire.FullTooltip: Increase the Attack Speed and Basic Attack damage of the spirits by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If this is the final Ability cast, the Attack Speed and damage bonus is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and the spirits gain <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Movement Speed for its duration.

ChenBreathOfFire.name: Breath of Fire
ChenBreathOfFire.ShortTooltip: Breathe fire in target direction, dealing damage and Igniting drenched enemies
ChenBreathOfFire.FullTooltip: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies that are soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> additional damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and adding <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds to the duration of the Slow from Keg Smash. <n/><n/>After being used or after <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, this ability becomes Keg Smash.<n/><n/><c val="e1c72c">Keg Smash</c><n/>Damage and Slow enemies.

ChenEyeOfTheTiger.name: Eye of the Tiger
ChenEyeOfTheTiger.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage, heal
ChenEyeOfTheTiger.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage and heal Chen for<c val="bfd4fd"> 40%</c> of the damage done.

ChenFreshestIngredients.name: Freshest Ingredients
ChenFreshestIngredients.FullTooltip: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 100%.Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

ChenStormstoutSecretRecipe.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
ChenStormstoutSecretRecipe.FullTooltip: Chen heals for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5%</c> of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

ChenDeadlyStrike.name: Deadly Strike
ChenDeadlyStrike.ShortTooltip: Increase Flying Kick damage and remove Brew cost
ChenDeadlyStrike.FullTooltip: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

ChenAccumulatingFlame.name: Accumulating Flame
ChenAccumulatingFlame.FullTooltip: Increase Ignited damage by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

ChenWitheringFlames.name: Withering Flames
ChenWitheringFlames.ShortTooltip: Igniting Heroes reduces their Spell Power
ChenWitheringFlames.FullTooltip: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ChenGiftOfTheOxStagger.name: Gift of the Ox
ChenGiftOfTheOxStagger.ShortTooltip: Increase Stagger's duration, reduce damage taken
ChenGiftOfTheOxStagger.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of damage taken.

ChenBrewmastersBalance.name: Brewmaster's Balance
ChenBrewmastersBalance.ShortTooltip: Gain bonuses based on current level of Brew
ChenBrewmastersBalance.FullTooltip: While at or below <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Brew, gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed. While at or above <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Brew, regenerate an additional <c val="bfd4fd">18~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

ChenElusiveBrawler.name: Elusive Brawler
ChenElusiveBrawler.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ChenHeroicAbilityWanderingKeg.name: Wandering Keg
ChenHeroicAbilityWanderingKeg.ShortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
ChenHeroicAbilityWanderingKeg.FullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> increased Movement Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">59~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChenHeroicAbilityStormEarthFire.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
ChenHeroicAbilityStormEarthFire.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds, each with <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability. The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.<n/><n/><c val="00ffff">Storm</c> can grant the spirits a Shield. <n/><c val="00ff00">Earth</c> can leap to an area and Slow enemies. <n/><c val="ff6600">Fire</c> can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

ChenPressurePoint.name: Pressure Point
ChenPressurePoint.FullTooltip: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, or by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

ChenMasteryKegSmashATouchOfHoney.name: A Touch of Honey
ChenMasteryKegSmashATouchOfHoney.ShortTooltip: Increase Keg Smash Slow amount, duration
ChenMasteryKegSmashATouchOfHoney.FullTooltip: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

ChenRingofFire.name: Ring of Fire
ChenRingofFire.ShortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies after Igniting them
ChenRingofFire.FullTooltip: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage every second to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChenMasteryFortifyingBrewEnoughToShare.name: Enough to Share
ChenMasteryFortifyingBrewEnoughToShare.FullTooltip: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage, up to <c val="bfd4fd">420~~0.04~~</c>.

ChenFlyingLeap.name: Flying Leap
ChenFlyingLeap.FullTooltip: Increase Flying Kick's range by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> and reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

ChenCelerity.name: Celerity
ChenCelerity.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Stagger cooldown, grant Armor
ChenCelerity.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds and grant Chen <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChenComboStrikes.name: Combo Strikes
ChenComboStrikes.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack against the same target deals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> bonus damage. While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Attack Speed.

ChenMasteryWanderingKegUntappedPotential.name: Untapped Potential
ChenMasteryWanderingKegUntappedPotential.FullTooltip: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c>, and its Armor bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> for its duration and <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds afterwards.

ChenElementalConduit.name: Elemental Conduit
ChenElementalConduit.ShortTooltip: All Storm, Earth, Fire Abilities are empowered
ChenElementalConduit.FullTooltip: Increase the spirits' Health to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

ChenPurifyingBrew.name: Purifying Brew
ChenPurifyingBrew.FullTooltip: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ChenEnergizingBrew.name: Energizing Brew
ChenEnergizingBrew.ShortTooltip: Fortifying Brew gives maximum Health, damage
ChenEnergizingBrew.FullTooltip: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus Health and <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus damage for <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

Cho.name: Cho
Cho.title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain
Cho.SearchText: Cho'gall Chogall gall Ogre Twoheaded Two Headed Two-headed War2 Warcraft2 WC2 Warcraft II 2 Tides of Darkness ToD WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm Warlords of Draenor WoD Horde
Cho.Description: Head 1 of a 2 Headed Hero, Cho controls the body of Cho'gall.
Cho.InfoText: Cho’gall is one of the most powerful, intelligent, and insane ogre-magi to have ever lived. As the leader of the Twilight's Hammer the two brothers seek to bring about an age of destruction... whenever they aren’t bickering that is.

ChoSurgingFistCast.name: Surging Fist
ChoSurgingFistCast.ShortTooltip: Dash a direction knocking aside enemies
ChoSurgingFistCast.FullTooltip: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage. The dash range increases by up to <c val="bfd4fd">250%</c>, depending on how long it is charged.

ChoConsumingBlaze.name: Consuming Blaze
ChoConsumingBlaze.ShortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal Cho
ChoConsumingBlaze.FullTooltip: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> when an enemy is Ignited.

ChoRuneBomb.name: Rune Bomb
ChoRuneBomb.ShortTooltip: Throw a Rune Bomb down a line. Gall can detonate it to do area damage
ChoRuneBomb.FullTooltip: Roll a bomb dealing <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area.

ChoUpheaval.name: Upheaval
ChoUpheaval.ShortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
ChoUpheaval.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">175~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ChoHammerOfTwilight.name: Hammer of Twilight
ChoHammerOfTwilight.ShortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
ChoHammerOfTwilight.FullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.045~~</c> damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Cho's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased damage.

ChoOgreHide.name: Ogre Hide
ChoOgreHide.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ChoSurgingFistTrigger.name: Surging Fist
ChoSurgingFistTrigger.FullTooltip: Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage. The dash range increases by up to <c val="bfd4fd">250%</c>, depending on how long it is charged.

ChoOgreHidePassive.name: Ogre Hide
ChoOgreHidePassive.FullTooltip: Cho's Armor is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>, but Gall's damage is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.<n/><n/>Gall can activate Ogre Rage to grant himself <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased damage, but remove this Armor bonus.

ChoConsumingFire.name: Consuming Fire
ChoConsumingFire.FullTooltip: Consuming Blaze heals for <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> more when a Hero is Ignited.

ChoFuelForTheFlame.name: Fuel for the Flame
ChoFuelForTheFlame.FullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

ChoCallousedHide.name: Calloused Hide
ChoCallousedHide.ShortTooltip: Low health increases healing, Move Speed
ChoCallousedHide.FullTooltip: While under <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> maximum Health, Cho gains <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> increased Movement Speed and healing received.

ChoUppercut.name: Uppercut
ChoUppercut.FullTooltip: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> of their max Health.

ChoRollback.name: Rollback
ChoRollback.FullTooltip: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

ChoSearedFlesh.name: Seared Flesh
ChoSearedFlesh.ShortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal bonus damage
ChoSearedFlesh.FullTooltip: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> damage. This bonus lasts <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

ChoPowerSurge.name: Power Surge
ChoPowerSurge.ShortTooltip: Surging Fist cooldown lowers against Heroes
ChoPowerSurge.FullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChoFirestarter.name: Firestarter
ChoFirestarter.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChoEnragedRegeneration.name: Enraged Regeneration
ChoEnragedRegeneration.ShortTooltip: Cho heals from Hero damage, Gall reduces enemy healing
ChoEnragedRegeneration.FullTooltip: Each time Cho hits an enemy Hero with an Ability or Basic Attack, he heals for <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Gall's Dread Orb receive <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> less healing for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ChoHeroicAbilityHammerOfTwilight.name: Hammer of Twilight
ChoHeroicAbilityHammerOfTwilight.ShortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
ChoHeroicAbilityHammerOfTwilight.FullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.045~~</c> damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Cho's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased damage.

ChoHeroicAbilityUpheaval.name: Upheaval
ChoHeroicAbilityUpheaval.ShortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
ChoHeroicAbilityUpheaval.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">175~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ChoSurgingDash.name: Surging Dash
ChoSurgingDash.FullTooltip: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

ChoTwilightVeil.name: Twilight Veil
ChoTwilightVeil.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Ogre Hide Armor
ChoTwilightVeil.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide to <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

ChoTalentMoltenBlock.name: Molten Block
ChoTalentMoltenBlock.FullTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, damaging nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">92~~0.04~~</c> damage per second.

ChoFrenziedFists.name: Frenzied Fists
ChoFrenziedFists.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after using Surging Fist.

ChoRunicFeedback.name: Runic Feedback
ChoRunicFeedback.ShortTooltip: Runic Blast reduces Rune Bomb cooldown
ChoRunicFeedback.FullTooltip: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second per enemy hit, and <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds for each Hero hit.

ChoRunedGauntlet.name: Runed Gauntlet
ChoRunedGauntlet.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>.

ChoCthunsGift.name: C'Thun's Gift
ChoCthunsGift.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks are now ranged, Slow targets
ChoCthunsGift.FullTooltip: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ChoFavorOfTheOldGods.name: Favor of the Old Gods
ChoFavorOfTheOldGods.FullTooltip: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ChoTheWillofCho.name: The Will of Cho
ChoTheWillofCho.FullTooltip: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>, to a max of <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> extra Armor.

ChoHourofTwilight.name: Hour of Twilight
ChoHourofTwilight.FullTooltip: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

Chromie.name: Chromie
Chromie.title: Keeper of Time
Chromie.SearchText: Chronormu Bronze Dragon WoW World of Warcraft Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords of Draenor WoD
Chromie.Description: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.
Chromie.InfoText: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.

ChromieSandBlast.name: Sand Blast
ChromieSandBlast.ShortTooltip: Fire a long range blast that damages an enemy
ChromieSandBlast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, fire a missile that deals <c val="bfd4fd">305~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> damage. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Echo active at a time.

ChromieDragonsBreath.name: Dragon’s Breath
ChromieDragonsBreath.ShortTooltip: Fire a series of blasts in an area
ChromieDragonsBreath.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Launch <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> blasts into the air that land every <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">215~~0.04~~</c> damage each.

ChromieTimeTrap.name: Time Trap
ChromieTimeTrap.ShortTooltip: Place a trap that Time Stops Heroes
ChromieTimeTrap.FullTooltip: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> trap active at a time.

ChromieTemporalLoop.name: Temporal Loop
ChromieTemporalLoop.ShortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
ChromieTemporalLoop.FullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.<n/><n/>Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">500%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

ChromieSlowingSands.name: Slowing Sands
ChromieSlowingSands.FullTooltip: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>.

ChromieTimewalkerTrait.name: Timewalker
ChromieTimewalkerTrait.ShortTooltip: Gain Talents earlier than everyone else
ChromieTimewalkerTrait.FullTooltip: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> levels earlier than her teammates!<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Detonate Time Trap</s><n/><n/>Detonates active Time Traps.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ChromieTimeTrapDetonate.name: Detonate Time Trap
ChromieTimeTrapDetonate.ShortTooltip: Detonate a trap that Time Stops Heroes
ChromieTimeTrapDetonate.FullTooltip: Detonates active Time Traps, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ChromieSandBlastOnceAgainTheFirstTime.name: Once Again the First Time
ChromieSandBlastOnceAgainTheFirstTime.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Sand Blast gains another Echo
ChromieSandBlastOnceAgainTheFirstTime.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes.Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.

ChromieDragonsBreathDeepBreathing.name: Deep Breathing
ChromieDragonsBreathDeepBreathing.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hitting Heroes empowers Dragon's Breath
ChromieDragonsBreathDeepBreathing.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 75.Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 75 and also increase Chromie's vision radius by 100%.

ChromieTimewalkersPursuit.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
ChromieTimewalkersPursuit.ShortTooltip: Activate to reveal an area<n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase Spell Power
ChromieTimewalkersPursuit.FullTooltip: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 15% Spell Power.

ChromieTimeTrapChronicConditions.name: Chronic Conditions
ChromieTimeTrapChronicConditions.ShortTooltip: Time Trap affects enemy/allied Move Speed
ChromieTimeTrapChronicConditions.FullTooltip: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and allies gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChromieTimeTrapTimeTroubles.name: Time Troubles
ChromieTimeTrapTimeTroubles.FullTooltip: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and allies gain <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChromieTimeTrapAndorhalAnomaly.name: Andorhal Anomaly
ChromieTimeTrapAndorhalAnomaly.ShortTooltip: Increase Time Trap charges, reduce cooldown
ChromieTimeTrapAndorhalAnomaly.FullTooltip: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c>, and reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

ChromieSandBlastBronzeTalons.name: Bronze Talons
ChromieSandBlastBronzeTalons.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> additional Basic Attack damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChromieDragonsBreathMobiusLoop.name: Mobius Loop
ChromieDragonsBreathMobiusLoop.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Dragon's Breath cooldown
ChromieDragonsBreathMobiusLoop.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Dragon's Breath reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and restores <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Mana.

ChromieAProperGreeting.name: A Proper Greeting
ChromieAProperGreeting.ShortTooltip: Damage disabled Heroes to increase damage
ChromieAProperGreeting.FullTooltip: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> additional damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ChromieHeroicAbilitySlowingSands.name: Slowing Sands
ChromieHeroicAbilitySlowingSands.FullTooltip: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>.

ChromieHeroicAbilityTemporalLoop.name: Temporal Loop
ChromieHeroicAbilityTemporalLoop.ShortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
ChromieHeroicAbilityTemporalLoop.FullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.<n/><n/>Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">500%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

ChromieSandBlastGnomeSpeedAhead.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
ChromieSandBlastGnomeSpeedAhead.ShortTooltip: Sand Blast increases Move Speed and Regen
ChromieSandBlastGnomeSpeedAhead.FullTooltip: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> increased Health Regeneration for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChromieHereAndThere.name: Here and There
ChromieHereAndThere.ShortTooltip: Activate to swap positions with an Echo
ChromieHereAndThere.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

ChromieTimeOut.name: Time Out
ChromieTimeOut.FullTooltip: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

ChromieSandBlastShiftingSands.name: Shifting Sands
ChromieSandBlastShiftingSands.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

ChromieSandBlastFastForward.name: Fast Forward
ChromieSandBlastFastForward.ShortTooltip: Long range Sand Blasts reduce its cooldown
ChromieSandBlastFastForward.FullTooltip: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and it refunds <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana.

ChromieQuantumOverdrive.name: Quantum Overdrive
ChromieQuantumOverdrive.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ChromieSlowingSandsUnravelling.name: Unravelling
