ChromieSlowingSandsUnravelling.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> up to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c>.

ChromieTemporalLoopStuckInALoop.name: Stuck in a Loop
ChromieTemporalLoopStuckInALoop.FullTooltip: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from <c val="bfd4fd">500%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">700%</c>.

ChromieSandBlastPiercingSands.name: Piercing Sands
ChromieSandBlastPiercingSands.FullTooltip: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.

ChromieBlessingOfTheBronze.name: Blessing of the Bronze
ChromieBlessingOfTheBronze.ShortTooltip: Increase allied Move Speed and reduce cooldowns
ChromieBlessingOfTheBronze.FullTooltip: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

Crusader.name: Johanna
Crusader.title: Crusader of Zakarum
Crusader.SearchText: Johanna Johana Joana Joanna Crusader Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS
Crusader.Description: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions.
Crusader.InfoText: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.

CrusaderPunish.name: Punish
CrusaderPunish.FullTooltip: Step forward dealing <c val="bfd4fd">113~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

CrusaderCondemn.name: Condemn
CrusaderCondemn.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

CrusaderShieldGlare.name: Shield Glare
CrusaderShieldGlare.ShortTooltip: Damages and blinds enemies in a cone
CrusaderShieldGlare.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">59~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Blind them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

CrusaderFallingSword.name: Falling Sword
CrusaderFallingSword.ShortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
CrusaderFallingSword.FullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area. While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. <n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds Johanna lands, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.2</c> seconds, and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

CrusaderBlessedShield.name: Blessed Shield
CrusaderBlessedShield.ShortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
CrusaderBlessedShield.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun the first enemy hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">57~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

CrusaderIronSkin.name: Iron Skin
CrusaderIronSkin.ShortTooltip: Becomes Unstoppable and gains a Shield
CrusaderIronSkin.FullTooltip: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">674~~0.04~~</c> damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

CrusaderMasteryIronSkinReinforce.name: Reinforce
CrusaderMasteryIronSkinReinforce.FullTooltip: Using a Basic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> Physical Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

CrusaderMasteryIronSkinHoldYourGround.name: Hold Your Ground
CrusaderMasteryIronSkinHoldYourGround.ShortTooltip: Increases Iron Skin Shield, reduced cooldown
CrusaderMasteryIronSkinHoldYourGround.FullTooltip: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

CrusaderMasteryLawsOfHope.name: Laws of Hope
CrusaderMasteryLawsOfHope.ShortTooltip: Increases Health Regen, activate to burst heal
CrusaderMasteryLawsOfHope.FullTooltip: Activate to heal <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of Johanna's max Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">1.5~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

CrusaderMasteryCondemnEternalRetaliation.name: Eternal Retaliation
CrusaderMasteryCondemnEternalRetaliation.FullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and refund <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> targets.

CrusaderMasteryCondemnConviction.name: Conviction
CrusaderMasteryCondemnConviction.FullTooltip: Movement Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> while Condemn is charging up.

CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareSinsExposed.name: Sins Exposed
CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareSinsExposed.ShortTooltip: Shield Glare makes enemies take bonus damage
CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareSinsExposed.FullTooltip: Shield Glare marks enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> extra damage and the mark is removed.

CrusaderMasteryPunishSubdue.name: Subdue
CrusaderMasteryPunishSubdue.FullTooltip: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

CrusaderZealousGlare.name: Zealous Glare
CrusaderZealousGlare.FullTooltip: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

BattleMomentumCrusader.name: Blessed Momentum
BattleMomentumCrusader.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

CrusaderHeroicAbilityFallingSword.name: Falling Sword
CrusaderHeroicAbilityFallingSword.ShortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
CrusaderHeroicAbilityFallingSword.FullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area. While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. <n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds Johanna lands, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.2</c> seconds, and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

CrusaderHeroicAbilityBlessedShield.name: Blessed Shield
CrusaderHeroicAbilityBlessedShield.ShortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
CrusaderHeroicAbilityBlessedShield.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun the first enemy hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">57~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

CrusaderMasteryPunishRoar.name: Roar
CrusaderMasteryPunishRoar.FullTooltip: Increase Punish's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. This bonus is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> whenever Punish hits <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Heroes.

CrusaderHolyFury.name: Holy Fury
CrusaderHolyFury.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">12~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

CrusaderBlessedHammer.name: Blessed Hammer
CrusaderBlessedHammer.FullTooltip: Activate to create <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit.<n/><n/>Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareHolyRenewal.name: Holy Renewal
CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareHolyRenewal.ShortTooltip: Shield Glare heals for each Hero hit
CrusaderMasteryShieldGlareHolyRenewal.FullTooltip: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> health.

CrusaderMasteryIronSkinFanaticism.name: Fanaticism
CrusaderMasteryIronSkinFanaticism.ShortTooltip: Damage taken during Iron Skin grants Move Speed
CrusaderMasteryIronSkinFanaticism.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

GenericTalentImposingPresence.name: Imposing Presence
GenericTalentImposingPresence.ShortTooltip: Activate to Slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
GenericTalentImposingPresence.FullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of nearby Heroes and Summons for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5 </c>seconds.

CrusaderMasteryFallingSwordHeavensFury.name: Heaven's Fury
CrusaderMasteryFallingSwordHeavensFury.ShortTooltip: Falling Sword bombards enemies with holy bolts
CrusaderMasteryFallingSwordHeavensFury.FullTooltip: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds for each enemy hit.

CrusaderMasteryBlessedShieldRadiatingFai.name: Radiating Faith
CrusaderMasteryBlessedShieldRadiatingFai.ShortTooltip: Increase Blessed Shield Stun duration, max targets
CrusaderMasteryBlessedShieldRadiatingFai.FullTooltip: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>. Its Stun duration is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

CrusaderHeroicMasteryIndestructable.name: Indestructible
CrusaderHeroicMasteryIndestructable.ShortTooltip: Gain a Shield instead of dying
CrusaderHeroicMasteryIndestructable.FullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">120</c> second cooldown.

CrusaderBlindedByTheLight.name: Blinded By The Light
CrusaderBlindedByTheLight.FullTooltip: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of their maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

Deathwing.name: Deathwing
Deathwing.title: The Destroyer
Deathwing.SearchText: Warcraft WC2 WoW Cataclysm dragon Neltharion the Earth-Warder
Deathwing.Description: A Massive Unstoppable Dragon that can withstand punishment while dishing it out, but is unaffected by allied Abilities.
Deathwing.InfoText: One of the five Dragon Aspects and the leader of the Black Dragonflight, Neltharion the Earth-Warder was once a protector of Azeroth. During the War of the Ancients, he was driven mad by the Old Gods and turned against his former allies. Now known as Deathwing the Destroyer, he has found his way to the Nexus where his limitless rage drives his ultimate goal of widespread destruction and the eventual end of all living things.

DeathwingMoltenFlame.name: Molten Flame
DeathwingMoltenFlame.ShortTooltip: Melt enemies with a stream of molten flame
DeathwingMoltenFlame.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, Deathwing breathes a stream of flame, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">21~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.125</c> seconds. Drains <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Energy per second.

DeathwingIncinerate.name: Incinerate
DeathwingIncinerate.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, Deathwing flaps his wings, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker: Lava Burst</c><n/>Create a lava pool that damages and Slows

DeathwingOnslaught.name: Onslaught
DeathwingOnslaught.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Deathwing lunges in a direction dealing <c val="bfd4fd">38~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Deathwing bites enemies at the end of the lunge, dealing an additional <c val="bfd4fd">72~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker: Earth Shatter</c><n/>Damage and Stun enemies in two lines

DeathwingCataclysm.name: Cataclysm
DeathwingCataclysm.ShortTooltip: Deathwing flies over an area, causing devastation in his wake.
DeathwingCataclysm.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, Deathwing flies in the targeted direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact and leaving scorched ground that deals <c val="bfd4fd">36~~0.04~~</c> damage a second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DeathwingAspectOfDeath.name: Aspect of Death
DeathwingAspectOfDeath.ShortTooltip: Deathwing is especially powerful, but ignores friendly effects
DeathwingAspectOfDeath.FullTooltip: Deathwing is fitted with <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Armor Plates which grant <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor each. Every <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Health lost causes Deathwing to lose a plate. Plates are only restored when Dragonflight is used, based on the amount of Health Deathwing has when landing.<n/><n/>Deathwing is also a mighty Dragon Aspect who is permanently Unstoppable and deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> additional Spell Damage to Heroes, but views his allies with contempt and ignores any of their friendly effects.

DeathwingDragonflight.name: Dragonflight
DeathwingDragonflight.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, fly into the sky, becoming Immune to all effects and gaining <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> Health per second. Once cast, this ability cannot be interrupted. Cannot be cast for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds after taking damage, Basic Attacking or casting an Ability.

DeathwingFormSwitch.name: Form Switch
DeathwingFormSwitch.FullTooltip: Switches Deathwing between <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> and <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker</c> forms, each granting access to two unique Basic Abilities.<n/><n/><c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Incinerate</c> damages enemies around Deathwing and <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Onslaught</c> allows him to lunge at enemies.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">Lava Burst</c> creates a Slowing area and <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Earth Shatter</c> Stuns enemies in two lines.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DeathwingDestroyerForm.name: Destroyer
DeathwingDestroyerForm.ShortTooltip: Land on the ground in Destroyer form
DeathwingDestroyerForm.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds, Deathwing slams down to the ground, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area and landing in <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> form. Deathwing can begin to cast Abilities <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after landing.

DeathwingWorldbreakerForm.name: World Breaker
DeathwingWorldbreakerForm.ShortTooltip: Land on the ground in World Breaker form
DeathwingWorldbreakerForm.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds, Deathwing slams down to the ground, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area and landing in <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker</c> form. Deathwing can begin to cast Abilities <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after landing.

DeathwingMoltenFlameCancel.name: Cancel
DeathwingMoltenFlameCancel.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, Deathwing breathes a stream of flame, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">21~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.125</c> seconds. Drains <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Energy per second.

DeathwingLavaBurst.name: Lava Burst
DeathwingLavaBurst.ShortTooltip: Create a lava pool that damages and Slows
DeathwingLavaBurst.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second delay, deal <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in an area and create a pool of magma that deals <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer: Incinerate</c><n/>Damage enemies near Deathwing

DeathwingEarthShatter.name: Earth Shatter
DeathwingEarthShatter.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in two lines
DeathwingEarthShatter.FullTooltip: Create a fissure of earth that deals <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit and Stuns them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer: Onslaught</c><n/>Lunge in a direction

DeathwingSkyfall.name: Skyfall
DeathwingSkyfall.ShortTooltip: Deathwing can drop meteors while in Dragonflight
DeathwingSkyfall.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.8</c> seconds, a meteor falls from the sky, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">58~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area.<n/><n/>If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of his maximum Health.

DeathwingDragonSoul.name: Dragon Soul
DeathwingDragonSoul.ShortTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Incinerate</c>, <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Lava Burst</c> explosion heal Deathwing
DeathwingDragonSoul.FullTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer:</c> <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Incinerate</c> heals Deathwing for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker: Lava Burst's</c> explosion damage heals Deathwing for <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.

DeathwingMoltenBlood.name: Molten Blood
DeathwingMoltenBlood.FullTooltip: While Deathwing has <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> or more Armor Plates, he heals for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5%</c> of his maximum Health per second.

DeathwingDraconicMight.name: Draconic Might
DeathwingDraconicMight.ShortTooltip: Protected from Armor Plate loss, Basic Attacks heal
DeathwingDraconicMight.FullTooltip: Deathwing's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes heal him for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage dealt. Upon losing an Armor Plate, Deathwing becomes Protected for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

DeathwingInfernus.name: Infernus
DeathwingInfernus.ShortTooltip: Increase Molten Flame damage at high Energy
DeathwingInfernus.FullTooltip: When Molten Flame is cast at <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Energy or higher, its damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> against Heroes.

DeathwingHeatWave.name: Heat Wave
DeathwingHeatWave.ShortTooltip: Increase <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Incinerate</c> and <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Lava Burst</c> damage
DeathwingHeatWave.FullTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer:</c> After hitting an enemy Hero with <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Incinerate</c>, Deathwing deals <c val="bfd4fd">12~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to all nearby enemies for the next <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> times.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker:</c> Increase the explosion damage of <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Lava Burst</c> by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c>.

DeathwingDragonsIre.name: Dragon's Ire
DeathwingDragonsIre.ShortTooltip: Deathwing gains damage while missing Armor Plates
DeathwingDragonsIre.FullTooltip: While Deathwing has <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> or fewer Armor Plates, his damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

DeathwingFirestorm.name: Firestorm
DeathwingFirestorm.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Deathwing's landing Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. When Deathwing lands, he drops <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> meteors near the landing area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">65~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit. Heroes hit by the meteors reduce Dragonflight's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Meteors prioritize landing on Heroes, otherwise they fall randomly in the area.

DeathwingDeathDrop.name: Death Drop
DeathwingDeathDrop.ShortTooltip: Landing on Heroes reduces Spell Armor
DeathwingDeathDrop.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> or <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker's</c> landing damage reduces their Spell Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds and Deathwing's Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

DeathwingSkyfall.name: Skyfall
DeathwingSkyfall.ShortTooltip: Deathwing can drop meteors to heal himself
DeathwingSkyfall.FullTooltip: After using Dragonflight, Deathwing can drop meteors anywhere within vision dealing <c val="bfd4fd">58~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area. Has <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.<n/><n/>If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of his maximum Health.

DeathwingBurnBeneathMyShadow.name: Burn Beneath My Shadow
DeathwingBurnBeneathMyShadow.ShortTooltip: Destroying Forts or Keeps refreshes Cataclysm
DeathwingBurnBeneathMyShadow.FullTooltip: When an enemy Fort or Keep is destroyed the cooldown of Cataclysm is reset. Cataclysm's periodic damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c>.

DeathwingBellowingRoar.name: Bellowing Roar
DeathwingBellowingRoar.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Deathwing unleashes a mighty roar, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">25~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby Heroes and causing them to run in Fear for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

DeathwingWickedInferno.name: Wicked Inferno
DeathwingWickedInferno.FullTooltip: Molten Flame's Energy cost per second is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c>. After using Molten Flame, Deathwing gains <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Energy over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

DeathwingRuination.name: Ruination
DeathwingRuination.ShortTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Onslaught</c> bite Slows, <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Earth Shatter</c> cost reduced
DeathwingRuination.FullTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer:</c> The bite from <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Onslaught</c> now Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker:</c> Reduce <c val="d8ab80-87564b">Earth Shatter's</c> cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds and its Energy cost by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c>.

DeathwingFireAndFury.name: Fire and Fury
DeathwingFireAndFury.ShortTooltip: Empower Basic Attacks against disabled enemies
DeathwingFireAndFury.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Rooted, Slowed, or Stunned enemy Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> additional damage and reduce the cooldowns of Deathwing's Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

DeathwingConflagration.name: Conflagration
DeathwingConflagration.ShortTooltip: Molten Flame causes Heroes to explode
DeathwingConflagration.FullTooltip: Dealing <c val="bfd4fd">320~~0.04~~</c> damage with Molten Flame to enemy Heroes within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds causes them to burn for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. While burning, they explode every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies.

DeathwingGazeOntoDestruction.name: Gaze Onto Destruction
DeathwingGazeOntoDestruction.ShortTooltip: Landing on Heroes Slows and reduces damage
DeathwingGazeOntoDestruction.FullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> or <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker's</c> landing causes their damage to be reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and Slows them by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

DeathwingElementiumPlating.name: Elementium Plating
DeathwingElementiumPlating.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield, restore Health
DeathwingElementiumPlating.FullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of Deathwing's missing Health for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. While the Shield holds, Deathwing regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of his maximum Health per second. <n/><n/>When the Shield expires or is destroyed, Deathwing regains Armor Plates appropriate for his new Health.<n/><n/>The Shield and effect end immediately if Deathwing uses Dragonflight.

DeathwingStoodInTheFire.name: Stood in the Fire
DeathwingStoodInTheFire.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> while standing in scorched ground, and its duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

DeathwingArrivalOfAGod.name: Arrival of a God
DeathwingArrivalOfAGod.ShortTooltip: Landing damage increased, gain all level 7 talents
DeathwingArrivalOfAGod.FullTooltip: <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> or <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker's</c> landing damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">400%</c>.<n/><n/>Deathwing also gains the benefits of all of his level <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> talents.

DeathwingDestroyersRampage.name: Destroyer's Rampage
DeathwingDestroyersRampage.ShortTooltip: Landing in <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> form empowers Deathwing
DeathwingDestroyersRampage.FullTooltip: For the next <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds after landing in <c val="ef6e28-ad231e">Destroyer</c> form, Deathwing's damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> and his Basic Ability cooldowns recharge <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.<n/><n/>Damaging Heroes refreshes this effect and switching to <c val="d8ab80-87564b">World Breaker</c> form removes the effect.

Deckard.name: Deckard
Deckard.title: The Last Horadrim
Deckard.SearchText: Cain D1 D2 D3 Diablo 1 2 3 I II III Diablo1 Diablo2 Diablo3
Deckard.Description: A burst Healer who excels at preparing the battlefield before a fight and can cripple enemies with crowd control.
Deckard.InfoText: As an avid scholar, Deckard Cain has dedicated his life to the pursuit of knowledge. He has been an advisor, storyteller, and friend to Sanctuary's greatest heroes, guiding them through peril time and again. When Deckard speaks, it's wise to stay awhile and listen.

DeckardHealingPotion.name: Healing Potion
DeckardHealingPotion.FullTooltip: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for <c val="bfd4fd">270~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Limit <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> active Potions.

DeckardHoradricCube.name: Horadric Cube
DeckardHoradricCube.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
DeckardHoradricCube.FullTooltip: Release the Horadric Cube. After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds it explodes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

DeckardScrollOfSealing.name: Scroll Of Sealing
DeckardScrollOfSealing.ShortTooltip: Damage and Root enemies in an area
DeckardScrollOfSealing.FullTooltip: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over <c val="bfd4fd">2.25</c> seconds, forming a triangle that deals <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies inside and Roots them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.ShortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after.<n/><n/>Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

DeckardLorenado.name: Lorenado
DeckardLorenado.ShortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
DeckardLorenado.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

DeckardFortitudeOfTheFaithful.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
DeckardFortitudeOfTheFaithful.ShortTooltip: Nearby allies grant Armor, cooldown reduction
DeckardFortitudeOfTheFaithful.FullTooltip: When at least <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DeckardAncientBlessings.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
DeckardAncientBlessings.FullTooltip: When at least <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.<n/><n/>Activate to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, causing them to deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> for each Hero hit.

DeckardScrollOfIdentify.name: Scroll of Identify
DeckardScrollOfIdentify.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Scroll of Sealing reveals, reduces Armor
DeckardScrollOfIdentify.FullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.Reward: After hitting 14 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

DeckardFieldStudy.name: Field Study
DeckardFieldStudy.ShortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can grant Spell Power
DeckardFieldStudy.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">16</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

DeckardGemSapphire.name: Sapphire
DeckardGemSapphire.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by <c val="bfd4fd">100% </c>and its slow by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.<n/><n/>Only <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Gem may be active at a time.

DeckardPotionOfShielding.name: Potion of Shielding
DeckardPotionOfShielding.FullTooltip: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a <c val="bfd4fd">122~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DeckardRejuvenationPotion.name: Rejuvenation Potion
DeckardRejuvenationPotion.ShortTooltip: Healing Potions restore Mana, heal more
DeckardRejuvenationPotion.FullTooltip: Healing Potions restore <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana and heal for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">108~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DeckardGemRuby.name: Ruby
DeckardGemRuby.ShortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube creates Lesser Healing Potions
DeckardGemRuby.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by <c val="bfd4fd">100% </c> and it spawns <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Only <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Gem may be active at a time.

DeckardCubeMastery.name: Cube Mastery
DeckardCubeMastery.ShortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Scroll of Sealing cooldown
DeckardCubeMastery.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>. Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DeckardKanaisCube.name: Kanai's Cube
DeckardKanaisCube.ShortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt
DeckardKanaisCube.FullTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DeckardGemEmerald.name: Emerald
DeckardGemEmerald.ShortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube reduces enemy healing received
DeckardGemEmerald.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by <c val="bfd4fd">100% </c>and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Only <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Gem may be active at a time.

DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.ShortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
DeckardStayAWhileAndListen.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after.<n/><n/>Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

DeckardLorenado.name: Lorenado
DeckardLorenado.ShortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
DeckardLorenado.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

DeckardSuperHealingPotion.name: Super Healing Potion
DeckardSuperHealingPotion.ShortTooltip: Healing Potions heal more after a duration
DeckardSuperHealingPotion.FullTooltip: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, it heals for <c val="bfd4fd">120%</c> more.

DeckardPotionOfRevival.name: Potion of Revival
DeckardPotionOfRevival.ShortTooltip: Healing Potions heal in an area
DeckardPotionOfRevival.FullTooltip: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the healing amount.

DeckardAncientBlessings.name: Ancient Blessings
DeckardAncientBlessings.ShortTooltip: Activate Fortitude to empower ally Attacks
DeckardAncientBlessings.FullTooltip: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, causing them to deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

DeckardScrollOfStoneCurse.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
DeckardScrollOfStoneCurse.ShortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can deal more damage
DeckardScrollOfStoneCurse.FullTooltip: Scroll of Sealing deals <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> more damage when hitting at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes.

DeckardSafetyInNumbers.name: Safety in Numbers
DeckardSafetyInNumbers.ShortTooltip: Additional allies empower Fortitude of the Faithful
DeckardSafetyInNumbers.FullTooltip: If at least <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Armor, <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.

DeckardHoradricStaff.name: Horadric Staff
DeckardHoradricStaff.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

DeckardRespectTheElderly.name: Respect the Elderly
DeckardRespectTheElderly.ShortTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences, Blinds
DeckardRespectTheElderly.FullTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

DeckardMorenados.name: Morenados!
DeckardMorenados.FullTooltip: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

DeckardBottomlessFlask.name: Bottomless Flask
DeckardBottomlessFlask.FullTooltip: After use, Healing Potions recharge after <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

DeckardPerfectGems.name: Perfect Gems
DeckardPerfectGems.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

Dehaka.name: Dehaka
Dehaka.title: Primal Pack Leader
Dehaka.SearchText: Dahaka Deaka Primal Zerg SC 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 StarCraft II Heart of the Swarm HotS
Dehaka.Description: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.
Dehaka.InfoText: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.

DehakaDrag.name: Drag
DehakaDrag.ShortTooltip: Deal light damage and drag an enemy
DehakaDrag.FullTooltip: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

DehakaDarkSwarm.name: Dark Swarm
DehakaDarkSwarm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">49~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

DehakaBurrow.name: Burrow
DehakaBurrow.ShortTooltip: Gain Stasis by burrowing into the ground
DehakaBurrow.FullTooltip: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

DehakaIsolation.name: Isolation
DehakaIsolation.ShortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
DehakaIsolation.FullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DehakaAdaptation.name: Adaptation
DehakaAdaptation.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, heal for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

DehakaEssenceCollection.name: Essence Collection
DehakaEssenceCollection.ShortTooltip: Collect and consume enemy Essence to heal
DehakaEssenceCollection.FullTooltip: Heal Dehaka for <c val="bfd4fd">29~~0.04~~</c> Health per stored Essence over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Essence from Takedowns and <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Essence.

DehakaBrushstalker.name: Brushstalker
DehakaBrushstalker.ShortTooltip: Burrow to a bush on the Battleground.
DehakaBrushstalker.FullTooltip: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> movement speed while in a bush and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after leaving.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DehakaDarkSwarmTalentEnduringSwarm.name: Enduring Swarm
DehakaDarkSwarmTalentEnduringSwarm.ShortTooltip: Increases Dark Swarm duration, grants Spell Armor
DehakaDarkSwarmTalentEnduringSwarm.FullTooltip: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and grants <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor while active.

DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentTissueRegen.name: Tissue Regeneration
DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentTissueRegen.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Essence increases Health Regen, max Essence
DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentTissueRegen.FullTooltip: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentEnhancedAgi.name: Enhanced Agility
DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentEnhancedAgi.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Essence increases Brushstalker Move Speed
DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentEnhancedAgi.FullTooltip: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

DehakaBurrowTalentLurkerStrain.name: Lurker Strain
DehakaBurrowTalentLurkerStrain.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

DehakaEssenceCollectionOneWhoCollectsTal.name: One-Who-Collects
DehakaEssenceCollectionOneWhoCollectsTal.FullTooltip: Increases Essence collected from Minions by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentHeroStalker.name: Hero Stalker
DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentHeroStalker.FullTooltip: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>, and gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

DehakaDragTalentFeedingFrenzy.name: Feeding Frenzy
DehakaDragTalentFeedingFrenzy.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

DehakaDragTalentParalyzingEnzymes.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
DehakaDragTalentParalyzingEnzymes.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Drag by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Drag Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after it ends.

DehakaDarkSwarmTalentSymbiosis.name: Symbiosis
DehakaDarkSwarmTalentSymbiosis.ShortTooltip: Reduces Dark Swarm cooldown against Heroes
DehakaDarkSwarmTalentSymbiosis.FullTooltip: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.4</c> seconds.

DehakaHeroicAbilityIsolation.name: Isolation
DehakaHeroicAbilityIsolation.ShortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
DehakaHeroicAbilityIsolation.FullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DehakaHeroicAbilityAdaptation.name: Adaptation
DehakaHeroicAbilityAdaptation.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, heal for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

DehakaPrimalRage.name: Primal Rage
DehakaPrimalRage.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

DehakaBrushstalkerFerociousStalker.name: Ferocious Stalker
DehakaBrushstalkerFerociousStalker.ShortTooltip: Brushstalker Slows, increases Dark Swarm damage
DehakaBrushstalkerFerociousStalker.FullTooltip: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

DehakaPrimalSwarm.name: Primal Swarm
DehakaPrimalSwarm.FullTooltip: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> extra damage.

DehakaPackLeaderBrushstalkerTalent.name: Pack Leader
DehakaPackLeaderBrushstalkerTalent.FullTooltip: Dehaka gains <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor while in a bush and for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after leaving.

DehakaIsolationTalentContagion.name: Contagion
DehakaIsolationTalentContagion.FullTooltip: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

DehakaAdaptationChangeIsSurvivalTalent.name: Change Is Survival
DehakaAdaptationChangeIsSurvivalTalent.FullTooltip: Increases Adaptation healing to <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

DehakaBrushstalkerApexPredator.name: Apex Predator
DehakaBrushstalkerApexPredator.FullTooltip: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">35</c> seconds and the cast time by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

DehakaEssenceClaws.name: Essence Claws
DehakaEssenceClaws.FullTooltip: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Essence.

DemonHunter.name: Valla
DemonHunter.title: Demon Hunter
DemonHunter.SearchText: Valla Demon Hunter demonhunter DH Nephalem Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 III Diablo3 Reaper of Souls RoS
DemonHunter.Description: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.
DemonHunter.InfoText: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.

DemonHunterHungeringArrow.name: Hungering Arrow
DemonHunterHungeringArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire an arrow which seeks out and strikes multiple targets
DemonHunterHungeringArrow.FullTooltip: Fire an arrow that deals <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

DemonHunterMultishot.name: Multishot
DemonHunterMultishot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">172~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within the target area.

DemonHunterVault.name: Vault
DemonHunterVault.FullTooltip: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> increased damage per stack of Hatred.

DemonHunterStrafe.name: Strafe
DemonHunterStrafe.ShortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
DemonHunterStrafe.FullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> range for <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DemonHunterRainOfVengeance.name: Rain of Vengeance
DemonHunterRainOfVengeance.FullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage and stuns enemies in the target area for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

DemonHunterHatred.name: Hatred
DemonHunterHatred.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Damage and Move Speed temporarily
DemonHunterHatred.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c>. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> and Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DemonHunterMasteryMonsterHunterHungering.name: Monster Hunter
DemonHunterMasteryMonsterHunterHungering.ShortTooltip: Reduces Hungering Arrow Mana cost and increases non-Hero damage
DemonHunterMasteryMonsterHunterHungering.FullTooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>.

DemonHunterMasteryCaltrops.name: Caltrops
DemonHunterMasteryCaltrops.ShortTooltip: Drop Caltrops while Vaulting <n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Maintain Hatred to empower Vault
DemonHunterMasteryCaltrops.FullTooltip: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60~~0.04~~ damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.

DemonHunterCombatStyleHotPursuit.name: Hot Pursuit
DemonHunterCombatStyleHotPursuit.ShortTooltip: Max Hatred increases Movement Speed and Mana Regen
DemonHunterCombatStyleHotPursuit.FullTooltip: When at <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> total and Valla gains <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Mana per second.

DemonHunterMasteryPuncturingArrow.name: Puncturing Arrow
DemonHunterMasteryPuncturingArrow.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hitting Heroes empowers Hungering Arrow
DemonHunterMasteryPuncturingArrow.FullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

DemonHunterPunishment.name: Punishment
DemonHunterPunishment.FullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c>.

DemonHunterCreedoftheHunter.name: Creed of the Hunter
DemonHunterCreedoftheHunter.ShortTooltip: Increases Attack Speed<n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Attacking Heroes empowers Hatred
DemonHunterCreedoftheHunter.FullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

DemonHunterMasteryArsenal.name: Arsenal
DemonHunterMasteryArsenal.FullTooltip: Multishot also fires <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> grenades which deal <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

DemonHunterDeathDealer.name: Death Dealer
DemonHunterDeathDealer.ShortTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus
DemonHunterDeathDealer.FullTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">14%</c> per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

DemonHunterMasteryRepeatingArrowVault.name: Repeating Arrow
DemonHunterMasteryRepeatingArrowVault.FullTooltip: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

DemonHunterHeroicAbilityStrafe.name: Strafe
DemonHunterHeroicAbilityStrafe.ShortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
DemonHunterHeroicAbilityStrafe.FullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> range for <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DemonHunterHeroicAbilityRainofVengeance.name: Rain of Vengeance
DemonHunterHeroicAbilityRainofVengeance.FullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage and stuns enemies in the target area for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

DemonHunterMasterySiphoningArrow.name: Siphoning Arrow
DemonHunterMasterySiphoningArrow.ShortTooltip: Hungering Arrow returns damage as Health
DemonHunterMasterySiphoningArrow.FullTooltip: Valla heals for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

DemonHunterCombatStyleTemperedByDiscipli.name: Tempered by Discipline
DemonHunterCombatStyleTemperedByDiscipli.ShortTooltip: Max Hatred grants healing on Basic Attacks
DemonHunterCombatStyleTemperedByDiscipli.FullTooltip: While at <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage dealt.

DemonHunterGloom.name: Gloom
DemonHunterGloom.ShortTooltip: Consume Hatred to gain Spell Armor
DemonHunterGloom.FullTooltip: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Permanently gain <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

DemonHunterMasteryFrostShot.name: Frost Shot
DemonHunterMasteryFrostShot.ShortTooltip: Multishot slows enemies and has increased range
DemonHunterMasteryFrostShot.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Multishot by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and it also slows by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

DemonHunterSeethingHatred.name: Seething Hatred
DemonHunterSeethingHatred.ShortTooltip: Max Hatred grants Spell Power, gain Hatred faster
DemonHunterSeethingHatred.FullTooltip: While at <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> stacks of Hatred, gain <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> stacks of Hatred.

DemonHunterManticore.name: Manticore
DemonHunterManticore.ShortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks against Heroes are empowered
DemonHunterManticore.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of their maximum Health as damage.

DemonHunterMasteryDeathSiphon.name: Death Siphon
DemonHunterMasteryDeathSiphon.FullTooltip: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for <c val="bfd4fd">34~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. <c val="bfd4fd">25% </c>of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

DemonHunterMasteryStormofVengeance.name: Storm of Vengeance
DemonHunterMasteryStormofVengeance.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

DemonHunterCombatStyleRancor.name: Rancor
DemonHunterCombatStyleRancor.FullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c>. While at <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> stacks of Hatred, gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Attack Speed.

DemonHunterFarflightQuiver.name: Farflight Quiver
DemonHunterFarflightQuiver.FullTooltip: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">2.2</c>.

Diablo.name: Diablo
Diablo.title: Lord of Terror
Diablo.SearchText: Diablo Demon Lord Terror D1 D2 D3 Diablo 1 2 3 I II III Diablo1 Diablo2 Diablo3 red
Diablo.Description: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.
Diablo.InfoText: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.

DiabloShadowCharge.name: Shadow Charge
DiabloShadowCharge.ShortTooltip: Charge to a target enemy and push them back
DiabloShadowCharge.FullTooltip: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage and gaining <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage.

DiabloFireStomp.name: Fire Stomp
DiabloFireStomp.ShortTooltip: Unleash fire waves in a direction
DiabloFireStomp.FullTooltip: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal <c val="bfd4fd">12~~0.04~~</c> damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional <c val="bfd4fd">36~~0.04~~</c> damage. Diablo heals for <c val="bfd4fd">130%</c> of the damage dealt to Heroes.

DiabloOverpower.name: Overpower
DiabloOverpower.ShortTooltip: Grab an enemy and slam them behind Diablo, stunning them and dealing damage
DiabloOverpower.FullTooltip: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">73~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning for <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

DiabloApocalypse.name: Apocalypse
DiabloApocalypse.FullTooltip: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds the rune explodes dealing <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

DiabloLightningBreath.name: Lightning Breath
DiabloLightningBreath.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo
DiabloLightningBreath.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. <n/><n/>Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

DiabloBlackSoulstone.name: Black Soulstone
DiabloBlackSoulstone.ShortTooltip: Gather souls from enemies to gain Health and resurrect faster
DiabloBlackSoulstone.FullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DiabloMasteryFeastOnFearBlackSoulstone.name: Feast on Fear
DiabloMasteryFeastOnFearBlackSoulstone.FullTooltip: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

DiabloMasteryDevilsDueBlackSoulstone.name: Devil's Due
DiabloMasteryDevilsDueBlackSoulstone.ShortTooltip: Souls empower Regen Globes, Healing Fountains
DiabloMasteryDevilsDueBlackSoulstone.FullTooltip: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by <c val="bfd4fd">2.25% </c>per Soul.

DiabloSoulShield.name: Soul Shield
DiabloSoulShield.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Spell Armor per Soul
DiabloSoulShield.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> plus <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

DiabloShadowChargeSacrificialSoul.name: Sacrificial Soul
DiabloShadowChargeSacrificialSoul.ShortTooltip: Shadow Charge grants Souls and Armor
DiabloShadowChargeSacrificialSoul.FullTooltip: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Souls and <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. While at <c val="bfd4fd">100</c> Souls, increase this Armor to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c>.

DiabloFireStompSoulsToTheFlame.name: Souls to the Flame
DiabloFireStompSoulsToTheFlame.ShortTooltip: Fire Stomp grants Souls and heals more
DiabloFireStompSoulsToTheFlame.FullTooltip: Fire Stomp grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Soul every <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1.3%</c> of its damage dealt per Soul.

DiabloLifeLeech.name: Life Leech
DiabloLifeLeech.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant Souls and heal
DiabloLifeLeech.FullTooltip: Diablo gains <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Soul and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c> of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at <c val="bfd4fd">100</c> Souls, increase this healing to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of his maximum Health.

DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerEternalFlames.name: Eternal Flames
DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerEternalFlames.ShortTooltip: Shadow Charge, Overpower reset Fire Stomp
DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerEternalFlames.FullTooltip: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains <c val="bfd4fd">35</c> Mana.

DiabloMalevolence.name: Malevolence
DiabloMalevolence.FullTooltip: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds to deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> Spell Damage. Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

DiabloDiabolicalMomentum.name: Diabolical Momentum
DiabloDiabolicalMomentum.FullTooltip: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

DiabloHeroicAbilityApocalypse.name: Apocalypse
DiabloHeroicAbilityApocalypse.FullTooltip: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds the rune explodes dealing <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

DiabloHeroicAbilityLightningBreath.name: Lightning Breath
DiabloHeroicAbilityLightningBreath.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo
DiabloHeroicAbilityLightningBreath.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. <n/><n/>Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

DiabloDevastatingCharge.name: Devastating Charge
DiabloDevastatingCharge.ShortTooltip: Quest: Shadow Charge reduces Armor
DiabloDevastatingCharge.FullTooltip: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

DiabloHellfire.name: Hellfire
DiabloHellfire.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals <c val="bfd4fd">15~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerCruelty.name: Cruelty
DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerCruelty.ShortTooltip: Shadow Charge, Overpower grant Attack Speed
DiabloShadowChargeOverpowerCruelty.FullTooltip: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

DiabloTalentDominationOverpower.name: Domination
DiabloTalentDominationOverpower.ShortTooltip: Overpower resets cooldown of Shadow Charge
DiabloTalentDominationOverpower.FullTooltip: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

DiabloDebilitatingFlames.name: Debilitating Flames
DiabloDebilitatingFlames.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Heroes Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> or more by Debilitating Flames deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage.

DiabloOverpowerOverpoweringNightmare.name: Overpowering Nightmare
DiabloOverpowerOverpoweringNightmare.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges of Overpower, with a <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> second cooldown between uses.

DiabloMasteryDyingBreathApocalypse.name: Dying Breath
DiabloMasteryDyingBreathApocalypse.FullTooltip: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

DiabloTalentLordOfTerror.name: Lord of Terror
DiabloTalentLordOfTerror.ShortTooltip: Steal Health, Souls from nearby enemy Heroes
DiabloTalentLordOfTerror.FullTooltip: Activate to steal <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Souls per Hero hit.

DiabloHellgate.name: Hellgate
DiabloHellgate.FullTooltip: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds the rune explodes dealing <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage and stunning enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

Dryad.name: Lunara
Dryad.title: First Daughter of Cenarius
Dryad.SearchText: Lunara Dryad Night Elf Cenarius WoW World of Warcraft Legion Heroes of the Storm Hearthstone
Dryad.Description: A sustained Assassin who can wear down her enemies from afar with her poison.
Dryad.InfoText: While her younger sisters frolicked in idyllic forests, Lunara watched as mortals exploited nature’s splendor. On Azeroth, her father Cenarius forbade her from retaliating. But this is the Nexus, and it’s time for nature to take its revenge.

DryadNoxiousBlossom.name: Noxious Blossom
DryadNoxiousBlossom.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage.

DryadCripplingSpores.name: Crippling Spores
DryadCripplingSpores.ShortTooltip: Slow enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin and extend duration
DryadCripplingSpores.FullTooltip: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>seconds and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

DryadWisp.name: Wisp
DryadWisp.FullTooltip: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, its vision radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%.</c> Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds.

DryadThornwoodVine.name: Thornwood Vine
DryadThornwoodVine.FullTooltip: Send forth vines that deal <c val="bfd4fd">176~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

DryadLeapingStrike.name: Leaping Strike
DryadLeapingStrike.ShortTooltip: Leap over enemies, damaging and Slowing
DryadLeapingStrike.FullTooltip: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">0.35 </c>seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">271~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

DryadNaturesToxin.name: Nature's Toxin
DryadNaturesToxin.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities deal damage over time
DryadNaturesToxin.FullTooltip: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">36~~0.04~~</c> damage a second for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">9</c> seconds.

DryadDryadsSwiftness.name: Dryad's Swiftness
DryadDryadsSwiftness.ShortTooltip: Lunara moves about <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> faster by leaping short distances.
DryadDryadsSwiftness.FullTooltip: Lunara moves <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> faster by leaping short distances.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DryadWispRedirect.name: Relocate Wisp
DryadWispRedirect.ShortTooltip: Move the Wisp to a new location
DryadWispRedirect.FullTooltip: Moves the Wisp to a new location.

DryadGallopingGait.name: Dryad's Swiftness
DryadGallopingGait.ShortTooltip: Lunara moves about <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> faster by leaping short distances.
DryadGallopingGait.FullTooltip: Lunara moves <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> faster by leaping short distances.

DryadSentinelWisp.name: Sentinel Wisp
DryadSentinelWisp.ShortTooltip: Wisp's bonus vision radius is increased
DryadSentinelWisp.FullTooltip: After remaining in a bush for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> and reveals the surrounding area.

DryadNaturalPerspective.name: Natural Perspective
DryadNaturalPerspective.FullTooltip: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

DryadHippityHop.name: Hippity Hop
DryadHippityHop.FullTooltip: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by <c val="bfd4fd">10%.</c>

DryadBlossomSwell.name: Blossom Swell
DryadBlossomSwell.ShortTooltip: Increases Noxious Blossom range and radius
DryadBlossomSwell.FullTooltip: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and its radius by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.

DryadSiphoningToxin.name: Siphoning Toxin
DryadSiphoningToxin.FullTooltip: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for <c val="bfd4fd">9~~0.04~~</c> per second. When an enemy Hero has <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by <c val="bfd4fd">19~~0.04~~</c> per second.

DryadNaturesCulling.name: Nature's Culling
DryadNaturesCulling.ShortTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to non-Heroes
DryadNaturesCulling.FullTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> to non-Heroes.

DryadSplinteredSpear.name: Splintered Spear
DryadSplinteredSpear.ShortTooltip: Noxious Blossom makes Basic Attack spread
DryadSplinteredSpear.FullTooltip: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

DryadChokingPollen.name: Choking Pollen
DryadChokingPollen.ShortTooltip: Nature's Toxin increases Noxious Blossom damage
DryadChokingPollen.FullTooltip: Noxious Blossom deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> against enemies with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks.

DryadWildVigor.name: Wild Vigor
DryadWildVigor.ShortTooltip: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack damage
DryadWildVigor.FullTooltip: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Basic Attacks by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

DryadHeroicAbilityThornwoodVine.name: Thornwood Vine
DryadHeroicAbilityThornwoodVine.FullTooltip: Send forth vines that deal <c val="bfd4fd">176~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

DryadHeroicAbilityLeapingStrike.name: Leaping Strike
DryadHeroicAbilityLeapingStrike.ShortTooltip: Leap over enemies, damaging and Slowing
DryadHeroicAbilityLeapingStrike.FullTooltip: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">0.35 </c>seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">271~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

DryadEndlessSpores.name: Endless Spores
DryadEndlessSpores.ShortTooltip: Nature's Toxin can reduce Crippling Spores cooldown
DryadEndlessSpores.FullTooltip: Casting Crippling Spores while at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DryadLetThemWither.name: Let Them Wither
DryadLetThemWither.FullTooltip: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and causes it to no longer decay.

DryadGreaterSpellShield.name: Greater Spell Shield
DryadGreaterSpellShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

DryadAbolishMagic.name: Abolish Magic
DryadAbolishMagic.ShortTooltip: Remove crowd control from a target and Lunara
DryadAbolishMagic.FullTooltip: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

DryadAcceleratedContamination.name: Accelerated Contamination
DryadAcceleratedContamination.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">40</c>. While at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

DryadStarWoodSpear.name: Star Wood Spear
DryadStarWoodSpear.ShortTooltip: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack range
DryadStarWoodSpear.FullTooltip: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">2.75</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DryadInvigoratingSpores.name: Invigorating Spores
DryadInvigoratingSpores.FullTooltip: Crippling Spores grants <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c> of their maximum Health.

DryadUnfairAdvantage.name: Unfair Advantage
DryadUnfairAdvantage.ShortTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to disabled Heroes
DryadUnfairAdvantage.FullTooltip: Nature's Toxin deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

DryadForestsWrath.name: Forest's Wrath
DryadForestsWrath.FullTooltip: Thornwood Vine now applies <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> stacks of Nature's Toxin. Increase Thornwood Vine's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and Lunara's vision radius by <c val="bfd4fd">35%.</c>

DryadBoundlessStrideTalent.name: Boundless Stride
DryadBoundlessStrideTalent.FullTooltip: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

DryadIntensifyingToxin.name: Intensifying Toxin
DryadIntensifyingToxin.FullTooltip: At <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks, Nature's Toxin deals <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage.

DryadGallopingGait.name: Galloping Gait
DryadGallopingGait.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

DVa.name: D.Va
DVa.title: MEKA Pilot
DVa.SearchText: Dva Diva Hana Song Overwatch OW Human
DVa.Description: A hard-to-kill Bruiser that can peel enemies away from her allies with high disruption.
DVa.InfoText: Hana Song, also known as "D.Va," is both a world champion professional gamer and a burgeoning global icon. As a member of South Korea’s elite MEKA unit, she fights to protect her homeland from the colossal omnic threat lurking within the East China Sea.

DVaBoostersOn.name: Boosters
DVaBoostersOn.FullTooltip: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Enemies that are hit take <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage and are knocked away. <n/><n/>D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

DVaMechDefenseMatrixOn.name: Defense Matrix
DVaMechDefenseMatrixOn.ShortTooltip: Reduce damage of enemy Heroes in an area
DVaMechDefenseMatrixOn.FullTooltip: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.<n/><n/>Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

DVaMechSelfDestruct.name: Self-Destruct
DVaMechSelfDestruct.ShortTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct for massive damage
DVaMechSelfDestruct.FullTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">1200~~0.04~~</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">400~~0.04~~</c> damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage against Structures.<n/><n/><c val="FF8000">Gain </c><c val="bfd4fd">1%</c><c val="FF8000"> Charge for every </c><c val="bfd4fd">2</c><c val="FF8000"> seconds spent Basic Attacking, and </c><c val="bfd4fd">30%</c><c val="FF8000"> Charge per </c><c val="bfd4fd">100%</c><c val="FF8000"> of Mech Health lost.</c>

DVaPilotBigShot.name: Big Shot
DVaPilotBigShot.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
DVaPilotBigShot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds for each enemy Hero hit.<n/><n/>Requires Pilot Mode.

DVaMechBunnyHopHeroic.name: Bunny Hop
DVaMechBunnyHopHeroic.ShortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
DVaMechBunnyHopHeroic.FullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Requires Mech Mode.

DVaMechMechMode.name: Mech Mode
DVaMechMechMode.ShortTooltip: D.Va can eject from her Mech and continue to fight
DVaMechMechMode.FullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

DVaMechanizedWalker.name: Mechanized Walker
DVaMechanizedWalker.ShortTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her Movement Speed is reduced.
DVaMechanizedWalker.FullTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
