LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DVaBoostersRushdown.name: Rush-down
DVaBoostersRushdown.ShortTooltip: Reduced Boosters cooldown if used out of combat
DVaBoostersRushdown.FullTooltip: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

DVaBoostersHitTheNitrous.name: Hit the Nitrous
DVaBoostersHitTheNitrous.FullTooltip: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">325%</c>, then decays to normal boost speed over <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. During this time, Boosters deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> extra damage.

DVaBoostersCrashCourse.name: Crash Course
DVaBoostersCrashCourse.FullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

DVaMechProMoves.name: Pro Moves
DVaMechProMoves.FullTooltip: D.Va's Mech gains <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds every time it takes damage, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

DVaDefenseMatrixDivertingPower.name: Diverting Power
DVaDefenseMatrixDivertingPower.ShortTooltip: Increase Defense Matrix size, Move Speed reduced
DVaDefenseMatrixDivertingPower.FullTooltip: The area of Defense Matrix is <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> wider and <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for the duration.

DVaDefenseMatrixGetThroughThis.name: Get Through This!
DVaDefenseMatrixGetThroughThis.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

DVaDefenseMatrixFusionGenerator.name: Fusion Generator
DVaDefenseMatrixFusionGenerator.FullTooltip: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c>.<n/><n/>Max of <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Charge gained per use.

DVaSelfDestructBringItOn.name: Bring It On
DVaSelfDestructBringItOn.FullTooltip: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

DVaBoostersComingThrough.name: Coming Through
DVaBoostersComingThrough.FullTooltip: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

DVaDefenseMatrixDazerZone.name: Dazer Zone
DVaDefenseMatrixDazerZone.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

DVaDefenseMatrixAggressionMatrix.name: Aggression Matrix
DVaDefenseMatrixAggressionMatrix.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Defense Matrix cooldown
DVaDefenseMatrixAggressionMatrix.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

DVaSelfDestructNuclearOption.name: Nuclear Option
DVaSelfDestructNuclearOption.FullTooltip: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Detonation damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>.<n/><n/>A new Mech can still be called after <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

DVaBunnyHop.name: Bunny Hop
DVaBunnyHop.ShortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
DVaBunnyHop.FullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Requires Mech Mode.

DVaBigShot.name: Big Shot
DVaBigShot.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
DVaBigShot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds for each enemy Hero hit.<n/><n/>Requires Pilot Mode.

DVaMechExpensivePlating.name: Expensive Plating
DVaMechExpensivePlating.ShortTooltip: Increase Mech Health and Call Mech cooldown
DVaMechExpensivePlating.FullTooltip: Increase Mech Health by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.<n/><n/>This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

DVaMechEmergencyShielding.name: Emergency Shielding
DVaMechEmergencyShielding.ShortTooltip: Mech gains a Shield instead of dying
DVaMechEmergencyShielding.FullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> second cooldown.

DVaMechAblativeArmor.name: Ablative Armor
DVaMechAblativeArmor.ShortTooltip: Take less damage from weak attacks
DVaMechAblativeArmor.FullTooltip: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> or less of its maximum Health is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

DVaPilotTorpedoDash.name: Torpedo Dash
DVaPilotTorpedoDash.FullTooltip: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.<n/><n/>Requires Pilot Mode.

DVaPilotGGWP.name: GG, WP
DVaPilotGGWP.ShortTooltip: Increased Pilot damage, Takedowns refresh Mech
DVaPilotGGWP.FullTooltip: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

DVaPilotNanoweaveSuit.name: Nanoweave Suit
DVaPilotNanoweaveSuit.ShortTooltip: Faster Call Mech, ejection grants Armor
DVaPilotNanoweaveSuit.FullTooltip: For <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor and her Basic Attacks grant <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

DVaPilotSuppressingFire.name: Suppressing Fire
DVaPilotSuppressingFire.ShortTooltip: Pilot Basic Attacks Slow, range increased
DVaPilotSuppressingFire.FullTooltip: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

DVaBunnyHopStopAndPop.name: Stop and Pop
DVaBunnyHopStopAndPop.ShortTooltip: Bunny Hop damage increased if stationary
DVaBunnyHopStopAndPop.FullTooltip: Bunny Hop deals <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

DVaBigShotPewPewPew.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
DVaBigShotPewPewPew.FullTooltip: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> shots over <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Each shot deals <c val="bfd4fd">50</c>% damage.

DVaPilotConcussivePulse.name: Concussive Pulse
DVaPilotConcussivePulse.FullTooltip: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal <c val="bfd4fd">141~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.<n/><n/>Requires Pilot Mode.

DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall.name: MEKAfall
DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall.ShortTooltip: Call Mech is instant and targetable, damages enemies
DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall.FullTooltip: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals <c val="bfd4fd">202~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the impact area.

DVaPilotTorpedoDash.name: Torpedo Dash
DVaPilotTorpedoDash.FullTooltip: Dash towards the target location, passing through enemies along the way.

DVaPilotConcussivePulse.name: Concussive Pulse
DVaPilotConcussivePulse.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">141~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.

DVaPilotCallMech.name: Call Mech
DVaPilotCallMech.FullTooltip: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode.<n/><n/>Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds each.

DVaPilotBigShot.name: Big Shot
DVaPilotBigShot.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
DVaPilotBigShot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds for each enemy Hero hit.<n/><n/>Requires Pilot Mode.

DVaPilotPilotMode.name: Pilot Mode
DVaPilotPilotMode.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall.name: Call Mech
DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall.FullTooltip: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode.<n/><n/>Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds each.

FaerieDragon.name: Brightwing
FaerieDragon.title: Faerie Dragon
FaerieDragon.SearchText: Brightwing BW Sprite Darter Faerie Dragon WoW World of Warcraft Legion Heroes of the Storm
FaerieDragon.Description: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.
FaerieDragon.InfoText: Like many faerie dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!

FaerieDragonArcaneFlare.name: Arcane Flare
FaerieDragonArcaneFlare.FullTooltip: Shoot a flare dealing <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit, and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

FaerieDragonPolymorph.name: Polymorph
FaerieDragonPolymorph.FullTooltip: Polymorph a target for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

FaerieDragonPixieDust.name: Pixie Dust
FaerieDragonPixieDust.ShortTooltip: Increase a Hero's Movement Speed and grant Spell Armor
FaerieDragonPixieDust.FullTooltip: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>, and grant them <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.name: Blink Heal
FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.ShortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.FullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.name: Emerald Wind
FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.ShortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~ </c>damage and pushing enemies away.

BrightwingCalmingMist.name: Soothing Mist
BrightwingCalmingMist.FullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> every <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds

BrightwingPhaseShift.name: Phase Shift
BrightwingPhaseShift.ShortTooltip: Teleport to an allied Hero and heal them
BrightwingPhaseShift.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of their maximum Health.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

BrightwingBlinkHealDoubleWyrmholeDash.name: Double Wyrmhole
BrightwingBlinkHealDoubleWyrmholeDash.FullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c>.

BrightwingGreaterPolymorphPolymorph.name: Greater Polymorph
BrightwingGreaterPolymorphPolymorph.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase Polymorph's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. <n/><n/>If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds and gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Mana.

BrightwingPhaseShiftHyperShift.name: Hyper Shift
BrightwingPhaseShiftHyperShift.FullTooltip: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

BrightwingPixieCharm.name: Pixie Charm
BrightwingPixieCharm.ShortTooltip: Activate to instantly defeat a Mercenary
BrightwingPixieCharm.FullTooltip: Activate to consume <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> stacks.

BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.name: Dream Shot
BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.ShortTooltip: Arcane Flare center hits reduce cooldown
BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.FullTooltip: Increase Arcane Flare's range by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

BrightwingUnstableAnomalyPolymorph.name: Unstable Anomaly
BrightwingUnstableAnomalyPolymorph.FullTooltip: Increase Polymorph's Slow by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health.

BrightwingMagicSpit.name: Magic Spit
BrightwingMagicSpit.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Soothing Mist cooldown
BrightwingMagicSpit.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.1</c>. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

BrightwingArcaneFlareStickyFlare.name: Sticky Flare
BrightwingArcaneFlareStickyFlare.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Increase the Slow to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> if they are hit by the center portion.

BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.name: Peekaboo!
BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.ShortTooltip: Phase Shift grants a Shield, reveals an area
BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.FullTooltip: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a <c val="bfd4fd">335~~0.04~~</c> point Shield and reveals a large area around them for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

BrightwingCriticalMistCalmingMist.name: Critical Mist
BrightwingCriticalMistCalmingMist.FullTooltip: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c>. Increase this healing by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.

FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.name: Blink Heal
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.ShortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.FullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.name: Emerald Wind
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.ShortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~ </c>damage and pushing enemies away.

BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.name: Pixie Boost
BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.ShortTooltip: Pixie Dust grants an additional burst of speed
BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.FullTooltip: Pixie Dust gives <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> bonus Movement Speed, decaying to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

BrightwingPixieDustSafetyDust.name: Safety Dust
BrightwingPixieDustSafetyDust.FullTooltip: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more.

BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.name: Pixie Power
BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.ShortTooltip: Reduce Pixie Dust cooldown, increase Spell Armor
BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.

BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.name: Hush!
BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.ShortTooltip: Arcane Flare center Silences, reduces damage
BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

FaerieDragonMasteryCritterize.name: Critterize
FaerieDragonMasteryCritterize.FullTooltip: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>, increasing the damage they take by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

BrightwingPhaseOut.name: Phase Out
BrightwingPhaseOut.FullTooltip: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

BrightwingInvisibleFriends.name: Invisible Friends
BrightwingInvisibleFriends.FullTooltip: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

BrightwingIntensiveWinds.name: Intensive Winds
BrightwingIntensiveWinds.ShortTooltip: Reduce Emerald Wind cooldown, increase cost
BrightwingIntensiveWinds.FullTooltip: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and increase its Mana cost to <c val="bfd4fd">200</c>.

BrightwingFaerieProtector.name: Faerie Protector
BrightwingFaerieProtector.FullTooltip: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

Falstad.name: Falstad
Falstad.title: Wildhammer Thane
Falstad.SearchText: Falstad Gryphonrider Wildhammer Dwarf Alliance WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm BFA Battle for Azeroth
Falstad.Description: An Assassin that can fly large distances, excelling on large battlegrounds.
Falstad.InfoText: Falstad is the High Thane of the Wildhammer Clan and a founding member of the Council of Three Hammers that presides over Ironforge. Despite speculation, Falstad has never been dead and anyone who claims such is a liar.

FalstadHammerang.name: Hammerang
FalstadHammerang.ShortTooltip: Throw out a Hammer that returns. Hammer slows and damages enemies
FalstadHammerang.FullTooltip: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">121~~0.04~~</c> damage and slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

FalstadLightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
FalstadLightningRod.ShortTooltip: Deal damage to target enemy while staying close to them
FalstadLightningRod.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">107~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy, and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage per second for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds while close to the target.

FalstadBarrelRoll.name: Barrel Roll
FalstadBarrelRoll.ShortTooltip: Dash to a location and gain a temporary shield
FalstadBarrelRoll.FullTooltip: Dashes forward and grants a <c val="bfd4fd">171~~0.04~~</c> point Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

FalstadMightyGust.name: Mighty Gust
FalstadMightyGust.ShortTooltip: Push away enemies and slow them
FalstadMightyGust.FullTooltip: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

FalstadHinterlandBlast.name: Hinterland Blast
FalstadHinterlandBlast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, deal <c val="bfd4fd">475~~0.0475~~</c> damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

FalstadTailwindCooldownDisplay.name: Tailwind
FalstadTailwindCooldownDisplay.ShortTooltip: After not taking damage for a brief period, gain increased Movement Speed
FalstadTailwindCooldownDisplay.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

FalstadFlight.name: Flight
FalstadFlight.ShortTooltip: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain
FalstadFlight.FullTooltip: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

FalstadBOOMerang.name: BOOMerang
FalstadBOOMerang.ShortTooltip: Deal damage in a small area around the Hammer.
FalstadBOOMerang.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> additional damage in a small area around the hammer.

FalstadHammerangGatheringStorm.name: Gathering Storm
FalstadHammerangGatheringStorm.FullTooltip: Quest: Each time a Hero is hit by Hammerang, its damage is permanently increased by 1.5 and it refunds 10 Mana.

GenericTalentSeasonedMarksman.name: Seasoned Marksman
GenericTalentSeasonedMarksman.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
GenericTalentSeasonedMarksman.FullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 4 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

FalstadWingman.name: Wingman
FalstadWingman.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>.<n/><n/>Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> stacks.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

FalstadMasteryLightningRodStaticShield.name: Static Shield
FalstadMasteryLightningRodStaticShield.ShortTooltip: Gain Shields after every Lightning Rod strike
FalstadMasteryLightningRodStaticShield.FullTooltip: Gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds and stacks.

FalstadMasteryUpdraftBarrelRoll.name: Updraft
FalstadMasteryUpdraftBarrelRoll.FullTooltip: Increases Barrel Roll's range by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> and Shield amount by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

FalstadTalentHammerGains.name: Hammer Gains
FalstadTalentHammerGains.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of the damage dealt to the primary target.

FalstadMasteryHammerangSecretWeapon.name: Secret Weapon
FalstadMasteryHammerangSecretWeapon.ShortTooltip: Increases Hammerang range, Basic Attack damage
FalstadMasteryHammerangSecretWeapon.FullTooltip: Increases Hammerang's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

FalstadHammerangBOOMerang.name: BOOMerang
FalstadHammerangBOOMerang.ShortTooltip: Activate Hammerang second time for more damage
FalstadHammerangBOOMerang.FullTooltip: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage around the hammer.

FalstadMasteryLightningRodChargedUp.name: Charged Up
FalstadMasteryLightningRodChargedUp.ShortTooltip: Increases Lightning Rod strikes and range
FalstadMasteryLightningRodChargedUp.FullTooltip: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> and its range by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

FalstadHeroicAbilityHinterlandBlast.name: Hinterland Blast
FalstadHeroicAbilityHinterlandBlast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, deal <c val="bfd4fd">475~~0.0475~~</c> damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

FalstadHeroicAbilityMightyGust.name: Mighty Gust
FalstadHeroicAbilityMightyGust.ShortTooltip: Push away enemies and slow them
FalstadHeroicAbilityMightyGust.FullTooltip: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

FalstadMasteryLightningRodThunderstrikes.name: Thunderstrikes
FalstadMasteryLightningRodThunderstrikes.FullTooltip: Lightning Rod deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage each subsequent strike.

FalstadMasteryBarrelRollFlowRider.name: Flow Rider
FalstadMasteryBarrelRollFlowRider.FullTooltip: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

GenericTalentGiantKiller.name: Giant Killer
GenericTalentGiantKiller.ShortTooltip: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
GenericTalentGiantKiller.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

FalstadMasteryCripplingHammerHammerang.name: Crippling Hammer
FalstadMasteryCripplingHammerHammerang.FullTooltip: Increases Hammerang's Slow from <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

FalstadMasteryAerieGustsTailwind.name: Aerie Gusts
FalstadMasteryAerieGustsTailwind.ShortTooltip: Reduce Tailwind delay, increase Move Speed
FalstadMasteryAerieGustsTailwind.FullTooltip: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

FalstadMasteryAfterburner.name: Afterburner
FalstadMasteryAfterburner.FullTooltip: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>, decaying over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

FalstadMasteryCalloftheWildhammerHinterl.name: Call of the Wildhammer
FalstadMasteryCalloftheWildhammerHinterl.ShortTooltip: Increases Hinterland Blast range and damage
FalstadMasteryCalloftheWildhammerHinterl.FullTooltip: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage.

FalstadMasteryMightyGustWindTunnel.name: Wind Tunnel
FalstadMasteryMightyGustWindTunnel.FullTooltip: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

GenericTalentNexusFrenzy.name: Nexus Frenzy
GenericTalentNexusFrenzy.FullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and Attack Range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.1</c>.

FalstadMasteryFlightEpicMount.name: Epic Mount
FalstadMasteryFlightEpicMount.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, and increase the speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

Fenix.name: Fenix
Fenix.title: Steward of the Templar
Fenix.SearchText: Fenix Dragoon Protoss SC SC1 StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW
Fenix.Description: A sustained damage Assassin with a regenerating Shield that enables him to efficiently duel his opponents.
Fenix.InfoText: As one of the greatest heroes in protoss history, Fenix's deeds on the battlefield are legendary. After falling to the zerg during the invasion of Aiur, his body was recovered and implanted into a dragoon so he could continue to fight. Not even death can stop Fenix from achieving glory and valor.

FenixPlasmaCutter.name: Plasma Cutter
FenixPlasmaCutter.ShortTooltip: Summon a laser that circles Fenix, damaging and Slowing enemies
FenixPlasmaCutter.FullTooltip: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

FenixPhaseBomb.name: Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon
FenixPhaseBomb.FullTooltip: Basic Attack speed increased by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>.<n/><n/>Activate to change to <c val="00ff90">Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb</c>, increasing Basic Attack range and damage, and causing Basic Attacks to splash.

FenixWarp.name: Warp
FenixWarp.FullTooltip: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, and arriving <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds later.

FenixPlanetCracker.name: Planet Cracker
FenixPlanetCracker.ShortTooltip: Fire a laser across the battleground
FenixPlanetCracker.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

FenixPurificationSalvo.name: Purification Salvo
FenixPurificationSalvo.ShortTooltip: Fire a barrage of homing missiles
FenixPurificationSalvo.FullTooltip: Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> missiles at each locked Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">79~~0.04~~</c> damage each. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage to Slowed targets.

FenixShieldCapacitor.name: Shield Capacitor
FenixShieldCapacitor.ShortTooltip: Permanent Shield that regenerates out of combat
FenixShieldCapacitor.FullTooltip: Fenix has a permanent <c val="bfd4fd">760~~0.04~~</c> Shield which regenerates at <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> per second after not taking damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

FenixRepeaterCannon.name: Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb
FenixRepeaterCannon.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash, deal more damage, have longer range
FenixRepeaterCannon.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks have <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> increased range, deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Activate to change to <c val="00ff90">Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon</c>, increasing Basic Attack speed.

FenixAdvancedTargeting.name: Advanced Targeting
FenixAdvancedTargeting.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Plasma Cutter circles an additional time
FenixAdvancedTargeting.FullTooltip: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

FenixArsenalSynergy.name: Arsenal Synergy
FenixArsenalSynergy.FullTooltip: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> more damage and splashes in a <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> larger area.

FenixMobileOffense.name: Mobile Offense
FenixMobileOffense.FullTooltip: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> more damage to Heroes.

FenixTargetAcquired.name: Target Acquired
FenixTargetAcquired.ShortTooltip: Repeater Cannon can grant Move Speed
FenixTargetAcquired.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

FenixInhibitingEnergy.name: Inhibiting Energy
FenixInhibitingEnergy.ShortTooltip: Phase Bomb can Slow enemies hit
FenixInhibitingEnergy.FullTooltip: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

FenixEmergencyProtocol.name: Emergency Protocol
FenixEmergencyProtocol.ShortTooltip: Gain Move Speed, more when Shield depletes
FenixEmergencyProtocol.FullTooltip: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed. This bonus is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.

FenixCombatAdvantage.name: Combat Advantage
FenixCombatAdvantage.ShortTooltip: Plasma Cutter deals more damage to Slowed targets
FenixCombatAdvantage.FullTooltip: Plasma Cutter deals <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> more damage to Slowed targets.

FenixWarpWarfare.name: Warp Warfare
FenixWarpWarfare.FullTooltip: After arriving with Warp, gain <c val="bfd4fd">175%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

FenixDivertPowerWeaponsTalent.name: Divert Power: Weapons
FenixDivertPowerWeaponsTalent.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase damage, lose Shield
FenixDivertPowerWeaponsTalent.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Basic Attack damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

FenixHeroicAbilityPurificationSalvo.name: Purification Salvo
FenixHeroicAbilityPurificationSalvo.ShortTooltip: Fire a barrage of homing missiles
FenixHeroicAbilityPurificationSalvo.FullTooltip: Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> missiles at each locked Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">79~~0.04~~</c> damage each. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage to Slowed targets.

FenixHeroicAbilityPlanetCracker.name: Planet Cracker
FenixHeroicAbilityPlanetCracker.ShortTooltip: Fire a laser across the battleground
FenixHeroicAbilityPlanetCracker.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

FenixAdaniumShell.name: Adanium Shell
FenixAdaniumShell.FullTooltip: After arriving with Warp, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

FenixDampeningField.name: Dampening Field
FenixDampeningField.FullTooltip: Fenix gains <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

FenixRapidRecharge.name: Rapid Recharge
FenixRapidRecharge.FullTooltip: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the healing received.

FenixAuxiliaryShields.name: Auxiliary Shields
FenixAuxiliaryShields.FullTooltip: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the damage dealt.

FenixOffensiveCadence.name: Offensive Cadence
FenixOffensiveCadence.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of the target's maximum Health as damage.

FenixPhotonicWeaponry.name: Photonic Weaponry
FenixPhotonicWeaponry.FullTooltip: Fenix deals <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

FenixArsenalOvercharge.name: Arsenal Overcharge
FenixArsenalOvercharge.FullTooltip: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

FenixSecondaryFire.name: Secondary Fire
FenixSecondaryFire.ShortTooltip: Plasma Cutter can fire Purification Salvo missiles
FenixSecondaryFire.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">79~~0.04~~</c> damage. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage to Slowed targets.

FenixSingularityCharge.name: Singularity Charge
FenixSingularityCharge.FullTooltip: Repeater Cannon grants <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> more range.

FenixUnconqueredSpirit.name: Unconquered Spirit
FenixUnconqueredSpirit.FullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains <c val="bfd4fd">800~~0.04~~</c> Shields. This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">120</c> second cooldown.

Firebat.name: Blaze
Firebat.title: Veteran Firebat
Firebat.SearchText: Firebat Terran Heroes of the Storm
Firebat.Description: A ranged Tank that specializes in initiating fights and dealing area damage by spreading his flames.
Firebat.InfoText: Cpl. Miles "Blaze" Lewis has always been drawn to the flame, but it wasn't until he joined up with Raynor's Raiders that he put his pyromania to good use. He's seen his fair share of battles since then, and has never failed to bring the heat.

FirebatFlameStream.name: Flame Stream
FirebatFlameStream.FullTooltip: Fire two streams that deal <c val="bfd4fd">83~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

FirebatOilSpill.name: Oil Spill
FirebatOilSpill.ShortTooltip: Splash oil that Slows and can be Ignited to damage enemies and heal Blaze
FirebatOilSpill.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Oil Spills are Ignited for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal <c val="bfd4fd">16~~0.04~~</c> damage to them every <c val="bfd4fd">0.3</c> seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">49~~0.04~~</c> Health every <c val="bfd4fd">0.3</c> seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

FirebatJetPropulsion.name: Jet Propulsion
FirebatJetPropulsion.ShortTooltip: Charge forward, Stunning and damaging enemy Heroes
FirebatJetPropulsion.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.375</c> seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals <c val="bfd4fd">52~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

FirebatBunkerDrop.name: Bunker Drop
FirebatBunkerDrop.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with <c val="bfd4fd">1435~~0.04~~</c> Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. <n/><n/>Exiting the Bunker grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Bunkers last <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, or until destroyed.

FirebatCombustion.name: Combustion
FirebatCombustion.ShortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
FirebatCombustion.FullTooltip: Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">2.6</c> seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> and deal <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage to them every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> while Channeling.

FirebatIgnite.name: Pyromania
FirebatIgnite.ShortTooltip: Gain Armor and damage nearby enemies
FirebatIgnite.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor and deal <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Attack Speed, Move Speed
FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

FirebatEnduranceStimpack.name: Endurance Stimpack
FirebatEnduranceStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

FirebatNeuralStimpack.name: Neural Stimpack
FirebatNeuralStimpack.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase cooldown recharge rate
FirebatNeuralStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

FirebatNewHabits.name: New Habits
FirebatNewHabits.FullTooltip: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

FirebatOilSpillAdhesivePetroleum.name: Adhesive Petroleum
FirebatOilSpillAdhesivePetroleum.FullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

FirebatOilSpillOilDispersal.name: Oil Dispersal
FirebatOilSpillOilDispersal.FullTooltip: Increase Oil Spill's area by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and refunds <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Mana.

FirebatIgniteMeltdown.name: Meltdown
FirebatIgniteMeltdown.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.name: Crossfire
FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.ShortTooltip: Flame Stream can deal bonus damage
FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals <c val="bfd4fd">139~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage.

FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.name: Grill and Kill
FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest</c>: Increase Ignited Oil Spill damage, duration
FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.FullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks Ignite Oil Spills, area increased
FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack area by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

FirebatHeroicAbilityBunkerDrop.name: Bunker Drop
FirebatHeroicAbilityBunkerDrop.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with <c val="bfd4fd">1435~~0.04~~</c> Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. <n/><n/>Exiting the Bunker grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Bunkers last <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, or until destroyed.

FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.name: Combustion
FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.ShortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.FullTooltip: Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">2.6</c> seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> and deal <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage to them every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> while Channeling.

FirebatFlameStreamSuppressiveFire.name: Suppressive Fire
FirebatFlameStreamSuppressiveFire.FullTooltip: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

FirebatOilSpillNanomachineCoating.name: Nanomachine Coating
FirebatOilSpillNanomachineCoating.FullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.name: Fuel Leak
FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.ShortTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates a trail of Oil Spills
FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.FullTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.name: Thermal Protection
FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.ShortTooltip: Jet Propulsion hits grant Armor, reduce cooldown
FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.FullTooltip: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

FirebatIgniteHeatTreatment.name: Heat Treatment
FirebatIgniteHeatTreatment.FullTooltip: Heal for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.name: Juggernaut Plating
FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor, then Shield for damage taken
FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.name: Fortified Bunker
FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.ShortTooltip: Allies can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop
FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.FullTooltip: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>, and its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

FirebatCombustionFlashFire.name: Flash Fire
FirebatCombustionFlashFire.ShortTooltip: Combustion Slows, remove Move Speed penalty
FirebatCombustionFlashFire.FullTooltip: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.name: Burn Notice
FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow, damage over time
FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> and deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">18~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

Gall.name: Gall
Gall.title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain
Gall.SearchText: Cho'gall Chogall Ogre Twoheaded Two Headed Two-headed War2 Warcraft2 WC2 Warcraft II 2 Tides of Darkness ToD WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm Warlords of Draenor WoD Horde
Gall.Description: Head 2 of a 2 Headed Hero, Gall is a powerful Mage stuck to Cho.
Gall.InfoText: Cho’gall is one of the most powerful, intelligent, and insane ogre-magi to have ever lived. As the leader of the Twilight's Hammer the two brothers seek to bring about an age of destruction... whenever they aren’t bickering that is.

GallShadowflame.name: Shadowflame
GallShadowflame.ShortTooltip: Blast enemies in a narrow line
GallShadowflame.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.05~~</c> damage to enemies in the area.

GallDreadOrb.name: Dread Orb
GallDreadOrb.ShortTooltip: Lob a ball of energy that bounces three times, damaging enemies it hits
GallDreadOrb.FullTooltip: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">126~~0.05~~</c> damage to enemies.

GallRunicBlast.name: Runic Blast
GallRunicBlast.ShortTooltip: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing area damage
GallRunicBlast.FullTooltip: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage around it.

GallTwistingNether.name: Twisting Nether
GallTwistingNether.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, nearby enemies are slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> while Gall channels, up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">353~~0.05~~</c> damage.

GallShadowboltVolley.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
GallShadowboltVolley.ShortTooltip: Launch a barrage of Shadow Bolts
GallShadowboltVolley.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, unleash <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Shadow Bolts over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">87~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

GallOgreRage.name: Ogre Rage
GallOgreRage.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Gall's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>, but reduce Cho's Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.

GallShove.name: Shove
GallShove.FullTooltip: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GallTalentEyeOfKilrogg.name: Eye of Kilrogg
GallTalentEyeOfKilrogg.ShortTooltip: Place an eye that grants vision
GallTalentEyeOfKilrogg.FullTooltip: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Basic Attacks. Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

GallTwistingNetherActivated.name: Detonate Twisting Nether
GallTwistingNetherActivated.FullTooltip: Detonate the Twisting Nether, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">353~~0.05~~</c> damage.

GallShiftingNether.name: Twisting Nether
GallShiftingNether.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, nearby enemies are slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> while Gall channels, up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">353~~0.05~~</c> damage.

GallDoubleBack.name: Double Back
GallDoubleBack.ShortTooltip: Activate to reverse Dread Orb third bounce
GallDoubleBack.FullTooltip: Activate to reverse the third bounce's direction.

GallOgreRagePassive.name: Ogre Rage
GallOgreRagePassive.FullTooltip: Gall's damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>, but Cho's Armor is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.<n/><n/>Cho can activate Ogre Hide to grant himself <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor, but remove this damage bonus.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.

GallKeepMoving.name: Keep Moving!
GallKeepMoving.ShortTooltip: Increased Shove Move Speed amount and duration
GallKeepMoving.FullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Shove by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> and its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GallTaskmaster.name: Taskmaster
GallTaskmaster.FullTooltip: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GallWeSeeYou.name: We See You!
GallWeSeeYou.FullTooltip: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds, its range is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c>, and the number of Basic Attacks required to kill it is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>.

GallDoubleBack.name: Double Back
GallDoubleBack.ShortTooltip: Re-activate Dread Orb to reverse third bounce
GallDoubleBack.FullTooltip: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> The third bounce of Dread Orb deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage to Heroic targets, and <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

GallRunicPersistence.name: Runic Persistence
GallRunicPersistence.ShortTooltip: Runic Blast deals additional damage over time
GallRunicPersistence.FullTooltip: Runic Blast deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds in an area around the detonation point.

GallBombsAway.name: Bomb's Away
GallBombsAway.FullTooltip: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

GallEdgeOfMadness.name: Edge of Madness
GallEdgeOfMadness.FullTooltip: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> damage, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

GallDoubleTrouble.name: Double Trouble
GallDoubleTrouble.FullTooltip: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.

GallOgreRampage.name: Ogre Rampage
GallOgreRampage.FullTooltip: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>. Each time Gall damages an enemy Hero this bonus increases by <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, up to an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> bonus damage.

GallHeroicAbilityShadowboltVolley.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
GallHeroicAbilityShadowboltVolley.ShortTooltip: Launch a barrage of Shadow Bolts
GallHeroicAbilityShadowboltVolley.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, unleash <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Shadow Bolts over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">87~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

GallHeroicAbilityTwistingNether.name: Twisting Nether
GallHeroicAbilityTwistingNether.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, nearby enemies are slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> while Gall channels, up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">353~~0.05~~</c> damage.

GallSearingShadows.name: Searing Shadows
GallSearingShadows.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health as damage.

GallRisingDread.name: Rising Dread
GallRisingDread.ShortTooltip: Increase Dread Orb area and damage
GallRisingDread.FullTooltip: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

GallTwilightNova.name: Twilight Nova
GallTwilightNova.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> The cooldown of Dread Orb is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>After the first bounce of Dread Orb, <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

GallLeadenOrb.name: Leaden Orb
GallLeadenOrb.FullTooltip: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GallDeafeningBlast.name: Deafening Blast
GallDeafeningBlast.FullTooltip: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

GallShadowsnare.name: Shadowsnare
GallShadowsnare.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by your Basic Abilities are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">15% </c>for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. This effect can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.

GallShadowboltVolleyShadowfury.name: Shadowfury
GallShadowboltVolleyShadowfury.FullTooltip: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

GallShiftingNether.name: Shifting Nether
GallShiftingNether.FullTooltip: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.

GallTheWillofGall.name: The Will of Gall
GallTheWillofGall.ShortTooltip: Takedowns increase Ogre Rage's Damage Bonus
GallTheWillofGall.FullTooltip: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c>.

GallPsychoticBreak.name: Psychotic Break
GallPsychoticBreak.FullTooltip: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

Garrosh.name: Garrosh
Garrosh.title: Son of Hellscream
Garrosh.SearchText: Garosh WoW Orc Warchief Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords of Draenor WoD Burning Crusade BC Hearthstone HS Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Horde
Garrosh.Description: A frontline Tank that enters the fray, trying to isolate a single opponent for elimination.
Garrosh.InfoText: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.

GarroshGroundbreaker.name: Groundbreaker
GarroshGroundbreaker.ShortTooltip: Deal damage to enemies, can Stun them
GarroshGroundbreaker.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">81~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and then Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40% </c>for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GarroshBloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
GarroshBloodthirst.ShortTooltip: Deal damage and heal for a portion of missing Health
GarroshBloodthirst.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">156~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> against Heroes.

GarroshWreckingBall.name: Wrecking Ball
GarroshWreckingBall.ShortTooltip: Throw an enemy, damaging and Slowing them
GarroshWreckingBall.FullTooltip: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

GarroshWarlordsChallenge.name: Warlord's Challenge
GarroshWarlordsChallenge.ShortTooltip: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh
GarroshWarlordsChallenge.FullTooltip: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GarroshDecimate.name: Decimate
GarroshDecimate.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

GarroshArmorUp.name: Armor Up
GarroshArmorUp.ShortTooltip: Gain Armor as Health gets lower
GarroshArmorUp.FullTooltip: Garrosh gains <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Armor for every <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of maximum Health missing.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.name: Double Up
GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.ShortTooltip: Activate Armor Up to increase bonus
GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.FullTooltip: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GarroshGroundbreakerWarbreaker.name: Warbreaker
GarroshGroundbreakerWarbreaker.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Stun Heroes to empower Groundbreaker
GarroshGroundbreakerWarbreaker.FullTooltip: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165~~0.04~~ damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

GarroshWreckingBallUnrivaledStrength.name: Unrivaled Strength
GarroshWreckingBallUnrivaledStrength.ShortTooltip: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range, damage
GarroshWreckingBallUnrivaledStrength.FullTooltip: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c>.

GarroshArmorUpBodyCheck.name: Body Check
GarroshArmorUpBodyCheck.FullTooltip: Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">111~~0.04~~</c> damage to a target enemy and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> reduced healing for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GarroshBloodthirstInFortheKill.name: In For the Kill
GarroshBloodthirstInFortheKill.ShortTooltip: Bloodthirst kills reset cooldown, restore Mana
GarroshBloodthirstInFortheKill.FullTooltip: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

GarroshBloodthirstThirstforBattle.name: Thirst for Battle
GarroshBloodthirstThirstforBattle.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GarroshIndomitable.name: Indomitable
GarroshIndomitable.FullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

GarroshGroundbreakerIntimidation.name: Intimidation
GarroshGroundbreakerIntimidation.FullTooltip: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

GarroshOppressor.name: Oppressor
GarroshOppressor.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

GarroshWreckingBallIntotheFray.name: Into the Fray
GarroshWreckingBallIntotheFray.FullTooltip: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

GarroshHeroicAbilityWarlordsChallenge.name: Warlord's Challenge
GarroshHeroicAbilityWarlordsChallenge.ShortTooltip: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh
GarroshHeroicAbilityWarlordsChallenge.FullTooltip: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GarroshHeroicAbilityDecimate.name: Decimate
GarroshHeroicAbilityDecimate.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

GarroshGroundbreakerDefensiveMeasures.name: Defensive Measures
GarroshGroundbreakerDefensiveMeasures.FullTooltip: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a <c val="bfd4fd">350~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

GarroshBloodthirstBloodcraze.name: Bloodcraze
GarroshBloodthirstBloodcraze.FullTooltip: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of Garrosh's maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.name: Double Up
GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.ShortTooltip: Activate Armor Up to increase bonus
GarroshArmorUpDoubleUp.FullTooltip: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GarroshGroundbreakerRoughLanding.name: Rough Landing
GarroshGroundbreakerRoughLanding.FullTooltip: Increase Groundbreaker's Slow amount by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> and duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GarroshGroundbreakerMortalCombo.name: Mortal Combo
GarroshGroundbreakerMortalCombo.ShortTooltip: Reduce Wrecking Ball cooldown on Stunned targets
GarroshGroundbreakerMortalCombo.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, regardless of order.

GarroshWreckingBallEarthshaker.name: Earthshaker
GarroshWreckingBallEarthshaker.ShortTooltip: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near impact
GarroshWreckingBallEarthshaker.FullTooltip: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

GarroshWarlordsChallengeDeathWish.name: Death Wish
GarroshWarlordsChallengeDeathWish.FullTooltip: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds.

GarroshDecimateDeadlyCalm.name: Deadly Calm
GarroshDecimateDeadlyCalm.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Decimate deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GarroshWreckingBallTitanicMight.name: Titanic Might
GarroshWreckingBallTitanicMight.ShortTooltip: Wrecking Ball throws an additional enemy
GarroshWreckingBallTitanicMight.FullTooltip: Wrecking Ball now throws the <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> closest enemies.

GarroshArmorUpInnerRage.name: Inner Rage
GarroshArmorUpInnerRage.ShortTooltip: Body Check gains an additional charge
GarroshArmorUpInnerRage.FullTooltip: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.

Genji.name: Genji
Genji.title: Cybernetic Ninja
Genji.Description: An opportunistic, mobile Assassin who can tear apart a weak backline.
Genji.InfoText: Once the carefree youngest scion of the Shimada clan, Genji was cut down by his own brother for refusing to take part in their illegal ventures. Grafted into a cyborg body by Overwatch, Genji walks his own path as one who fights for what's right.

GenjiShuriken.name: Shuriken
GenjiShuriken.ShortTooltip: Throw Shuriken in a spread pattern
GenjiShuriken.FullTooltip: Throw <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">65~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

GenjiDeflectInstant.name: Deflect
GenjiDeflectInstant.ShortTooltip: Become Protected and return fire from attacks
GenjiDeflectInstant.FullTooltip: Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/>Total Damage Deflected: <c val="bfd4fd">0</c>

GenjiSwiftStrike.name: Swift Strike
GenjiSwiftStrike.ShortTooltip: Dash forward damaging enemies passed through
GenjiSwiftStrike.FullTooltip: Dash forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">190~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

GenjiDragonblade.name: Dragonblade
GenjiDragonblade.FullTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GenjiXStrike.name: X-Strike
GenjiXStrike.ShortTooltip: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape
GenjiXStrike.FullTooltip: Perform two slashes dealing <c val="bfd4fd">145~~0.04~~</c> damage. The slashes detonate after <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds causing an additional <c val="bfd4fd">290~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in their area.

GenjiCyberAgility.name: Cyber Agility
GenjiCyberAgility.FullTooltip: Activate to jump to the target area.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.
