LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

GenjiDragonbladeAttack.name: Dragonblade
GenjiDragonbladeAttack.ShortTooltip: Lunge forward and slash in a huge arc
GenjiDragonbladeAttack.FullTooltip: Lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GenjiDragonbladeAttack.name: Dragonblade
GenjiDragonbladeAttack.ShortTooltip: Lunge forward and slash in a huge arc
GenjiDragonbladeAttack.FullTooltip: Lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GenjiSwiftStrikeSwiftAsTheWind.name: Swift as the Wind
GenjiSwiftStrikeSwiftAsTheWind.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenjiCyberAgilityAgileDismount.name: Agile Dismount
GenjiCyberAgilityAgileDismount.ShortTooltip: Increase Cyber Agility range while Mounted
GenjiCyberAgilityAgileDismount.FullTooltip: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">14</c> seconds.

GenjiCyberAgilityPathfinder.name: Pathfinder
GenjiCyberAgilityPathfinder.ShortTooltip: Jumping over terrain increases Move Speed
GenjiCyberAgilityPathfinder.FullTooltip: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

GenjiShurikenShurikenMastery.name: Shuriken Mastery
GenjiShurikenShurikenMastery.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Shuriken damage and restore charges
GenjiShurikenShurikenMastery.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

GenjiSwiftStrikeStrikeAtTheHeart.name: Strike At The Heart
GenjiSwiftStrikeStrikeAtTheHeart.ShortTooltip: Extra Swift Strike damage at its end
GenjiSwiftStrikeStrikeAtTheHeart.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">134~~0.04~~</c> damage after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GenjiDeflectDragonClaw.name: Dragon Claw
GenjiDeflectDragonClaw.FullTooltip: After Genji blocks <c val="bfd4fd">330~~0.04~~</c> damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">190~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies.

GenjiDeflectAugmentedGuard.name: Augmented Guard
GenjiDeflectAugmentedGuard.ShortTooltip: Gain a Shield after Deflect ends
GenjiDeflectAugmentedGuard.FullTooltip: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage blocked for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

GenjiDeflectPerfectDefense.name: Perfect Defense
GenjiDeflectPerfectDefense.FullTooltip: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

GenjiCyberAgilityCyberShield.name: Cyber Shield
GenjiCyberAgilityCyberShield.FullTooltip: Using Cyber Agility grants <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

GenjiDodge.name: Dodge
GenjiDodge.FullTooltip: Genji dodges <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Heroic Basic Attack every <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

GenjiHeroicDragonblade.name: Dragonblade
GenjiHeroicDragonblade.FullTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GenjiHeroicXStrike.name: X-Strike
GenjiHeroicXStrike.ShortTooltip: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape
GenjiHeroicXStrike.FullTooltip: Perform two slashes dealing <c val="bfd4fd">145~~0.04~~</c> damage. The slashes detonate after <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds causing an additional <c val="bfd4fd">290~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in their area.

GenjiShurikenShingan.name: Shingan
GenjiShurikenShingan.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with all <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Shuriken deals <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage.

GenjiSwiftStrikeFlowLikeWater.name: Flow Like Water
GenjiSwiftStrikeFlowLikeWater.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Swift Strike cooldown
GenjiSwiftStrikeFlowLikeWater.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenjiWayOfTheShimadaTalent.name: Way Of The Shimada
GenjiWayOfTheShimadaTalent.FullTooltip: Increase Genji's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>. Each time Genji hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase his Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

GenjiDeflectReflect.name: Reflect
GenjiDeflectReflect.FullTooltip: Deflect also deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> of the damage blocked.

GenjiSwiftStrikeFinalCut.name: Final Cut
GenjiSwiftStrikeFinalCut.ShortTooltip: Swift Strike deals extra damage after a delay
GenjiSwiftStrikeFinalCut.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Swift Strike deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in the area.

GenjiSwiftStrikeSteadyBlade.name: Steady Blade
GenjiSwiftStrikeSteadyBlade.ShortTooltip: Swift Strike deals increased damage for each Hero hit
GenjiSwiftStrikeSteadyBlade.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. This bonus stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

GenjiDragonbladeTheDragonBecomesMe.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
GenjiDragonbladeTheDragonBecomesMe.FullTooltip: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. If a Hero is killed within <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

GenjiXStrikeLivingWeapon.name: Living Weapon
GenjiXStrikeLivingWeapon.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

GenjiShurikenSharpenedStars.name: Sharpened Stars
GenjiShurikenSharpenedStars.FullTooltip: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

GenjiDeflectZanshin.name: Zanshin
GenjiDeflectZanshin.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Deflect hits all nearby Heroes
GenjiDeflectZanshin.FullTooltip: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

Greymane.name: Greymane
Greymane.title: Lord of the Worgen
Greymane.SearchText: Greymane Genn GM Graymane Worgen Gilneas Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War2 WC2 Warcraft2 Tides of Darkness ToD II Cataclysm Legion BFA Battle for Azeroth
Greymane.Description: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill.10 Armor (in Worgen Form)
Greymane.InfoText: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the worgen curse. Though he feels at fault for his people’s ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.

GreymaneGilneanCocktail.name: Gilnean Cocktail
GreymaneGilneanCocktail.ShortTooltip: Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them
GreymaneGilneanCocktail.FullTooltip: Hurl a flask that deals <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a cone behind them.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Worgen: Razor Swipe</c><n/>Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

GreymaneInnerBeast.name: Inner Beast
GreymaneInnerBeast.ShortTooltip: Gain a massive Attack Speed boost
GreymaneInnerBeast.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

GreymaneDarkflight.name: Darkflight
GreymaneDarkflight.ShortTooltip: Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen
GreymaneDarkflight.FullTooltip: Shapeshift into a <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c> and leap at an enemy dealing <c val="bfd4fd">88~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Worgen: Disengage</c><n/>Roll away and shapeshift into a <c val="ffff80">Human</c>.

GreymaneGoForTheThroat.name: Go for the Throat
GreymaneGoForTheThroat.ShortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die
GreymaneGoForTheThroat.FullTooltip: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c>, slashing for <c val="bfd4fd">355~~0.04~~</c> damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds for free.

GreymaneCursedBullet.name: Cursed Bullet
GreymaneCursedBullet.ShortTooltip: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health
GreymaneCursedBullet.FullTooltip: Greymane shapeshifts into a <c val="ffff80">Human</c> and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of their current Health in damage.<n/><n/>Does not affect Vehicles.

GreymaneWorgenForm.name: Curse of the Worgen
GreymaneWorgenForm.ShortTooltip: Able to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen
GreymaneWorgenForm.FullTooltip: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a <c val="ffff80">Human</c> and a <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c>.<n/><n/>While <c val="ffff80">Human</c>, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.<n/><n/>While <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c>, Greymane gains <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: Shapeshift into Human form and increase Greymane's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

GreymaneRazorSwipe.name: Razor Swipe
GreymaneRazorSwipe.FullTooltip: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">126~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit.<n/><n/><c val="ffff80">Human: Gilnean Cocktail</c><n/>Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

GreymaneDisengage.name: Disengage
GreymaneDisengage.ShortTooltip: Roll away and transform into a Human
GreymaneDisengage.FullTooltip: Roll away and shapeshift into a <c val="ffff80">Human</c>.<n/><n/><c val="ffff80">Human: Darkflight</c><n/>Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c>.

GreymaneInnerBeastActive.name: Inner Beast
GreymaneInnerBeastActive.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

GreymaneInnerBeastWolfheart.name: Wolfheart
GreymaneInnerBeastWolfheart.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Inner Beast cooldown
GreymaneInnerBeastWolfheart.FullTooltip: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GreymaneGilneanCocktailPerfectAim.name: Perfect Aim
GreymaneGilneanCocktailPerfectAim.ShortTooltip: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range and refunds Mana against Heroes
GreymaneGilneanCocktailPerfectAim.FullTooltip: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and refunds <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

GreymaneInnerBeastViciousness.name: Viciousness
GreymaneInnerBeastViciousness.ShortTooltip: Increases Inner Beast duration, Abilities refresh
GreymaneInnerBeastViciousness.FullTooltip: Increases Inner Beast's duration to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

GreymaneDarkflightThickSkin.name: Thick Skin
GreymaneDarkflightThickSkin.FullTooltip: Using Darkflight grants <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor against the next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Hero Basic Attacks while in <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c> Form, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

GreymaneDisengageEyesInTheDark.name: Eyes in the Dark
GreymaneDisengageEyesInTheDark.FullTooltip: Disengage grants Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GreymaneInnerBeastInsatiable.name: Insatiable
GreymaneInnerBeastInsatiable.ShortTooltip: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore Mana
GreymaneInnerBeastInsatiable.FullTooltip: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana.

GreymaneWorgenFormQuicksilverBullets.name: Quicksilver Bullets
GreymaneWorgenFormQuicksilverBullets.FullTooltip: Increases Greymane's <c val="ffff80">Human</c> Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.1</c>.

GreymaneGilneanCocktailIncendiaryElixir.name: Incendiary Elixir
GreymaneGilneanCocktailIncendiaryElixir.FullTooltip: Quest: Reduce the cooldown of Gilnean Cocktail by 2 seconds. Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

GreymaneWizenedDuelist.name: Wizened Duelist
GreymaneWizenedDuelist.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Basic Attack Heroes to gain damage
GreymaneWizenedDuelist.FullTooltip: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

GreymaneHeroicAbilityGoForTheThroat.name: Go for the Throat
GreymaneHeroicAbilityGoForTheThroat.ShortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die
GreymaneHeroicAbilityGoForTheThroat.FullTooltip: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c>, slashing for <c val="bfd4fd">355~~0.04~~</c> damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds for free.

GreymaneHeroicAbilityCursedBullet.name: Cursed Bullet
GreymaneHeroicAbilityCursedBullet.ShortTooltip: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health
GreymaneHeroicAbilityCursedBullet.FullTooltip: Greymane shapeshifts into a <c val="ffff80">Human</c> and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of their current Health in damage.<n/><n/>Does not affect Vehicles.

GreymaneDarkflightDisengageRunningWild.name: Running Wild
GreymaneDarkflightDisengageRunningWild.FullTooltip: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

GreymaneRazorSwipeUnfetteredAssault.name: Unfettered Assault
GreymaneRazorSwipeUnfetteredAssault.ShortTooltip: Increases Razor Swipe range, reduces cooldown
GreymaneRazorSwipeUnfetteredAssault.FullTooltip: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>, and <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c> Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

GreymaneInnerBeastOnTheProwl.name: On the Prowl
GreymaneInnerBeastOnTheProwl.FullTooltip: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> once it has been active for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GreymaneEagerWolf.name: Eager Wolf
GreymaneEagerWolf.FullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">40% </c>after it has been active for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.name: Executioner
HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GreymaneWorgenFormAlphaKiller.name: Alpha Killer
GreymaneWorgenFormAlphaKiller.ShortTooltip: Increases Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes
GreymaneWorgenFormAlphaKiller.FullTooltip: <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c> Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

GreymaneGoForTheThroatUnleashed.name: Unleashed
GreymaneGoForTheThroatUnleashed.ShortTooltip: Increase Go for the Throat damage, reset Ability cooldowns
GreymaneGoForTheThroatUnleashed.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive</c>: Go For The Throat's damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.<n/><n/>If Go for the Throat kills its target, refund its Mana cost and reset the cooldowns of Greymane's Abilities.

GreymaneCursedBulletGilneanRoulette.name: Gilnean Roulette
GreymaneCursedBulletGilneanRoulette.ShortTooltip: Cursed Bullet deals less damage, lower cooldown
GreymaneCursedBulletGilneanRoulette.FullTooltip: Cursed Bullet's damage is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of current health but its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

GreymaneHuntersBlunderbuss.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
GreymaneHuntersBlunderbuss.FullTooltip: <c val="ffff80">Human</c> Basic Attacks splash for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage behind the target.

GreymaneToothAndClaw.name: Tooth and Claw
GreymaneToothAndClaw.FullTooltip: <c val="D65CFF">Worgen</c> Basic Attacks cleave for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage. Increase Razor Swipe's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

Guldan.name: Gul'dan
Guldan.title: Darkness Incarnate
Guldan.SearchText: Guldan Orc Warlock War1 1 I War2 War3 WC1 WC2 WC3 Warcraft1 Warcraft2 Warcraft3 Warcraft 2 Tides of Darkness ToD II 2 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC WoW World of Warcraft Burning Crusade BC Warlords of Draenor WoD Legion Horde Hearthstone HS
Guldan.Description: A sustained damage Mage who uses his health as fuel but can steal life from his enemies.
Guldan.InfoText: Abandoning the ways of shamanism, Gul'dan entered a pact with the demon lord Kil'jaeden and betrayed his people in exchange for limitless power. With the orcish Horde under his master's thrall, both Draenor and Azeroth nearly fell into his grasp.

GuldanFelFlame.name: Fel Flame
GuldanFelFlame.ShortTooltip: Release a wave of flame that damages enemies
GuldanFelFlame.FullTooltip: Release a wave of flame, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.045~~</c> damage to enemies.

GuldanDrainLife.name: Drain Life
GuldanDrainLife.ShortTooltip: Drain Health from an enemy, dealing damage and healing Gul'dan
GuldanDrainLife.FullTooltip: Drain the life from an enemy over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">132~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and healing Gul'dan for <c val="bfd4fd">188~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

GuldanCorruption.name: Corruption
GuldanCorruption.ShortTooltip: Deals damage over time to enemies in the area
GuldanCorruption.FullTooltip: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">204~~0.045~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Corruption can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times on an enemy.

GuldanHorrify.name: Horrify
GuldanHorrify.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

GuldanRainOfDestruction.name: Rain of Destruction
GuldanRainOfDestruction.ShortTooltip: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
GuldanRainOfDestruction.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds. Each meteor deals <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage in a small area.

GuldanLifeTap.name: Life Tap
GuldanLifeTap.ShortTooltip: Restore Mana at the cost of Health
GuldanLifeTap.FullTooltip: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.<n/><n/>Activate to restore <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Gul'dan's Mana.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

GuldanLifeTapFree.name: Life Tap
GuldanLifeTapFree.FullTooltip: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.<n/><n/>Activate to restore <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Gul'dan's Mana.

GuldanFelFlamePursuitOfFlame.name: Pursuit of Flame
GuldanFelFlamePursuitOfFlame.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Heroes to increase area
GuldanFelFlamePursuitOfFlame.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

GuldanChaoticEnergy.name: Chaotic Energy
GuldanChaoticEnergy.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Gather Regen Globes to reduce Mana costs
GuldanChaoticEnergy.FullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

GuldanCorruptionEchoedCorruption.name: Echoed Corruption
GuldanCorruptionEchoedCorruption.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Heroes with Corruption to increase strikes
GuldanCorruptionEchoedCorruption.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

GuldanDrainLifeHealthFunnel.name: Health Funnel
GuldanDrainLifeHealthFunnel.FullTooltip: Drain Life's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

GuldanLifeTapImprovedLifeTap.name: Improved Life Tap
GuldanLifeTapImprovedLifeTap.FullTooltip: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

GuldanConsumeSoul.name: Consume Soul
GuldanConsumeSoul.ShortTooltip: Instantly kill an enemy Minion to heal
GuldanConsumeSoul.FullTooltip: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">365~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

GuldanFelFlameBoundByShadow.name: Bound by Shadow
GuldanFelFlameBoundByShadow.ShortTooltip: Fel Flame hits reduce the cooldown of Corruption
GuldanFelFlameBoundByShadow.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

GuldanCorruptionCurseOfExhaustion.name: Curse of Exhaustion
GuldanCorruptionCurseOfExhaustion.ShortTooltip: Drain Life deals more damage, Slows
GuldanCorruptionCurseOfExhaustion.FullTooltip: Drain Life deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

GuldanLifeTapHungerforPower.name: Hunger for Power
GuldanLifeTapHungerforPower.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Power but reduce healing received
GuldanLifeTapHungerforPower.FullTooltip: Increases Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> but reduces healing received from allies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

GuldanHorrify.name: Horrify
GuldanHorrify.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

GuldanRainOfDestruction.name: Rain of Destruction
GuldanRainOfDestruction.ShortTooltip: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
GuldanRainOfDestruction.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds. Each meteor deals <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage in a small area.

GuldanFelFlameFelArmor.name: Fel Armor
GuldanFelFlameFelArmor.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

GuldanDrainLifeHarvestLife.name: Harvest Life
GuldanDrainLifeHarvestLife.FullTooltip: Drain Life heals for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more Health when used on Heroes.

GuldanDarkBargain.name: Dark Bargain
GuldanDarkBargain.FullTooltip: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> but his respawn time is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

GuldanHealthstone.name: Healthstone
GuldanHealthstone.FullTooltip: Activate to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

GuldanFelFlameRampantHellfire.name: Rampant Hellfire
GuldanFelFlameRampantHellfire.FullTooltip: Fel Flame's damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

GuldanCorruptionRuinousAffliction.name: Ruinous Affliction
GuldanCorruptionRuinousAffliction.FullTooltip: Corruption deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals <c val="bfd4fd">233~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GuldanLifeTapDarknessWithin.name: Darkness Within
GuldanLifeTapDarknessWithin.FullTooltip: Dealing <c val="bfd4fd">600~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

GuldanHorrifyHaunt.name: Haunt
GuldanHorrifyHaunt.ShortTooltip: Increases Horrify duration, lower enemies' Armor
GuldanHorrifyHaunt.FullTooltip: Increases the duration of Horrify by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, and while Feared, enemies lose <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage.

GuldanRainOfDestructionDeepImpact.name: Deep Impact
GuldanRainOfDestructionDeepImpact.ShortTooltip: Rain of Destruction slows enemy Movement Speed
GuldanRainOfDestructionDeepImpact.FullTooltip: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

GuldanDemonicCircle.name: Demonic Circle
GuldanDemonicCircle.ShortTooltip: Summon a Demonic Circle that Gul'dan can teleport to
GuldanDemonicCircle.FullTooltip: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

Hanzo.name: Hanzo
Hanzo.title: Master Assassin
Hanzo.Description: A ranged Assassin who specializes in scouting and taking out enemies from a distance.
Hanzo.InfoText: Once heir to the Shimada clan's criminal empire, Hanzo abandoned his birthright after he almost killed his younger brother. He now strives to perfect his skills as a warrior, and sees the Nexus and its endless conflict as the ideal training ground.

HanzoStormBowFireTargetPoint.name: Storm Bow
HanzoStormBowFireTargetPoint.ShortTooltip: Charge up to fire a deadly arrow
HanzoStormBowFireTargetPoint.FullTooltip: Activate to charge an arrow that deals <c val="bfd4fd">291~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.

HanzoScatterArrow.name: Scatter Arrow
HanzoScatterArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire an arrow that ricochets and splits
HanzoScatterArrow.FullTooltip: Fire an arrow that deals <c val="bfd4fd">88~~0.04~~</c> to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> additional times, and deal <c val="bfd4fd">88~~0.04~~</c> damage each to the first enemy hit.

HanzoSonicArrow.name: Sonic Arrow
HanzoSonicArrow.FullTooltip: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage to them and follows them as they move.

HanzoDragonstrike.name: Dragonstrike
HanzoDragonstrike.ShortTooltip: Summon a pair of Spirit Dragons to damage enemies
HanzoDragonstrike.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage.

HanzoDragonsArrow.name: Dragon's Arrow
HanzoDragonsArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages
HanzoDragonsArrow.FullTooltip: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> and the Stun duration to <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">390~~0.04~~</c> and the Stun duration to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

HanzoNaturalAgilityButton.name: Natural Agility
HanzoNaturalAgilityButton.FullTooltip: Jump over unpathable terrain or Structures, up to a maximum range.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

HanzoPOTG.name: Play of the Game
HanzoPOTG.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to Hanzo's Dragon's Arrow.

HanzoTargetPractice.name: Target Practice
HanzoTargetPractice.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit all enemy Heroes to empower Storm Bow
HanzoTargetPractice.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

HanzoSimpleGeometry.name: Simple Geometry
HanzoSimpleGeometry.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

HanzoRedemption.name: Redemption
HanzoRedemption.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to gain Attack Speed
HanzoRedemption.FullTooltip: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

HanzoExplosiveArrows.name: Explosive Arrows
HanzoExplosiveArrows.ShortTooltip: Storm Bow arrows explode on Minions, Monsters
HanzoExplosiveArrows.FullTooltip: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of its damage to enemies around its target.

HanzoSerratedArrows.name: Serrated Arrows
HanzoSerratedArrows.ShortTooltip: Scatter Arrow deals more damage to non-Heroes
HanzoSerratedArrows.FullTooltip: Scatter Arrow deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

HanzoIgnoreAllDistractions.name: Ignore All Distractions
HanzoIgnoreAllDistractions.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions, increase range
HanzoIgnoreAllDistractions.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

HanzoTheDragonHungers.name: The Dragon Hungers
HanzoTheDragonHungers.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

HanzoNeverOutmatched.name: Never Outmatched
HanzoNeverOutmatched.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Scatter Arrow cooldown
HanzoNeverOutmatched.FullTooltip: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c>. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

HanzoSharpenedArrowheads.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
HanzoSharpenedArrowheads.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Storm Bow reduce Armor
HanzoSharpenedArrowheads.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, up to a maximum reduction of <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor.

HanzoDragonstrike.name: Dragonstrike
HanzoDragonstrike.ShortTooltip: Summon a pair of Spirit Dragons to damage enemies
HanzoDragonstrike.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage.

HanzoDragonsArrow.name: Dragon's Arrow
HanzoDragonsArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages
HanzoDragonsArrow.FullTooltip: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> and the Stun duration to <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">390~~0.04~~</c> and the Stun duration to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

HanzoFleetofFoot.name: Fleet of Foot
HanzoFleetofFoot.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

HanzoNinjaAssassin.name: Ninja Assassin
HanzoNinjaAssassin.ShortTooltip: Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility cooldown
HanzoNinjaAssassin.FullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

HanzoMountedArchery.name: Mounted Archery
HanzoMountedArchery.ShortTooltip: Increase Mount Speed, Natural Agility mounts
HanzoMountedArchery.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Summon Mount by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Upon mounting, gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> additional Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

HanzoFlawlessTechnique.name: Flawless Technique
HanzoFlawlessTechnique.ShortTooltip: Storm Bow, Basic Attacks empower each other
HanzoFlawlessTechnique.FullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

HanzoPiercingArrows.name: Piercing Arrows
HanzoPiercingArrows.FullTooltip: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> enemy each time it ricochets.

HanzoGiantSlayer.name: Giant Slayer
HanzoGiantSlayer.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Scatter Arrow deal bonus damage
HanzoGiantSlayer.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health as damage.

HanzoTheDragonAwakens.name: The Dragon Awakens
HanzoTheDragonAwakens.ShortTooltip: Abilities and Attacks reduce Dragonstrike cooldown
HanzoTheDragonAwakens.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

HanzoPOTG.name: Play of the Game
HanzoPOTG.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport to Dragon's Arrow
HanzoPOTG.FullTooltip: While in flight or for up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal <c val="bfd4fd">132~~0.04~~</c> damage to each target hit by the impact.<n/><n/>Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

HanzoBullseye.name: Bullseye
HanzoBullseye.FullTooltip: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

HanzoPerfectAgility.name: Perfect Agility
HanzoPerfectAgility.ShortTooltip: Gain Natural Agility charge, cooldown reduced
HanzoPerfectAgility.FullTooltip: Natural Agility gains a <c val="bfd4fd">2nd</c> charge and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

Illidan.name: Illidan
Illidan.title: The Betrayer
Illidan.SearchText: Illidan Ilidan Stormrage Demon Hunter DH Night Elf WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Legion
Illidan.Description: A mobile, sustained damage Assassin who pairs well with Heroes that can enable him.
Illidan.InfoText: Illidan Stormrage, the first demon hunter, betrayed his people and created a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over Outland slaying unsuitably prepared Heroes who venture into his domain.

IllidanDive.name: Dive
IllidanDive.ShortTooltip: Dive and flip over an enemy
IllidanDive.FullTooltip: Dive at the target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

IllidanSweepingStrike.name: Sweeping Strike
IllidanSweepingStrike.ShortTooltip: Dash and damage enemies while gaining Basic Attack damage
IllidanSweepingStrike.FullTooltip: Dash towards target point, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">119~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

IllidanEvasion.name: Evasion
IllidanEvasion.FullTooltip: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

IllidanTheHunt.name: The Hunt
IllidanTheHunt.ShortTooltip: Charge a target from a very long range
IllidanTheHunt.FullTooltip: Charge to target unit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">251~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact and stunning for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

IllidanMetamorphosisTargeted.name: Metamorphosis
IllidanMetamorphosisTargeted.ShortTooltip: Damage area and increase max Health
IllidanMetamorphosisTargeted.FullTooltip: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> seconds.

IllidanBetrayersThirst.name: Betrayer's Thirst
IllidanBetrayersThirst.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for part of the damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns
IllidanBetrayersThirst.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

IllidanMasteryImmolationSweepingStrike.name: Immolation
IllidanMasteryImmolationSweepingStrike.FullTooltip: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">22~~0.04~~</c> damage a second for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

IllidanMasteryBatteredAssaultSweepingStr.name: Battered Assault
IllidanMasteryBatteredAssaultSweepingStr.FullTooltip: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes its damage bonus is increased from <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c>.

IllidanUnendingHatredPassive.name: Unending Hatred
IllidanUnendingHatredPassive.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Killing enemies grants Basic Attack damage
IllidanUnendingHatredPassive.FullTooltip: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

IllidanMasteryRapidChaseDive.name: Rapid Chase
IllidanMasteryRapidChaseDive.FullTooltip: Dive grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

IllidanMasteryFriendOrFoeDive.name: Friend or Foe
IllidanMasteryFriendOrFoeDive.ShortTooltip: Increases Dive range and can Dive to allies
IllidanMasteryFriendOrFoeDive.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Dive by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

IllidanMasteryUnboundSweepingStrike.name: Unbound
IllidanMasteryUnboundSweepingStrike.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Sweeping Strike can go over terrain
IllidanMasteryUnboundSweepingStrike.FullTooltip: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

IllidanReflexiveBlock.name: Reflexive Block
IllidanReflexiveBlock.FullTooltip: Using Dive grants <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Hero Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

IllidanSweepingStrikesThirstingBlade.name: Thirsting Blade
IllidanSweepingStrikesThirstingBlade.FullTooltip: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

IllidanCombatStyleHuntersOnslaught.name: Hunter's Onslaught

IllidanHeroicAbilityMetamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
IllidanHeroicAbilityMetamorphosis.ShortTooltip: Damage area and increase max Health
IllidanHeroicAbilityMetamorphosis.FullTooltip: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> seconds.

IllidanHeroicAbilityTheHunt.name: The Hunt
IllidanHeroicAbilityTheHunt.ShortTooltip: Charge a target from a very long range
IllidanHeroicAbilityTheHunt.FullTooltip: Charge to target unit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">251~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact and stunning for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

IllidanNimbleDefender.name: Nimble Defender
IllidanNimbleDefender.FullTooltip: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

IllidanElusiveStrike.name: Elusive Strike
IllidanElusiveStrike.FullTooltip: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

IllidanMasterySixthSenseEvasion.name: Sixth Sense
IllidanMasterySixthSenseEvasion.FullTooltip: While active, Evasion grants Illidan <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor against the next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

IllidanMasteryMarkedforDeathDive.name: Marked for Death
IllidanMasteryMarkedforDeathDive.FullTooltip: Dive deals an extra <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage if used consecutively on a target within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

IllidanFieryBrand.name: Fiery Brand
IllidanFieryBrand.ShortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks to Heroes are empowered
IllidanFieryBrand.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">4th</c> attack against the same Hero deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">9%</c> of their maximum Health as damage.

IllidanBladesOfAzzinoth.name: Blades of Azzinoth
IllidanBladesOfAzzinoth.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
IllidanBladesOfAzzinoth.FullTooltip: Hitting <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

IllidanMasteryDemonicFormMetamorphosis.name: Demonic Form
IllidanMasteryDemonicFormMetamorphosis.ShortTooltip: Demon form lasts forever, grants Attack Speed
IllidanMasteryDemonicFormMetamorphosis.FullTooltip: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

IllidanMasteryNowhereToHideTheHunt.name: Nowhere to Hide
IllidanMasteryNowhereToHideTheHunt.ShortTooltip: Increases The Hunt range and reveal low Health Heroes
IllidanMasteryNowhereToHideTheHunt.FullTooltip: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Health anywhere on the Battleground.

GenericTalentNexusBlades.name: Nexus Blades
GenericTalentNexusBlades.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
GenericTalentNexusBlades.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.name: Bolt of the Storm
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Imperius.name: Imperius
Imperius.title: Archangel of Valor
Imperius.SearchText: Imperious Impirius Angel Archangel Diablo 3 III D3 Diablo3
Imperius.Description: An all-in Bruiser that leads the charge with strong initiation and single target damage.
Imperius.InfoText: Leader of the Angiris Council and Aspect of Valor, Imperius has valiantly led the armies of the High Heavens to innumerous victories over the demons of the Burning Hells. While his methods are exact and severe, there is no greater defender of righteousness in the entirety of creation.

ImperiusCelestialCharge.name: Celestial Charge
ImperiusCelestialCharge.FullTooltip: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c> damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and deal <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> additional damage when it fully finishes.

ImperiusSolarionsFire.name: Solarion's Fire
ImperiusSolarionsFire.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line
ImperiusSolarionsFire.FullTooltip: Release a fiery wave that deals <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies hit by the center take <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> bonus damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ImperiusMoltenArmor.name: Molten Armor
ImperiusMoltenArmor.FullTooltip: Shroud Imperius in flames for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, striking a nearby enemy for <c val="bfd4fd">19~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. Imperius heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> against Heroes.

ImperiusAngelicArmaments.name: Angelic Armaments
ImperiusAngelicArmaments.ShortTooltip: Gain a large Shield, reactivate to damage
ImperiusAngelicArmaments.FullTooltip: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants <c val="bfd4fd">1000~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds to launch <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> swords toward an area, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit.

ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.name: Wrath of the Angiris
ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.ShortTooltip: Ascend with an enemy into the Heavens
ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.<n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">375~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ImperiusValorousBrand.name: Valorous Brand
ImperiusValorousBrand.ShortTooltip: Basic Abilities mark enemy Heroes, increasing Basic Attack damage and healing
ImperiusValorousBrand.FullTooltip: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus damage per mark and healing for <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> per mark.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression

ImperiusCelestialChargeImpalingLight.name: Impaling Light
ImperiusCelestialChargeImpalingLight.ShortTooltip: Empower Celestial Charge with Valorous Brand
ImperiusCelestialChargeImpalingLight.FullTooltip: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

ImperiusSolarionsFireConsumingFlame.name: Consuming Flame
ImperiusSolarionsFireConsumingFlame.ShortTooltip: Increase Solarion's Fire Slow, center damage
ImperiusSolarionsFireConsumingFlame.FullTooltip: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> and its Slow amount by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana.

ImperiusValorousBrandBurnTheImpure.name: Burn the Impure
ImperiusValorousBrandBurnTheImpure.ShortTooltip: Valorous Brand marks deal bonus damage
ImperiusValorousBrandBurnTheImpure.FullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

ImperiusMoltenArmorSovereignArmor.name: Sovereign Armor
ImperiusMoltenArmorSovereignArmor.FullTooltip: Molten Armor grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

ImperiusValorousBrandBattleHunger.name: Battle Hunger
ImperiusValorousBrandBattleHunger.FullTooltip: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c>.

ImperiusPressForward.name: Press Forward
ImperiusPressForward.ShortTooltip: Damage Heroes to refresh Regen Globes
ImperiusPressForward.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor while being healed by a Regeneration Globe. Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds (unless it is already higher).

ImperiusCelestialChargeFlashOfAnger.name: Flash of Anger
ImperiusCelestialChargeFlashOfAnger.ShortTooltip: Celestial Charge marks deal damage in an area
ImperiusCelestialChargeFlashOfAnger.FullTooltip: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target and nearby enemies and grants Imperius a <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> point Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ImperiusSolarionsFireBlazeOfGlory.name: Blaze of Glory
ImperiusSolarionsFireBlazeOfGlory.ShortTooltip: Solarion's Fire creates a delayed explosion
ImperiusSolarionsFireBlazeOfGlory.FullTooltip: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.04~~</c> damage. This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

ImperiusHolyFervor.name: Holy Fervor
ImperiusHolyFervor.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain cleaving Basic Attacks
ImperiusHolyFervor.FullTooltip: Activate to cause the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Basic Attacks within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds to cleave for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> additional damage.

ImperiusAngelicArmaments.name: Angelic Armaments
ImperiusAngelicArmaments.ShortTooltip: Gain a large Shield, reactivate to damage
ImperiusAngelicArmaments.FullTooltip: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants <c val="bfd4fd">1000~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds to launch <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> swords toward an area, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit.

ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.name: Wrath of the Angiris
ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.ShortTooltip: Ascend with an enemy into the Heavens
ImperiusWrathOfTheAngiris.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.<n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">375~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ImperiusCelestialChargePatheticMortals.name: Pathetic Mortals
ImperiusCelestialChargePatheticMortals.ShortTooltip: Celestial Charge reduces Move Speed, damage
ImperiusCelestialChargePatheticMortals.FullTooltip: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and their damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ImperiusMoltenArmorDivineRage.name: Divine Rage
ImperiusMoltenArmorDivineRage.ShortTooltip: Valorous Brand reduces Molten Armor cooldown
ImperiusMoltenArmorDivineRage.FullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ImperiusMoltenArmorHeatOfBattle.name: Heat of Battle
ImperiusMoltenArmorHeatOfBattle.ShortTooltip: Molten Armor heals more against Heroes
ImperiusMoltenArmorHeatOfBattle.FullTooltip: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> for every <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> Health Imperius is missing.

ImperiusCelestialChargeCelestialSwiftnes.name: Celestial Swiftness
ImperiusCelestialChargeCelestialSwiftnes.ShortTooltip: Celestial Charge grants Attack and Move Speed
ImperiusCelestialChargeCelestialSwiftnes.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

ImperiusMoltenArmorMeltingTouch.name: Melting Touch
ImperiusMoltenArmorMeltingTouch.FullTooltip: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ImperiusValorousPursuit.ShortTooltip: Teleport to enemies marked by Valorous Brand
ImperiusValorousPursuit.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ImperiusAngelicArmamentsHeavenlyHost.name: Heavenly Host
ImperiusAngelicArmamentsHeavenlyHost.ShortTooltip: Allied Heroes gain a weaponized Shield
ImperiusAngelicArmamentsHeavenlyHost.FullTooltip: Nearby allied Heroes gain <c val="bfd4fd">600~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ImperiusWrathOfTheAngirisUnrelentingDesc.name: Unrelenting Descent
ImperiusWrathOfTheAngirisUnrelentingDesc.FullTooltip: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ImperiusValorousBrandBrandOfSolarion.name: Brand of Solarion
ImperiusValorousBrandBrandOfSolarion.FullTooltip: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

ImperiusImpervious.name: Impervious
ImperiusImpervious.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Spell Armor
ImperiusImpervious.FullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

Jaina.name: Jaina
Jaina.title: Archmage
Jaina.SearchText: Jaina Proudmoore Human Theramore Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS dreadlord? dread lord? BFA Battle for Azeroth
Jaina.Description: A frost Mage that can slow the entire enemy team.
Jaina.InfoText: Once the apprentice of the Archmage Antonidas, Jaina Proudmoore led the survivors of Lordaeron to Kalimdor and founded the city of Theramore. Now, she serves the Alliance as a powerful voice fighting for reason and diplomacy.

JainaFrostbolt.name: Frostbolt
JainaFrostbolt.ShortTooltip: Shoot a bolt that deals damage and Chills the target
JainaFrostbolt.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">184~~0.04~~</c> damage and Chill the target.

JainaBlizzard.name: Blizzard
JainaBlizzard.ShortTooltip: Creates a storm of ice at target location, damaging and slowing enemies
JainaBlizzard.FullTooltip: Bombard an area with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> waves of ice, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">142~~0.04~~</c> damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

JainaConeOfCold.name: Cone of Cold
JainaConeOfCold.ShortTooltip: Deal damage in a cone and Chill targets
JainaConeOfCold.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> damage and Chill targets.

JainaSummonWaterElemental.name: Summon Water Elemental
JainaSummonWaterElemental.ShortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
JainaSummonWaterElemental.FullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage, splash for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

JainaRingOfFrost.name: Ring of Frost
JainaRingOfFrost.ShortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
JainaRingOfFrost.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage and Roots enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. The ring persists for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

JainaTraitFrostbite.name: Frostbite
JainaTraitFrostbite.ShortTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, slowing them and causing them to take more damage
JainaTraitFrostbite.FullTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

JainaCommandWaterElemental.name: Command Water Elemental
JainaCommandWaterElemental.FullTooltip: Wills the Water Elemental to attack an enemy or move to an area.

ImprovedIceBlock.name: Improved Ice Block
ImprovedIceBlock.FullTooltip: Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

JainaFrostboltWintersReach.name: Winter's Reach
JainaFrostboltWintersReach.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Frostbolt by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

JainaFrostbiteLingeringChill.name: Lingering Chill
JainaFrostbiteLingeringChill.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Chill from <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

JainaFingersOfFrost.name: Fingers of Frost
JainaFingersOfFrost.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase Mana Regeneration
JainaFingersOfFrost.FullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

JainaFrostboltFrostShards.name: Frost Shards
JainaFrostboltFrostShards.FullTooltip: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

JainaFrostbiteArcaneIntellect.name: Arcane Intellect
JainaFrostbiteArcaneIntellect.ShortTooltip: Damage to Chilled targets returns Mana
JainaFrostbiteArcaneIntellect.FullTooltip: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Mana and Abilities return <c val="bfd4fd">20</c>.

JainaFrostbiteFrostArmor.name: Frost Armor
JainaFrostbiteFrostArmor.ShortTooltip: Chill attackers and gain Physical Armor
JainaFrostbiteFrostArmor.FullTooltip: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, Jaina gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

JainaFrostboltIceLance.name: Ice Lance
JainaFrostboltIceLance.ShortTooltip: Reduce Frostbolt cooldown on Chilled targets
JainaFrostboltIceLance.FullTooltip: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds and restores <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana.

JainaConeOfColdIceFloes.name: Ice Floes
JainaConeOfColdIceFloes.ShortTooltip: Increase Cone of Cold area, reduce cooldown
JainaConeOfColdIceFloes.FullTooltip: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds per use.

JainaIcefuryWand.name: Icefury Wand
JainaIcefuryWand.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

JainaHeroicRingOfFrost.name: Ring of Frost
JainaHeroicRingOfFrost.ShortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
JainaHeroicRingOfFrost.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage and Roots enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. The ring persists for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

JainaHeroicSummonWaterElemental.name: Summon Water Elemental
JainaHeroicSummonWaterElemental.ShortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
JainaHeroicSummonWaterElemental.FullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage, splash for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

JainaBlizzardStormFront.name: Storm Front
JainaBlizzardStormFront.ShortTooltip: Increase Blizzard cast range and radius
JainaBlizzardStormFront.FullTooltip: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and its radius by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

JainaFrostbiteIceBarrier.name: Ice Barrier
JainaFrostbiteIceBarrier.FullTooltip: Gain a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

JainaIcyVeins.name: Icy Veins
JainaIcyVeins.FullTooltip: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> faster and reduce their Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

JainaBlizzardSnowstorm.name: Snowstorm
JainaBlizzardSnowstorm.FullTooltip: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. The damage of the third wave is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

JainaConeOfColdNorthernExposure.name: Northern Exposure
JainaConeOfColdNorthernExposure.FullTooltip: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, increasing their damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

JainaConeOfColdNumbingBlast.name: Numbing Blast
JainaConeOfColdNumbingBlast.ShortTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets
JainaConeOfColdNumbingBlast.FullTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

JainaRingOfFrostColdSnap.name: Cold Snap
JainaRingOfFrostColdSnap.ShortTooltip: Ring of Frost center deals damage, Roots
JainaRingOfFrostColdSnap.FullTooltip: The center area of Ring of Frost deals <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

JainaSummonWaterElementalWintermute.name: Wintermute
JainaSummonWaterElementalWintermute.ShortTooltip: Increase cast range and mimics Basic Abilities
JainaSummonWaterElementalWintermute.FullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage.

JainaFrigidTransmission.name: Ice Blink
JainaFrigidTransmission.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport and Chill nearby enemies
JainaFrigidTransmission.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

JainaFrostbiteDeepChill.name: Deep Chill
JainaFrostbiteDeepChill.FullTooltip: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

Junkrat.name: Junkrat
Junkrat.title: Junker Demolitionist
Junkrat.SearchText: Junker Junkdude Grenademans Human Overwatch OW Jamison Fawkes
Junkrat.Description: A mobile Assassin that bombards the enemy from afar, and sows chaos with traps and mines.
Junkrat.InfoText: The destruction of the Australian omnium left the area an irradiated waste and survivors like Jamison Fawkes were greatly affected by radiation. Now as the explosive-obsessed criminal Junkrat, he is renowned for leaving havoc and bedlam in his wake.

JunkratFragLauncher.name: Frag Launcher
JunkratFragLauncher.FullTooltip: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">118~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

JunkratConcussionMine.name: Concussion Mine
JunkratConcussionMine.ShortTooltip: Place a mine that can be detonated
JunkratConcussionMine.FullTooltip: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.<n/><n/>Limit <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> active mine.

JunkratSteelTrap.name: Steel Trap
JunkratSteelTrap.ShortTooltip: Place a trap that Roots enemies
JunkratSteelTrap.FullTooltip: Place a trap on the ground that arms after <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Limit <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> active trap.

JunkratRIPTire.name: RIP-Tire
JunkratRIPTire.ShortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
JunkratRIPTire.FullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with <c val="bfd4fd">530~~0.04~~</c> Health that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.<n/><n/>RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">720~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">445~~0.04~~</c> to enemies on the edge.

JunkratRocketRide.name: Rocket Ride
JunkratRocketRide.ShortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
JunkratRocketRide.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.<n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">3.75</c> seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">890~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

JunkratTotalMayhem.name: Total Mayhem
JunkratTotalMayhem.FullTooltip: Upon dying, drop <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> grenades that explode after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> less damage to Structures.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Detonate Mine</s><n/><n/>Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.
