JunkratRIPTireJump.name: Jump!
JunkratRIPTireJump.FullTooltip: Activate to make the RIP-Tire jump. Can be used to pass over terrain and Structures.

JunkratDetonateRIPTire.name: Detonate RIP-Tire
JunkratDetonateRIPTire.FullTooltip: Instantly detonate the RIP-Tire, knocking nearby enemies back, and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">720~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">445~~0.04~~</c> to enemies on the edge.

JunkratDetonateMine.name: Detonate Mine
JunkratDetonateMine.FullTooltip: Detonate the planted Concussion Mine, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.

JunkratFragLauncherTrickyShuffles.name: Tricky Shuffles
JunkratFragLauncherTrickyShuffles.ShortTooltip: Gain Move Speed while Frag Launcher replenishes
JunkratFragLauncherTrickyShuffles.FullTooltip: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> bonus damage.

JunkratFragLauncherExtraWoundTimers.name: Extra-Wound Timers
JunkratFragLauncherExtraWoundTimers.ShortTooltip: Frag Launcher grenades deal bonus damage
JunkratFragLauncherExtraWoundTimers.FullTooltip: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds before automatically detonating.

JunkratConcussionMineBlowEmUp.name: Blow 'Em Up!
JunkratConcussionMineBlowEmUp.ShortTooltip: Concussion Mine and Steel Trap increase damage
JunkratConcussionMineBlowEmUp.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

JunkratFragLauncherTasteForExplosions.name: Taste For Explosions
JunkratFragLauncherTasteForExplosions.FullTooltip: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

JunkratConcussionMineBOOMPOW.name: BOOM POW
JunkratConcussionMineBOOMPOW.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Concussion Mine cooldown
JunkratConcussionMineBOOMPOW.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

JunkratSteelTrapChatteringTeeth.name: Chattering Teeth
JunkratSteelTrapChatteringTeeth.FullTooltip: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

JunkratConcussionMineBoggedDown.name: Bogged Down
JunkratConcussionMineBoggedDown.FullTooltip: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds upon landing.

JunkratSteelTrapBigAs.name: Big As
JunkratSteelTrapBigAs.FullTooltip: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

JunkratSteelTrapStickyWicket.name: Sticky Wicket
JunkratSteelTrapStickyWicket.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

JunkratTotalMayhemDirtyTricksterTalent.name: Dirty Trickster
JunkratTotalMayhemDirtyTricksterTalent.FullTooltip: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> grenades at his feet that explode. <n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> second cooldown.

JunkratRIPTire.name: RIP-Tire
JunkratRIPTire.ShortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
JunkratRIPTire.FullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with <c val="bfd4fd">530~~0.04~~</c> Health that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.<n/><n/>RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">720~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">445~~0.04~~</c> to enemies on the edge.

JunkratRocketRide.name: Rocket Ride
JunkratRocketRide.ShortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
JunkratRocketRide.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.<n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">3.75</c> seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">890~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

JunkratFragLauncherBombsAwayTalent.name: Bombs Away
JunkratFragLauncherBombsAwayTalent.FullTooltip: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>. Frag Launcher grenades fired within <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds of using a Basic Attack deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> bonus damage.

JunkratConcussionMineRipperAir.name: Ripper Air
JunkratConcussionMineRipperAir.FullTooltip: Junkrat is knocked back <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

JunkratSteelTrapGottaTrapEmAll.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
JunkratSteelTrapGottaTrapEmAll.FullTooltip: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>.

JunkratFragLauncherBurstFire.name: Burst Fire
JunkratFragLauncherBurstFire.FullTooltip: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, but it loses <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> maximum charge.

JunkratFragLauncherEndlessNades.name: Endless Nades
JunkratFragLauncherEndlessNades.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Frag Launcher cooldown
JunkratFragLauncherEndlessNades.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

JunkratFragLauncherSpreadVolley.name: Spread Volley
JunkratFragLauncherSpreadVolley.ShortTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher spread
JunkratFragLauncherSpreadVolley.FullTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

JunkratRIPTireExtraOomph.name: Extra Oomph
JunkratRIPTireExtraOomph.FullTooltip: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

JunkratRocketRidePuckishScamp.name: Puckish Scamp
JunkratRocketRidePuckishScamp.FullTooltip: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

JunkratFragLauncherCannonball.name: Cannonball!
JunkratFragLauncherCannonball.ShortTooltip: Bigger Basic Attack, Frag Launcher explosions
JunkratFragLauncherCannonball.FullTooltip: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

JunkratIHateWaitingTalent.name: I Hate Waiting!
JunkratIHateWaitingTalent.FullTooltip: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

Kaelthas.name: Kael'thas
Kaelthas.title: The Sun King
Kaelthas.SearchText: Kael'thas Kaelthas KT Prince Sunstrider Mage Blood Elf WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC
Kaelthas.Description: A fire Mage that punishes enemies that stay close together.
Kaelthas.InfoText: Like all Blood Elves, Prince Kael'thas was transformed by the fall of Quel'Thalas. Desperate to save his people from being consumed by their magical addiction, he joined forces with the Burning Legion and now lords over Tempest Keep.

KaelthasFlamestrike.name: Flamestrike
KaelthasFlamestrike.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, deal <c val="bfd4fd">345~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. <n/><n/><c val="ff00">Verdant Spheres</c> increases the radius by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

KaelthasLivingBomb.name: Living Bomb
KaelthasLivingBomb.ShortTooltip: Damage an enemy over time, eventually exploding in an area around them
KaelthasLivingBomb.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">126~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing <c val="bfd4fd">215~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.<n/><n/><c val="ff00">Verdant Spheres</c> makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

KaelthasGravityLapse.name: Gravity Lapse
KaelthasGravityLapse.FullTooltip: Stun the first enemy hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. <n/><n/><c val="ff00">Verdant Spheres</c> causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> enemies hit and increases the stun duration by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

KaelthasPyroblast.name: Pyroblast
KaelthasPyroblast.ShortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
KaelthasPyroblast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals <c val="bfd4fd">810~~0.05~~</c> damage to an enemy Hero and <c val="bfd4fd">405~~0.05~~</c> damage to enemies nearby.

KaelthasPhoenix.name: Phoenix
KaelthasPhoenix.ShortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
KaelthasPhoenix.FullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds, attacking enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage and splashing for <c val="bfd4fd">39~~0.04~~</c> damage.

KaelthasVerdantSpheres.name: Verdant Spheres
KaelthasVerdantSpheres.ShortTooltip: Make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful
KaelthasVerdantSpheres.FullTooltip: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

KaelthasPhoenixRetarget.name: Phoenix Retarget
KaelthasPhoenixRetarget.FullTooltip: Send the Phoenix to a different area.

KaelthasVerdantSpheresActive.name: Verdant Spheres Active
KaelthasVerdantSpheresActive.FullTooltip: Kael'thas's next Basic Ability is more powerful

KaelthasFlamestrikeConvection.name: Convection
KaelthasFlamestrikeConvection.FullTooltip: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

KaelthasVerdantSpheresFelInfusion.name: Fel Infusion
KaelthasVerdantSpheresFelInfusion.ShortTooltip: Increases Spell Power, Verdant Spheres heals
KaelthasVerdantSpheresFelInfusion.FullTooltip: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c>. Kael'thas heals for <c val="bfd4fd">94~~0.04~~</c> Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

KaelthasManaAddict.name: Mana Addict
KaelthasManaAddict.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes grant Arcane Barrier
KaelthasManaAddict.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

KaelthasGravityLapseNetherWind.name: Nether Wind
KaelthasGravityLapseNetherWind.ShortTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse range and restores Mana
KaelthasGravityLapseNetherWind.FullTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> Mana.

KaelthasGravityLapseEnergyRoil.name: Energy Roil
KaelthasGravityLapseEnergyRoil.ShortTooltip: Reduce Gravity Lapse cooldown on Heroes
KaelthasGravityLapseEnergyRoil.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by <c val="bfd4fd">70.</c> If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">9</c> seconds.

KaelthasFlamestrikeManaTap.name: Mana Tap
KaelthasFlamestrikeManaTap.FullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres restores <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

KaelthasFlamestrikeBurnedFlesh.name: Burned Flesh
KaelthasFlamestrikeBurnedFlesh.FullTooltip: When Flamestrike damages <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> of their maximum Health.

KaelthasLivingBombSunKingsFury.name: Sun King's Fury
KaelthasLivingBombSunKingsFury.ShortTooltip: Living Bomb deals more damage after spreading
KaelthasLivingBombSunKingsFury.FullTooltip: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> more damage.

KaelthasMasterySunfireEnchantment.name: Sunfire Enchantment
KaelthasMasterySunfireEnchantment.FullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Basic Attacks to instead deal <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.04~~</c> Spell Damage. If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain<c val="bfd4fd"> 15%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

KaelthasHeroicAbilityPhoenix.name: Phoenix
KaelthasHeroicAbilityPhoenix.ShortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
KaelthasHeroicAbilityPhoenix.FullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds, attacking enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage and splashing for <c val="bfd4fd">39~~0.04~~</c> damage.

KaelthasHeroicAbilityPyroblast.name: Pyroblast
KaelthasHeroicAbilityPyroblast.ShortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
KaelthasHeroicAbilityPyroblast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals <c val="bfd4fd">810~~0.05~~</c> damage to an enemy Hero and <c val="bfd4fd">405~~0.05~~</c> damage to enemies nearby.

KaelthasLivingBombPyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
KaelthasLivingBombPyromaniac.ShortTooltip: Living Bomb reduces Basic Ability cooldowns
KaelthasLivingBombPyromaniac.FullTooltip: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

KaelthasLivingBombBackdraft.name: Backdraft
KaelthasLivingBombBackdraft.FullTooltip: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

KaelthasLivingBombFissionBomb.name: Fission Bomb
KaelthasLivingBombFissionBomb.FullTooltip: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

KaelthasFlamestrikeFuryOfTheSunwell.name: Fury of the Sunwell
KaelthasFlamestrikeFuryOfTheSunwell.FullTooltip: Flamestrike will explode a second time <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds later.

KaelthasLivingBombIgnite.name: Ignite
KaelthasLivingBombIgnite.FullTooltip: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

KaelthasTwinSpheres.name: Twin Spheres
KaelthasTwinSpheres.ShortTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge
KaelthasTwinSpheres.FullTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

KaelthasPhoenixRebirth.name: Rebirth
KaelthasPhoenixRebirth.ShortTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration and may retarget
KaelthasPhoenixRebirth.FullTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

KaelthasPyroblastPresenceOfMind.name: Presence Of Mind
KaelthasPyroblastPresenceOfMind.FullTooltip: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

KaelthasMasterOfFlames.name: Master of Flames
KaelthasMasterOfFlames.FullTooltip: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

KaelthasMasteryFlamethrower.name: Flamethrower
KaelthasMasteryFlamethrower.FullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. If Flamestrike hits <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzad.title: Archlich of Naxxramas
KelThuzad.SearchText: KT Kelthuzad Archlich of Naxxramas esteemed Lich Lord of the Plaguelands Commander of the Dread Necropolis Master and Founder of the The Damned Return formerly of the Council of Six Creator of the Abomination Summoner of Archimonde the Defiler Betrayer of Humanity Hearthstone Enthusiast and Majordomo to the Lich King undead WC3 Reign of Chaos Frozen Throne FT WoW Wrath WotLK Wrath of the Lich King Warcraft3 Warcraft III 3 War3
KelThuzad.Description: A burst damage Mage that locks down enemies and devastates them with powerful combos.
KelThuzad.InfoText: Kel'Thuzad has faithfully served the Lich King both in life and after death. Reanimated as the Archlich of the Scourge and given domain of the Dread Necropolis, Naxxramas, Kel’Thuzad remains Arthas’s most trusted advisor and master of the cold dark.

KelThuzadDeathAndDecay.name: Death and Decay
KelThuzadDeathAndDecay.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies and create a damaging pool
KelThuzadDeathAndDecay.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">82~~0.025~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds to enemies.

KelThuzadFrostNova.name: Frost Nova
KelThuzadFrostNova.FullTooltip: Create a nova that explodes after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

KelThuzadChains.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzadChains.FullTooltip: Launch a chain, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">97~~0.025~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadFrozenTomb.name: Frost Blast
KelThuzadFrozenTomb.ShortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
KelThuzadFrozenTomb.FullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.025~~</c> damage to its target and <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

KelThuzadShadowFissure.name: Shadow Fissure
KelThuzadShadowFissure.ShortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
KelThuzadShadowFissure.FullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">320~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadMasterOfTheColdDark.name: Master of the Cold Dark
KelThuzadMasterOfTheColdDark.ShortTooltip: Kel'Thuzad becomes increasingly stronger as he disrupts enemies
KelThuzadMasterOfTheColdDark.FullTooltip: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.Blight: 0/30

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

KelThuzadChainsLink.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzadChainsLink.FullTooltip: Launch a new chain from the currently chained enemy. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">97~~0.025~~</c> damage upon impacting a Hero and pulls both enemies together.

KelThuzadGlacialSpike.name: Glacial Spike
KelThuzadGlacialSpike.ShortTooltip: Create a spike that explodes, deals damage
KelThuzadGlacialSpike.FullTooltip: Activate to create a spike that detonates after <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">60~~0.025~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

KelThuzadThePlaguelands.name: The Plaguelands
KelThuzadThePlaguelands.ShortTooltip: Increase Death and Decay duration, radius
KelThuzadThePlaguelands.FullTooltip: Increase Death and Decay's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. After gaining <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

KelThuzadBlightedFrost.name: Blighted Frost
KelThuzadBlightedFrost.ShortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova center damage, duration
KelThuzadBlightedFrost.FullTooltip: Frost Nova deals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadBarbedChains.name: Barbed Chains
KelThuzadBarbedChains.ShortTooltip: Chains deals more damage, reduces Armor
KelThuzadBarbedChains.FullTooltip: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c>. After gaining <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

KelThuzadStripShields.name: Strip Shields
KelThuzadStripShields.FullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent <c val="bfd4fd">128~~0.04~~</c> Shield, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.<n/><n/>Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to <c val="bfd4fd">270~~0.025~~</c> bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

KelThuzadPhylactery.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzadPhylactery.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Collect Regen Globes for instant respawn
KelThuzadPhylactery.FullTooltip: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

KelThuzadArchlichArmor.name: Armor of the Archlich
KelThuzadArchlichArmor.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Physical Armor, Slow enemies
KelThuzadArchlichArmor.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take <c val="bfd4fd">45~~0.04~~</c> damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

KelThuzadAcceleratedDecay.name: Accelerated Decay
KelThuzadAcceleratedDecay.FullTooltip: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> times.

KelThuzadChillingTouch.name: Chilling Touch
KelThuzadChillingTouch.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically deal area Spell damage
KelThuzadChillingTouch.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

KelThuzadIceCold.name: Ice Cold
KelThuzadIceCold.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds and increase its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">400%</c>.

KelThuzadFrozenTomb.name: Frost Blast
KelThuzadFrozenTomb.ShortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
KelThuzadFrozenTomb.FullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.025~~</c> damage to its target and <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

KelThuzadShadowFissure.name: Shadow Fissure
KelThuzadShadowFissure.ShortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
KelThuzadShadowFissure.FullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">320~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadIcyGrasp.name: Icy Grasp
KelThuzadIcyGrasp.ShortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova Slow, reduce cooldown
KelThuzadIcyGrasp.FullTooltip: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadChainsOfIce.name: Chains of Ice
KelThuzadChainsOfIce.FullTooltip: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

KelThuzadChainLink.name: Chain-Link
KelThuzadChainLink.FullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

KelThuzadArcaneEchoes.name: Arcane Echoes
KelThuzadArcaneEchoes.FullTooltip: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

KelThuzadHungeringCold.name: Hungering Cold
KelThuzadHungeringCold.ShortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to Rooted enemies
KelThuzadHungeringCold.FullTooltip: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.025~~</c> damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

KelThuzadPowerOfIcecrown.name: Power of Icecrown
KelThuzadPowerOfIcecrown.FullTooltip: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

KelThuzadDeathchill.name: Deathchill
KelThuzadDeathchill.ShortTooltip: Frost Blast Slows, Takedowns release blasts
KelThuzadDeathchill.FullTooltip: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

KelThuzadMightOfTheScourge.name: Might of the Scourge
KelThuzadMightOfTheScourge.FullTooltip: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second later. This second cast will not duplicate itself.

KelThuzadShiftingMalice.name: Shifting Malice
KelThuzadShiftingMalice.ShortTooltip: Activate to dash and deal damage
KelThuzadShiftingMalice.FullTooltip: Activate to dash forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.025~~</c> damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

KelThuzadTheDamnedReturn.name: The Damned Return
KelThuzadTheDamnedReturn.ShortTooltip: Create Shades that mimic Death and Decay
KelThuzadTheDamnedReturn.FullTooltip: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

Kerrigan.name: Kerrigan
Kerrigan.title: Queen of Blades
Kerrigan.SearchText: Kerrigan Karrigan Kerigan Sarah Swarm Queen Blades Zerg HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW LotV Legacy Void Wings Liberty WoL SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2
Kerrigan.Description: A combo Assassin who goes all in, diving into the enemy team.
Kerrigan.InfoText: Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.

KerriganRavage.name: Ravage
KerriganRavage.ShortTooltip: Leap to an enemy and deal damage
KerriganRavage.FullTooltip: Leap to a target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage. If the enemy dies within <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, restore <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> charge and refund <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Mana.

KerriganImpalingBlades.name: Impaling Blades
KerriganImpalingBlades.ShortTooltip: Stun and damage enemies in an area
KerriganImpalingBlades.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

KerriganPrimalGrasp.name: Primal Grasp
KerriganPrimalGrasp.ShortTooltip: Pull and damage enemies in an area
KerriganPrimalGrasp.FullTooltip: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">25~~0.04~~</c> damage. After <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">195~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

KerriganSummonUltralisk.name: Summon Ultralisk
KerriganSummonUltralisk.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

KerriganMaelstrom.name: Maelstrom
KerriganMaelstrom.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">74~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

KerriganAssimilation.name: Assimilation
KerriganAssimilation.ShortTooltip: Gain a temporary Shield by attacking enemies
KerriganAssimilation.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current maximum: </c><c val="bfd4fd">1004~~0.04~~</c>

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

KerriganSummonUltraliskIssueOrder.name: Command Ultralisk
KerriganSummonUltraliskIssueOrder.FullTooltip: Order the Ultralisk to attack an enemy or move to an area.

KerriganRavageSiphoningImpact.name: Siphoning Impact
KerriganRavageSiphoningImpact.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> points of Assimilation Shields.

KerriganAssimilationMastery.name: Assimilation Mastery
KerriganAssimilationMastery.ShortTooltip: Globes grant Shields, Assimilation increases regen
KerriganAssimilationMastery.FullTooltip: Regeneration Globe healing grants <c val="bfd4fd">45~~0.04~~</c> points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>.

KerriganFuryOfTheSwarm.name: Fury of the Swarm
KerriganFuryOfTheSwarm.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant more Shields, can splash
KerriganFuryOfTheSwarm.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds splashes for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage around the target.

KerriganRavageSharpenedBlades.name: Sharpened Blades
KerriganRavageSharpenedBlades.FullTooltip: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

KerriganImpalingBladesKineticFulmination.name: Kinetic Fulmination
KerriganImpalingBladesKineticFulmination.ShortTooltip: Damage dealt increases Impaling Blades damage
KerriganImpalingBladesKineticFulmination.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

KerriganPrimalGraspPsionicPulse.name: Psionic Pulse
KerriganPrimalGraspPsionicPulse.FullTooltip: Primal Grasp explodes a second time <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds after its first explosion.

KerriganRavageQueenOfBlades.name: Queen of Blades
KerriganRavageQueenOfBlades.FullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

KerriganRavageBoundlessFury.name: Boundless Fury
KerriganRavageBoundlessFury.ShortTooltip: Ravage can grant a charge of Ravage
KerriganRavageBoundlessFury.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds per Hero.

KerriganBladedMomentum.name: Bladed Momentum
KerriganBladedMomentum.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">0.6</c> seconds.

KerriganHeroicAbilityMaelstrom.name: Maelstrom
KerriganHeroicAbilityMaelstrom.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">74~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

KerriganHeroicAbilitySummonUltralisk.name: Summon Ultralisk
KerriganHeroicAbilitySummonUltralisk.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

KerriganPrimalGraspPsionicBarrier.name: Psionic Barrier
KerriganPrimalGraspPsionicBarrier.ShortTooltip: Primal Grasp grants Spell Armor, Move Speed
KerriganPrimalGraspPsionicBarrier.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Spell Armor and <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed.

KerriganAssimilationVolatilePower.name: Volatile Power
KerriganAssimilationVolatilePower.FullTooltip: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>, but reduce duration of Assimilation by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

KerriganChrysalis.name: Chrysalis
KerriganChrysalis.ShortTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and heal
KerriganChrysalis.FullTooltip: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with <c val="bfd4fd">750~~0.04~~</c> Health for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of her maximum Health per second.<n/><n/>Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

KerriganRavageMountingPotency.name: Mounting Potency
KerriganRavageMountingPotency.FullTooltip: Ravage grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

KerriganImpalingBladesPainfulSpikes.name: Painful Spikes
KerriganImpalingBladesPainfulSpikes.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">70~~0.04~~</c> damage the next <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> times Kerrigan damages them within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

KerriganUnbridledEnergy.name: Unbridled Energy
KerriganUnbridledEnergy.ShortTooltip: Heroic Ability damage grants Spell Power
KerriganUnbridledEnergy.FullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

KerriganOmegastormMaelstrom.name: Omegastorm
KerriganOmegastormMaelstrom.FullTooltip: Maelstrom's duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds every time it damages a Hero.

KerriganTorrasqueSummonUltralisk.name: Torrasque
KerriganTorrasqueSummonUltralisk.ShortTooltip: Ultralisk spawns a new Ultralisk on death
KerriganTorrasqueSummonUltralisk.FullTooltip: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

KerriganAssimilationAssimilationBlades.name: Assimilation Blades
KerriganAssimilationAssimilationBlades.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

KerriganPsionicShift.name: Psionic Shift
KerriganPsionicShift.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance, deal damage
KerriganPsionicShift.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Generates <c val="bfd4fd">300%</c> increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

L90ETC.name: E.T.C.
L90ETC.title: Rock God
L90ETC.SearchText: E.T.C. Elite Tauren Chieftain ETC etc Level 90 Horde Heroes of the Storm WoW
L90ETC.Description: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.
L90ETC.InfoText: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.

L90ETCPowerslide.name: Powerslide
L90ETCPowerslide.ShortTooltip: Dash to an area, stunning and damaging enemies hit
L90ETCPowerslide.FullTooltip: Slide to a location dealing <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage and stunning enemies hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> second.

L90ETCFaceMelt.name: Face Melt
L90ETCFaceMelt.ShortTooltip: Knock back and damage nearby enemies
L90ETCFaceMelt.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

L90ETCGuitarSolo.name: Guitar Solo
L90ETCGuitarSolo.FullTooltip: Regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> Health per second for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

L90ETCMoshPit.name: Mosh Pit
L90ETCMoshPit.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

L90ETCStageDive.name: Stage Dive
L90ETCStageDive.ShortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
L90ETCStageDive.FullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after <c val="bfd4fd">2.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">330~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

RockstarDummy.name: Rockstar
RockstarDummy.ShortTooltip: After using an ability, E.T.C. gains Armor
RockstarDummy.FullTooltip: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression

ETCMasteryGuitarHero.FullTooltip: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks. Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

ETCMasteryProgRock.name: Prog Rock
ETCMasteryProgRock.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes empower Guitar Solo
ETCMasteryProgRock.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50~~0.04~~ Health every second while it is active.

ETCBlockParty.name: Block Party
ETCBlockParty.FullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. Maximum <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> stacks of Block.

ETCCrowdSurfer.name: Crowd Surfer
ETCCrowdSurfer.FullTooltip: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

L90ETCMasteryFaceMeltLoudSpeakers.name: Loud Speakers

L90ETCMasteryFaceMeltLoudSpeakers.FullTooltip: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

ETCCombatStyleEchoPedal.name: Echo Pedal

This deals <c val="bfd4fd">250%</c> bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds later.

ETCMasteryHammeron.name: Hammer-on
ETCMasteryHammeron.FullTooltip: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage.

ETCHeroicAbilityMoshPit.name: Mosh Pit
ETCHeroicAbilityMoshPit.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ETCHeroicAbilityStageDive.name: Stage Dive
ETCHeroicAbilityStageDive.ShortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
ETCHeroicAbilityStageDive.FullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after <c val="bfd4fd">2.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">330~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ETCMasteryMicCheck.name: Mic Check

ETCMasteryFaceSmelt.name: Face Smelt

ETCMasteryGuitarSoloAggressiveShredding.name: Aggressive Shredding

L90ETCMasteryDeathMetal.name: Death Metal

GenericTalentStormShield.name: Storm Shield

GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.name: Bolt of the Storm
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Leoric.name: Leoric
Leoric.title: The Skeleton King
Leoric.SearchText: Leoric Skeleton King Tristram Undead Diablo Diablo1 Diablo3 D1 I 1 D3 III 3
Leoric.Description: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.
Leoric.InfoText: Madness. Betrayal. Death. These are the legacy of the Black King Leoric's reign. Driven to madness by the spirit of Diablo, Leoric brought untold suffering on his kingdom. Even after his death there was no release for the Skeleton King.

LeoricSkeletalSwingTargetedReady.name: Skeletal Swing
LeoricSkeletalSwingTargetedReady.FullTooltip: Leoric swings his mace, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

LeoricDrainHope.name: Drain Hope
LeoricDrainHope.ShortTooltip: Drain Health from an enemy Hero while close to them
LeoricDrainHope.FullTooltip: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> while this is active.

LeoricWraithWalk.name: Wraith Walk
LeoricWraithWalk.ShortTooltip: Leoric's ghost separates from his body to move unhindered
LeoricWraithWalk.FullTooltip: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.

LeoricEntomb.name: Entomb
LeoricEntomb.FullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LeoricMarchoftheBlackKing.name: March of the Black King
LeoricMarchoftheBlackKing.ShortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
LeoricMarchoftheBlackKing.FullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times. Enemies hit take <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> of his maximum Health.

LeoricUndyingTrait.name: Undying
LeoricUndyingTrait.ShortTooltip: Leoric haunts his enemies as a ghost while dead
LeoricUndyingTrait.FullTooltip: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Wrath Of The Bone King</s><n/><n/>Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage, and his third Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> damage to a single target.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

LeoricGhastlySwing.name: Ghastly Swing
LeoricGhastlySwing.FullTooltip: Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

LeoricDrainEssence.name: Drain Essence
LeoricDrainEssence.FullTooltip: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

LeoricMasteryConsumeVitalitySkeletalSwin.name: Consume Vitality
LeoricMasteryConsumeVitalitySkeletalSwin.FullTooltip: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of his maximum Health.

LeoricMasteryFealtyUntoDeathUndying.name: Fealty Unto Death
LeoricMasteryFealtyUntoDeathUndying.ShortTooltip: Gain Health and Mana when Minions die
LeoricMasteryFealtyUntoDeathUndying.FullTooltip: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores <c val="bfd4fd">1.25%</c> of his maximum Health and <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> Mana.

LeoricMasteryOsseinRenewal.name: Ossein Renewal
LeoricMasteryOsseinRenewal.FullTooltip: Activate to heal Leoric for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

LeoricMasteryGhastlyReachSkeletalSwing.name: Ghastly Reach
LeoricMasteryGhastlyReachSkeletalSwing.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

LeoricMasteryParalyzingRageSkeletalSwing.name: Paralyzing Rage
LeoricMasteryParalyzingRageSkeletalSwing.FullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

LeoricSkeletalSwingKneelPeasantsTalent.name: Kneel, Peasants!

LeoricSkeletalSwingKneelPeasantsTalent.FullTooltip: Skeletal Swing deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

LeoricMasteryWillingVesselDrainHope.name: Willing Vessel
LeoricMasteryWillingVesselDrainHope.FullTooltip: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of his maximum Health.

LeoricMasteryDrainMomentumDrainHope.name: Drain Momentum
LeoricMasteryDrainMomentumDrainHope.FullTooltip: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LeoricMasteryHopelessnessDrainHope.name: Hopelessness
LeoricMasteryHopelessnessDrainHope.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Drain Hope by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

LeoricHeroicAbilityEntomb.name: Entomb
LeoricHeroicAbilityEntomb.FullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LeoricHeroicAbilityMarchoftheBlackKing.name: March of the Black King
LeoricHeroicAbilityMarchoftheBlackKing.ShortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
LeoricHeroicAbilityMarchoftheBlackKing.FullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times. Enemies hit take <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> of his maximum Health.

LeoricMasteryUnyieldingDespairDrainHope.name: Unyielding Despair
LeoricMasteryUnyieldingDespairDrainHope.FullTooltip: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds for every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

LeoricWraithWalkOminousWraithTalent.name: Ominous Wraith
LeoricWraithWalkOminousWraithTalent.FullTooltip: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LeoricMasterySpectralLeech.name: Spectral Leech
LeoricMasterySpectralLeech.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal extra damage and heal
LeoricMasterySpectralLeech.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

LeoricDrainHopeCrushingHopeTalent.name: Crushing Hope
LeoricDrainHopeCrushingHopeTalent.ShortTooltip: Full duration Drain Hope deals bonus damage
LeoricDrainHopeCrushingHopeTalent.FullTooltip: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

LeoricMasteryRoyalFocusWraithWalk.name: Royal Focus
LeoricMasteryRoyalFocusWraithWalk.ShortTooltip: Empower Skeletal Swing and Wraith Walk
LeoricMasteryRoyalFocusWraithWalk.FullTooltip: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds.

LeoricMithrilMaceTalent.name: Mithril Mace
LeoricMithrilMaceTalent.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Empower Wrath Of The Bone King
LeoricMithrilMaceTalent.FullTooltip: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

LeoricMasteryBuriedAliveEntomb.name: Buried Alive
LeoricMasteryBuriedAliveEntomb.FullTooltip: The duration of Entomb is lowered by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LeoricMasteryDeathMarchMarchoftheBlackKi.name: Death March
LeoricMasteryDeathMarchMarchoftheBlackKi.ShortTooltip: March of the Black King applies Drain Hope
LeoricMasteryDeathMarchMarchoftheBlackKi.FullTooltip: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

LeoricDrainHopeHardenedBonesTalent.name: Hardened Bones
LeoricDrainHopeHardenedBonesTalent.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

LeoricBurningDespairTalent.name: Burning Despair
LeoricBurningDespairTalent.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">40~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> while Drain Hope is active.

LeoricShroudoftheDeadKingTalent.name: Shroud of the Dead King
LeoricShroudoftheDeadKingTalent.FullTooltip: Activate to become Protected for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, preventing all damage.

LiLi.name: Li Li
LiLi.title: World Wanderer
LiLi.SearchText: Li Li LiLi Pandaren WoW World of Warcraft Mists of Pandaria MoP
LiLi.Description: A sustained Healer who works well against Physical attackers by Blinding them.
LiLi.InfoText: Born upon Shen-zin Su, the Wandering Isle, Li Li Stormstout led an uneventful life until she began reading her uncle Chen's journals. Soon, nothing would sate her desire for adventure, exploration, and pestering adventurers around Halfhill.

LiLiHealingBrew.name: Healing Brew
LiLiHealingBrew.FullTooltip: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> range for <c val="bfd4fd">175~~0.04~~</c> Health.

LiLiCloudSerpent.name: Cloud Serpent
LiLiCloudSerpent.ShortTooltip: Summon a serpent to assist an ally
LiLiCloudSerpent.FullTooltip: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">26~~0.04~~</c> damage and heals the ally for <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c>. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

LiLiBlindingWind.name: Blinding Wind
LiLiBlindingWind.FullTooltip: Throw a cloud of wind at the <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing <c val="bfd4fd">133~~0.04~~</c> damage. Affected targets are Blinded for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

LiLiJugof1000Cups.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
LiLiJugof1000Cups.FullTooltip: Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> Health.

LiLiWaterDragon.name: Water Dragon
LiLiWaterDragon.ShortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
LiLiWaterDragon.FullTooltip: Li Li channels for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> range and all enemies near them, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> damage and slowing their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LiLiFastFeet.name: Fast Feet
LiLiFastFeet.ShortTooltip: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed
LiLiFastFeet.FullTooltip: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster and you gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

LiLiSafetySprint.name: Fast Feet
LiLiSafetySprint.ShortTooltip: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed
LiLiSafetySprint.FullTooltip: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster and you gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LiLiFreeDrinks.name: Free Drinks
LiLiFreeDrinks.ShortTooltip: Healing Brew cost reduced on low Health targets
LiLiFreeDrinks.FullTooltip: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

LiLiWindSerpent.name: Wind Serpent
LiLiWindSerpent.ShortTooltip: Cloud Serpent launches Blinding Wind on cast
LiLiWindSerpent.FullTooltip: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

LiLiEagerAdventurer.name: Eager Adventurer
LiLiEagerAdventurer.FullTooltip: Increase Fast Feet's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> and increase Mana regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> while Fast Feet is active.

LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentSerpentSidekick.name: Serpent Sidekick
LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentSerpentSidekick.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases Cloud Serpent duration
LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentSerpentSidekick.FullTooltip: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">0.6</c> seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

LiLiMasteryBlindingWindSurgingWinds.name: Surging Winds
LiLiMasteryBlindingWindSurgingWinds.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Power from Blinding Wind
LiLiMasteryBlindingWindSurgingWinds.FullTooltip: If Blinding Wind hits <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and Li Li gains <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

LiLiMasteryFastFeetSafetySprint.name: Safety Sprint
LiLiMasteryFastFeetSafetySprint.ShortTooltip: Activate Fast Feet for a burst of speed
LiLiMasteryFastFeetSafetySprint.FullTooltip: Activate to gain Fast Feet for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> while active.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTheGoodStuff.name: The Good Stuff
LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTheGoodStuff.ShortTooltip: Healing Brew also heals over time
LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTheGoodStuff.FullTooltip: Healing Brew heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">42~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentLightningSerpent.name: Lightning Serpent
LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentLightningSerpent.ShortTooltip: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to Heroes
LiLiMasteryCloudSerpentLightningSerpent.FullTooltip: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">13~~0.04~~</c> damage and <c val="bfd4fd">10~~0.04~~</c> healing.

LiLiLetsGo.name: Let's Go!
LiLiLetsGo.ShortTooltip: Activate to heal ally, make them Unstoppable
LiLiLetsGo.FullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> and make them Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Li Li.</c>

LiLiHeroicAbilityJugof1000Cups.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
LiLiHeroicAbilityJugof1000Cups.FullTooltip: Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> Health.

LiLiHeroicAbilityWaterDragon.name: Water Dragon
LiLiHeroicAbilityWaterDragon.ShortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
LiLiHeroicAbilityWaterDragon.FullTooltip: Li Li channels for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> range and all enemies near them, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> damage and slowing their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LiLiMasteryBlindingWindGaleForce.name: Gale Force
LiLiMasteryBlindingWindGaleForce.FullTooltip: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> increased damage.

LiLiHinderingWinds.name: Hindering Winds
LiLiHinderingWinds.FullTooltip: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

LiLiMasteryBlindingWindMassVortex.name: Mass Vortex
LiLiMasteryBlindingWindMassVortex.FullTooltip: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c>. Blinding Wind deals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> additional damage if all <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> enemies hit are Heroes.

LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTwoForOne.name: Two For One
LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTwoForOne.ShortTooltip: Healing Brew heals twice but longer cooldown
LiLiMasteryHealingBrewTwoForOne.FullTooltip: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>, but increases the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LiLiPickMeUp.name: Pick Me Up
LiLiPickMeUp.ShortTooltip: Healing Brew heals more on low Health targets
LiLiPickMeUp.FullTooltip: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> if they are under <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

LiLiBlessingsOfYulon.name: Blessings Of Yu’lon
LiLiBlessingsOfYulon.FullTooltip: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

LiLiMasteryJugof1000CupsJugof1000000Cups.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
LiLiMasteryJugof1000CupsJugof1000000Cups.ShortTooltip: Jug of 1,000 cups heals two allies at once
LiLiMasteryJugof1000CupsJugof1000000Cups.FullTooltip: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

LiLiMasteryWaterDragonDoubleDragon.name: Double Dragon
LiLiMasteryWaterDragonDoubleDragon.FullTooltip: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

LiLiMistweaver.name: Mistweaver
LiLiMistweaver.FullTooltip: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">149~~0.04~~</c>. Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LiLiShakeItOff.name: Shake It Off
LiLiShakeItOff.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor.

LostVikings.name: The Lost Vikings
LostVikings.title: Triple Trouble
LostVikings.SearchText: The Lost Vikings TLV LV TheLostVikings Olaf Eric Baleog 2 LV2 Classic
LostVikings.Description: Three Heroes in one! Can gather experience from multiple locations.
LostVikings.InfoText: The Lost Vikings are back! While they briefly considered retirement after defeating the emperor Tomator, there were only so many polar bears they could wrestle before falling into a Nexus portal seemed like a solid life decision.

LostVikingsSpinToWin.name: Spin To Win!
LostVikingsSpinToWin.FullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsNorseForce.name: Norse Force!
LostVikingsNorseForce.FullTooltip: All Vikings gain a <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingsPressA.name: Jump!
LostVikingsPressA.FullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.name: Nordic Attack Squad
LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.ShortTooltip: Vikings deal bonus damage when together
LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.FullTooltip: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.25%</c> maximum Health to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsVikingBribery.name: Viking Bribery
LostVikingsVikingBribery.ShortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
LostVikingsVikingBribery.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: <c val="bfd4fd">200</c>.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current number of Bribe stacks: </c><c val="bfd4fd">0</c>

LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.name: Longboat Raid!
LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.ShortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.FullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.</c>

LostVikingsPlayAgain.name: Play Again!
LostVikingsPlayAgain.FullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.</c>

LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.name: Viking Hoard
LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.ShortTooltip: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen
LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.FullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> per second.<n/><n/>Current Bonus: <c val="bfd4fd">0</c> Regen per second

LostVikingsGoGoGo.name: Go Go Go!
LostVikingsGoGoGo.FullTooltip: The Vikings gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingSelectOlaf.name: Select Olaf
LostVikingSelectOlaf.ShortTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Olaf</c> has lots of health, regenerates health quickly, and charges to slow enemies
LostVikingSelectOlaf.FullTooltip: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds by right-clicking on them. <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> second cooldown. <n/><n/>Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingSelectBaleog.name: Select Baleog
LostVikingSelectBaleog.ShortTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Baleog</c> deals splash damage to enemies behind his attack target
LostVikingSelectBaleog.FullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

LostVikingSelectErik.name: Select Erik
LostVikingSelectErik.ShortTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Erik</c> moves faster than the other Vikings and has a longer attack range
LostVikingSelectErik.FullTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

LostVikingSelectAll.name: Select All Vikings
LostVikingSelectAll.FullTooltip: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

LostVikingsMasteryOlafTheStout.name: Olaf the Stout
LostVikingsMasteryOlafTheStout.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Olaf gains <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> bonus maximum Health.<n/><n/>Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, Olaf gains <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

LostVikingsMasterySpyGames.name: Spy Games
LostVikingsMasterySpyGames.ShortTooltip: Erik gains Stealth and increases vision if stationary
LostVikingsMasterySpyGames.FullTooltip: After standing still for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. The Stealth persists for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after moving and once removed, Erik gains <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> bonus Basic Attack damage for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

LostVikingsMasteryExplosiveAttacks.name: Explosive Attacks
LostVikingsMasteryExplosiveAttacks.ShortTooltip: Increases Baleog splash to non-Heroic enemies
LostVikingsMasteryExplosiveAttacks.FullTooltip: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

LostVikingsMasteryVikingBribery.name: Viking Bribery
LostVikingsMasteryVikingBribery.ShortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
LostVikingsMasteryVikingBribery.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: <c val="bfd4fd">200</c>.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current number of Bribe stacks: </c><c val="bfd4fd">0</c>

LostVikingsMasteryPainDontHurt.name: Pain Don't Hurt
LostVikingsMasteryPainDontHurt.FullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

LostVikingsMasteryErikTheSwift.name: Erik the Swift
LostVikingsMasteryErikTheSwift.ShortTooltip: Increases Erik's Move Speed and heal while running
LostVikingsMasteryErikTheSwift.FullTooltip: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>, and as long as Erik is moving he heals <c val="bfd4fd">34~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

LostVikingsMasteryItsASabotage.name: It's a Sabotage!
LostVikingsMasteryItsASabotage.FullTooltip: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, causing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage.

GenericTalentMercenaryLord.name: Mercenary Lord
GenericTalentMercenaryLord.FullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

LostVikingsMasteryBaleogTheFierce.name: Baleog the Fierce
LostVikingsMasteryBaleogTheFierce.FullTooltip: Increase Baleog's attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c>. While near Olaf and Erik, he becomes inspired by the power of teamwork and his Attack Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

LostVikingsMasterySpinToWin.name: Spin To Win!
LostVikingsMasterySpinToWin.FullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsMasteryNorseForce.name: Norse Force!
LostVikingsMasteryNorseForce.FullTooltip: All Vikings gain a <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingsHeroicAbilityLongboatRaid.name: Longboat Raid!
LostVikingsHeroicAbilityLongboatRaid.ShortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
LostVikingsHeroicAbilityLongboatRaid.FullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.</c>

LostVikingsHeroicAbilityPlayAgain.name: Play Again!
LostVikingsHeroicAbilityPlayAgain.FullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.</c>

LostVikingsMasteryHunkaBurningOlaf.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
LostVikingsMasteryHunkaBurningOlaf.ShortTooltip: Olaf deals damage to nearby enemies
LostVikingsMasteryHunkaBurningOlaf.FullTooltip: Olaf deals <c val="bfd4fd">34~~0.04~~</c> damage every second to nearby enemies.

LostVikingsMasteryJump.name: Jump!
LostVikingsMasteryJump.FullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

LostVikingsMasteryNordicAttackSquad.name: Nordic Attack Squad
LostVikingsMasteryNordicAttackSquad.ShortTooltip: Vikings deal bonus damage when together
LostVikingsMasteryNordicAttackSquad.FullTooltip: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.25%</c> maximum Health to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsMasteryLargeAndInCharge.name: Large and In Charge
LostVikingsMasteryLargeAndInCharge.FullTooltip: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LostVikingsMasteryImpatienceIsAVirtue.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
LostVikingsMasteryImpatienceIsAVirtue.ShortTooltip: Vikings' attacks reduce cooldowns of all Vikings
LostVikingsMasteryImpatienceIsAVirtue.FullTooltip: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

LostVikingsGoGoGo64KBMarathon.name: 64 KB Marathon
LostVikingsGoGoGo64KBMarathon.ShortTooltip: Run faster and break slows and roots
LostVikingsGoGoGo64KBMarathon.FullTooltip: Gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.name: Executioner
HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

LostVikingsMasteryWereOnABoat.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
LostVikingsMasteryWereOnABoat.FullTooltip: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

LostVikingsMasteryCheckpointReached.name: Checkpoint Reached
LostVikingsMasteryCheckpointReached.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

LostVikingsMasteryTheSequel.name: The Sequel!
LostVikingsMasteryTheSequel.ShortTooltip: Reduces death timer for all Vikings
LostVikingsMasteryTheSequel.FullTooltip: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

LostVikingsTalentFuryoftheStorm.name: Fury of the Storm
LostVikingsTalentFuryoftheStorm.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">41~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target, and <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters. Each Viking has their own cooldown.

LostVikingsSpinToWin.FullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

Maximum stacks available: <c val="bfd4fd">200</c>.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current number of Bribe stacks: </c><c val="bfd4fd">0</c>
