LostVikingsPlayAgain.FullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.</c>

LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.name: Longboat Raid!
LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.ShortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
LostVikingsLongboatRaidNewer.FullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.</c>

LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.name: Viking Hoard
LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.ShortTooltip: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen
LostVikingsVikingHoardTalent.FullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> per second.<n/><n/>Current Bonus: <c val="bfd4fd">0</c> Regen per second

LostVikingsGoGoGo.name: Go Go Go!
LostVikingsGoGoGo.FullTooltip: The Vikings gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingSelectBaleog.name: Select Baleog
LostVikingSelectBaleog.ShortTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Baleog</c> deals splash damage to enemies behind his attack target
LostVikingSelectBaleog.FullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

LostVikingSelectAll.name: Select All Vikings
LostVikingSelectAll.FullTooltip: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

LostVikingsLongboatRaidMortar.name: Mortar
LostVikingsLongboatRaidMortar.FullTooltip: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage in a large area.

LostVikingsSpinToWin.name: Spin To Win!
LostVikingsSpinToWin.FullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsNorseForce.name: Norse Force!
LostVikingsNorseForce.FullTooltip: All Vikings gain a <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LostVikingsPressA.name: Jump!
LostVikingsPressA.FullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.name: Nordic Attack Squad
LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.ShortTooltip: Vikings deal bonus damage when together
LostVikingsNordicAttackSquad.FullTooltip: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.25%</c> maximum Health to enemy Heroes.

LostVikingsVikingBribery.name: Viking Bribery
LostVikingsVikingBribery.ShortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
LostVikingsVikingBribery.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: <c val="bfd4fd">200</c>.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current number of Bribe stacks: </c><c val="bfd4fd">0</c>

Lucio.name: Lúcio
Lucio.title: Freedom Fighting DJ
Lucio.Description: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.
Lucio.InfoText: From the streets of Rio to the clubs on King's Row, Lúcio's beats bring the party to life, and drive the people to action. Now he's on tour in the Nexus, ready to break it down, and to continue fighting for what's right.

LucioSoundwave.name: Soundwave
LucioSoundwave.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

LucioCrossfade.name: Crossfade
LucioCrossfade.ShortTooltip: Play a <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> or <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c> track
LucioCrossfade.FullTooltip: Currently playing <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c>, increasing the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.<n/><n/>Toggle to play <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> instead.

LucioAmpItUp.name: Amp It Up
LucioAmpItUp.ShortTooltip: Boost the effect of Lúcio's Crossfade track
LucioAmpItUp.FullTooltip: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, amping <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> Health per second and <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased Movement Speed.

LucioSoundBarrier.name: Sound Barrier
LucioSoundBarrier.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a <c val="bfd4fd">1296~~0.04~~</c> point Shield that rapidly decays over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

LucioHighFive.name: High Five
LucioHighFive.ShortTooltip: Skate to allies, healing and granting Unstoppable
LucioHighFive.FullTooltip: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c>.

LucioPushOff.name: Push Off
LucioPushOff.ShortTooltip: Push off a wall to Slow enemies
LucioPushOff.FullTooltip: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LucioWallRide.name: Wall Ride
LucioWallRide.ShortTooltip: Lúcio gains Move Speed near terrain and can move through units
LucioWallRide.FullTooltip: When moving alongside terrain, Lúcio begins to Wall Ride for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lúcio can walk through units and gains <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

LucioCrossfade.name: Crossfade
LucioCrossfade.ShortTooltip: Play a <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> or <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c> track
LucioCrossfade.FullTooltip: Currently playing <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c>, passively healing Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">15~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.<n/><n/>Toggle to play <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c> instead.

LucioCrossfadePartyMixQuest.name: Party Mix
LucioCrossfadePartyMixQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Playing Crossfade for allies increases range
LucioCrossfadePartyMixQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple allies provide additional time.Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

LucioWallRideAccelerando.name: Accelerando
LucioWallRideAccelerando.ShortTooltip: Wall Ride gradually increases Move Speed
LucioWallRideAccelerando.FullTooltip: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

LucioPassiveSmoothMoves.name: Smooth Moves
LucioPassiveSmoothMoves.FullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of the damage dealt and restore <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> Mana.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase Wall Ride duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LucioSoundwaveSubwoofer.name: Subwoofer
LucioSoundwaveSubwoofer.FullTooltip: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further.Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave.Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

LucioSoundwaveOffTheWall.name: Off the Wall
LucioSoundwaveOffTheWall.ShortTooltip: Wall Ride Soundwave hits reduce cooldown
LucioSoundwaveOffTheWall.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

LucioPushOffSupersonic.name: Supersonic
LucioPushOffSupersonic.ShortTooltip: Wall Ride recharges Push Off cooldown
LucioPushOffSupersonic.FullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

LucioSoundwaveGoodVibrations.name: Good Vibrations
LucioSoundwaveGoodVibrations.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times this amount.

LucioReverseAmp.name: Reverse Amp
LucioReverseAmp.ShortTooltip: Amp It Up blasts Crossfade at enemy Heroes
LucioReverseAmp.FullTooltip: Blast Lúcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and <c val="3DFF7F">Speed Boost</c> Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.<n/><n/>This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

LucioBoombox.name: Boombox
LucioBoombox.ShortTooltip: Drop a boombox that plays Crossfade
LucioBoombox.FullTooltip: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.<n/><n/>Crossfade tracks do not stack.

LucioSoundBarrier.name: Sound Barrier
LucioSoundBarrier.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a <c val="bfd4fd">1296~~0.04~~</c> point Shield that rapidly decays over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

LucioHighFive.name: High Five
LucioHighFive.ShortTooltip: Skate to allies, healing and granting Unstoppable
LucioHighFive.FullTooltip: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c>.

LucioCrossfadeAllTogetherTalent.name: All Together
LucioCrossfadeAllTogetherTalent.ShortTooltip: Gain Move Speed from nearby allies
LucioCrossfadeAllTogetherTalent.FullTooltip: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

LucioPushOffHeavyCasters.name: Heavy Casters
LucioPushOffHeavyCasters.ShortTooltip: Push Off Stuns, no longer Slows
LucioPushOffHeavyCasters.FullTooltip: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

LucioWallRideSlip.name: Slip
LucioWallRideSlip.ShortTooltip: Gain Armor, Move Speed during Wall Ride
LucioWallRideSlip.FullTooltip: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c al="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Wall Ride grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor.

LucioAmpItUpRejuvenescencia.name: Rejuvenescência
LucioAmpItUpRejuvenescencia.FullTooltip: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's <c val="FFF800">Healing Boost</c> heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of the target's maximum Health each second.

LucioAmpItUpUpTheFrequency.name: Up the Frequency
LucioAmpItUpUpTheFrequency.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Amp It Up cooldown
LucioAmpItUpUpTheFrequency.FullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by <c val="bfd4fd">0.4</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">2.2</c>.

LucioAmpItUpUpToEleven.name: Up To Eleven
LucioAmpItUpUpToEleven.ShortTooltip: Activate to extend Amp It Up
LucioAmpItUpUpToEleven.FullTooltip: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

LucioSoundBarrierBossaNova.name: Bossa Nova
LucioSoundBarrierBossaNova.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, but the Shield now decays over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

LucioCrossfadeMixingFire.name: Mixing Fire
LucioCrossfadeMixingFire.ShortTooltip: High Five damages enemies, reduces their healing
LucioCrossfadeMixingFire.FullTooltip: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> damage and reducing all healing received by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the duration of Amp It Up by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

LucioPassiveHouseParty.name: House Party
LucioPassiveHouseParty.ShortTooltip: Gain increased healing from nearby allies
LucioPassiveHouseParty.FullTooltip: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> increased healing.

LucioItemSummerAnthem.name: Summer Anthem
LucioItemSummerAnthem.ShortTooltip: Activate for nearby allies to become Unkillable
LucioItemSummerAnthem.FullTooltip: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

Maiev.name: Maiev
Maiev.title: The Warden
Maiev.SearchText: Shadowsong Warden Watcher Night Elf Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Frozen Throne FT Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS
Maiev.Description: A mobile Assassin that excels against clustered enemies and prevents their escape.
Maiev.InfoText: Maiev Shadowsong stood watch over the imprisoned Betrayer for ten thousand years, and hunted him relentlessly after he was released. Some say she's determined; others say she's obsessed. Either way, she will stop at nothing to ensure the security of her world.

MaievFanOfKnives.name: Fan of Knives
MaievFanOfKnives.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">152~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a crescent area.<n/><n/>Hitting at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.

MaievUmbralBind.name: Umbral Bind
MaievUmbralBind.ShortTooltip: Tether enemy Heroes to Maiev, pulling those that stray too far
MaievUmbralBind.FullTooltip: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage and breaking the tether.

MaievSpiritOfVengeance.name: Spirit of Vengeance
MaievSpiritOfVengeance.ShortTooltip: Project a shadow of Maiev that she can later Blink to
MaievSpiritOfVengeance.FullTooltip: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MaievContainmentDisc.name: Containment Disc
MaievContainmentDisc.ShortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
MaievContainmentDisc.FullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Containment Disc automatically activates <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds after hitting a Hero.

MaievWardensCage.name: Warden's Cage
MaievWardensCage.ShortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
MaievWardensCage.FullTooltip: Summon <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MaievVaultOfTheWardens.name: Vault of the Wardens
MaievVaultOfTheWardens.ShortTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming temporarily Immune
MaievVaultOfTheWardens.FullTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming Immune to all hostile effects for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MaievContainmentDiscContain.name: Contain
MaievContainmentDiscContain.FullTooltip: Activate to remove the target's vision and Time Stop them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceBlink.name: Blink
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceBlink.FullTooltip: Teleport to the Spirit of Vengeance, consuming it.

MaievUmbralBindPrimed.name: Umbral Bind
MaievUmbralBindPrimed.FullTooltip: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage and breaking the tether.

MaievUmbralBindBondsOfJustice.name: Bonds of Justice
MaievUmbralBindBondsOfJustice.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Secondary tethers increase Umbral Bind damage
MaievUmbralBindBondsOfJustice.FullTooltip: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

MaievUmbralBindPursuitOfVengeance.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
MaievUmbralBindPursuitOfVengeance.ShortTooltip: Umbral Bind tethers reduce Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
MaievUmbralBindPursuitOfVengeance.FullTooltip: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MaievFanOfKnivesNaishasMemento.name: Naisha's Memento
MaievFanOfKnivesNaishasMemento.ShortTooltip: Activate to make Basic Attacks bounce
MaievFanOfKnivesNaishasMemento.FullTooltip: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

MaievFanOfKnivesPinDown.name: Pin Down
MaievFanOfKnivesPinDown.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hitting multiple Heroes empowers Fan of Knives
MaievFanOfKnivesPinDown.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

MaievFanOfKnivesBladeDance.name: Blade Dance
MaievFanOfKnivesBladeDance.ShortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals Physical Damage around Maiev
MaievFanOfKnivesBladeDance.FullTooltip: Using Fan of Knives deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceSuddenVengeance.name: Sudden Vengeance
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceSuddenVengeance.FullTooltip: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of their maximum Health.

MaievFanOfKnivesElunesWrath.name: Elune's Wrath
MaievFanOfKnivesElunesWrath.ShortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals more damage after hitting multiple Heroes
MaievFanOfKnivesElunesWrath.FullTooltip: Hitting at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals <c val="bfd4fd">77~~0.04~~</c> damage when it impacts.

MaievUmbralBindBondsOfCorruption.name: Bonds of Corruption
MaievUmbralBindBondsOfCorruption.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceRuthlessSpirit.name: Ruthless Spirit
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceRuthlessSpirit.ShortTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit increase Maiev's damage
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceRuthlessSpirit.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

MaievContainmentDisc.name: Containment Disc
MaievContainmentDisc.ShortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
MaievContainmentDisc.FullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Containment Disc automatically activates <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds after hitting a Hero.

MaievWardensCage.name: Warden's Cage
MaievWardensCage.ShortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
MaievWardensCage.FullTooltip: Summon <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MaievFanOfKnivesBladedArmor.name: Bladed Armor
MaievFanOfKnivesBladedArmor.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor.

MaievUmbralBindChainGang.name: Chain Gang
MaievUmbralBindChainGang.ShortTooltip: Multiple Umbral Bind tethers grant Armor
MaievUmbralBindChainGang.FullTooltip: Tethering at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants <c val="bfd4fd">35</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceShadowArmor.name: Shadow Armor
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceShadowArmor.FullTooltip: Blink grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

MaievUmbralBindCruelChain.name: Cruel Chain
MaievUmbralBindCruelChain.ShortTooltip: Damage Umbral Bind targets to increase pull damage
MaievUmbralBindCruelChain.FullTooltip: Umbral Bind grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceVengefulKnives.name: Vengeful Knives
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceVengefulKnives.ShortTooltip: Spirit of Vengeance increases Fan of Knives damage
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceVengefulKnives.FullTooltip: For <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after teleporting with Spirit of Vengeance, Fan of Knives will deal <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes. Increase this damage bonus by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> for each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance.

MaievArmoredAssault.name: Armored Assault
MaievArmoredAssault.FullTooltip: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

MaievSpiritOfVengeanceShadowOrbVengeance.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceShadowOrbVengeance.ShortTooltip: Activate to reset Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
MaievSpiritOfVengeanceShadowOrbVengeance.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.<n/><n/>Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

MaievShadowOrbHuntress.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
MaievShadowOrbHuntress.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Move Speed, Attack Speed
MaievShadowOrbHuntress.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times.

MaievShadowOrbShadowStrike.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
MaievShadowOrbShadowStrike.FullTooltip: Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and reducing their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times.

Malfurion.name: Malfurion
Malfurion.title: Archdruid
Malfurion.SearchText: Malfurion Stormrage Night Elf Druid Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 War III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS
Malfurion.Description: A strong sustained Healer who can help lockdown enemies to secure takedowns.
Malfurion.InfoText: Malfurion Stormrage is the greatest druid on Azeroth, and a student of the demi-god Cenarius. Communing with nature and Cenarius through the Emerald dream, Malfurion protects the wilds from demonic influences.

MalfurionRegrowth.name: Regrowth
MalfurionRegrowth.ShortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero over time
MalfurionRegrowth.FullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">380~~0.04~~ </c>Health over <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

MalfurionMoonfire.name: Moonfire
MalfurionMoonfire.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area, and heal allies with Regrowth
MalfurionMoonfire.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

MalfurionEntanglingRoots.name: Entangling Roots
MalfurionEntanglingRoots.ShortTooltip: Root and damage Heroes in an area
MalfurionEntanglingRoots.FullTooltip: Root enemy Heroes in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, and deal <c val="bfd4fd">117~~0.04~~</c> damage over the duration. Affected area grows over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalfurionTranquility.name: Tranquility
MalfurionTranquility.FullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> Health per second for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor.

MalfurionTwilightDream.name: Twilight Dream
MalfurionTwilightDream.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>seconds.

MalfurionInnervate.name: Innervate
MalfurionInnervate.ShortTooltip: Grant Mana to an ally and reduce their cooldowns
MalfurionInnervate.FullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of their maximum Mana over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.</c>

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MalfurionRejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
MalfurionRejuvenation.FullTooltip: Casting Regrowth on an ally also grants Malfurion its effect for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> normal duration.

MalfurionCelestialAlignment.name: Celestial Alignment
MalfurionCelestialAlignment.FullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> more damage.

MalfurionCombatStyleShandosClarity.name: Shan'do's Clarity
MalfurionCombatStyleShandosClarity.FullTooltip: Innervate's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

MalfurionMasteryStranglingVinesEntanglin.name: Strangling Vines
MalfurionMasteryStranglingVinesEntanglin.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> less healing from all sources for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalfurionEntanglingRootsDeepRootsTalent.name: Deep Roots
MalfurionEntanglingRootsDeepRootsTalent.ShortTooltip: Increases Entangling Roots area and duration
MalfurionEntanglingRootsDeepRootsTalent.FullTooltip: Entangling Roots grows <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> larger, and persist on the ground <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> longer.

MalfurionMasteryVengefulRoots.name: Vengeful Roots
MalfurionMasteryVengefulRoots.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Entangling Roots spawns a Treant
MalfurionMasteryVengefulRoots.FullTooltip: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

MalfurionWildGrowthTalent.name: Wild Growth
MalfurionWildGrowthTalent.FullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

MalfurionMasteryTenaciousRootsEntangling.name: Tenacious Roots
MalfurionMasteryTenaciousRootsEntangling.ShortTooltip: Extend Entangling Roots, Stuns reset cooldown
MalfurionMasteryTenaciousRootsEntangling.FullTooltip: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

MalfurionNaturesCureRegrowth.name: Nature's Cure
MalfurionNaturesCureRegrowth.ShortTooltip: Activate to remove disablers from allies
MalfurionNaturesCureRegrowth.FullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

MalfurionHeroicAbilityTranquility.name: Tranquility
MalfurionHeroicAbilityTranquility.FullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> Health per second for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor.

MalfurionHeroicAbilityTwilightDream.name: Twilight Dream
MalfurionHeroicAbilityTwilightDream.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>seconds.

MalfurionRegrowthNaturesSwiftness.name: Nature's Swiftness
MalfurionRegrowthNaturesSwiftness.FullTooltip: Malfurion gains <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

MalfurionMasteryHinderingMoonfire.name: Hindering Moonfire
MalfurionMasteryHinderingMoonfire.FullTooltip: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MalfurionRevitalizeInnervateTalent.name: Revitalize
MalfurionRevitalizeInnervateTalent.FullTooltip: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion <c val="bfd4fd">80</c> Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MalfurionYserasGift.name: Ysera's Gift
MalfurionYserasGift.ShortTooltip: Increase Regrowth heal at high Health
MalfurionYserasGift.FullTooltip: While Malfurion is above <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

MalfurionRegrowthNaturesBalance.name: Nature's Balance
MalfurionRegrowthNaturesBalance.FullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's area by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and Regrowth's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalfurionMoonfireMoonlitHarmonyTalent.name: Moonlit Harmony
MalfurionMoonfireMoonlitHarmonyTalent.ShortTooltip: Moonfire heals more per ally affected by Regrowth
MalfurionMoonfireMoonlitHarmonyTalent.FullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's heal by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> per ally affected by Regrowth.

MalfurionMasterySerenity.name: Serenity
MalfurionMasterySerenity.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> per ally affected by Regrowth.

MalfurionMasteryAstralCommunion.name: Astral Communion
MalfurionMasteryAstralCommunion.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport and cast Twilight Dream
MalfurionMasteryAstralCommunion.FullTooltip: Activate to Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location. Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MalfurionLifebloomRegrowth.name: Lifebloom
MalfurionLifebloomRegrowth.ShortTooltip: Regrowth instantly heals for missing Health
MalfurionLifebloomRegrowth.FullTooltip: Casting Regrowth instantly heals its target for <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of their missing Health.

MalfurionMasteryLunarShower.name: Lunar Shower
MalfurionMasteryLunarShower.FullTooltip: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and the next Moonfire within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

MalGanis.name: Mal'Ganis
MalGanis.title: Nathrezim Lord
MalGanis.SearchText: Malganis Dread Lord dreadlord undead demon Warcraft III War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 Reign of Chaos WoW WotLK Wrath of the Lich King Legion
MalGanis.Description: A self-sustaining Tank that peels for allies and disrupts enemies.
MalGanis.InfoText: Cunning and intelligent, Mal'Ganis was chosen to bring Arthas Menethil into the Lich King’s service. After manipulating the prince into purging Stratholme of life, he finally fell to Frostmourne as Arthas's first act as the Lich King's champion... yet a demon does not die so easily.

MalGanisFelClawsFirst.name: Fel Claws
MalGanisFelClawsFirst.ShortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
MalGanisFelClawsFirst.FullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">69~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.<n/><n/>Reactivate to slash up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

MalGanisNecroticEmbrace.name: Necrotic Embrace
MalGanisNecroticEmbrace.ShortTooltip: Deal damage around Mal'Ganis and gain Armor
MalGanisNecroticEmbrace.FullTooltip: Desecrate the air, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and gaining <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalGanisNightRush.name: Night Rush
MalGanisNightRush.ShortTooltip: Gain Move Speed and put enemies to Sleep
MalGanisNightRush.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MalGanisDarkConversion.name: Dark Conversion
MalGanisDarkConversion.ShortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
MalGanisDarkConversion.FullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalGanisCarrionSwarm.name: Carrion Swarm
MalGanisCarrionSwarm.ShortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
MalGanisCarrionSwarm.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to enemies.<n/><n/>Vampiric Touch heals for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

MalGanisVampiricTouch.name: Vampiric Touch
MalGanisVampiricTouch.FullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for <c val="bfd4fd">45%</c> of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MalGanisFelClawsThird.name: Fel Claws
MalGanisFelClawsThird.ShortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
MalGanisFelClawsThird.FullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">69~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.<n/><n/>Reactivate to slash up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

MalGanisFelClawsSecond.name: Fel Claws
MalGanisFelClawsSecond.ShortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
MalGanisFelClawsSecond.FullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">69~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.<n/><n/>Reactivate to slash up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

MalGanisNecroticEmbraceWingedGuard.name: Winged Guard
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceWingedGuard.ShortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace grants extra Physical Armor
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceWingedGuard.FullTooltip: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.<n/><n/>If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> charge after <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

MalGanisVampiricTouchVampiricAura.name: Vampiric Aura
MalGanisVampiricTouchVampiricAura.ShortTooltip: Improve Vampiric Touch and share it with allies
MalGanisVampiricTouchVampiricAura.FullTooltip: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of Physical Damage dealt.

MalGanisVampiricTouchTimeToFeed.name: Time to Feed
MalGanisVampiricTouchTimeToFeed.ShortTooltip: Heal when initially damaging enemy Heroes
MalGanisVampiricTouchTimeToFeed.FullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for <c val="bfd4fd">52~~0.04~~</c> when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds against each enemy Hero.

MalGanisNecroticEmbraceFueledByTorment.name: Fueled by Torment
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceFueledByTorment.ShortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace heals when damage is taken
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceFueledByTorment.FullTooltip: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for <c val="bfd4fd">11~~0.04~~</c> when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> more Hero damage into healing.

MalGanisNecroticEmbraceMightOfSargeras.name: Might of Sargeras
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceMightOfSargeras.ShortTooltip: Raise Necrotic Embrace Armor, but lower duration
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceMightOfSargeras.FullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c>, but the duration is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MalGanisNecroticEmbraceEchoOfDoom.name: Echo of Doom
MalGanisNecroticEmbraceEchoOfDoom.FullTooltip: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> more second.<n/><n/>Does not wake Sleeping targets.

MalGanisFelClawsBlackClaws.name: Black Claws
MalGanisFelClawsBlackClaws.ShortTooltip: Fel Claws increases Basic Attack damage
MalGanisFelClawsBlackClaws.FullTooltip: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> more damage.

MalGanisFelClawsWillOfTichondrius.name: Will of Tichondrius
MalGanisFelClawsWillOfTichondrius.FullTooltip: The third slash of Fel Claws steals <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

MalGanisNightRushSpreadingPlague.name: Spreading Plague
MalGanisNightRushSpreadingPlague.ShortTooltip: Periodically deal damage after Night Rush
MalGanisNightRushSpreadingPlague.FullTooltip: After Night Rush expires, deal <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.<n/><n/>Does not wake Sleeping targets.

MalGanisNightmareFuel.name: Nightmare Fuel
MalGanisNightmareFuel.FullTooltip: Casting Night Rush while in a bush increases its duration to <c val="bfd4fd">2.75</c> seconds. Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> more damage to Sleeping targets.

MalGanisCarrionSwarm.name: Carrion Swarm
MalGanisCarrionSwarm.ShortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
MalGanisCarrionSwarm.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to enemies.<n/><n/>Vampiric Touch heals for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

MalGanisDarkConversion.name: Dark Conversion
MalGanisDarkConversion.ShortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
MalGanisDarkConversion.FullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalGanisNightRushDeepSleep.name: Deep Sleep
MalGanisNightRushDeepSleep.FullTooltip: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

MalGanisNightRushTheNightBeckons.name: The Night Beckons
MalGanisNightRushTheNightBeckons.FullTooltip: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MalGanisVampiricTouchBloodRush.name: Blood Rush
MalGanisVampiricTouchBloodRush.FullTooltip: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

MalGanisNecroticEmbracePlagueBats.name: Plague Bats
MalGanisNecroticEmbracePlagueBats.ShortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats
MalGanisNecroticEmbracePlagueBats.FullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">81~~0.04~~</c> damage.

MalGanisVampiricTouchFrenziedAssault.name: Frenzied Assault
MalGanisVampiricTouchFrenziedAssault.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed against higher Health Heroes
MalGanisVampiricTouchFrenziedAssault.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased Physical Damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MalGanisFelClawsBlindAsABat.name: Blind as a Bat
MalGanisFelClawsBlindAsABat.ShortTooltip: Remove Fel Claws cooldown, but lose all vision
MalGanisFelClawsBlindAsABat.FullTooltip: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

MalGanisCarrionSwarmSeekerSwarm.name: Seeker Swarm
MalGanisCarrionSwarmSeekerSwarm.ShortTooltip: Carrion Swarm Sleeps Heroes after expiring
MalGanisCarrionSwarmSeekerSwarm.FullTooltip: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">132~~0.04~~</c> damage and Sleeping them for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MalGanisDarkConversionWrathOfNathreza.name: Wrath of Nathreza
MalGanisDarkConversionWrathOfNathreza.ShortTooltip: Dark Conversion damages Heroes near the target
MalGanisDarkConversionWrathOfNathreza.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the transferred Health as damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

MalGanisFelClawsVanquishTheWeak.name: Vanquish the Weak
MalGanisFelClawsVanquishTheWeak.ShortTooltip: Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slow
MalGanisFelClawsVanquishTheWeak.FullTooltip: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

MalGanisNightRushAloneInTheDark.name: Alone in the Dark
MalGanisNightRushAloneInTheDark.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after.

Malthael.name: Malthael
Malthael.title: Aspect of Death
Malthael.SearchText: Malthel Malthiel Angel Archangel Diablo 3 D3 Reaper of Souls RoS
Malthael.Description: A Bruiser who marks his enemies, shredding away high Health enemies.
Malthael.InfoText: Once the Aspect of Wisdom, Malthael abandoned heaven after the Worldstone's destruction. In secret, he had resolved to end the Eternal Conflict by becoming a Reaper of Souls and eliminating everything affected by demonic corruption, including humanity.

MalthaelSoulRip.name: Soul Rip
MalthaelSoulRip.FullTooltip: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c>, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage and healing Malthael for <c val="bfd4fd">25~~0.04~~</c> per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

MalthaelWraithStrike.name: Wraith Strike
MalthaelWraithStrike.FullTooltip: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c>, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">59~~0.04~~</c> damage and refreshing <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c>.

MalthaelDeathShroud.name: Death Shroud
MalthaelDeathShroud.ShortTooltip: Unleash a wave that applies Reaper's Mark
MalthaelDeathShroud.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> to enemies it hits.

MalthaelTormentedSouls.name: Tormented Souls
MalthaelTormentedSouls.ShortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
MalthaelTormentedSouls.FullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

MalthaelLastRites.name: Last Rites
MalthaelLastRites.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
MalthaelLastRites.FullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.

MalthaelReapersMark.name: Reaper's Mark
MalthaelReapersMark.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave, apply Reaper's Mark
MalthaelReapersMark.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.75%</c> of their maximum Health every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MalthaelDeathsReach.name: Death's Reach
MalthaelDeathsReach.FullTooltip: Increase Wraith Strike's range by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

MalthaelOnAPaleHorse.name: On a Pale Horse
MalthaelOnAPaleHorse.FullTooltip: Gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed while mounted.

MalthaelFearTheReaper.name: Fear the Reaper
MalthaelFearTheReaper.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and pass through other units for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MalthaelDieAlone.name: Die Alone
MalthaelDieAlone.FullTooltip: Soul Rip deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

MalthaelThrowingShade.name: Throwing Shade
MalthaelThrowingShade.ShortTooltip: Increase Death Shroud range, reduce cooldown
MalthaelThrowingShade.FullTooltip: Increase Death Shroud's range by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c>, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c>.

MalthaelBlackHarvest.name: Black Harvest
MalthaelBlackHarvest.FullTooltip: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

MalthaelColdHand.name: Cold Hand
MalthaelColdHand.FullTooltip: Soul Rip Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MalthaelMassacre.name: Massacre
MalthaelMassacre.FullTooltip: Wraith Strike now damages and applies <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> to enemies around its target.

MalthaelTouchOfDeath.name: Touch of Death
MalthaelTouchOfDeath.FullTooltip: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MalthaelTormentedSouls.name: Tormented Souls
MalthaelTormentedSouls.ShortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
MalthaelTormentedSouls.FullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> to nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

MalthaelLastRites.name: Last Rites
MalthaelLastRites.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
MalthaelLastRites.FullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.

MalthaelSoulSiphon.name: Soul Siphon
MalthaelSoulSiphon.FullTooltip: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to <c val="bfd4fd">4.75%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

MalthaelEtherealExistence.name: Ethereal Existence
MalthaelEtherealExistence.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c>, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">30</c>.

MalthaelInevitableEnd.name: Inevitable End
MalthaelInevitableEnd.ShortTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable, remove Marks
MalthaelInevitableEnd.FullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, but remove all active <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Marks</c>.

MalthaelShroudOfWisdom.name: Shroud of Wisdom
MalthaelShroudOfWisdom.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MalthaelSoulCollector.name: Soul Collector
MalthaelSoulCollector.ShortTooltip: Increase Soul Rip range, reduce cooldown
MalthaelSoulCollector.FullTooltip: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and increase its range by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

MalthaelMortality.name: Mortality
MalthaelMortality.ShortTooltip: Wraith Strike deals bonus damage to Heroes
MalthaelMortality.FullTooltip: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

MalthaelMementoMori.name: Memento Mori
MalthaelMementoMori.ShortTooltip: Reaper's Mark deals increased damage over time
MalthaelMementoMori.FullTooltip: <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> deals <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MalthaelReaperOfSouls.name: Reaper of Souls
MalthaelReaperOfSouls.ShortTooltip: Hero Takedowns extend Tormented Souls duration
MalthaelReaperOfSouls.FullTooltip: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

MalthaelAngelOfDeath.name: Angel of Death
MalthaelAngelOfDeath.FullTooltip: Last Rites heals for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

MalthaelFinalCurtain.name: Final Curtain
MalthaelFinalCurtain.FullTooltip: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, applying <c val="00DFDF">Reaper's Mark</c> to enemies in its area.

MalthaelNoOneCanStopDeath.name: No One Can Stop Death
MalthaelNoOneCanStopDeath.FullTooltip: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

Medic.name: Lt. Morales
Medic.title: Combat Medic
Medic.SearchText: Lt. Morales Medic Lieutenant LtMorales Terran Heroes of the Storm SC Brood War BW UED
Medic.Description: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.
Medic.InfoText: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.

MedicHealingBeam.name: Healing Beam
MedicHealingBeam.FullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for <c val="bfd4fd">172~~0.04~~</c> Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> Energy per second.<n/><n/>Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

MedicSafeguard.name: Safeguard
MedicSafeguard.FullTooltip: Grant target ally Hero <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MedicDisplacementGrenade.name: Displacement Grenade
MedicDisplacementGrenade.FullTooltip: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">208~~0.04~~</c> to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

MedicStimDrone.name: Stim Drone
MedicStimDrone.ShortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
MedicStimDrone.FullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

MedicMedivacDropship.name: Medivac Dropship
MedicMedivacDropship.FullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

MedicCaduceusReactor.name: Caduceus Reactor
MedicCaduceusReactor.ShortTooltip: Restore Health while channeling Healing Beam
MedicCaduceusReactor.FullTooltip: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of her maximum Health per second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MedicRedirectHealingBeam.name: Redirect Healing Beam
MedicRedirectHealingBeam.FullTooltip: Redirect Healing Beam to another Hero or Minion. Self-cast to cancel channeling.

MedicDetonateDisplacementGrenade.name: Detonate Displacement Grenade
MedicDetonateDisplacementGrenade.FullTooltip: Detonate Displacement Grenade, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">208~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

MedicCaduceusFeedback.name: Caduceus Feedback
MedicCaduceusFeedback.FullTooltip: Increases Attack Range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.1</c> and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Energy.

MedicLifeSupport.name: Life Support
MedicLifeSupport.FullTooltip: Generate <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Energy per use.

MedicClear.name: Clear!
MedicClear.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to empower Displacement Grenade
MedicClear.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

MedicCellularReactor.name: Cellular Reactor
MedicCellularReactor.FullTooltip: Consume <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Energy to heal Lt. Morales for <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of her maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

MedicTraumaTrigger.name: Trauma Trigger
MedicTraumaTrigger.FullTooltip: Taking damage while below <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Health grants <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> second cooldown.

MedicBlastShield.name: Blast Shield
MedicBlastShield.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of her maximum Health, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

MedicPhysicalTherapy.name: Physical Therapy
MedicPhysicalTherapy.FullTooltip: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MedicVanadiumPlating.name: Vanadium Plating
MedicVanadiumPlating.ShortTooltip: Increased duration, Stuns, Roots increase Safeguard Armor
MedicVanadiumPlating.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the duration of Safeguard by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor.

MedicMediDrone.name: Medi-Drone
MedicMediDrone.FullTooltip: Allies with Safeguard receive <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the healing done by Healing Beam on another ally.

MedicHeroicAbilityStimDrone.name: Stim Drone
MedicHeroicAbilityStimDrone.ShortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
MedicHeroicAbilityStimDrone.FullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

MedicHeroicAbilityMedivacDropship.name: Medivac Dropship
MedicHeroicAbilityMedivacDropship.FullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

MedicEMPGrenade.name: EMP Grenade
MedicEMPGrenade.ShortTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals more damage to Shields
MedicEMPGrenade.FullTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, and up to <c val="bfd4fd">400~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage to Shields.

MedicSystemShock.name: System Shock
MedicSystemShock.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MedicSecondOpinion.name: Second Opinion
MedicSecondOpinion.FullTooltip: Hitting <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MedicExtendedCare.name: Extended Care
MedicExtendedCare.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Healing Beam by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

MedicFirstResponder.name: First Responder
MedicFirstResponder.ShortTooltip: Healing Beam empowered at high Energy
MedicFirstResponder.FullTooltip: While above <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

MedicHyperactivity.name: Hyperactivity
MedicHyperactivity.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from <c val="bfd4fd">90</c> seconds to <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

MedicSafeZone.name: Safe Zone
MedicSafeZone.FullTooltip: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MedicReinforcements.name: Reinforcements
MedicReinforcements.ShortTooltip: Medivac appears at Hall of Storms
MedicReinforcements.FullTooltip: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.</c>

MedicCaduceusReactor2dot0.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
MedicCaduceusReactor2dot0.FullTooltip: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

Medivh.name: Medivh
Medivh.title: The Last Guardian
Medivh.SearchText: Midivh Prophet War1 I WC1 Warcraft1 Warcraft3 Warcraft III WC3 War3 3 Reign of Chaos RoC WoW World of Warcraft Burning Crusade BC Hearthstone HS
Medivh.Description: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.
Medivh.InfoText: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes his place amongst legends.

MedivhArcaneRift.name: Arcane Rift
MedivhArcaneRift.ShortTooltip: Launch an arcane bolt that damages enemies in a line
MedivhArcaneRift.FullTooltip: Launch a rift that deals 170~~0.04~~ damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

MedivhForceOfWill.name: Force of Will
MedivhForceOfWill.ShortTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from damage
MedivhForceOfWill.FullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of the damage it absorbed.

MedivhPortalInstant.name: Portal
MedivhPortalInstant.ShortTooltip: Create a portal that allies can pass through
MedivhPortalInstant.FullTooltip: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

MedivhPolyBomb.name: Poly Bomb
MedivhPolyBomb.ShortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
MedivhPolyBomb.FullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

MedivhLeyLineSeal.name: Ley Line Seal
MedivhLeyLineSeal.ShortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
MedivhLeyLineSeal.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MedivhRavenForm.name: Raven Form
MedivhRavenForm.FullTooltip: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

MedivhTransformRaven.name: Raven Form
MedivhTransformRaven.FullTooltip: Transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over terrain and is immune to all effects.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MedivhLeyLineSealMedivhCheats.name: Redirect Ley Line Seal
MedivhLeyLineSealMedivhCheats.FullTooltip: Redirect the energy wave to a new location.

MedivhTransformRavenWindsOfCelerity.name: Winds of Celerity
MedivhTransformRavenWindsOfCelerity.FullTooltip: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

MedivhTransformRavenRavensIntellect.name: Raven’s Intellect
MedivhTransformRavenRavensIntellect.ShortTooltip: Raven Form increases Health and Mana Regen
MedivhTransformRavenRavensIntellect.FullTooltip: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

MedivhPortalPortalMastery.name: Portal Mastery
MedivhPortalPortalMastery.FullTooltip: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form. <n/><n/><c val="ffff80">Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal</c>.

MedivhPortalMageArmor.name: Mage Armor
MedivhPortalMageArmor.FullTooltip: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, reducing their damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

MedivhPortalRavenFamiliar.name: Raven Familiar
MedivhPortalRavenFamiliar.ShortTooltip: Using a Portal grants a Raven Familiar
MedivhPortalRavenFamiliar.FullTooltip: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MedivhDustOfAppearance.name: Dust of Appearance
MedivhDustOfAppearance.FullTooltip: Activate to greatly increase sight range for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

MedivhMysticAssault.name: Mystic Assault
MedivhMysticAssault.FullTooltip: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt.

MedivhForceOfWillArcaneExplosion.name: Arcane Explosion
MedivhForceOfWillArcaneExplosion.ShortTooltip: Force of Will deals area damage
MedivhForceOfWillArcaneExplosion.FullTooltip: When Force of Will expires, it deals <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies, plus <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage it prevented, up to <c val="bfd4fd">315~~0.04~~</c> additional damage.

MedivhForceofMagic.name: Force of Magic
MedivhForceofMagic.ShortTooltip: Force of Will can grant Spell Power
MedivhForceofMagic.FullTooltip: Preventing at least <c val="bfd4fd">268~~0.04~~</c> damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.

MedivhPolyBomb.name: Poly Bomb
MedivhPolyBomb.ShortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
MedivhPolyBomb.FullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

MedivhLeyLineSeal.name: Ley Line Seal
MedivhLeyLineSeal.ShortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
MedivhLeyLineSeal.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MedivhForceOfWillCircleOfProtection.name: Circle of Protection
MedivhForceOfWillCircleOfProtection.ShortTooltip: Force of Will applies to allies near target
MedivhForceOfWillCircleOfProtection.FullTooltip: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MedivhForceOfWillEnduringWill.name: Enduring Will
MedivhForceOfWillEnduringWill.ShortTooltip: Preventing damage reduces Force of Will cooldown
MedivhForceOfWillEnduringWill.FullTooltip: Preventing at least <c val="bfd4fd">268~~0.04~~</c> damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

MedivhForceOfWillReabsorption.name: Reabsorption
MedivhForceOfWillReabsorption.FullTooltip: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> of the damage it absorbed.

MedivhArcaneRiftArcaneCharge.name: Arcane Charge
MedivhArcaneRiftArcaneCharge.ShortTooltip: Arcane Rift deals more damage after hitting a Hero
MedivhArcaneRiftArcaneCharge.FullTooltip: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> more damage.

MedivhTemporalFlux.name: Temporal Flux
MedivhTemporalFlux.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">9%</c>.

MedivhPortalStablePortal.name: Stable Portal
MedivhPortalStablePortal.FullTooltip: Decrease Portal cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and increase Portal duration by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

MedivhPolyBombGlyphOfPolyBomb.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
MedivhPolyBombGlyphOfPolyBomb.ShortTooltip: Poly Bomb spreads faster and farther
MedivhPolyBombGlyphOfPolyBomb.FullTooltip: Poly Bomb explodes <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second sooner and the spread radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

MedivhLeyLineSealMedivhCheats.name: Medivh Cheats!
MedivhLeyLineSealMedivhCheats.ShortTooltip: Ley Line Seal can be redirected while active
MedivhLeyLineSealMedivhCheats.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

MedivhArcaneRiftGuardianOfTirisfal.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
MedivhArcaneRiftGuardianOfTirisfal.FullTooltip: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

MedivhArcaneBrilliance.name: Arcane Brilliance
MedivhArcaneBrilliance.ShortTooltip: Grant Spell Power and Mana to allies
MedivhArcaneBrilliance.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore <c val="bfd4fd">200</c> mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

MedivhDustofDisappearance.name: Dust of Disappearance
MedivhDustofDisappearance.FullTooltip: Stealth an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

Mephisto.name: Mephisto
Mephisto.title: Lord of Hatred
Mephisto.Description: A sustained Assassin who thrives in battle against groups of enemies.
Mephisto.InfoText: Dul’Mephistos, the Lord of Hatred, is said to be the most cunning among his brethren. Even while imprisoned in a soulstone, his vile influence corrupted the Zakarum and manipulated them into breaking the seal, giving him free reign to reunite the Prime Evils and enslave humanity.

MephistoSkullMissile.name: Skull Missile
MephistoSkullMissile.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line after a short delay
MephistoSkullMissile.FullTooltip: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">127~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MephistoLightningNova.name: Lightning Nova
MephistoLightningNova.ShortTooltip: Deal increasing damage to nearby enemies
MephistoLightningNova.FullTooltip: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. Enemies within the ring take <c val="bfd4fd">45~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

MephistoShadeOfMephisto.name: Shade of Mephisto
MephistoShadeOfMephisto.ShortTooltip: Teleport to a location and return after a delay
MephistoShadeOfMephisto.FullTooltip: Teleport to a location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">78~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location. <n/><n/>After <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.

MephistoConsumeSouls.name: Consume Souls
MephistoConsumeSouls.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
MephistoConsumeSouls.FullTooltip: Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take <c val="bfd4fd">357~~0.04~~</c> damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MephistoDuranceOfHate.name: Durance of Hate
MephistoDuranceOfHate.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds and deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to them over the same duration.<n/><n/>Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

MephistoLordOfHatred.name: Lord Of Hatred
MephistoLordOfHatred.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's cooldowns
MephistoLordOfHatred.FullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.<n/><n/>Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants <c val="bfd4fd">0.3</c> seconds per Hero hit.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MephistoSkullMissileUnyieldingPower.name: Unyielding Power
MephistoSkullMissileUnyieldingPower.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

MephistoLightningNovaFuriousSpark.name: Furious Spark
MephistoLightningNovaFuriousSpark.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals <c val="bfd4fd">72~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage and grants Mephisto <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Mana.

MephistoShadeOfMephistoMaliciousIntent.name: Malicious Intent
MephistoShadeOfMephistoMaliciousIntent.ShortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants Spell Power
MephistoShadeOfMephistoMaliciousIntent.FullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Spell Power while active and for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds after ending.<n/><n/>If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then increase the duration of the Spell Power bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds after it ends.

MephistoSkullMissileHatefulMending.name: Hateful Mending
MephistoSkullMissileHatefulMending.FullTooltip: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the damage it deals to Heroes.

MephistoLightningNovaStaticBarrier.name: Static Barrier
MephistoLightningNovaStaticBarrier.FullTooltip: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MephistoSpite.name: Spite
MephistoSpite.ShortTooltip: Regen Globes activate Lord of Hatred
MephistoSpite.FullTooltip: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

MephistoShadeOfMephistoGhastlyArmor.name: Ghastly Armor
MephistoShadeOfMephistoGhastlyArmor.FullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor while active and for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds after it ends.

MephistoShadeOfMephistoFrostStorm.name: Frost Storm
MephistoShadeOfMephistoFrostStorm.ShortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto causes Lightning Nova to Slow
MephistoShadeOfMephistoFrostStorm.FullTooltip: While Shade of Mephisto is active, enemies who are hit by Lightning Nova are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and the Slow from Skull Missile is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

MephistoShadeOfMephistoTrickery.name: Trickery
MephistoShadeOfMephistoTrickery.ShortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants Move Speed
MephistoShadeOfMephistoTrickery.FullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed while active and for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds after it ends.<n/><n/>If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then reset the cooldown of Shade of Mephisto.

MephistoConsumeSouls.name: Consume Souls
MephistoConsumeSouls.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
MephistoConsumeSouls.FullTooltip: Channel for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take <c val="bfd4fd">357~~0.04~~</c> damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MephistoDuranceOfHate.name: Durance of Hate
