MephistoDuranceOfHate.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds and deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage to them over the same duration.<n/><n/>Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

MephistoSkullMissileAbhorredSkull.name: Abhorred Skull
MephistoSkullMissileAbhorredSkull.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

MephistoLordOfHatredHysteria.name: Hysteria
MephistoLordOfHatredHysteria.ShortTooltip: Lord of Hatred reduces Heroic cooldown
MephistoLordOfHatredHysteria.FullTooltip: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability. Mephisto is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of his maximum Health and Mana when he casts his Heroic Ability.

MephistoShardOfHate.name: Shard of Hate
MephistoShardOfHate.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash and activate Lord of Hatred
MephistoShardOfHate.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second per Hero hit.

MephistoSkullMissileLightningReaction.name: Lightning Reaction
MephistoSkullMissileLightningReaction.ShortTooltip: Skull Missile explodes when hitting Lightning Nova
MephistoSkullMissileLightningReaction.FullTooltip: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">138~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

MephistoLightningNovaStaticField.name: Static Field
MephistoLightningNovaStaticField.ShortTooltip: Lightning Nova can deal Percent Damage
MephistoLightningNovaStaticField.FullTooltip: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of their maximum Health.

MephistoAnimosity.name: Animosity
MephistoAnimosity.ShortTooltip: Increase duration, damage of Lightning Nova
MephistoAnimosity.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Lightning Nova by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and the maximum amount of bonus damage it can deal from <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">36%</c>.

MephistoConsumeSoulsConsumedByHatred.name: Consumed by Hatred
MephistoConsumeSoulsConsumedByHatred.FullTooltip: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> additional time.

MephistoDuranceOfHateUnspeakableHorror.name: Unspeakable Horror
MephistoDuranceOfHateUnspeakableHorror.FullTooltip: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after its Root expires.

MephistoLightningNovaMimic.name: Mimic
MephistoLightningNovaMimic.ShortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto can cast Lightning Nova
MephistoLightningNovaMimic.FullTooltip: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

MephistoShadeOfMephistoShadeLord.name: Shade Lord
MephistoShadeOfMephistoShadeLord.ShortTooltip: Activate to swap with Shade of Mephisto
MephistoShadeOfMephistoShadeLord.FullTooltip: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> Talents.

Monk.name: Kharazim
Monk.title: Veradani Monk
Monk.SearchText: Karazim Monk Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 III Reaper of Souls RoS Diablo3
Monk.Description: A flexible Healer that pairs well with Melee allies who like to dive into the enemy team.
Monk.InfoText: To the monks of Ivgorod, the gods are in all things, and their divine will is proclaimed by the Patriarchs. With unshakable faith, Kharazim carries forth the decrees of the thousand and one gods to the ends of Sanctuary and the realms beyond.

MonkRadiantDash.name: Radiant Dash
MonkRadiantDash.ShortTooltip: Jump to an ally or enemy
MonkRadiantDash.FullTooltip: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

MonkBreathOfHeaven.name: Breath of Heaven
MonkBreathOfHeaven.ShortTooltip: Heal nearby ally Heroes and grant Movement Speed
MonkBreathOfHeaven.FullTooltip: Heal nearby Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">276~~0.04~~</c> and give them <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MonkDeadlyReach.name: Deadly Reach
MonkDeadlyReach.ShortTooltip: Increases Attack Speed and Attack Range
MonkDeadlyReach.FullTooltip: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MonkSevenSidedStrike.name: Seven-Sided Strike
MonkSevenSidedStrike.ShortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes
MonkSevenSidedStrike.FullTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> times over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> of their maximum Health.

MonkDivinePalm.name: Divine Palm
MonkDivinePalm.FullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for <c val="bfd4fd">1200~~0.04~~</c> if they take fatal damage in the next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MonkBlankTrait.name: Pick Your Trait
MonkBlankTrait.FullTooltip: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MonkDeadlyReachActive.name: Deadly Reach Active
MonkDeadlyReachActive.FullTooltip: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MonkIronFists.name: Iron Fists
MonkIronFists.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">110%</c> bonus damage and gives <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Move Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MonkInsight.name: Insight
MonkInsight.FullTooltip: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14~~0.04~~ Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

MonkTranscendence.name: Transcendence
MonkTranscendence.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">104~~0.04~~</c> and gives <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Move Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MonkTranscendence.name: Transcendence
MonkTranscendence.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">104~~0.04~~</c> and gives <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Move Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MonkIronFists.name: Iron Fists
MonkIronFists.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">110%</c> bonus damage and gives <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Move Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

MonkInsight.name: Insight
MonkInsight.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Basic Attacks restore Mana, lower cooldowns
MonkInsight.FullTooltip: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14~~0.04~~ Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

MonkSpiritAlly.name: Spirit Ally
MonkSpiritAlly.ShortTooltip: Place a Spirit Ally that heals in an area
MonkSpiritAlly.FullTooltip: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health every second. Has <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> Health and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

MonkEarthAlly.name: Earth Ally
MonkEarthAlly.ShortTooltip: Place an Earth Ally that grants Physical Armor
MonkEarthAlly.FullTooltip: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Has <c val="bfd4fd">400~~0.04~~</c> Health and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

MonkAirAlly.name: Air Ally
MonkAirAlly.ShortTooltip: Place an Air Ally that gives Spell Power, reveals
MonkAirAlly.FullTooltip: Place an Air Ally that gives allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Spell Power, grants vision, and reveals a large area around it. Has <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> Health and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.

MonkBlindingSpeedRadiantDash.name: Blinding Speed
MonkBlindingSpeedRadiantDash.FullTooltip: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>.

MonkHeavenlyZealBreathofHeaven.name: Heavenly Zeal
MonkHeavenlyZealBreathofHeaven.ShortTooltip: Breath of Heaven increases allies Move Speed
MonkHeavenlyZealBreathofHeaven.FullTooltip: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds.

MonkBlazingFistsDeadlyReach.name: Blazing Fists
MonkBlazingFistsDeadlyReach.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Deadly Reach cooldown
MonkBlazingFistsDeadlyReach.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

MonkHeroicAbilityDivinePalm.name: Divine Palm
MonkHeroicAbilityDivinePalm.FullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for <c val="bfd4fd">1200~~0.04~~</c> if they take fatal damage in the next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MonkHeroicAbilitySevenSidedStrike.name: Seven-Sided Strike
MonkHeroicAbilitySevenSidedStrike.ShortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes
MonkHeroicAbilitySevenSidedStrike.FullTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> times over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> of their maximum Health.

MonkQuicksilverRadiantDash.name: Quicksilver
MonkQuicksilverRadiantDash.FullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> bonus Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenericTalentSpellShield.name: Spell Shield
GenericTalentSpellShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

MonkSixthSense.name: Sixth Sense
MonkSixthSense.ShortTooltip: Gain Physical Armor while Stunned, Rooted
MonkSixthSense.FullTooltip: While Stunned or Rooted, gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, reducing their damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

MonkCleansingTouchRadiantDash.name: Cleansing Touch
MonkCleansingTouchRadiantDash.FullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

MonkWayoftheHundredFistsRadiantDash.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
MonkWayoftheHundredFistsRadiantDash.ShortTooltip: Radiant Dash launches a volley of blows
MonkWayoftheHundredFistsRadiantDash.FullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> Basic Attacks dealing <c val="bfd4fd">45%</c> damage each.

MonkEchoofHeavenBreathofHeaven.name: Echo of Heaven
MonkEchoofHeavenBreathofHeaven.ShortTooltip: Breath of Heaven heals a second time
MonkEchoofHeavenBreathofHeaven.FullTooltip: Breath of Heaven heals <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of its normal amount, but heals a second time <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds later.

MonkPeacefulReposeDivinePalm.name: Peaceful Repose
MonkPeacefulReposeDivinePalm.ShortTooltip: Reduces Divine Palm cooldown if they do not die
MonkPeacefulReposeDivinePalm.FullTooltip: Divine Palm's healing amount is increased by<c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and its cooldown is set to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds if the Hero does not die.

MonkElevenSidedStrikeSevenSidedStrike.name: Transgression
MonkElevenSidedStrikeSevenSidedStrike.FullTooltip: Seven-Sided Strike hits <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> additional times.

GenericTalentStormShield.name: Storm Shield
GenericTalentStormShield.ShortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
GenericTalentStormShield.FullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of their max Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MonkEpiphany.name: Epiphany
MonkEpiphany.ShortTooltip: Activate to restore Mana and Radiant Dash charges
MonkEpiphany.FullTooltip: Activate to restore <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges of Radiant Dash.

Muradin.name: Muradin
Muradin.title: Mountain King
Muradin.SearchText: Muradin Bronzebeard Dwarf Alliance Warcraft III War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 Reign of Chaos RoC WoW Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm
Muradin.Description: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.
Muradin.InfoText: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother King Magni.

MuradinStormBolt.name: Storm Bolt
MuradinStormBolt.ShortTooltip: Throw a hammer, stunning and damaging the first enemy hit
MuradinStormBolt.FullTooltip: Throw a hammer, dealing 110~~0.04~~ damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes.Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

MuradinThunderclap.name: Thunder Clap
MuradinThunderclap.FullTooltip: Blast nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for the duration.

MuradinDwarfToss.name: Dwarf Toss
MuradinDwarfToss.ShortTooltip: Leap to an area, dealing damage to nearby enemies
MuradinDwarfToss.FullTooltip: Leap to target location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">59~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

MuradinAvatar.name: Avatar
MuradinAvatar.FullTooltip: Transform for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">1053~~0.04~~</c> Health.

MuradinHaymaker.name: Haymaker
MuradinHaymaker.ShortTooltip: Stun and knock an enemy away
MuradinHaymaker.FullTooltip: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage and knocking them aside.

MuradinSecondWind.name: Second Wind
MuradinSecondWind.ShortTooltip: Restore Health when not taking damage
MuradinSecondWind.FullTooltip: Muradin restores <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> Health per second when he has not taken damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When below <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Health, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">111~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

Stoneform.name: Second Wind
Stoneform.ShortTooltip: Restore Health when not taking damage
Stoneform.FullTooltip: Muradin restores <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> Health per second when he has not taken damage for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When below <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Health, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">111~~0.04~~</c> Health per second.

MuradinStormboltPerfectStorm.name: Perfect Storm
MuradinStormboltPerfectStorm.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hitting Heroes empowers Storm Bolt
MuradinStormboltPerfectStorm.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

MuradinDwarfBlock.name: Dwarf Block
MuradinDwarfBlock.FullTooltip: Casting Dwarf Toss grants <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> charges of Block. Each Block charge grants <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against a single enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. These Block charges last for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

MuradinCombatStyleThirdWind.name: Third Wind
MuradinCombatStyleThirdWind.FullTooltip: Increases Health Restoration rate to <c val="bfd4fd">90~~0.04~~</c> per second, and raises Health threshold to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> Health for improved <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> per second Restoration.

MuradinMasteryStormhammerSledgehammer.name: Sledgehammer
MuradinMasteryStormhammerSledgehammer.FullTooltip: Stormbolt deals <c val="bfd4fd">350%</c> damage to non-Heroic enemies. Hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of his baseline quest.

MuradinMasteryThunderclapReverberation.name: Reverberation
MuradinMasteryThunderclapReverberation.FullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and the duration from <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds to <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>.

MuradinMasteryThunderburn.name: Thunder Burn
MuradinMasteryThunderburn.ShortTooltip: Thunder Clap can strike a second time
MuradinMasteryThunderburn.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds later in the same location that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage.

MuradinMasteryDwarfTossHeavyImpact.name: Heavy Impact
MuradinMasteryDwarfTossHeavyImpact.ShortTooltip: Dwarf Toss briefly Slows enemies hit
MuradinMasteryDwarfTossHeavyImpact.FullTooltip: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by<c val="bfd4fd"> 80% </c>for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

MuradinGiveEmTheAxeExecutioner60DamageBo.name: Give 'em the Axe!
MuradinGiveEmTheAxeExecutioner60DamageBo.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MuradinCombatStyleSkullcracker.name: Skullcracker
MuradinCombatStyleSkullcracker.ShortTooltip: Successive Basic Attacks Stun, deal more damage
MuradinCombatStyleSkullcracker.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack against the same enemy deals <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> bonus damage and Stuns them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

MuradinHeroicAbilityAvatar.name: Avatar
MuradinHeroicAbilityAvatar.FullTooltip: Transform for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">1053~~0.04~~</c> Health.

MuradinHeroicAbilityHaymaker.name: Haymaker
MuradinHeroicAbilityHaymaker.ShortTooltip: Stun and knock an enemy away
MuradinHeroicAbilityHaymaker.FullTooltip: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage and knocking them aside.

MuradinMasteryThunderclapHealingStatic.name: Healing Static
MuradinMasteryThunderclapHealingStatic.FullTooltip: Muradin heals for <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

MuradinMasteryThunderclapThunderstrike.name: Thunder Strike
MuradinMasteryThunderclapThunderstrike.ShortTooltip: Increases Thunder Clap damage to one enemy
MuradinMasteryThunderclapThunderstrike.FullTooltip: Thunder Clap deals <c val="bfd4fd">300%</c> damage if only one target is hit.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MuradinBronzebeardRage.name: Bronzebeard Rage
MuradinBronzebeardRage.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increase this damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

MuradinMasteryDwarfTossDwarfLaunch.name: Dwarf Launch
MuradinMasteryDwarfTossDwarfLaunch.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenericTalentImposingPresence.name: Imposing Presence
GenericTalentImposingPresence.ShortTooltip: Activate to Slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
GenericTalentImposingPresence.FullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of nearby Heroes and Summons for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5 </c>seconds.

MuradinMasteryPassiveStoneform.name: Stoneform
MuradinMasteryPassiveStoneform.FullTooltip: Activate to heal Muradin for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

MuradinMasteryAvatarUnstoppableForce.name: Unstoppable Force
MuradinMasteryAvatarUnstoppableForce.FullTooltip: While active, Avatar grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

MuradinMasteryHaymakerGrandSlam.name: Grand Slam
MuradinMasteryHaymakerGrandSlam.ShortTooltip: Increases Haymaker damage and adds charge
MuradinMasteryHaymakerGrandSlam.FullTooltip: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. If a Hero dies within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> charge.

GenericTalentHardenedShield.name: Hardened Shield
GenericTalentHardenedShield.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, taking <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> less damage.

GenericTalentRewind.name: Rewind
GenericTalentRewind.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Murky.name: Murky
Murky.title: Baby Murloc
Murky.SearchText: Murky Murloc WoW Legion Heroes of the Storm
Murky.Description: Not quite a full Hero, Murky can place an Egg to respawn quickly back into battle.
Murky.InfoText: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.

MurkySlime.name: Slime
MurkySlime.ShortTooltip: Release Slime to damage and slow enemies
MurkySlime.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">86~~0.04~~</c> damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. <n/><n/>Deal <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

MurkyPufferfish.name: Pufferfish
MurkyPufferfish.ShortTooltip: Spit out a fish that explodes after a delay
MurkyPufferfish.FullTooltip: Spit out a Pufferfish with <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.055~~</c> health at the target point. After <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, the fish will blow up for <c val="bfd4fd">410~~0.04~~</c> damage. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage to Structures.

MurkySafetyBubble.name: Safety Bubble
MurkySafetyBubble.ShortTooltip: Becomes Invulnerable, but cannot attack or use abilities
MurkySafetyBubble.FullTooltip: Becomes Invulnerable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

MurkyMarchoftheMurlocs.name: March of the Murlocs
MurkyMarchoftheMurlocs.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> damage and slows its target by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Murlocs deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to Structures.

MurkyOctoGrab.name: Octo-Grab
MurkyOctoGrab.ShortTooltip: Stun and poke an enemy Hero
MurkyOctoGrab.FullTooltip: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds while he hits them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> damage a second.

MurkyRespawnEgg.name: Spawn Egg
MurkyRespawnEgg.ShortTooltip: Place an Egg, from which Murky will respawn
MurkyRespawnEgg.FullTooltip: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Murky only grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of a real Hero's experience upon dying.<n/><n/>If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

MurkyCancelMarchoftheMurlocs.name: Cancel March of the Murlocs
MurkyCancelMarchoftheMurlocs.FullTooltip: Stop channeling March of the Murlocs

MurkyFishEye.name: Fish Eye
MurkyFishEye.FullTooltip: Egg's Health is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>, its sight radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">300%</c> and it can see Stealthed enemies. <n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to <c val="bfd4fd">45%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MurkyEggHunt.name: Egg Hunt
MurkyEggHunt.FullTooltip: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>fake Eggs.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MurkyAFishyDeal.name: A Fishy Deal
MurkyAFishyDeal.ShortTooltip: Kill Minions with Pufferfish to bribe Mercs
MurkyAFishyDeal.FullTooltip: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.<n/><n/>Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">32</c> stacks of Bribe.

MurkySlimeTime.name: Slime Time
MurkySlimeTime.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Slime Heroes to empower Slime
MurkySlimeTime.FullTooltip: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

MurkyMasteryTufferfish.name: Tufferfish
MurkyMasteryTufferfish.FullTooltip: Pufferfish gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor and deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage to Slimed targets.

MurkyLivingtheDream.name: Living the Dream
MurkyLivingtheDream.FullTooltip: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

MurkySlipperyWhenWet.name: Slippery When Wet
MurkySlipperyWhenWet.ShortTooltip: Move faster during Safety Bubble, reduce cooldown
MurkySlipperyWhenWet.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

MurkyTimetoKrill.name: Time to Krill
MurkyTimetoKrill.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">7~~0.04~~</c> damage a second and slow the target by <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. This effect can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

MurkyHeroicAbilityMarchoftheMurlocs.name: March of the Murlocs
MurkyHeroicAbilityMarchoftheMurlocs.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> damage and slows its target by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Murlocs deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to Structures.

MurkyHeroicAbilityOctoGrab.name: Octo-Grab
MurkyHeroicAbilityOctoGrab.ShortTooltip: Stun and poke an enemy Hero
MurkyHeroicAbilityOctoGrab.FullTooltip: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds while he hits them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> damage a second.

MurkyMasteryRejuvenatingBubble.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
MurkyMasteryRejuvenatingBubble.FullTooltip: Safety Bubble restores <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of Murky's maximum Health.

MurkyEggShell.name: Egg Shell
MurkyEggShell.FullTooltip: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

MurkyFishTank.name: Fish Tank
MurkyFishTank.FullTooltip: Murky is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

MurkyToxicBuildup.name: Toxic Buildup
MurkyToxicBuildup.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd </c>consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

MurkyFishOil.name: Fish Oil
MurkyFishOil.FullTooltip: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

MurkyMasteryWrathOfCod.name: Wrath of Cod
MurkyMasteryWrathOfCod.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of their maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

MurkyMasteryNeverEndingMurlocs.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
MurkyMasteryNeverEndingMurlocs.ShortTooltip: March of the Murlocs can channel forever
MurkyMasteryNeverEndingMurlocs.FullTooltip: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

MurkyMasteryAndASharkToo.name: ... And a Shark Too!
MurkyMasteryAndASharkToo.FullTooltip: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by <c val="bfd4fd">13700%~~0.04~~</c>.

MurkyBigTunaKahuna.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
MurkyBigTunaKahuna.FullTooltip: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

MurkyMakingInky.name: Making Inky
MurkyMakingInky.FullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

Necromancer.name: Xul
Necromancer.title: Cryptic Necromancer
Necromancer.SearchText: Xul Xuul Zuul Zul Zool Necromancer Human D2 Diablo 2 II Diablo2
Necromancer.Description: A Summoner who can push multiple lanes with ease.
Necromancer.InfoText: From the recesses of the eastern jungles comes a man cloaked in mystery. As a member of the secretive Priests of Rathma, or the Necromancers, Xul wields powerful death magic and fights to preserve the delicate balance between order and chaos.

NecromancerSpectralScythe.name: Spectral Scythe
NecromancerSpectralScythe.ShortTooltip: Throw a scythe that damages enemies as it returns to Xul
NecromancerSpectralScythe.FullTooltip: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.

NecromancerCursedStrikes.name: Cursed Strikes
NecromancerCursedStrikes.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal damage in an area and reduce Attack Speed
NecromancerCursedStrikes.FullTooltip: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds once triggered.

NecromancerBonePrison.name: Bone Prison
NecromancerBonePrison.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> second delay, deal <c val="bfd4fd">80~~0.04~~</c> damage and Root the target enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds. All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

NecromancerSkeletalMages.name: Skeletal Mages
NecromancerSkeletalMages.ShortTooltip: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies
NecromancerSkeletalMages.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Summon <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">47~~0.04~~</c> damage a second and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Last up to <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.

NecromancerPoisonNovaInstant.name: Poison Nova
NecromancerPoisonNovaInstant.ShortTooltip: Poison enemies in a large area
NecromancerPoisonNovaInstant.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal <c val="bfd4fd">630~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies hit over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

NecromancerRaiseSkeletonDisplayAbility.name: Raise Skeleton
NecromancerRaiseSkeletonDisplayAbility.FullTooltip: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> Health that attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">21~~0.04~~</c> damage and lasts up to <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal <c val="bfd4fd">46~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

NecromancerBoneArmor.name: Bone Armor
NecromancerBoneArmor.FullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Xul's maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

NecromancerSpectralScythe.name: Spectral Scythe
NecromancerSpectralScythe.ShortTooltip: Throw a scythe that damages enemies as it returns to Xul
NecromancerSpectralScythe.FullTooltip: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.

NecromancerCursedStrikesPassive.name: Cursed Strikes
NecromancerCursedStrikesPassive.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal damage in an area and reduce Attack Speed
NecromancerCursedStrikesPassive.FullTooltip: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds once triggered.

NecromancerTalentBoneArmorBacklash.name: Backlash
NecromancerTalentBoneArmorBacklash.FullTooltip: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> of their maximum Health.

NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShackler.name: Shackler
NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShackler.ShortTooltip: Bone Armor Slows, can reduce cooldown
NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShackler.FullTooltip: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShade.name: Shade
NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShade.FullTooltip: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentReapersToll.name: Reaper's Toll
NecromancerTalentReapersToll.ShortTooltip: Lower Spectral Scythe cooldown, Mana cost
NecromancerTalentReapersToll.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds and its Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c>.

NecromancerTalentGrimScythe.name: Grim Scythe
NecromancerTalentGrimScythe.FullTooltip: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, up to <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentJailors.name: Jailors
NecromancerTalentJailors.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Bone Prison spawns Skeletal Warriors
NecromancerTalentJailors.FullTooltip: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 30% Movement and Attack Speed.

NecromancerTalentHarvestVitality.name: Harvest Vitality
NecromancerTalentHarvestVitality.FullTooltip: Cursed Strikes heals for <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> of the damage dealt to Heroes.

NecromancerTalentTragOulsEssence.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
NecromancerTalentTragOulsEssence.ShortTooltip: Skeletal Warrior attacks restore Health, Mana
NecromancerTalentTragOulsEssence.FullTooltip: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore <c val="bfd4fd">0.5%</c> of Xul's maximum Health and <c val="bfd4fd">0.2%</c> of his maximum Mana.

NecromancerBoneArmorWallOfBonesTalent.name: Wall Of Bones
NecromancerBoneArmorWallOfBonesTalent.FullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Spell Armor for its duration.

NecromancerHeroicAbilityPoisonNova.name: Poison Nova
NecromancerHeroicAbilityPoisonNova.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal <c val="bfd4fd">630~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies hit over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

NecromancerHeroicAbilitySkeletalMages.name: Skeletal Mages
NecromancerHeroicAbilitySkeletalMages.ShortTooltip: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies
NecromancerHeroicAbilitySkeletalMages.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Summon <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">47~~0.04~~</c> damage a second and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Last up to <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentEchoesOfDeath.name: Echoes of Death
NecromancerTalentEchoesOfDeath.FullTooltip: Spectral Scythe spawns <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional scythes next to the first after <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> damage.

NecromancerTalentRapidHarvest.name: Rapid Harvest
NecromancerTalentRapidHarvest.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

NecromancerTalentAmplifyDamage.name: Amplify Damage
NecromancerTalentAmplifyDamage.FullTooltip: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentDecrepify.name: Decrepify
NecromancerTalentDecrepify.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentWeaken.name: Weaken
NecromancerTalentWeaken.ShortTooltip: Cursed Strikes, Skeletal Warriors reduce damage dealt
NecromancerTalentWeaken.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentBoneSpear.name: Bone Spear
NecromancerTalentBoneSpear.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line.

NecromancerTalentAndarielsVisage.name: Andariel's Visage
NecromancerTalentAndarielsVisage.ShortTooltip: Increase Poison Nova duration, now heals
NecromancerTalentAndarielsVisage.FullTooltip: Poison Nova heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

NecromancerTalentColdHandOfDeath.name: Cold Hand of Death
NecromancerTalentColdHandOfDeath.FullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. <n/><n/>Every <c val="bfd4fd">5th</c> Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.

NecromancerTalentMortalWound.name: Mortal Wound
NecromancerTalentMortalWound.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> less healing for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

NecromancerTalentKalansEdict.name: Kalan's Edict
NecromancerTalentKalansEdict.FullTooltip: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c>.

NexusHunter.name: Qhira
NexusHunter.title: Realmless Bounty Hunter
NexusHunter.SearchText: Human Nexus Hunter Mercenary Sword Chainblade
NexusHunter.Description: A brutal Melee Assassin who is adept at both beginning and ending fights.
NexusHunter.InfoText: A sworn knight and holder of a singularity shard, Qhira's only desire is to seek out others who may have escaped the destruction of her doomed home realm, Iresia. While she searches, she gets by as a bounty hunter – a job she loathes, despite her exceptional skill.

NexusHunterCarnage.name: Carnage
NexusHunterCarnage.ShortTooltip: Unleash your blade to deal damage in an area in front of you
NexusHunterCarnage.FullTooltip: Unleash your sword in the target direction, continuously dealing <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies caught in its path.

NexusHunterBloodRage.name: Blood Rage
NexusHunterBloodRage.ShortTooltip: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities cause enemies to take damage over time
NexusHunterBloodRage.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for <c val="bfd4fd">44~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Stacks <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Active:</c> Qhira deals <c val="bfd4fd">32~~0.04~~</c> damage and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> per each additional stack on that Hero.

NexusHunterRevolvingSweep.name: Revolving Sweep
NexusHunterRevolvingSweep.ShortTooltip: Attach to an enemy Hero to rotate around and Stun them
NexusHunterRevolvingSweep.FullTooltip: Attach your sword on the first enemy Hero hit, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, swinging around the target for <c val="bfd4fd">2.75</c> seconds and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies between you and the target.<n/><n/>Re-activate to send you to the target's location knocking them away, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">108~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.name: Unrelenting Strikes
NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.ShortTooltip: Deal damage and Stun nearby enemies
NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">44~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

NexusHunterFinalStrikeActivate.name: Final Strike
NexusHunterFinalStrikeActivate.ShortTooltip: Extend sword to deal finishing blow
NexusHunterFinalStrikeActivate.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, deal <c val="bfd4fd">395~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> against enemy Heroes who are below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

NexusHunterGrapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
NexusHunterGrapplingHook.ShortTooltip: Qhira launches herself towards terrain or Heroes
NexusHunterGrapplingHook.FullTooltip: Qhira fires a grappling hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c> damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">108~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/>Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

NexusHunterRevolvingSweepSecondary.name: Revolving Sweep
NexusHunterRevolvingSweepSecondary.ShortTooltip: Fly into your target to Stun and Knockback
NexusHunterRevolvingSweepSecondary.FullTooltip: Fly into your target dealing <c val="bfd4fd">108~~0.04~~</c> damage, knocking them away and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

NexusHunterCarnageMaximumEffort.name: Maximum Effort
NexusHunterCarnageMaximumEffort.FullTooltip: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times it deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">108~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

NexusHunterFatalWounds.name: Fatal Wounds
NexusHunterFatalWounds.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Blood Rage damage, duration
NexusHunterFatalWounds.FullTooltip: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage. Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.

NexusHunterFinishingTouch.name: Finishing Touch
NexusHunterFinishingTouch.ShortTooltip: Empower Basic Attacks against weak Heroes
NexusHunterFinishingTouch.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health it deals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> additional damage, and she gains <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

NexusHunterUpstage.name: Upstage
NexusHunterUpstage.FullTooltip: Damaging at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Heroic Basic Attacks within <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

NexusHunterEnsnaringSwing.name: Ensnaring Swing
NexusHunterEnsnaringSwing.FullTooltip: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

NexusHunterBloodRageYourPainMyGain.name: Your Pain, My Gain
NexusHunterBloodRageYourPainMyGain.FullTooltip: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Stacks <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

NexusHunterTheThirst.name: The Thirst
NexusHunterTheThirst.ShortTooltip: Carnage increases Basic Attack damage, healing
NexusHunterTheThirst.FullTooltip: Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds against an enemy Hero deals <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> additional damage and restores <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the total damage dealt as Health. Damage stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times.

NexusHunterBloodRageHealmonger.name: Healmonger
NexusHunterBloodRageHealmonger.ShortTooltip: Blood Rage heals more against low Health
NexusHunterBloodRageHealmonger.FullTooltip: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, it heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">190~~0.04~~</c> Health.

NexusHunterSiphoningLink.name: Siphoning Link
NexusHunterSiphoningLink.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> times.

NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.name: Unrelenting Strikes
NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.ShortTooltip: Deal damage and Stun nearby enemies
NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikes.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">44~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

NexusHunterFinalStrike.name: Final Strike
NexusHunterFinalStrike.ShortTooltip: Extend sword to deal finishing blow
NexusHunterFinalStrike.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, deal <c val="bfd4fd">395~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> against enemy Heroes who are below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

NexusHunterChainsaw.name: Chainsaw
NexusHunterChainsaw.FullTooltip: Carnage's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

NexusHunterPulsingPain.name: Pulsing Pain
NexusHunterPulsingPain.ShortTooltip: Increase Revolving Sweep damage to main target
NexusHunterPulsingPain.FullTooltip: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">115~~0.04~~</c> damage.

NexusHunterTheHunted.name: The Hunted
NexusHunterTheHunted.ShortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal bonus damage
NexusHunterTheHunted.FullTooltip: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> times and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

NexusHunterRevolvingSweepBoomingKick.name: Booming Kick
NexusHunterRevolvingSweepBoomingKick.FullTooltip: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

NexusHunterRevolvingSweepLingeringAilmen.name: Lingering Ailment
NexusHunterRevolvingSweepLingeringAilmen.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep's initial impact and swing have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

NexusHunterRevolvingSweepSwingLifeAway.name: Swing Life Away
NexusHunterRevolvingSweepSwingLifeAway.FullTooltip: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds after the re-activation impact.

NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikesSilentKille.name: Silent Killer
NexusHunterUnrelentingStrikesSilentKille.FullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

NexusHunterFinalStrikeUnleashedPotential.name: Unleashed Potential
NexusHunterFinalStrikeUnleashedPotential.FullTooltip: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health from <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>If an enemy Hero dies within <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.

NexusHunterGrapplingHookUtilityBelt.name: Utility Belt
NexusHunterGrapplingHookUtilityBelt.FullTooltip: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges <c val="bfd4fd">900%</c> faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

NexusHunterHuntersVengeanceNoSanctuary.name: No Sanctuary
NexusHunterHuntersVengeanceNoSanctuary.FullTooltip: Nearby enemy Heroes below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health are revealed and you gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.<n/><n/>Additionally, you deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage to these revealed enemies.

Nova.name: Nova
Nova.title: Dominion Ghost
Nova.SearchText: Nova Terra Ghost November Terran SC2 StarCraft 2 II Wings of Liberty WoL Heart of the Swarm HotS SC Covert Ops CO Star2 Starcraft2
Nova.Description: A burst damage Mage who can ambush enemies from Stealth.
Nova.InfoText: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught in her crosshairs.

NovaSnipeStorm.name: Snipe
NovaSnipeStorm.ShortTooltip: Fire a shot and deal a large amount of damage to the first enemy hit
NovaSnipeStorm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c>, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

NovaPinningShot.name: Pinning Shot
NovaPinningShot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and Slow them by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.25</c> seconds.

NovaHoloDecoy.name: Holo Decoy
NovaHoloDecoy.ShortTooltip: Create a hologram decoy of Nova
NovaHoloDecoy.FullTooltip: Create a Decoy for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds with <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

NovaTripleTap.name: Triple Tap
NovaTripleTap.FullTooltip: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for <c val="bfd4fd">372~~0.04~~</c> damage each.

NovaPrecisionStrike.name: Precision Strike
NovaPrecisionStrike.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> second delay, deals <c val="bfd4fd">435~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

NovaPermanentCloak.name: Permanent Cloak
NovaPermanentCloak.ShortTooltip: Stealth and gain Move Speed while not attacking or taking damage
NovaPermanentCloak.FullTooltip: Gain Stealth when out of combat for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed while Stealthed.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

NovaGhostProtocol.name: Ghost Protocol
NovaGhostProtocol.ShortTooltip: Instantly Stealth and spawn a Holo Decoy at your location
NovaGhostProtocol.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

NovaMasteryLongshot.name: Longshot
NovaMasteryLongshot.FullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c>.

NovaCovertOps.name: Covert Ops
NovaCovertOps.ShortTooltip: Stealth enhances Pinning Shot slow and cost
NovaCovertOps.FullTooltip: After being Stealthed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">55%</c> and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

NovaAdvancedCloaking.name: Advanced Cloaking
NovaAdvancedCloaking.ShortTooltip: Stealth grants Move Speed, Mana regen
NovaAdvancedCloaking.FullTooltip: After being Stealthed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Mana per second.

NovaRapidProjection.name: Rapid Projection
NovaRapidProjection.ShortTooltip: Reduces Holo Decoy cooldown and Mana cost
NovaRapidProjection.FullTooltip: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

NovaHoloStability.name: Holo Stability
NovaHoloStability.FullTooltip: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> and its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">120%</c>.

NovaCovertMission.name: Covert Mission
NovaCovertMission.ShortTooltip: Kill Minions or Heroes to bribe a Mercenary
NovaCovertMission.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant <c val="bfd4fd">10 </c>stacks of Bribe. Use <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100</c> stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> faster.

NovaMasteryPerfectShotSnipe.name: Perfect Shot
NovaMasteryPerfectShotSnipe.ShortTooltip: Hero hits reduce Snipe cooldown, refund Mana
NovaMasteryPerfectShotSnipe.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

NovaCombatStyleOneintheChamber.name: One in the Chamber
NovaCombatStyleOneintheChamber.ShortTooltip: Using an Ability empowers next Basic Attack
NovaCombatStyleOneintheChamber.FullTooltip: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> additional damage.

NovaCombatStyleAntiArmorShells.name: Anti-Armor Shells
NovaCombatStyleAntiArmorShells.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks hit harder, reduce Physical Armor
NovaCombatStyleAntiArmorShells.FullTooltip: Nova's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">250%</c> damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

NovaHeroicAbilityTripleTap.name: Triple Tap
NovaHeroicAbilityTripleTap.FullTooltip: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for <c val="bfd4fd">372~~0.04~~</c> damage each.

NovaHeroicAbilityPrecisionStrike.name: Precision Strike
NovaHeroicAbilityPrecisionStrike.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> second delay, deals <c val="bfd4fd">435~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

NovaMasteryPsionicEfficiency.name: Psionic Efficiency
NovaMasteryPsionicEfficiency.FullTooltip: Snipe's range is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

NovaMasteryDoubleTap.name: Double Tap
NovaMasteryDoubleTap.ShortTooltip: Pinning Shot gains a charge, cooldown increased
NovaMasteryDoubleTap.FullTooltip: Pinning Shot now has <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges, but its cooldown is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

NovaIonicForceField.name: Ionic Force Field
NovaIonicForceField.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after losing Stealth.

NovaMasteryExplosiveShot.name: Explosive Round
NovaMasteryExplosiveShot.ShortTooltip: Snipe deals damage in an area
NovaMasteryExplosiveShot.FullTooltip: Snipe also deals <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> damage to enemies near the impact.

NovaMasteryCripplingShot.name: Crippling Shot
NovaMasteryCripplingShot.FullTooltip: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage.

NovaMasteryLethalDecoy.name: Lethal Decoy
NovaMasteryLethalDecoy.FullTooltip: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of Nova's damage.

NovaMasteryFastReload.name: Fast Reload
NovaMasteryFastReload.ShortTooltip: Triple Tap cooldown resets on Hero kills
NovaMasteryFastReload.FullTooltip: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

NovaMasteryPrecisionBarrage.name: Precision Barrage
NovaMasteryPrecisionBarrage.ShortTooltip: Lower Precision Strike cooldown, gain charge
NovaMasteryPrecisionBarrage.FullTooltip: Precision Strike gains a <c val="bfd4fd">2nd</c> charge and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

NovaApolloSuit.name: Apollo Suit
NovaApolloSuit.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GenericTalentRewind.name: Rewind
GenericTalentRewind.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Orphea.name: Orphea
Orphea.title: Heir of Raven Court
Orphea.Description: A ranged Assassin who dances around her enemies while using spells to empower her attacks.
Orphea.InfoText: Rejecting the dark power her father had begun to consort with, Orphea tried to run away from the Raven Lord's influence. But after witnessing King's Crest fall to his machinations, she was convinced she needed to stand and fight. She now vows to protect the innocent--as a Hero of the Nexus.

OrpheaShadowWaltz.name: Shadow Waltz
OrpheaShadowWaltz.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line and dash after hitting a Hero
OrpheaShadowWaltz.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">165~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. <n/><n/>Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, refunds <c val="bfd4fd">35</c> Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.

OrpheaChomp.name: Chomp
OrpheaChomp.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in front of Orphea
OrpheaChomp.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.625</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">305~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.

OrpheaDread.name: Dread
OrpheaDread.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line, erupting after a short delay
OrpheaDread.FullTooltip: Release a wave of dread that deals <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit. Dread erupts <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">175~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies hit by Dread's wave or eruption are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

OrpheaCrushingJaws.name: Crushing Jaws
OrpheaCrushingJaws.ShortTooltip: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area
OrpheaCrushingJaws.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

OrpheaEternalFeast.name: Eternal Feast
OrpheaEternalFeast.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area repeatedly
OrpheaEternalFeast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

OrpheaOverflowingChaos.name: Overflowing Chaos
OrpheaOverflowingChaos.ShortTooltip: Basic Abilities against enemy Heroes grant Chaos
OrpheaOverflowingChaos.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Chaos. Chaos can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.<n/><n/>While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage per stack, and healing for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage dealt.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

OrpheaOverflowingChaosInvasiveMiasma.name: Overflowing Chaos
OrpheaOverflowingChaosInvasiveMiasma.ShortTooltip: Basic Abilities against enemy Heroes grant Chaos
OrpheaOverflowingChaosInvasiveMiasma.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Chaos. Chaos can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.<n/><n/>While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consumes all Chaos, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage per stack, and healing for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage dealt.

OrpheaEnPointe.name: En Pointe
OrpheaEnPointe.ShortTooltip: Extra Shadow Waltz damage at its end
OrpheaEnPointe.FullTooltip: Shadow Waltz deals an increased <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> damage to enemies hit by its end.

OrpheaGrowingNightmare.name: Growing Nightmare
OrpheaGrowingNightmare.FullTooltip: Increase Dread's eruption damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. <n/><n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.<n/><n/><c val="e4b800">Reward:</c> Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

OrpheaAncestralStrength.name: Ancestral Strength
OrpheaAncestralStrength.ShortTooltip: Abilities deal more damage to disabled enemies
OrpheaAncestralStrength.FullTooltip: Non-Heroic Abilities deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

OrpheaAllegrissimo.name: Allegrissimo
OrpheaAllegrissimo.ShortTooltip: Extra Shadow Waltz cooldown reduction at its end
OrpheaAllegrissimo.FullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

OrpheaBackbiter.name: Backbiter
OrpheaBackbiter.ShortTooltip: Orphea dashes back after Chomp, gain Health
OrpheaBackbiter.FullTooltip: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> maximum Health.

OrpheaChaoticAssault.name: Chaotic Assault
OrpheaChaoticAssault.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Chaos deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> bonus damage.

OrpheaInsatiable.name: Insatiable
OrpheaInsatiable.ShortTooltip: Hitting a Hero reduces Chomp's cooldown
OrpheaInsatiable.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

OrpheaRavenousHunger.name: Ravenous Hunger
OrpheaRavenousHunger.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Chomp kills increase damage, heals
OrpheaRavenousHunger.FullTooltip: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60~~0.04~~. Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

OrpheaMindDevourer.name: Mind Devourer
OrpheaMindDevourer.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Dread damage, reduce cooldown
OrpheaMindDevourer.FullTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 4, up to 160.Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

OrpheaEternalFeast.name: Eternal Feast
OrpheaEternalFeast.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area repeatedly
OrpheaEternalFeast.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">210~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

OrpheaCrushingJaws.name: Crushing Jaws
OrpheaCrushingJaws.ShortTooltip: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area
OrpheaCrushingJaws.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

OrpheaDetermination.name: Determination
OrpheaDetermination.ShortTooltip: Shadow Waltz grants Spell Armor after dashing
OrpheaDetermination.FullTooltip: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

OrpheaAbyssalSymbiosis.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
OrpheaAbyssalSymbiosis.ShortTooltip: Chomp hitting Heroes grants more Chaos, Shield
OrpheaAbyssalSymbiosis.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

OrpheaInvasiveMiasma.name: Invasive Miasma
OrpheaInvasiveMiasma.ShortTooltip: Activate Overflowing Chaos to damage, heal
OrpheaInvasiveMiasma.FullTooltip: Activate to deal <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies after <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for <c val="bfd4fd">182~~0.04~~</c> and gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Chaos.

OrpheaBondOfAnguish.name: Bond of Anguish
OrpheaBondOfAnguish.FullTooltip: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of damage dealt.

OrpheaDeadMagic.name: Dead Magic
OrpheaDeadMagic.ShortTooltip: Chaos Basic Attacks ignore Armor, area damage
OrpheaDeadMagic.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal <c val="bfd4fd">95~~0.04~~</c> Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.

OrpheaLurkingTerror.name: Lurking Terror
OrpheaLurkingTerror.ShortTooltip: Activate to cast Chomp from Dread's eruption
OrpheaLurkingTerror.FullTooltip: After Dread erupts and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

OrpheaMonsterWithin.name: Monster Within
OrpheaMonsterWithin.ShortTooltip: Eternal Feast grants Chaos, increases Attack Speed
OrpheaMonsterWithin.FullTooltip: Eternal Feast grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

OrpheaEngulfingOblivion.name: Engulfing Oblivion
OrpheaEngulfingOblivion.ShortTooltip: Crushing Jaws lowers Armor, reduces cooldown
OrpheaEngulfingOblivion.FullTooltip: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

OrpheaEldritchConduit.name: Eldritch Conduit
OrpheaEldritchConduit.FullTooltip: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

OrpheaFinalToccata.name: Final Toccata
OrpheaFinalToccata.ShortTooltip: Shadow Waltz cooldown resets after dashing
OrpheaFinalToccata.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

Probius.name: Probius
Probius.title: Curious Probe
Probius.SearchText: Probe Protoss SC SC1 StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2
Probius.Description: A high damage Summoner that must stay near Pylons to be effective.
Probius.InfoText: Since his activation, Probius has always wanted to prove himself. He may be small, but he made a big difference by warping in a critical pylon during the retaking of Aiur. As the bravest of probes, Probius is eager to fulfill his purpose in the Nexus.

ProbiusDisruptionPulse.name: Disruption Pulse
ProbiusDisruptionPulse.ShortTooltip: Fire a missile in a line that damages enemies and detonates Warp Rifts
ProbiusDisruptionPulse.FullTooltip: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">142~~0.05~~</c> damage to all enemies it passes through.<n/><n/>Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

ProbiusWarpRift.name: Warp Rift
ProbiusWarpRift.ShortTooltip: Create a rift that slows enemies and can be detonated with Disruption Pulse
ProbiusWarpRift.FullTooltip: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes <c val="bfd4fd">1.25 </c>seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> lasting <c val="bfd4fd">9</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">261~~0.05~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

ProbiusPhotonCannon.name: Photon Cannon
ProbiusPhotonCannon.ShortTooltip: Create a cannon that attacks nearby enemies
ProbiusPhotonCannon.FullTooltip: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals <c val="bfd4fd">105~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">13</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field. Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

ProbiusPylonOvercharge.name: Pylon Overcharge
ProbiusPylonOvercharge.FullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ProbiusNullGate.name: Null Gate
ProbiusNullGate.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for as long as they remain in contact with it.

ProbiusWarpInPylon.name: Warp In Pylon
ProbiusWarpInPylon.ShortTooltip: Summon a Pylon that renergizes Probius and allows the construction of other buildings
ProbiusWarpInPylon.FullTooltip: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.<n/><n/>Up to <c val="bfd4fd">2 </c>Pylons can be active at a time.

ProbiusWorkerRush.name: Worker Rush
ProbiusWorkerRush.ShortTooltip: Move faster passively. Activate to move even faster.
ProbiusWorkerRush.FullTooltip: Activate to gain an additional <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early. Worker Rush is always active while at the Hall of Storms.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Probius moves <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> faster by hovering over the ground.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ProbiusEchoPulseDisruptionPulse.name: Echo Pulse
ProbiusEchoPulseDisruptionPulse.FullTooltip: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds after reaching its target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> damage on the return trip.

ProbiusWarpResonanceWarpRiftQuest.name: Warp Resonance
ProbiusWarpResonanceWarpRiftQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800"> Quest:</c> Detonate Warp Rift on Heroes
ProbiusWarpResonanceWarpRiftQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions.Reward: After hitting 8 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100.Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

ProbiusGatherMineralsPhotonCannonQuest.name: Gather Minerals
ProbiusGatherMineralsPhotonCannonQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest: </c>Collect Minerals to empower Photon Cannons
ProbiusGatherMineralsPhotonCannonQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

ProbiusPhotonBarrierPhotonCannon.name: Photon Barrier
ProbiusPhotonBarrierPhotonCannon.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor while Photon Cannon is Active
ProbiusPhotonBarrierPhotonCannon.FullTooltip: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Spell Armor.

ProbiusTurboChargedWorkerRush.name: Turbo Charged
ProbiusTurboChargedWorkerRush.ShortTooltip: Move faster and decrease Worker Rush's cooldown
