ProbiusTurboChargedWorkerRush.FullTooltip: Worker Rush grants an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10 </c>seconds.

ProbiusShieldCapacitor.name: Shield Capacitor
ProbiusShieldCapacitor.FullTooltip: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to <c val="bfd4fd">10% </c>of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

ProbiusParticleAcceleratorDisruptionPuls.name: Particle Accelerator
ProbiusParticleAcceleratorDisruptionPuls.FullTooltip: Disruption Pulse deals <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>. Reduce the cooldown of Disruption Pulse by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, plus an additional <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds whenever a Warp Rift explodes.

ProbiusRiftShockWarpRift.name: Rift Shock
ProbiusRiftShockWarpRift.ShortTooltip: Deal more damage to enemies caught in Warp Rift detonations
ProbiusRiftShockWarpRift.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ProbiusTowerDefensePhotonCannon.name: Tower Defense
ProbiusTowerDefensePhotonCannon.FullTooltip: Reduce Photon Cannon's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds when Disruption Pulse or Warp Rift damages an enemy Hero.

ProbiusPylonOverchargeHeroic.name: Pylon Overcharge
ProbiusPylonOverchargeHeroic.FullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ProbiusNullGateHeroic.name: Null Gate
ProbiusNullGateHeroic.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for as long as they remain in contact with it.

ProbiusAggressiveMatrixWarpInPylon.name: Aggressive Matrix
ProbiusAggressiveMatrixWarpInPylon.FullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> increased Attack Damage.

ProbiusPowerOverflowingWarpInPylon.name: Power Overflowing
ProbiusPowerOverflowingWarpInPylon.ShortTooltip: Power Fields give Spell Power, Mana
ProbiusPowerOverflowingWarpInPylon.FullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes<c val="bfd4fd"> 10%</c> increased Spell Power and <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Mana per second.

ProbiusShieldBatteryWarpInPylon.name: Shield Battery
ProbiusShieldBatteryWarpInPylon.FullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">28~~0.04~~</c> Shields per second, up to <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c>. Shields persist for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

ProbiusQuantumEntanglementWarpRift.name: Quantum Entanglement
ProbiusQuantumEntanglementWarpRift.FullTooltip: Enemies continue to be slowed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

ProbiusGravityWellWarpRift.name: Gravity Well
ProbiusGravityWellWarpRift.ShortTooltip: Increase Warp Rift Slow amount in center
ProbiusGravityWellWarpRift.FullTooltip: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

ProbiusInterferenceWarpRift.name: Interference
ProbiusInterferenceWarpRift.ShortTooltip: Warp Rift explosions reduce enemy Spell Power and knock back
ProbiusInterferenceWarpRift.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift explosions have their Spell Power reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Additionally, enemies hit by Warp Rift explosions are knocked away from the center.

ProbiusConstructAdditionalPylonsPylonOve.name: Construct Additional Pylons
ProbiusConstructAdditionalPylonsPylonOve.ShortTooltip: Increase max Pylon count and Pylon Overcharge damage
ProbiusConstructAdditionalPylonsPylonOve.FullTooltip: Probius can now have up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

ProbiusGateKeeperNullGate.name: Gate Keeper
ProbiusGateKeeperNullGate.ShortTooltip: Indefinite duration while in Pylon Power
ProbiusGateKeeperNullGate.FullTooltip: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.

ProbiusShootEmUptoRiftsDisruptionPulse.name: Shoot 'Em Up
ProbiusShootEmUptoRiftsDisruptionPulse.ShortTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift splits Disruption Pulse into several additional pulses
ProbiusShootEmUptoRiftsDisruptionPulse.FullTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> additional pulses that deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions. <n/><n/><c val="FFFF00">Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.</c>

ProbiusProbiusLoopWarpRift.name: Probius Loop
ProbiusProbiusLoopWarpRift.ShortTooltip: Create new Warp Rifts by hitting Heroes with explosions
ProbiusProbiusLoopWarpRift.FullTooltip: Whenever a Rift explosion hits <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

Ragnaros.name: Ragnaros
Ragnaros.title: The Firelord
Ragnaros.SearchText: Ragnaros Firelord Molten Core MC Elemental WoW World of Warcraft Cataclysm Hearthstone HS
Ragnaros.Description: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.
Ragnaros.InfoText: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfuras.name: Empower Sulfuras
RagnarosEmpowerSulfuras.ShortTooltip: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros
RagnarosEmpowerSulfuras.FullTooltip: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">191~~0.04~~</c> Ability damage in an area, and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Molten Core: Molten Swing</c><n/>Stun and damage nearby enemies.

RagnarosLivingMeteor.name: Living Meteor
RagnarosLivingMeteor.ShortTooltip: Summon a meteor to damage enemies in a line
RagnarosLivingMeteor.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Summon a meteor at the target point that deals <c val="bfd4fd">68~~0.04~~</c> damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing <c val="bfd4fd">272~~0.04~~</c> damage per second for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Molten Core: Meteor Shower</c><n/>Drop a line of meteor impacts.

RagnarosBlastWave.name: Blast Wave
RagnarosBlastWave.ShortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion around an ally
RagnarosBlastWave.FullTooltip: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds before exploding dealing <c val="bfd4fd">104~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Molten Core: Explosive Rune</c><n/>Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

RagnarosSulfurasSmash.name: Sulfuras Smash
RagnarosSulfurasSmash.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
RagnarosSulfurasSmash.FullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies in the center take <c val="bfd4fd">594~~0.04~~</c> damage instead and are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.name: Lava Wave
RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.ShortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.FullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> versus Heroes.

RagnarosMoltenCore.name: Molten Core
RagnarosMoltenCore.ShortTooltip: Take over a destroyed or Allied fort to unleash Ragnaros's full power
RagnarosMoltenCore.FullTooltip: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having <c val="bfd4fd">3996~~0.04~~</c> Health that burns away over <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasActive.name: Empower Sulfuras
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasActive.ShortTooltip: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasActive.FullTooltip: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">191~~0.04~~</c> Ability damage in an area, and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Molten Core: Molten Swing</c><n/>Stun and damage nearby enemies.

RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor.name: Shifting Meteor
RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor.FullTooltip: Change the direction of Living Meteor.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasSulfurasHungers.name: Sulfuras Hungers
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasSulfurasHungers.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Kill Minions with Empower Sulfuras to increase its damage
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasSulfurasHungers.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor.name: Shifting Meteor
RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to empower Living Meteor
RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor.FullTooltip: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it.Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

RagnarosBlastWaveEngulfingFlame.name: Engulfing Flame
RagnarosBlastWaveEngulfingFlame.FullTooltip: Increase Blast Wave's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and its radius by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

RagnarosLivingMeteorFireWard.name: Fire Ward
RagnarosLivingMeteorFireWard.FullTooltip: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

RagnarosBlastWaveSlowBurn.name: Slow Burn
RagnarosBlastWaveSlowBurn.FullTooltip: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RagnarosCatchingFire.name: Catching Fire
RagnarosCatchingFire.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase Health Regen
RagnarosCatchingFire.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasHandOfRagnaros.name: Hand of Ragnaros
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasHandOfRagnaros.FullTooltip: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> enemy Heroes, it restores <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RagnarosLivingMeteorMoltenPower.name: Molten Power
RagnarosLivingMeteorMoltenPower.ShortTooltip: After hitting Heroes, next Living Meteor deals increased damage
RagnarosLivingMeteorMoltenPower.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

RagnarosBlisteringAttacks.name: Blistering Attacks
RagnarosBlisteringAttacks.ShortTooltip: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
RagnarosBlisteringAttacks.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RagnarosSulfurasSmash.name: Sulfuras Smash
RagnarosSulfurasSmash.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
RagnarosSulfurasSmash.FullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies in the center take <c val="bfd4fd">594~~0.04~~</c> damage instead and are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

RagnarosLavaWave.name: Lava Wave
RagnarosLavaWave.ShortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
RagnarosLavaWave.FullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> versus Heroes.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasCauterizeWounds.name: Cauterize Wounds
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasCauterizeWounds.FullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of damage dealt to Heroes over <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RagnarosBlastWaveTemperedFlame.name: Tempered Flame
RagnarosBlastWaveTemperedFlame.FullTooltip: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage dealt for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

RagnarosResilientFlame.name: Resilient Flame
RagnarosResilientFlame.FullTooltip: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. <n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> second cooldown.

RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasGiantScorcher.name: Giant Scorcher
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasGiantScorcher.ShortTooltip: Empower Sulfuras deals extra damage to Heroes
RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasGiantScorcher.FullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">9%</c> of their maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

RagnarosLivingMeteorMeteorBomb.name: Meteor Bomb
RagnarosLivingMeteorMeteorBomb.ShortTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path
RagnarosLivingMeteorMeteorBomb.FullTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby enemies.

RagnarosBlastWaveBlastEcho.name: Blast Echo
RagnarosBlastWaveBlastEcho.ShortTooltip: A second Blast Wave is created after the first
RagnarosBlastWaveBlastEcho.FullTooltip: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

RagnarosSulfurasSmashFlamesOfSulfuron.name: Flames of Sulfuron
RagnarosSulfurasSmashFlamesOfSulfuron.ShortTooltip: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies, Stuns longer
RagnarosSulfurasSmashFlamesOfSulfuron.FullTooltip: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RagnarosLavaWaveLavaSurge.name: Lava Surge
RagnarosLavaWaveLavaSurge.FullTooltip: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

RagnarosMoltenCoreHeroicDifficulty.name: Heroic Difficulty
RagnarosMoltenCoreHeroicDifficulty.ShortTooltip: Enhances Molten Core Health, cooldown, damage
RagnarosMoltenCoreHeroicDifficulty.FullTooltip: Molten Core has <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> seconds.

RagnarosSubmerge.name: Submerge
RagnarosSubmerge.ShortTooltip: Activate to heal and enter Stasis
RagnarosSubmerge.FullTooltip: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for <c val="bfd4fd">600~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

RagnarosBigRagMoltenSwing.name: Molten Swing
RagnarosBigRagMoltenSwing.FullTooltip: Swing Sulfuras in a wide arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">161~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRagMeteorShower.name: Meteor Shower
RagnarosBigRagMeteorShower.FullTooltip: <c val="bfd4fd">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Summon <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals <c val="bfd4fd">151~~0.04~~</c> damage and slows enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRagExplosiveRune.name: Explosive Rune
RagnarosBigRagExplosiveRune.ShortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion in a large area
RagnarosBigRagExplosiveRune.FullTooltip: Create a rune that deals <c val="bfd4fd">285~~0.04~~</c> damage to non-Structure enemies after <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRagSulfurasSmash.name: Sulfuras Smash
RagnarosBigRagSulfurasSmash.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
RagnarosBigRagSulfurasSmash.FullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage. Enemies in the center take <c val="bfd4fd">594~~0.04~~</c> damage instead and are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.name: Lava Wave
RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.ShortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
RagnarosLavaWaveTargetPoint.FullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> versus Heroes.

Raynor.name: Raynor
Raynor.title: Renegade Commander
Raynor.SearchText: Raynor General James Jimmy Commander Marine Terran HotS Heart of the Swarm SC SC1 StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW LotV Legacy Void Wings Liberty WoL Star2 Starcraft2
Raynor.Description: A Physical Damage Assassin that can keep enemies away.
Raynor.InfoText: Ex-Confederate Marshal James Raynor has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.

RaynorPenetratingRound.name: Penetrating Round
RaynorPenetratingRound.ShortTooltip: Fire a shot damaging, knocking back, and Slowing enemies
RaynorPenetratingRound.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

RaynorInspire.name: Inspire
RaynorInspire.FullTooltip: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

RaynorAdrenalineRush.name: Adrenaline Rush
RaynorAdrenalineRush.FullTooltip: Heal Raynor for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, doubled against Heroes.

RaynorHyperion.name: Hyperion
RaynorHyperion.FullTooltip: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds, hitting up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> damage every second. Every <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">794~~0.04~~</c> damage.

RaynorRaynorsRaidersDummy.name: Raynor's Raider
RaynorRaynorsRaidersDummy.FullTooltip: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.<n/><n/>The Banshee respawns automatically after <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds.

RaynorGiveEmSomePepper.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
RaynorGiveEmSomePepper.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">4th</c> Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> more damage to the main target.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

RaynorRaynorsRaidersRedirect.name: Command Raynor's Raider
RaynorRaynorsRaidersRedirect.FullTooltip: Order the Banshee to attack an enemy.

RaynorBountyHunter.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
RaynorBountyHunter.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">4th</c> Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> more damage to the main target.

RaynorVeteranMarksman.name: Veteran Marksman
RaynorVeteranMarksman.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 1%.

RaynorAceInTheHole.name: Ace In The Hole
RaynorAceInTheHole.ShortTooltip: Deal more damage to disabled Heroes
RaynorAceInTheHole.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Deal <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes. <n/><n/>Enemy Heroes hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

RaynorGiveEmSomePepperExterminator.name: Exterminator
RaynorGiveEmSomePepperExterminator.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> while Inspire is active.

RaynorMasteryFightorFlightAdrenalineRush.name: Fight or Flight
RaynorMasteryFightorFlightAdrenalineRush.ShortTooltip: Adrenaline Rush cooldown reduced, grants Armor
RaynorMasteryFightorFlightAdrenalineRush.FullTooltip: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

RaynorBasicAttackSustainingRounds.name: Sustaining Rounds
RaynorBasicAttackSustainingRounds.FullTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of his maximum Health, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> if the primary target is a Hero.

RaynorBehemothArmor.name: Behemoth Armor
RaynorBehemothArmor.FullTooltip: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health. Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

RaynorInspireFuelTheRush.name: Fuel The Rush
RaynorInspireFuelTheRush.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c>. While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c>.

RaynorGiveEmSomePepperUnstableCompound.name: Unstable Compound
RaynorGiveEmSomePepperUnstableCompound.ShortTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper area increased, reduces cooldowns
RaynorGiveEmSomePepperUnstableCompound.FullTooltip: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round and Inspire by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RaynorPenetratingRoundHeavySlugs.name: Heavy Slugs
RaynorPenetratingRoundHeavySlugs.FullTooltip: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> and increase its Slow duration to <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

RaynorHeroicAbilityHyperion.name: Hyperion
RaynorHeroicAbilityHyperion.FullTooltip: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds, hitting up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">66~~0.04~~</c> damage every second. Every <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">794~~0.04~~</c> damage.

RaynorHeroicAbilityRaynorsRaiders.name: Raynor's Raider
RaynorHeroicAbilityRaynorsRaiders.FullTooltip: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.<n/><n/>The Banshee respawns automatically after <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds.

RaynorPenetratingRoundDebilitatingRounds.name: Debilitating Rounds
RaynorPenetratingRoundDebilitatingRounds.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from <c val="bfd4fd">65</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">45</c>, and its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

RaynorInspireRallyingCry.name: Rallying Cry
RaynorInspireRallyingCry.ShortTooltip: Inspire lasts longer and affects allied Heroes
RaynorInspireRallyingCry.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Inspire by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

RaynorInspireGiddyUp.name: Giddy-Up
RaynorInspireGiddyUp.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> more Movement Speed.

RaynorPenetratingRoundPaintThemRed.name: Paint Them Red
RaynorPenetratingRoundPaintThemRed.ShortTooltip: Penetrating Round deals more damage, heals
RaynorPenetratingRoundPaintThemRed.FullTooltip: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and heal for <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> of the damage it deals to Heroes.

RaynorMasteryGiveMeMoreAdrenalineRush.name: Give Me More!
RaynorMasteryGiveMeMoreAdrenalineRush.FullTooltip: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. While Inspire is active, gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Basic Attack range.

RaynorBountyHunter.name: Bounty Hunter
RaynorBountyHunter.ShortTooltip: Empowers Give 'Em Some Pepper, grants Armor
RaynorBountyHunter.FullTooltip: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

RaynorHyperionIndomitableResolve.name: Indomitable Resolve
RaynorHyperionIndomitableResolve.FullTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RaynorDuskWing.name: Dusk Wing
RaynorDuskWing.FullTooltip: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

RaynorGiveEmSomePepperWeakSpotAcquired.name: Weak Spot Acquired
RaynorGiveEmSomePepperWeakSpotAcquired.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RaynorBasicAttackExecute.name: Execute
RaynorBasicAttackExecute.FullTooltip: Increase Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Basic Attack damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> against targets below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health.

Rehgar.name: Rehgar
Rehgar.title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
Rehgar.SearchText: Rehgar Regar Earthfury Orc Shaman Horde WoW World of Warcraft Legion
Rehgar.Description: A well-rounded Healer that pairs well with Melee allies.
Rehgar.InfoText: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.

RehgarChainHeal.name: Chain Heal
RehgarChainHeal.ShortTooltip: Create a healing wave that jumps between allies
RehgarChainHeal.FullTooltip: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> Health. The wave then bounces <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times to nearby allies within <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> range, restoring <c val="bfd4fd">260~~0.04~~</c> Health to them.

RehgarLightningShield.name: Lightning Shield
RehgarLightningShield.ShortTooltip: Imbue target ally with lightning, causing damage to nearby enemies
RehgarLightningShield.FullTooltip: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing <c val="bfd4fd">64~~0.04~~</c> damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

RehgarEarthbindTotem.name: Earthbind Totem
RehgarEarthbindTotem.ShortTooltip: Creates a totem that Slows nearby enemies
RehgarEarthbindTotem.FullTooltip: Create a totem that Slows nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>. The totem has <c val="bfd4fd">217~~0.04~~</c> Health and lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

RehgarBloodlust.name: Bloodlust
RehgarBloodlust.ShortTooltip: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal
RehgarBloodlust.FullTooltip: Grant nearby allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Movement Speed and causes them to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

RehgarAncestralHealing.name: Ancestral Healing
RehgarAncestralHealing.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">1180~~0.04~~</c> Health.

RehgarGhostWolf.name: Ghost Wolf
RehgarGhostWolf.FullTooltip: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

RehgarTotemicProjection.name: Totemic Projection
RehgarTotemicProjection.ShortTooltip: Instantly move Earthbind Totem to a new location
RehgarTotemicProjection.FullTooltip: Instantly move Earthbind Totem to a new location.

RehgarGhostWolfLunge.name: Ghost Wolf
RehgarGhostWolfLunge.FullTooltip: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

RehgarLightningShieldElectricCharge.name: Electric Charge
RehgarLightningShieldElectricCharge.FullTooltip: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. Heal for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes.

RehgarEarthbindTotemColossalTotem.name: Colossal Totem
RehgarEarthbindTotemColossalTotem.ShortTooltip: Increases Earthbind Totem area and range, reactivatable
RehgarEarthbindTotemColossalTotem.FullTooltip: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

RehgarWolfRun.name: Wolf Run
RehgarWolfRun.ShortTooltip: Increases Ghost Wolf Speed, lower cooldown
RehgarWolfRun.FullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. If an enemy Hero is hit by Ghost Wolf's Basic Attack, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RehgarLightningShieldStormcaller.name: Stormcaller
RehgarLightningShieldStormcaller.FullTooltip: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> Mana, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100</c>.

RehgarFeralHeart.name: Feral Heart
RehgarFeralHeart.ShortTooltip: Ghost Wolf restores Health and Mana
RehgarFeralHeart.FullTooltip: Increases Rehgar's Health Regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> while in Ghost Wolf form. Ghost Wolf attacks also restore <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of Rehgar's maximum Mana, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> against Heroes.

RehgarHealingTotem.name: Healing Totem
RehgarHealingTotem.ShortTooltip: Activate to place a ward which heals in an area
RehgarHealingTotem.FullTooltip: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health every second for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

RehgarEarthbindTotemGroundedTotem.name: Grounded Totem
RehgarEarthbindTotemGroundedTotem.ShortTooltip: Increase Totem Health, lower Attack Speed
RehgarEarthbindTotemGroundedTotem.FullTooltip: Increase the Health of Earthbind Totem by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. Enemy Heroes who are Slowed by Earthbind Totem also have their Attack Speed Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

RehgarBloodAndThunder.name: Blood and Thunder
RehgarBloodAndThunder.ShortTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns
RehgarBloodAndThunder.FullTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

GenericTalentCleanse.name: Cleanse
GenericTalentCleanse.FullTooltip: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

RehgarAncestralHealing.name: Ancestral Healing
RehgarAncestralHealing.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">1180~~0.04~~</c> Health.

RehgarBloodlust.name: Bloodlust
RehgarBloodlust.ShortTooltip: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal
RehgarBloodlust.FullTooltip: Grant nearby allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Movement Speed and causes them to heal for <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

RehgarMasteryTidalWaves.name: Tidal Waves
RehgarMasteryTidalWaves.ShortTooltip: Reduces Chain Heal cooldown, Mana cost
RehgarMasteryTidalWaves.FullTooltip: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from <c val="bfd4fd">55</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">40</c>.

RehgarEarthlivingEnchant.name: Earthliving Enchant
RehgarEarthlivingEnchant.ShortTooltip: Empowers Chain Heal on low Health Heroes
RehgarEarthlivingEnchant.FullTooltip: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, they are healed an additional <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

RehgarLightningShieldEarthShield.name: Earth Shield
RehgarLightningShieldEarthShield.FullTooltip: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> of their maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

RehgarLightningShieldRisingStorm.name: Rising Storm
RehgarLightningShieldRisingStorm.ShortTooltip: Increases Lightning Shield damage with each hit
RehgarLightningShieldRisingStorm.FullTooltip: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar. Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> times.

RehgarEarthbindTotemEarthgraspTotem.name: Earthgrasp Totem
RehgarEarthbindTotemEarthgraspTotem.FullTooltip: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it Slows nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">90%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RehgarHungerOfTheWolf.name: Hunger of the Wolf
RehgarHungerOfTheWolf.ShortTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks do extra damage and heal
RehgarHungerOfTheWolf.FullTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of his maximum Health.

RehgarAncestralHealingFarseersBlessing.name: Farseer's Blessing
RehgarAncestralHealingFarseersBlessing.ShortTooltip: Heals a second time and in an area
RehgarAncestralHealingFarseersBlessing.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, Ancestral Healing is cast a second time on the same target. Allies near the target are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">590~~0.04~~</c>.

RehgarGladiatorsWarShout.name: Gladiator's War Shout
RehgarGladiatorsWarShout.FullTooltip: Increase the duration and range of Bloodlust by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

GenericTalentRewind.name: Rewind
GenericTalentRewind.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

GenericTalentStormShield.name: Storm Shield
GenericTalentStormShield.ShortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
GenericTalentStormShield.FullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of their max Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

Rexxar.name: Rexxar
Rexxar.title: Champion of the Horde
Rexxar.SearchText: Rexxar Rexar Misha Chieftan Beastmaster Hunter Half Orc Ogre Horde WoW World of Warcraft 3 War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS BFA Battle for Azeroth
Rexxar.Description: A Bruiser that with his bear, Misha, expertly controls areas of the battleground.
Rexxar.InfoText: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.

RexxarSpiritSwoop.name: Spirit Swoop
RexxarSpiritSwoop.ShortTooltip: Launch a hawk to damage enemies and slow them
RexxarSpiritSwoop.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">141~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RexxarMishaChargeRedirect.name: Misha, Charge!
RexxarMishaChargeRedirect.ShortTooltip: Order Misha to charge, damaging and stunning enemies
RexxarMishaChargeRedirect.FullTooltip: Misha charges in a line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and stunning enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

RexxarMendPet.name: Mend Pet
RexxarMendPet.FullTooltip: Heal Misha for <c val="bfd4fd">714~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

RexxarUnleashTheBoars.name: Unleash the Boars
RexxarUnleashTheBoars.ShortTooltip: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes
RexxarUnleashTheBoars.FullTooltip: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

RexxarBestialWrath.name: Bestial Wrath
RexxarBestialWrath.FullTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

RexxarMishaFocus.name: Misha, Focus!
RexxarMishaFocus.ShortTooltip: Command Misha to move or attack
RexxarMishaFocus.FullTooltip: Passive: Misha gains <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> move speed. <n/><n/>Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.<n/><n/>Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> move speed until she reaches Rexxar.<n/><n/>Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

RexxarSpiritSwoopBirdOfPrey.name: Bird of Prey
RexxarSpiritSwoopBirdOfPrey.ShortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop damage to Minions
RexxarSpiritSwoopBirdOfPrey.FullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> to Minions.

RexxarSpiritBondEasyPrey.name: Easy Prey
RexxarSpiritBondEasyPrey.ShortTooltip: Misha is more effective against Minions and Mercs
RexxarSpiritBondEasyPrey.FullTooltip: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c>, and Misha gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

RexxarFlare.name: Flare
RexxarFlare.FullTooltip: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

RexxarHungryBear.name: Hungry Bear
RexxarHungryBear.FullTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for <c val="bfd4fd">4.5%</c> of her maximum Health.

RexxarHunterGatherer.name: Hunter-Gatherer
RexxarHunterGatherer.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes grant Health Regen
RexxarHunterGatherer.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

RexxarSpiritBondGrizzledFortitude.name: Grizzled Fortitude
RexxarSpiritBondGrizzledFortitude.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

RexxarAnimalHusbandry.name: Animal Husbandry
RexxarAnimalHusbandry.FullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

RexxarSpiritSwoopCripplingTalons.name: Crippling Talons
RexxarSpiritSwoopCripplingTalons.ShortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop slow amount and duration
RexxarSpiritSwoopCripplingTalons.FullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and its duration to<c val="bfd4fd"> 3.5</c> seconds.

RexxarTakingFlightSpiritSwoop.name: Taking Flight
RexxarTakingFlightSpiritSwoop.ShortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop range, returns Mana
RexxarTakingFlightSpiritSwoop.FullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RexxarAspectoftheBeastCharge.name: Aspect of the Beast
RexxarAspectoftheBeastCharge.ShortTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks lower Misha, Charge! cooldown
RexxarAspectoftheBeastCharge.FullTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

RexxarHeroicAbilityBestialWrath.name: Bestial Wrath
RexxarHeroicAbilityBestialWrath.FullTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

RexxarHeroicAbilityUnleashTheBoars.name: Unleash the Boars
RexxarHeroicAbilityUnleashTheBoars.ShortTooltip: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes
RexxarHeroicAbilityUnleashTheBoars.FullTooltip: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

RexxarAspectOfTheHawkSpiritSwoop.name: Aspect of the Hawk
RexxarAspectOfTheHawkSpiritSwoop.FullTooltip: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

RexxarDireBeast.name: Dire Beast
RexxarDireBeast.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks increase damage of Misha, Charge!
RexxarDireBeast.FullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>, stacking up to a <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> bonus.

RexxarSpiritBondWildfireBear.name: Wildfire Bear
RexxarSpiritBondWildfireBear.ShortTooltip: Misha deals damage to nearby enemies
RexxarSpiritBondWildfireBear.FullTooltip: Misha deals <c val="bfd4fd">28~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

RexxarThrilloftheHunt.name: Thrill of the Hunt
RexxarThrilloftheHunt.FullTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

RexxarSpiritBondPrimalIntimidation.name: Primal Intimidation
RexxarSpiritBondPrimalIntimidation.ShortTooltip: Activate to slow enemy Attack and Move speed
RexxarSpiritBondPrimalIntimidation.FullTooltip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5 </c>seconds.

RexxarFeignDeath.name: Feign Death
RexxarFeignDeath.FullTooltip: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. During this time you control Misha.

RexxarSpiritBond.name: Spirit Bond
RexxarSpiritBond.FullTooltip: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by<c val="bfd4fd"> 50%</c> and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

RexxarUnleashTheBoarsKillCommand.name: Kill Command
RexxarUnleashTheBoarsKillCommand.ShortTooltip: Unleash the Boars deals more damage and roots
RexxarUnleashTheBoarsKillCommand.FullTooltip: Unleash the Boars deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage and roots for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

RexxarFrenzyofKalimdor.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
RexxarFrenzyofKalimdor.ShortTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal more damage, Misha's attacks slow
RexxarFrenzyofKalimdor.FullTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

RexxarHardenedSkin.name: Hardened Skin
RexxarHardenedSkin.ShortTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain massive Armor
RexxarHardenedSkin.FullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

RexxarMishaCharge.name: Misha, Charge!
RexxarMishaCharge.ShortTooltip: Order Misha to charge, damaging and stunning enemies
RexxarMishaCharge.FullTooltip: Misha charges in a line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and stunning enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

Samuro.name: Samuro
Samuro.title: The Blademaster
Samuro.SearchText: Samuro Orc Blademaster Horde Warcraft III 3 War3 Warcraft3 WC3 Frozen Throne FT WoW
Samuro.Description: A stealthed Assassin that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and is difficult to kill.
Samuro.InfoText: Samuro, the last remaining blademaster to wear the banner of the Burning Blade, is on a warrior's pilgrimage in search of vengeance and redemption for his fallen clan. It will be a long journey, but he has sworn an oath to restore his clan's honor.

SamuroMirrorImageTargeted.name: Mirror Image
SamuroMirrorImageTargeted.ShortTooltip: Create Mirror Images to confuse and attack enemies
SamuroMirrorImageTargeted.FullTooltip: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Mirror Images for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds with <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">11~~0.04~~</c> damage. Images have their duration increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second each time they or Samuro use a Basic Attack against an enemy Hero. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.<n/><n/>Maximum <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.

SamuroCriticalStrike.name: Critical Strike
SamuroCriticalStrike.FullTooltip: Samuro's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every <c val="bfd4fd">4th</c> Basic Attack.

SamuroWindwalk.name: Wind Walk
SamuroWindwalk.ShortTooltip: Become Stealthed and gain Movement Speed
SamuroWindwalk.FullTooltip: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.<n/><n/>While Stealthed, Samuro heals for <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of his maximum Health every second, his Movement Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.<n/><n/>Samuro is Unrevealable for the first <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second of Wind Walk.

SamuroBladeStormDummy.name: Bladestorm
SamuroBladeStormDummy.ShortTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force
SamuroBladeStormDummy.FullTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, granting him <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

SamuroIllusionMaster.name: Illusion Master
SamuroIllusionMaster.FullTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. <n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

SamuroIllusionMaster.name: Image Transmission
SamuroIllusionMaster.ShortTooltip: Increase Movement Speed when attacking Heroes
SamuroIllusionMaster.FullTooltip: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Advancing Strikes</s><n/><n/>Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

SamuroSelectSamuroPrime.name: Select Samuro
SamuroSelectSamuroPrime.FullTooltip: <s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Select Samuro</s><n/><n/>Issue orders to Samuro only.

SamuroSelectAll.name: Select All
SamuroSelectAll.FullTooltip: <s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Select All</s><n/><n/>Issue orders to Samuro and all Mirror Images.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

SamuroWayOfIllusion.name: Way of Illusion
SamuroWayOfIllusion.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Image Critical Strikes empower Basic Attacks
SamuroWayOfIllusion.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 30 Attack Damage.

SamuroMirrorImageWayOfTheBlade.name: Way of the Blade
SamuroMirrorImageWayOfTheBlade.FullTooltip: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every <c val="bfd4fd">3rd</c> Basic Attack. <n/><n/>Samuro and his Mirror Images' Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.25</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

SamuroWayOfTheWind.name: Way of the Wind
SamuroWayOfTheWind.ShortTooltip: Wind Walk grants Move Speed, restores Health
SamuroWayOfTheWind.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk. Casting Wind Walk heals Samuro for<c val="bfd4fd"> 5%</c> of his maximum Health.

SamuroMirage.name: Mirage
SamuroMirage.FullTooltip: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Spell Armor against the next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

SamuroWindwalkOneWithTheWind.name: One With The Wind
SamuroWindwalkOneWithTheWind.FullTooltip: While Samuro has Wind Walk active and for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor, taking <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> reduced damage from all sources.

SamuroAdvancingStrikesDeflection.name: Deflection
SamuroAdvancingStrikesDeflection.FullTooltip: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images <c val="bfd4fd">35</c> Physical Armor.

SamuroBurningBlade.name: Burning Blade
SamuroBurningBlade.FullTooltip: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

SamuroPhantomPain.name: Phantom Pain
SamuroPhantomPain.ShortTooltip: Critical Strikes reduce Image Transmission cooldown
SamuroPhantomPain.FullTooltip: Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active and reduce the cooldown of Image Transmission by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

SamuroCrushingBlow.name: Crushing Blows
SamuroCrushingBlow.ShortTooltip: Critical Strikes increase Basic Attack damage
SamuroCrushingBlow.FullTooltip: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

SamuroHeroicAbilityBladestorm.name: Bladestorm
SamuroHeroicAbilityBladestorm.ShortTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force
SamuroHeroicAbilityBladestorm.FullTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, granting him <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">180~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies.

SamuroHeroicAbilityIllusionMaster.name: Illusion Master
SamuroHeroicAbilityIllusionMaster.FullTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. <n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

SamuroMirroredSteel.name: Mirrored Steel
SamuroMirroredSteel.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Mirror Image cooldown
SamuroMirroredSteel.FullTooltip: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

SamuroWindwalkKawarimi.name: Kawarimi
SamuroWindwalkKawarimi.FullTooltip: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

SamuroShukuchi.name: Shukuchi
SamuroShukuchi.ShortTooltip: Wind Walk teleports a short distance
SamuroShukuchi.FullTooltip: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

SamuroMercilessStrikes.name: Merciless Strikes
SamuroMercilessStrikes.ShortTooltip: Critically Strike always happens on disabled targets
SamuroMercilessStrikes.FullTooltip: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

SamuroHarshWinds.name: Harsh Winds
SamuroHarshWinds.ShortTooltip: Attacks from Wind Walk increase damage
SamuroHarshWinds.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased damage from Samuro for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

SamuroPressTheAttack.name: Press the Attack
SamuroPressTheAttack.FullTooltip: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

SamuroDanceOfDeath.name: Dance Of Death
SamuroDanceOfDeath.ShortTooltip: Images use Bladestorm, can reset cooldown
SamuroDanceOfDeath.FullTooltip: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> damage. If Samuro hits at least <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> enemy Heroes with Bladestorm, then reset its cooldown.

SamuroThreeBladeStyle.name: Three Blade Style
SamuroThreeBladeStyle.ShortTooltip: Images have increased Health and Duration
SamuroThreeBladeStyle.FullTooltip: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their Health by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and their duration is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">16</c> seconds.

SamuroWindStrider.name: Wind Strider
SamuroWindStrider.FullTooltip: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

SamuroBlademastersPursuit.name: Blademaster’s Pursuit
SamuroBlademastersPursuit.ShortTooltip: Increase Advancing Strikes Move Speed, duration
SamuroBlademastersPursuit.FullTooltip: Advancing Strikes grants an additional <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

SgtHammer.name: Sgt. Hammer
SgtHammer.title: Siege Tank Operator
SgtHammer.SearchText: Sgt. Hammer Sergeant SgtHammer Sgt Siege Tank Terran Heroes of the Storm StarCraft II SC 2 SC2 Legacy of the Void LotV Star2 Starcraft2
SgtHammer.Description: A long-range, Physical Damage dealer that needs protection from allies.
SgtHammer.InfoText: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.

SgtHammerSpiderMines.name: Spider Mines
SgtHammerSpiderMines.ShortTooltip: Create mines that slow and damage enemies on contact
SgtHammerSpiderMines.FullTooltip: Create <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> mines that arm after <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Siege Mode:</c> Cast range increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

SgtHammerConcussiveBlast.name: Concussive Blast
SgtHammerConcussiveBlast.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">141~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Siege Mode:</c> Radius increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

SgtHammerNeosteelPlating.name: Neosteel Plating
SgtHammerNeosteelPlating.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Siege Mode:</c> Grants <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more Armor.

SgtHammerNapalmStrike.name: Napalm Strike
SgtHammerNapalmStrike.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">164~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

SgtHammerBluntForceGun.name: Blunt Force Gun
SgtHammerBluntForceGun.ShortTooltip: Fire a large bullet across the map
SgtHammerBluntForceGun.FullTooltip: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.03~~ </c>damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

SgtHammerSiegeMode.name: Siege Mode
SgtHammerSiegeMode.ShortTooltip: Become immobile to increase range and empower Basic Attacks
SgtHammerSiegeMode.FullTooltip: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage, have <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> increased range, and deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of their damage as splash damage around the target.

SgtHammerThrusters.name: Thrusters
SgtHammerThrusters.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain a burst of Movement Speed
SgtHammerThrusters.FullTooltip: Increase Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Hall of Storms. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

SgtHammerSpiderMinesSiegeMode.name: Spider Mines
SgtHammerSpiderMinesSiegeMode.ShortTooltip: Create mines that slow and damage enemies on contact
SgtHammerSpiderMinesSiegeMode.FullTooltip: Create <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> mines that arm after <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Siege Mode:</c> Cast range increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

SgtHammerNapalmStrikeSiege.name: Napalm Strike
SgtHammerNapalmStrikeSiege.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">164~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

SgtHammerAmbush.name: Ambush
SgtHammerAmbush.ShortTooltip: Siege Mode grants Stealth, extra damage
SgtHammerAmbush.FullTooltip: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage.<n/><n/>Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

SgtHammerSiegeModeAdvancedArtillery.name: Advanced Artillery
SgtHammerSiegeModeAdvancedArtillery.ShortTooltip: Increase Siege Mode splash damage, radius
SgtHammerSiegeModeAdvancedArtillery.FullTooltip: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

SgtHammerSiegeModeMaelstromRounds.name: Maelstrom Rounds
SgtHammerSiegeModeMaelstromRounds.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
SgtHammerSiegeModeMaelstromRounds.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

SgtHammerBarricade.name: Barricade
SgtHammerBarricade.FullTooltip: Reduce Concussive Blast's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, its Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c>, and when cast create an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

SgtHammerNeosteelPlatingSiegeTactics.name: Siege Tactics
SgtHammerNeosteelPlatingSiegeTactics.FullTooltip: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

SgtHammerSiegeModeRegenerativeBioSteel.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
SgtHammerSiegeModeRegenerativeBioSteel.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks in Siege Mode heal
SgtHammerSiegeModeRegenerativeBioSteel.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the damage dealt.

SgtHammerSpiderMinesPulseDetonationCore.name: Pulse Detonation Core
SgtHammerSpiderMinesPulseDetonationCore.FullTooltip: Spider Mines detonate <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Increase this bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while in Siege Mode.

SgtHammerMasteryHoverSiegeMode.name: Hover Siege Mode
SgtHammerMasteryHoverSiegeMode.FullTooltip: Sgt. Hammer can move at <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

SgtHammerGraduatingRange.name: Graduating Range
SgtHammerGraduatingRange.ShortTooltip: Gradually gain Basic Attack range in Siege Mode
SgtHammerGraduatingRange.FullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> every <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c>.

SgtHammerHeroicAbilityBluntForceGun.name: Blunt Force Gun
SgtHammerHeroicAbilityBluntForceGun.ShortTooltip: Fire a large bullet across the map
SgtHammerHeroicAbilityBluntForceGun.FullTooltip: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">500~~0.03~~ </c>damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

SgtHammerHeroicAbilityNapalmStrike.name: Napalm Strike
SgtHammerHeroicAbilityNapalmStrike.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">164~~0.04~~</c> damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

SgtHammerSpiderMinesTacticalMineDeployme.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
SgtHammerSpiderMinesTacticalMineDeployme.FullTooltip: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

SgtHammerConcussiveBlastEntrenched.name: Entrenched
SgtHammerConcussiveBlastEntrenched.FullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

SgtHammerHyperCoolingEngines.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
SgtHammerHyperCoolingEngines.ShortTooltip: Siege Mode Attacks reduce Thrusters cooldown
SgtHammerHyperCoolingEngines.FullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

SgtHammerNeosteelPlatingMechanicalKnowho.name: Mechanical Know-how
SgtHammerNeosteelPlatingMechanicalKnowho.FullTooltip: Neosteel Plating grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> maximum Health as a Shield for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.name: Executioner
HeroGenericExecutionerPassive.FullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenericTalentGiantKillerSgtHammer.name: Giant Killer
GenericTalentGiantKillerSgtHammer.ShortTooltip: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
GenericTalentGiantKillerSgtHammer.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5%</c> of the Hero's maximum Health.

SgtHammerMasteryOrbitalBFGBluntForceGun.name: Orbital BFG
SgtHammerMasteryOrbitalBFGBluntForceGun.ShortTooltip: BFG repeatedly travels through the map
SgtHammerMasteryOrbitalBFGBluntForceGun.FullTooltip: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

SgtHammerMasteryAdvancedLavaStrikeNapalm.name: Advanced Lava Strike
SgtHammerMasteryAdvancedLavaStrikeNapalm.FullTooltip: Napalm Strike's range is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and its impact does <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage.

SgtHammerSpiderMinesShrapnelMines.name: Shrapnel Mines
SgtHammerSpiderMinesShrapnelMines.FullTooltip: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30</c>, for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

SgtHammerSiegeModeUltraCapacitors.name: Ultra Capacitors
SgtHammerSiegeModeUltraCapacitors.ShortTooltip: Siege Mode Attacks grant Attack Speed
SgtHammerSiegeModeUltraCapacitors.FullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

Stitches.name: Stitches
Stitches.title: Terror of Darkshire
Stitches.SearchText: Stitches Abomination Undead WoW World of Warcraft hook
Stitches.Description: A Tank who wants to isolate distant enemies away from their team.
Stitches.InfoText: Take care when traversing the shadowed trails of Duskwood...<n/>Ever since Abercrombie the Embalmer unleashed his vile abomination upon Darkshire, Stitches has wandered the road aimlessly, hungering for the flesh of low level Alliance players.

StitchesHook.name: Hook
StitchesHook.ShortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
StitchesHook.FullTooltip: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage.

StitchesSlam.name: Slam
StitchesSlam.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
StitchesSlam.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">104~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact area take <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage and are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">45%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

StitchesDevour.name: Devour
StitchesDevour.ShortTooltip: Damage an enemy and restore Health
StitchesDevour.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage to non-Heroic units, or <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage to Heroes. Restores <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of Stitches's maximum Health.

StitchesPutridBile.name: Putrid Bile
StitchesPutridBile.FullTooltip: Emit bile that deals <c val="bfd4fd">37~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

StitchesGorge.name: Gorge
StitchesGorge.FullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes <c val="bfd4fd">274~~0.04~~</c> damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

StitchesVileGasVileCleaver.name: Vile Cleaver
StitchesVileGasVileCleaver.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash additional damage over time
StitchesVileGasVileCleaver.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">45~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

StitchesHookHelpingHand.name: Helping Hand
StitchesHookHelpingHand.ShortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
StitchesHookHelpingHand.FullTooltip: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. When used to pull allies, the cooldown of Hook is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

StitchesBlight.name: Vile Cleaver
StitchesBlight.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks splash additional damage over time
StitchesBlight.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">45~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

StitchesSavortheFlavorDevour.name: Savor the Flavor
StitchesSavortheFlavorDevour.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800"> Quest:</c> Devour heals more, grants Health Regen
StitchesSavortheFlavorDevour.FullTooltip: When Devour hits a Hero, Stitches heals for an additional 8% of his maximum Health and Mana over 4 seconds. Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Devour increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 1.5.

StitchesPatchworkCreation.name: Patchwork Creation
StitchesPatchworkCreation.ShortTooltip: All healing effects increased, kills restore Health
StitchesPatchworkCreation.FullTooltip: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore <c val="bfd4fd">33~~0.04~~</c> Health. Takedowns restore <c val="bfd4fd">255~~0.04~~</c> Health.

StitchesHungryforMore.name: Hungry for More
StitchesHungryforMore.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase Health, Move Speed
StitchesHungryforMore.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30. Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

StitchesSerratedEdge.name: Serrated Edge
StitchesSerratedEdge.ShortTooltip: Hook deals bonus damage, reduces cooldown
StitchesSerratedEdge.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

StitchesPlaytime.name: Playtime!
StitchesPlaytime.ShortTooltip: Slam reduces other Basic Ability cooldowns
StitchesPlaytime.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

StitchesChopChop.name: Chop Chop
StitchesChopChop.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Slam grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Double the Attack Speed bonus and duration if they are hit by Slam's inner impact area.

StitchesBlight.name: Blight
StitchesBlight.ShortTooltip: Vile Gas heals, activate to reduce enemy healing
StitchesBlight.FullTooltip: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> less healing for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Vile Gas heals Stitches for <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> of the damage dealt.

StitchesCannibalize.name: Cannibalize
StitchesCannibalize.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Slam heals Stitches
StitchesCannibalize.FullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of his maximum Health.

StitchesTenderizer.name: Tenderizer
StitchesTenderizer.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies, refresh Slam's Slow
StitchesTenderizer.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

StitchesHeroicAbilityPutridBile.name: Putrid Bile
StitchesHeroicAbilityPutridBile.FullTooltip: Emit bile that deals <c val="bfd4fd">37~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

StitchesHeroicAbilityGorge.name: Gorge
StitchesHeroicAbilityGorge.FullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes <c val="bfd4fd">274~~0.04~~</c> damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

StitchesFishingHook.name: Fishing Hook
StitchesFishingHook.FullTooltip: Hook has an additional <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> range.

StitchesMeatHook.name: Meat Hook
StitchesMeatHook.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the healing duration.

StitchesPulverizeSlam.name: Pulverize
StitchesPulverizeSlam.ShortTooltip: Slam Slows all targets, increased Slow
StitchesPulverizeSlam.FullTooltip: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

StitchesLacerate.name: Lacerate
StitchesLacerate.ShortTooltip: Slam spreads Vile Gas, reduces Armor
StitchesLacerate.FullTooltip: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

StitchesDigestiveJuices.name: Digestive Juices
StitchesDigestiveJuices.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> reduced damage for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

StitchesGasFlare.name: Gas Flare
StitchesGasFlare.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="bfd4fd">15~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

StitchesPotentBile.name: Potent Bile
StitchesPotentBile.ShortTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts longer and Slows more
StitchesPotentBile.FullTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds longer and its Slow is increased from <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">45%</c>.

StitchesHungryHungryStitchesGorge.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
StitchesHungryHungryStitchesGorge.FullTooltip: For <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

StitchesSecondHelping.name: Second Helping
StitchesSecondHelping.ShortTooltip: Devour gains a charge, reduces Heroic cooldown
StitchesSecondHelping.FullTooltip: Devour gains <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

StitchesShamblingHorror.name: Shambling Horror
StitchesShamblingHorror.ShortTooltip: Resilient to Slows, activate to gain Armor
