StitchesShamblingHorror.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

Stukov.name: Stukov
Stukov.title: Infested Admiral
Stukov.SearchText: Stewkov Starcraft Brood War BW SC2 SC Heart of the Swarm HotS Legacy of the Void LotV Zerg Infested Terran UED
Stukov.Description: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.
Stukov.InfoText: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...

StukovHealingPathogen.name: Healing Pathogen
StukovHealingPathogen.ShortTooltip: Infest allies with a spreading healing Virus
StukovHealingPathogen.FullTooltip: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for <c val="bfd4fd">222~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4.5</c> seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> time.

StukovWeightedPustule.name: Weighted Pustule
StukovWeightedPustule.ShortTooltip: Damage enemies and infest them with a Slowing Virus
StukovWeightedPustule.FullTooltip: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>, increasing to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">88~~0.04~~</c> damage upon expiring or being removed.

StukovLurkingArm.name: Lurking Arm
StukovLurkingArm.ShortTooltip: Continually damage and Silence enemies in an area
StukovLurkingArm.FullTooltip: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals <c val="bfd4fd">136~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> reduced damage to non-Heroes.<n/><n/>Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

StukovMassiveShove.name: Massive Shove
StukovMassiveShove.ShortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
StukovMassiveShove.FullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">190~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Stukov gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor while shoving an enemy.

StukovFlailingSwipe.name: Flailing Swipe
StukovFlailingSwipe.ShortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
StukovFlailingSwipe.FullTooltip: Swipe <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times in front of Stukov over <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">48~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

StukovBioKillSwitch.name: Bio-Kill Switch
StukovBioKillSwitch.FullTooltip: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for <c val="bfd4fd">450~~0.04~~</c> Health, and each Weighted Pustule does <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slows its target by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

StukovFetidTouch.name: Fetid Touch
StukovFetidTouch.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Reduce Weighted Pustule cooldown, cost
StukovFetidTouch.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

StukovWeightedPustuleReactiveBallistospo.name: Reactive Ballistospores
StukovWeightedPustuleReactiveBallistospo.ShortTooltip: Radiate Weighted Pustule at low Health
StukovWeightedPustuleReactiveBallistospo.FullTooltip: When taking damage below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> second cooldown.

StukovLowBlow.name: Low Blow
StukovLowBlow.ShortTooltip: Increase Lurking Arm damage to low Health targets
StukovLowBlow.FullTooltip: Lurking Arm deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage to enemy Heroes below <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Health.

StukovSpineLauncher.name: Spine Launcher
StukovSpineLauncher.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, but deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> less damage.

StukovOneGoodSpread.name: One Good Spread...
StukovOneGoodSpread.ShortTooltip: Reduce Healing Pathogen cooldown after spreading
StukovOneGoodSpread.FullTooltip: After a Healing Pathogen infests <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> targets, restore <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

StukovBioticArmor.name: Biotic Armor
StukovBioticArmor.FullTooltip: Healing Pathogen grants <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

StukovVigorousReuptake.name: Vigorous Reuptake
StukovVigorousReuptake.FullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch heals for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more when detonating <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> or more Healing Pathogens.

StukovLongPitch.name: The Long Pitch
StukovLongPitch.ShortTooltip: Increase Weighted Pustule range, reduce cooldowns
StukovLongPitch.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Detonating <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

StukovGrowingInfestation.name: Growing Infestation
StukovGrowingInfestation.ShortTooltip: Lurking Arm expands, has set duration
StukovGrowingInfestation.FullTooltip: Lurking Arm's area expands by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

StukovTargetedExcision.name: Targeted Excision
StukovTargetedExcision.ShortTooltip: Detonate single Weighted Pustule to reduce cooldowns
StukovTargetedExcision.FullTooltip: Detonating exactly <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and other Basic Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

StukovHeroicAbilityFlailingSwipe.name: Flailing Swipe
StukovHeroicAbilityFlailingSwipe.ShortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
StukovHeroicAbilityFlailingSwipe.FullTooltip: Swipe <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times in front of Stukov over <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">48~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

StukovHeroicAbilityMassiveShove.name: Massive Shove
StukovHeroicAbilityMassiveShove.ShortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
StukovHeroicAbilityMassiveShove.FullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">190~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Stukov gains <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor while shoving an enemy.

StukovItHungers.name: It Hungers
StukovItHungers.ShortTooltip: Lurking Arm cost can be refunded
StukovItHungers.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

StukovLingeringSpines.name: Lingering Spines
StukovLingeringSpines.FullTooltip: Lurking Arm persists for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds after it is canceled.

StukovVirulentReaction.name: Virulent Reaction
StukovVirulentReaction.ShortTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule in Lurking Arm Roots
StukovVirulentReaction.FullTooltip: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

StukovPoppinPustules.name: Poppin' Pustules
StukovPoppinPustules.ShortTooltip: Weighted Pustule can detonate in an area
StukovPoppinPustules.FullTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds of its expiration increases its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

StukovSuperstrain.name: Superstrain
StukovSuperstrain.ShortTooltip: Healing Pathogen heals when Stunned, Rooted
StukovSuperstrain.FullTooltip: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> Health.

StukovUniversalCarrier.name: Universal Carrier
StukovUniversalCarrier.FullTooltip: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

StukovPoxPopuli.name: Pox Populi
StukovPoxPopuli.ShortTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen
StukovPoxPopuli.FullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

StukovControlledChaos.name: Controlled Chaos
StukovControlledChaos.ShortTooltip: Flailing Swipe only hits once, gains multiple charges
StukovControlledChaos.FullTooltip: Flailing Swipe gains <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges, but each use only swings <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from <c val="bfd4fd">60</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.

StukovPushComesToShove.name: Push Comes To Shove
StukovPushComesToShove.ShortTooltip: Massive Shove Slows, can reduce cooldown
StukovPushComesToShove.FullTooltip: Massive Shove Slows its target by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.

StukovTopOff.name: Top Off
StukovTopOff.ShortTooltip: Healing Pathogen stronger at high Health
StukovTopOff.FullTooltip: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> while its target is above <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> Health.

StukovBioExplosionSwitch.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
StukovBioExplosionSwitch.FullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage, applying a Weighted Pustule, and Silencing enemy Heroes inside for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Sylvanas
Sylvanas.title: The Banshee Queen
Sylvanas.SearchText: Sylvanas Windrunner Queen Forsaken Undead Elf Horde WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 3 III Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Warlords Draenor WoD Legion warchief BFA Battle for Azeroth
Sylvanas.Description: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.
Sylvanas.InfoText: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.

SylvanasWitheringFire.name: Withering Fire
SylvanasWitheringFire.ShortTooltip: Shoot arrows at the closest enemy. Cooldown is reset on Takedown.
SylvanasWitheringFire.FullTooltip: Shoot the closest enemy up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times over <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds for <c val="bfd4fd">39~~0.04~~</c> damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.

SylvanasShadowDagger.name: Shadow Dagger
SylvanasShadowDagger.ShortTooltip: Damage an enemy over time, spreading after hit
SylvanasShadowDagger.FullTooltip: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> damage and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.

SylvanasHauntingWave.name: Haunting Wave
SylvanasHauntingWave.FullTooltip: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

SylvanasWailingArrow.name: Wailing Arrow
SylvanasWailingArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and Silences
SylvanasWailingArrow.FullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage and Silence enemies in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

SylvanasMindControlMissile.name: Mind Control
SylvanasMindControlMissile.ShortTooltip: Force an enemy Hero to walk towards Sylvanas
SylvanasMindControlMissile.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

SylvanasBlackArrowsActive.name: Black Arrows
SylvanasBlackArrowsActive.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks apply Banshee's Curse, activate to disable enemies
SylvanasBlackArrowsActive.FullTooltip: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">10 </c>seconds. <n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Banshee's Curse</s><n/><n/>Basic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times. Deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage to enemies with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

SylvanasHauntingWaveActivate.name: Haunting Teleport
SylvanasHauntingWaveActivate.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the banshees' location.

SylvanasHauntingWaveActivateWindrunnerTa.name: Haunting Teleport
SylvanasHauntingWaveActivateWindrunnerTa.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the banshees' location.

SylvanasHauntingWaveWindrunnerTalent.name: Haunting Wave
SylvanasHauntingWaveWindrunnerTalent.FullTooltip: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing <c val="bfd4fd">114~~0.04~~</c> damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

SylvanasTalentMightOfTheBansheeQueen.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
SylvanasTalentMightOfTheBansheeQueen.ShortTooltip: Withering Fire grants Attack Speed, Spell Power
SylvanasTalentMightOfTheBansheeQueen.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

SylvanasUnfurlingShadowsShadowDagger.name: Unfurling Shadows
SylvanasUnfurlingShadowsShadowDagger.ShortTooltip: Quest: Increase Shadow Dagger damage
SylvanasUnfurlingShadowsShadowDagger.FullTooltip: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

SylvanasTalentOverwhelmingAffliction.name: Overwhelming Affliction
SylvanasTalentOverwhelmingAffliction.ShortTooltip: Banshee's Curse Slows, bonus damage to Heroes
SylvanasTalentOverwhelmingAffliction.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of their maximum Health as damage.

SylvanasTalentUnstablePoison.name: Unstable Poison
SylvanasTalentUnstablePoison.ShortTooltip: Enemy Minions can explode on death
SylvanasTalentUnstablePoison.FullTooltip: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

SylvanasTalentMercenaryQueen.name: Mercenary Queen
SylvanasTalentMercenaryQueen.FullTooltip: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> additional damage to Mercenaries with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse.

SylvanasHeroicAbilityPossession.name: Possession
SylvanasHeroicAbilityPossession.FullTooltip: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges. Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

SylvanasTalentWitheringFireBarbedShot.name: Barbed Shot
SylvanasTalentWitheringFireBarbedShot.FullTooltip: Hitting the same enemy with <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> shots of Withering Fire causes the <c val="bfd4fd">5th</c> shot to deal <c val="bfd4fd">350%</c> bonus damage.

SylvanasTalentLostSoul.name: Lost Soul
SylvanasTalentLostSoul.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Shadow Dagger cooldown
SylvanasTalentLostSoul.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

SylvanasTalentFesteringWounds.name: Festering Wounds
SylvanasTalentFesteringWounds.FullTooltip: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. Haunting Wave applies <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse.

SylvanasHeroicAbilityWailingArrow.name: Wailing Arrow
SylvanasHeroicAbilityWailingArrow.ShortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and Silences
SylvanasHeroicAbilityWailingArrow.FullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage and Silence enemies in an area for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

SylvanasMindControl.name: Mind Control
SylvanasMindControl.ShortTooltip: Force an enemy Hero to walk towards Sylvanas
SylvanasMindControl.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

SylvanasTalentColdEmbrace.name: Cold Embrace
SylvanasTalentColdEmbrace.FullTooltip: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> and any enemy it spreads to by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

SylvanasTalentWindrunnerHauntingWave.name: Windrunner
SylvanasTalentWindrunnerHauntingWave.ShortTooltip: Haunting Wave casts twice, resets Withering Fire
SylvanasTalentWindrunnerHauntingWave.FullTooltip: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

SylvanasTalentRemorseless.name: Remorseless
SylvanasTalentRemorseless.FullTooltip: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

SylvanasTalentWitheringFireEvasiveFire.name: Evasive Fire
SylvanasTalentWitheringFireEvasiveFire.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

SylvanasTalentLifeDrain.name: Life Drain
SylvanasTalentLifeDrain.FullTooltip: Heal for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

SylvanasTalentWillOfTheForsaken.name: Will of the Forsaken
SylvanasTalentWillOfTheForsaken.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Move Speed
SylvanasTalentWillOfTheForsaken.FullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

SylvanasWailingArrowDeafeningBlast.name: Deafening Blast
SylvanasWailingArrowDeafeningBlast.ShortTooltip: Increases power of Wailing Arrow center
SylvanasWailingArrowDeafeningBlast.FullTooltip: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

SylvanasDarkLadysCall.name: Dark Lady's Call
SylvanasDarkLadysCall.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

SylvanasTalentWitheringBarrage.name: Withering Barrage
SylvanasTalentWitheringBarrage.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.name: Bolt of the Storm
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Tassadar.name: Tassadar
Tassadar.title: Savior of the Templar
Tassadar.SearchText: Tassadar High Templar hightemplar HT Protoss Aiur SC StarCraft 1 SC1 Star1 Starcraft1
Tassadar.Description: A psychic Mage that can deliver area damage from long distances.
Tassadar.InfoText: An Executor without equal, Tassadar has fought tirelessly to purify the Koprulu sector of zerg infestation. Only now, after learning to wield the power of the void, is Tassadar finally ready to face the Overmind and its all-consuming Swarm.

TassadarShockRay.name: Shock Ray
TassadarShockRay.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line
TassadarShockRay.FullTooltip: Channel a beam of Psionic energy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">280~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies in a line by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TassadarPsionicStorm.name: Psionic Storm
TassadarPsionicStorm.FullTooltip: Create a Psionic Storm at the targeted location for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. While in a storm, enemies take <c val="bfd4fd">38~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, increasing by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for each consecutive instance of damage, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TassadarForceWall.name: Force Wall
TassadarForceWall.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">0.5 </c>second delay, create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TassadarArchon.name: Archon
TassadarArchon.FullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Resonance Beam: </c>Deals <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target and splashes <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.

TassadarBlackHole.name: Black Hole
TassadarBlackHole.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun Heroes in long line
TassadarBlackHole.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stuns the target for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

TassadarResonanceBeam.name: Resonance Beam
TassadarResonanceBeam.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks are Channeled, restore Mana
TassadarResonanceBeam.FullTooltip: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Channeled beam that Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. While Channeling, your Basic Attack damage and Mana regeneration increases by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> a second, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. While at full charge, gain an extra <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Mana every second.<n/><n/>This bonus is lost after <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds of not Channeling.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

TassadarArchon.FullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.

TassadarResonanceBeamArcDischargeDummy.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks are Channeled, restore Mana
TassadarResonanceBeamArcDischargeDummy.FullTooltip: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Channeled beam that Slows by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. While Channeling, your Basic Attack damage and Mana regeneration increases by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> a second, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. While at full charge, gain an extra <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Mana every second.<n/><n/>This bonus is lost after <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds of not Channeling.

TassadarStaticCharge.name: Static Charge
TassadarStaticCharge.FullTooltip: Quest: Heroes hit by Shock Ray permanently increases its damage by 5 and grants 33% Resonance Beam charge. Maximum of 250 bonus damage.

TassadarPsionicStormPsiInfusion.name: Psi-Infusion
TassadarPsionicStormPsiInfusion.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Psionic Storm by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c>. Each non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm restores <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> Mana, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> against Heroes.

TassadarKhaydarinAmulet.name: Khaydarin Amulet
TassadarKhaydarinAmulet.FullTooltip: Quest: Resonance Beam charges 50% faster.Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 80 seconds, it bounces to hit 1 additional target for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 160 seconds, it bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.

TassadarInduction.name: Induction
TassadarInduction.FullTooltip: Casting Shock Ray grants Tassadar <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, increase this speed bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

TassadarElectricFence.name: Electric Fence
TassadarElectricFence.ShortTooltip: Force Wall deals damage and Slows
TassadarElectricFence.FullTooltip: Force Wall deals <c val="bfd4fd">92~~0.04~~</c> damage a second to nearby enemies and Slows them by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

TassadarPlasmaShield.name: Plasma Shield
TassadarPlasmaShield.FullTooltip: While Resonance Beam is fully charged, gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of max Health every second, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

TassadarBeamAlignment.name: Beam Alignment
TassadarBeamAlignment.ShortTooltip: Resonance Beam reduces Shock Ray cooldown
TassadarBeamAlignment.FullTooltip: While Resonance Beam is fully charged, Tassadar's Basic Attack range is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> and Shock Ray's cooldown refreshes <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster.

TassadarPsionicEcho.name: Psionic Echo
TassadarPsionicEcho.ShortTooltip: Shock Ray creates Psionic Storm on Hero hit
TassadarPsionicEcho.FullTooltip: Casting Psionic Storm causes your next Shock Ray within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds to only cost <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana and create a Psionic Storm on the first enemy Hero hit.

TassadarArcDischarge.name: Arc Discharge
TassadarArcDischarge.FullTooltip: When Resonance Beam is fully charged, its next instance of damage also creates a Psionic Storm on the target. This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> second cooldown that decays twice as fast while Resonance Beam is fully charged.

TassadarHeroicAbilityArchon.name: Archon
TassadarHeroicAbilityArchon.FullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Resonance Beam: </c>Deals <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target and splashes <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.

TassadarHeroicAbilityBlackHole.name: Black Hole
TassadarHeroicAbilityBlackHole.ShortTooltip: Damage and Stun Heroes in long line
TassadarHeroicAbilityBlackHole.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals <c val="bfd4fd">310~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stuns the target for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

TassadarFeedback.name: Feedback
TassadarFeedback.FullTooltip: When an enemy Hero is affected by Psionic Storm, Resonance Beam's Slow is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and it reduces Physical Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.

TassadarShadowWalk.name: Shadow Walk
TassadarShadowWalk.FullTooltip: Tassadar becomes Stealthed and Unrevealable, but cannot attack or use Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. While this effect is active, gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> increased Movement Speed and <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor.<n/><n/>Can be cast while Channeling Shock Ray.

TassadarOracle.name: Oracle
TassadarOracle.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor, Channel to reveal an area
TassadarOracle.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> While stationary, gain <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds and restore <c val="bfd4fd">12~~0.04~~</c> Health a second.<n/><n/>Activate to Channel for up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, revealing a gradually increasing area anywhere on the map.

TassadarThermalLance.name: Thermal Lance
TassadarThermalLance.FullTooltip: Shock Ray deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> of maximum Health as damage to the first Hero it hits.

TassadarPsychicShock.name: Psychic Shock
TassadarPsychicShock.FullTooltip: Psionic Storm deals damage <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> faster.

TassadarExecutorsWill.name: Executor's Will
TassadarExecutorsWill.FullTooltip: Activate to gain full Resonance Beam charge, <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Spell Power, and cause Basic and Heroic Ability cooldowns to regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> faster. This effect lasts as long as Resonance Beam remains at full charge.

TassadarMasteryTwilightArchon.name: Twilight Archon
TassadarMasteryTwilightArchon.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TassadarKugelblitz.name: Kugelblitz
TassadarKugelblitz.FullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Black Hole's center creates a Psionic Storm at their location.

TassadarMasteryForceBarrier.name: Force Barrier
TassadarMasteryForceBarrier.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Force Wall by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, its range by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

TassadarKhalasGift.name: Khala's Gift
TassadarKhalasGift.ShortTooltip: Nearby Allies grant and gain Spell Power
TassadarKhalasGift.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> Spell Power for yourself and each nearby ally Hero, up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> total Spell Power. Your total bonus is shared with all contributing allies.

Thrall.name: Thrall
Thrall.title: Warchief of the Horde
Thrall.SearchText: Thrall Trall Go'el Goel Warchief Shaman Orc Horde WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Legion Hearthstone HS
Thrall.Description: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.
Thrall.InfoText: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.

ThrallChainLightning.name: Chain Lightning
ThrallChainLightning.FullTooltip: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">162~~0.04~~</c> damage. The lightning then bounces <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times to nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">81~~0.04~~</c> damage to each enemy hit.

ThrallFeralSpirit.name: Feral Spirit
ThrallFeralSpirit.ShortTooltip: Unleash a wolf spirit to burn enemies and Root Heroes
ThrallFeralSpirit.FullTooltip: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals <c val="bfd4fd">153~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

ThrallWindfury.name: Windfury
ThrallWindfury.FullTooltip: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. His next <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>Basic Attacks occur <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

ThrallSundering.name: Sundering
ThrallSundering.ShortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
ThrallSundering.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">290~~0.04~~</c> damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ThrallEarthquake.name: Earthquake
ThrallEarthquake.ShortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
ThrallEarthquake.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Each pulse lasts <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes. Does <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>pulses.

ThrallFrostwolfResilience.name: Frostwolf Resilience
ThrallFrostwolfResilience.ShortTooltip: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health
ThrallFrostwolfResilience.FullTooltip: Dealing damage with Abilities grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for <c val="bfd4fd">223~~0.04~~</c> Health.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ThrallFrostwolfsGrace.name: Frostwolf Resilience
ThrallFrostwolfsGrace.ShortTooltip: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health
ThrallFrostwolfsGrace.FullTooltip: Dealing damage with Abilities grants <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for <c val="bfd4fd">223~~0.04~~</c> Health.

ThrallEchooftheElements.name: Echo of the Elements
ThrallEchooftheElements.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Killing enemies grants Chain Lightning charge
ThrallEchooftheElements.FullTooltip: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

ThrallCrashLightning.name: Crash Lightning
ThrallCrashLightning.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Multiple Hero hits empower Chain Lightning
ThrallCrashLightning.FullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

ThrallMasteryRollingThunder.name: Rolling Thunder
ThrallMasteryRollingThunder.FullTooltip: For <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them grants a stack of Frostwolf Resilience. If the target is an enemy Hero, then he also deals damage to them equal to <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of their maximum Health and healing for the same amount.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>.

ThrallFeralResilience.name: Feral Resilience
ThrallFeralResilience.ShortTooltip: Feral Spirit grants Physical Armor, Frostwolf Resilience
ThrallFeralResilience.FullTooltip: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> stacks of Feral Resilience, granting <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.<n/><n/>Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

ThrallFrostwolfPack.name: Frostwolf Pack
ThrallFrostwolfPack.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Reduce Feral Spirit cooldown, cost
ThrallFrostwolfPack.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

ThrallMasteryManaTide.name: Mana Tide
ThrallMasteryManaTide.ShortTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores Mana, lowers cooldowns
ThrallMasteryManaTide.FullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

ThrallMaelstromWeapon.name: Maelstrom Weapon
ThrallMaelstromWeapon.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest: </c> Windfury attacks increase Move Speed
ThrallMaelstromWeapon.FullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

ThrallAncestralWrath.name: Ancestral Wrath
ThrallAncestralWrath.ShortTooltip: Activate to damage and steal Health from a Hero
ThrallAncestralWrath.FullTooltip: Activate to consume <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of their maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, and healing Thrall for <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> of the damage dealt.<n/><n/>Gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

GenericTalentFollowThrough.name: Follow Through
GenericTalentFollowThrough.FullTooltip: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> additional damage.

ThrallHeroicAbilitySundering.name: Sundering
ThrallHeroicAbilitySundering.ShortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
ThrallHeroicAbilitySundering.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">290~~0.04~~</c> damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ThrallHeroicAbilityEarthquake.name: Earthquake
ThrallHeroicAbilityEarthquake.ShortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
ThrallHeroicAbilityEarthquake.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Each pulse lasts <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes. Does <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>pulses.

ThrallMasteryGraceOfAir.name: Grace Of Air
ThrallMasteryGraceOfAir.FullTooltip: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

ThrallMasteryFrostwolfsGrace.name: Frostwolf's Grace
ThrallMasteryFrostwolfsGrace.ShortTooltip: Activate Frostwolf Resilience to instantly heal
ThrallMasteryFrostwolfsGrace.FullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> of its normal amount.

ThrallSpiritShield.name: Spirit Shield
ThrallSpiritShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

ThrallMasteryTempestFury.name: Tempest Fury
ThrallMasteryTempestFury.FullTooltip: The final strike of Windfury hits <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times for <c val="bfd4fd">75% </c>normal damage.

ThrallThunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
ThrallThunderstorm.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to make Chain Lightning Slow
ThrallThunderstorm.FullTooltip: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

ThrallAlphaWolf.name: Alpha Wolf
ThrallAlphaWolf.ShortTooltip: Feral Spirit has longer Root, empowers Attacks
ThrallAlphaWolf.FullTooltip: For <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">3%</c> of the target's maximum Health as damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ThrallMasteryWorldbreaker.name: Worldbreaker
ThrallMasteryWorldbreaker.FullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ThrallMasteryEarthenShields.name: Earthen Shields
ThrallMasteryEarthenShields.FullTooltip: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

GenericTalentNexusBlades.name: Nexus Blades
GenericTalentNexusBlades.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
GenericTalentNexusBlades.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ThrallWindRush.name: Wind Rush
ThrallWindRush.ShortTooltip: Activate to teleport and gain Windfury
ThrallWindRush.FullTooltip: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

Tinker.name: Gazlowe
Tinker.title: Boss of Ratchet
Tinker.SearchText: Gazlowe Tinker Goblin Horde WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Warlords Draenor WoD BFA Battle for Azeroth
Tinker.Description: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.
Tinker.InfoText: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.

TinkerRockItTurret.name: Rock-It! Turret
TinkerRockItTurret.ShortTooltip: Create a turret that shoots at nearby enemies
TinkerRockItTurret.FullTooltip: Creates a turret that deals <c val="bfd4fd">62~~0.04~~</c> damage. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

TinkerDethLazorCharged.name: Deth Lazor
TinkerDethLazorCharged.ShortTooltip: Charge and shoot a laser. Damage and range increases the longer it is charged
TinkerDethLazorCharged.FullTooltip: Charged attack that deals <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> after <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

TinkerXplodiumBomb.name: Xplodium Charge
TinkerXplodiumBomb.ShortTooltip: Throw a timed bomb which stuns and damages enemies in an area
TinkerXplodiumBomb.FullTooltip: Places a bomb that deals <c val="bfd4fd">233~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within target area after <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds, stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

TinkerGravOBomb3000.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
TinkerGravOBomb3000.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal <c val="bfd4fd">251~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TinkerRoboGoblin.name: Robo-Goblin
TinkerRoboGoblin.ShortTooltip: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed
TinkerRoboGoblin.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor and <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage.

TinkerDismantleTurret.name: Salvager
TinkerDismantleTurret.ShortTooltip: Turrets and enemy Structures drop Scrap that restore Mana and reduce cooldowns
TinkerDismantleTurret.FullTooltip: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. <n/><n/>Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

TinkerFocusTurrets.name: Focus Turrets!
TinkerFocusTurrets.ShortTooltip: Order turrets to attack a target.
TinkerFocusTurrets.FullTooltip: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

TinkerMasteryExtraTNT.name: Extra TNT
TinkerMasteryExtraTNT.FullTooltip: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> per target hit, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TinkerCombatStyleScrapoMaticSmelter.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
TinkerCombatStyleScrapoMaticSmelter.FullTooltip: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TinkerCombatStyleBreakitDown.name: Break it Down!
TinkerCombatStyleBreakitDown.FullTooltip: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TinkerGoblinRepairs.name: Goblin Repairs
TinkerGoblinRepairs.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase Health Regen
TinkerGoblinRepairs.FullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25.Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

TinkerCombatStyleClockwerkSteamFists.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
TinkerCombatStyleClockwerkSteamFists.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Basic Attacks increase Rock-It! Turret duration
TinkerCombatStyleClockwerkSteamFists.FullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

TinkerMasteryARKReaktor.name: ARK Reaktor
TinkerMasteryARKReaktor.ShortTooltip: Reduces Xplodium Charge cooldown, can give turret charges
TinkerMasteryARKReaktor.FullTooltip: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2 </c>seconds. If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges of Rock-It! Turret.

TinkerCombatStyleReduceReuseRecycle.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
TinkerCombatStyleReduceReuseRecycle.FullTooltip: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a <c val="bfd4fd">15% </c>chance to drop Scrap.

TinkerHiredGoons.name: Hired Goons
TinkerHiredGoons.ShortTooltip: Empower nearby Mercenaries. Turrets gain Merc Armor
TinkerHiredGoons.FullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

TinkerMasteryRockitTurretXL.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
TinkerMasteryRockitTurretXL.FullTooltip: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> damage.

TinkerMasteryEngineGunk.name: Engine Gunk
TinkerMasteryEngineGunk.FullTooltip: Rock-It! Turret attacks Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TinkerMasteryHyperfocusCoils.name: Hyperfocus Coils
TinkerMasteryHyperfocusCoils.FullTooltip: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> and it charges twice as fast.

TinkerHeroicAbilityRoboGoblin.name: Robo-Goblin
TinkerHeroicAbilityRoboGoblin.ShortTooltip: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed
TinkerHeroicAbilityRoboGoblin.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor and <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> bonus damage.

TinkerHeroicAbilityGravOBomb3000.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
TinkerHeroicAbilityGravOBomb3000.FullTooltip: After a <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal <c val="bfd4fd">251~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TinkerMasteryEZPZDimensionalRipper.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
TinkerMasteryEZPZDimensionalRipper.FullTooltip: Deth Lazor Slows Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and Stuns non-Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TinkerMasteryGoblinFusion.name: Goblin Fusion
TinkerMasteryGoblinFusion.FullTooltip: Deth Lazor can be charged for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TinkerMasteryXTraLargeBombs.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
TinkerMasteryXTraLargeBombs.ShortTooltip: Xplodium Charge casts when Stunned, Rooted
TinkerMasteryXTraLargeBombs.FullTooltip: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> second cooldown.

TinkerMasteryTurretStorage.name: Turret Storage
TinkerMasteryTurretStorage.FullTooltip: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c>.

TinkerSuperiorSchematics.name: Superior Schematics
TinkerSuperiorSchematics.FullTooltip: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased range while he is within their attack range.

TinkerMasteryQuikReleaseCharge.name: Kwik Release Charge
TinkerMasteryQuikReleaseCharge.FullTooltip: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

TinkerMasteryMechaLord.name: Mecha-Lord
TinkerMasteryMechaLord.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor.

TinkerMasteryMiniatureBlackHole.name: Miniature Black Hole
TinkerMasteryMiniatureBlackHole.FullTooltip: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and damage by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

TinkerTalentFirinMahLazorz.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
TinkerTalentFirinMahLazorz.FullTooltip: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals <c val="bfd4fd">137~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TinkerItsRainingScrap.name: It's Raining Scrap
TinkerItsRainingScrap.FullTooltip: Activate to create <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Scrap around Gazlowe over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

Tracer.name: Tracer
Tracer.title: Agent of Overwatch
Tracer.SearchText: Tracer Lena Oxton Human Overwatch OW
Tracer.Description: A mobile Assassin who picks off straggling enemies, finishing them off.
Tracer.InfoText: Lena Oxton (call sign: "Tracer"), is both an adventurer and an irrepressible force for good. With the ability to alter her own time at will, she fights the good fight wherever she goes--even the Nexus. Don't worry, loves. The cavalry's finally here.<n/><n/>Tracer is FREE to purchasers of Overwatch™: Origins Edition

TracerBlink.name: Blink
TracerBlink.FullTooltip: Dash towards an area.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

TracerMelee.name: Melee
TracerMelee.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">220~~0.04~~</c> damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> against Heroes.

TracerRecall.name: Recall
TracerRecall.ShortTooltip: Return to a recent location and remove negative effects
TracerRecall.FullTooltip: Tracer returns to the position she was at <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.

TracerPulseBomb.name: Pulse Bomb
TracerPulseBomb.ShortTooltip: Attach a bomb to enemies that deals heavy damage
TracerPulseBomb.FullTooltip: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds dealing <c val="bfd4fd">288~~0.06~~</c> damage to them and <c val="bfd4fd">144~~0.06~~</c> damage to other nearby enemies.<n/><n/>This ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

TracerReload.name: Reload
TracerReload.ShortTooltip: Tracer can move while Basic Attacking; Basic Attacks cost ammo
TracerReload.FullTooltip: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times she needs to reload over <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.<n/><n/>Basic Attacks heal Tracer for <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of the damage dealt.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

TracerLockedandLoadedFailReload.name: Locked and Loaded
TracerLockedandLoadedFailReload.ShortTooltip: Time Reload perfectly to gain Basic Attack damage
TracerLockedandLoadedFailReload.FullTooltip: Reactivate Reload within the last <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for that magazine.

TracerLockedandLoaded.name: Locked and Loaded
TracerLockedandLoaded.ShortTooltip: Time Reload perfectly to gain Basic Attack damage
TracerLockedandLoaded.FullTooltip: Reactivate Reload within the last <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for that magazine.

TracerOneTwoPunch.name: One-Two Punch
TracerOneTwoPunch.ShortTooltip: Melee gains an additional charge, reduced cooldown
TracerOneTwoPunch.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Melee by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and it gains an additional charge.

TracerPartingGift.name: Parting Gift
TracerPartingGift.FullTooltip: Recall leaves behind <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> bombs that deal <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> damage each to different targets. Each Hero hit with these bombs grants <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Pulse Bomb charge.

TracerTracerRounds.name: Tracer Rounds
TracerTracerRounds.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>. Basic Attacks against Heroes reveal a small area around them for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TracerLeechingRounds.name: Leeching Rounds
TracerLeechingRounds.ShortTooltip: Blink charges increase Basic Attack healing
TracerLeechingRounds.FullTooltip: Increase the Life Leech on your Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> for each Blink charge you currently have.

TracerPulseGenerator.name: Pulse Generator
TracerPulseGenerator.ShortTooltip: Pulse Bomb heals Tracer, refreshes Blink charge
TracerPulseGenerator.FullTooltip: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero heals Tracer for <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of her maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds and refunds a charge of Blink.

TracerIsThataHealthPack.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
TracerIsThataHealthPack.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><n/>Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cooldown of Healing Fountain by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

TracerSleightofHand.name: Sleight of Hand
TracerSleightofHand.FullTooltip: Reduces Reload time by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. This equals <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more damage per second.

TracerFocusFire.name: Focus Fire
TracerFocusFire.ShortTooltip: Unloading a magazine on an enemy does bonus damage
TracerFocusFire.FullTooltip: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal <c val="bfd4fd">84~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage. This is equal to <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of the total magazine.

TracerLockedandLoaded.name: Locked and Loaded
TracerLockedandLoaded.ShortTooltip: Time Reload perfectly to gain Basic Attack damage
TracerLockedandLoaded.FullTooltip: Reactivate Reload within the last <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for that magazine.

TracerStickyBomb.name: Sticky Bomb
TracerStickyBomb.ShortTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb area and adds Slow
TracerStickyBomb.FullTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and enemies hit are Slowed by <c val="bfd4fd">70%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TracerQuantumSpike.name: Quantum Spike
TracerQuantumSpike.FullTooltip: Pulse Bomb deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

TracerPulseRounds.name: Pulse Rounds
TracerPulseRounds.ShortTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb range and charge rate
TracerPulseRounds.FullTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TracerUntouchable.name: Untouchable
TracerUntouchable.FullTooltip: Passive: After Blinking, gain 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 5%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

TracerJumper.name: Jumper
TracerJumper.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive</c>: When Blink has no charges remaining, its cooldown refreshes <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> faster.<n/><n/>Casting Blink grants Tracer a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> of her maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. This Shield stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

TracerTelefrag.name: Telefrag
TracerTelefrag.ShortTooltip: Damage and knockback on Recall arrival
TracerTelefrag.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Recall by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>When Tracer arrives at her Recall location, nearby enemies are knocked back and take <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TracerBulletSprayMelee.name: Bullet Spray
TracerBulletSprayMelee.ShortTooltip: Melee hits all enemies in range
TracerBulletSprayMelee.FullTooltip: Increases the radius of Melee by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

TracerHeavyHanded.name: Heavy Handed
TracerHeavyHanded.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Melee have their Armor reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TracerRicochetHeroWeapon.name: Ricochet
TracerRicochetHeroWeapon.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks can bounce to a nearby enemy
TracerRicochetHeroWeapon.FullTooltip: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

TracerChronoTriggers.name: Chrono Triggers
TracerChronoTriggers.FullTooltip: Casting Blink causes Basic Attacks to not consume ammo for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

TracerGetStuffedMelee.name: Get Stuffed!
TracerGetStuffedMelee.FullTooltip: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge against Heroes from <c val="bfd4fd">12%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">24%</c>. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knock the target away.

TracerTotalRecallRecall.name: Total Recall
TracerTotalRecallRecall.FullTooltip: Recall heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

TracerCompositionBPulseBomb.name: Composition B
TracerCompositionBPulseBomb.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Pulse Bomb leaves a second
TracerCompositionBPulseBomb.FullTooltip: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage and explodes slightly earlier.

Tychus.name: Tychus
Tychus.title: Notorious Outlaw
Tychus.SearchText: Tychus Findlay Marine Outlaw Terran SC2 SC 2 II StarCraft Wings of Liberty WoL Star2 Starcraft2
Tychus.Description: An Assassin who shreds High Health enemies.
Tychus.InfoText: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.

TychusOverkillTargeted.name: Overkill
TychusOverkillTargeted.ShortTooltip: Attack one target while moving, damaging nearby enemies as well
TychusOverkillTargeted.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">552~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target and <c val="bfd4fd">276~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby targets over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while Channeling.

TychusGrenade.name: Frag Grenade
TychusGrenade.ShortTooltip: Throw a grenade, damaging and knocking back enemies
TychusGrenade.FullTooltip: Lob a grenade that deals <c val="bfd4fd">256~~0.04~~ </c>damage, knocking enemies away.

TychusDrakkenLaserDrill.name: Drakken Laser Drill
TychusDrakkenLaserDrill.ShortTooltip: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies
TychusDrakkenLaserDrill.FullTooltip: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">142~~0.04~~</c> damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">22</c> seconds.

TychusOdinNoHealth.name: Commandeer Odin
TychusOdinNoHealth.ShortTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot
TychusOdinNoHealth.FullTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">23</c> seconds.

TychusMinigun.name: Minigun
TychusMinigun.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage to Heroes
TychusMinigun.FullTooltip: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of their maximum Health. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

TychusDrakkenLaserDrillIssueOrder.name: Laser Drill Issue Order
TychusDrakkenLaserDrillIssueOrder.FullTooltip: Order the Laser Drill to attack a new target.

TychusOdinAnnihilate.name: Annihilate
TychusOdinAnnihilate.FullTooltip: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">196~~0.04~~</c> damage to everything in the path.

TychusOdinRagnarokMissilesTargeted.name: Ragnarok Missiles
TychusOdinRagnarokMissilesTargeted.FullTooltip: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">132~~0.04~~</c> damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

OverkillTargetedRetarget.name: Overkill Retarget
OverkillTargetedRetarget.FullTooltip: Focuses Overkill on a different target.

TychusMinigunActive.name: Minigun
TychusMinigunActive.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage to Heroes
TychusMinigunActive.FullTooltip: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of their maximum Health. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TychusPressTheAdvantage.name: Press the Advantage
TychusPressTheAdvantage.ShortTooltip: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range
TychusPressTheAdvantage.FullTooltip: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

TychusMasteryRunandGunDash.name: Dash
TychusMasteryRunandGunDash.ShortTooltip: Increase Run and Gun Range, Movement Speed
TychusMasteryRunandGunDash.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Run and Gun by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

TychusCombatTactician.name: Combat Tactician
TychusCombatTactician.ShortTooltip: Run and Gun reduces Minigun cooldown
TychusCombatTactician.FullTooltip: Casting Run And Gun reduces the cooldown of Minigun by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

TychusInTheRhythm.name: In the Rhythm
TychusInTheRhythm.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Basic Attacks increase Minigun duration
TychusInTheRhythm.FullTooltip: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

TychusTheBiggerTheyAre.name: The Bigger They Are...
TychusTheBiggerTheyAre.ShortTooltip: Lowers cooldown and increases damage of Minigun
TychusTheBiggerTheyAre.FullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Increase the damage bonus to <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> while enemy Heroes are above <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

TychusMasterAssassin.name: Master Assassin
TychusMasterAssassin.FullTooltip: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

TychusMasteryQuarterback.name: Quarterback
TychusMasteryQuarterback.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

TychusMasteryFragGrenadeConcussionGrenad.name: Concussion Grenade
TychusMasteryFragGrenadeConcussionGrenad.ShortTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade radius and knockback
TychusMasteryFragGrenadeConcussionGrenad.FullTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and the knockback distance by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TychusRelentlessSoldier.name: Relentless Soldier
TychusRelentlessSoldier.FullTooltip: Being Stunned or Rooted grants <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

TychusHeroicAbilityCommandeerOdin.name: Commandeer Odin
TychusHeroicAbilityCommandeerOdin.ShortTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot
TychusHeroicAbilityCommandeerOdin.FullTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">23</c> seconds.

TychusHeroicAbilityDrakkenLaserDrill.name: Drakken Laser Drill
TychusHeroicAbilityDrakkenLaserDrill.ShortTooltip: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies
TychusHeroicAbilityDrakkenLaserDrill.FullTooltip: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">142~~0.04~~</c> damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">22</c> seconds.

TychusThatsTheStuff.name: That's the Stuff!
TychusThatsTheStuff.FullTooltip: Minigun heals Tychus for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

TychusNeosteelCoating.name: Neosteel Coating
TychusNeosteelCoating.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

TychusMasteryFragGrenadeTitanGrenade.name: Titan Grenade
TychusMasteryFragGrenadeTitanGrenade.ShortTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade damage to Heroes
TychusMasteryFragGrenadeTitanGrenade.FullTooltip: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> of their maximum Health.

TychusMasteryLeadRain.name: Lead Rain
TychusMasteryLeadRain.FullTooltip: Overkill also Slows enemy Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

TychusMasteryOverkillArmorPiercingRounds.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
TychusMasteryOverkillArmorPiercingRounds.ShortTooltip: Increases Overkill damage to main target
TychusMasteryOverkillArmorPiercingRounds.FullTooltip: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

TychusMasteryOdinBigRedButton.name: Big Red Button
TychusMasteryOdinBigRedButton.ShortTooltip: Increases Odin duration and fires Nukes
TychusMasteryOdinBigRedButton.FullTooltip: Odin lasts <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds later, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage in its area.

TychusMasteryDrakkenLaserFocusingDiodes.name: Focusing Diodes
TychusMasteryDrakkenLaserFocusingDiodes.ShortTooltip: Increase Laser Drill range and damage
TychusMasteryDrakkenLaserFocusingDiodes.FullTooltip: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> extra damage.

TychusSizzlinAttacks.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
TychusSizzlinAttacks.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage to Heroes
TychusSizzlinAttacks.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

TychusRunAndGunBobAndWeave.name: Bob and Weave
TychusRunAndGunBobAndWeave.ShortTooltip: Adds Run and Gun charges and reduces Mana cost
TychusRunAndGunBobAndWeave.FullTooltip: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c>. Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">25</c>.

Tyrael.name: Tyrael
Tyrael.title: Archangel of Justice
Tyrael.SearchText: Tyrael Angel Justice D2 D3 Diablo2 Diablo3 Diablo 2 3 III Lord of Destruction LoD Reaper of Souls RoS
Tyrael.Description: A Tank who pairs well with allies that like to dive into the enemy team.<n/>
Tyrael.InfoText: Among the angels it is the Archangel of Justice Tyrael who is humanity's greatest defender. Wielding his sword El'druin against the Burning Hells, the Prime Evils would have enslaved humanity long ago if Tyrael had not intervened.

TyraelElDruinsMight.name: El'druin's Might
TyraelElDruinsMight.ShortTooltip: Slow and damage enemies in an area. Use ability again to teleport to the area
TyraelElDruinsMight.FullTooltip: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds. It can be reactivated within <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.

TyraelRighteousness.name: Righteousness
TyraelRighteousness.FullTooltip: Shields Tyrael for <c val="bfd4fd">336~~0.04~~</c> damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> as much for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TyraelSmite.name: Smite
TyraelSmite.ShortTooltip: Damage an area and speed up nearby allies
TyraelSmite.FullTooltip: Rake target area for <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TyraelJudgement.name: Judgment
TyraelJudgement.ShortTooltip: Charge and Stun an enemy Hero
TyraelJudgement.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TyraelSanctificationStationary.name: Sanctification
TyraelSanctificationStationary.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TyraelArchangelsWrathDummy.name: Archangel's Wrath
TyraelArchangelsWrathDummy.ShortTooltip: Upon dying, become invulnerable and explode
TyraelArchangelsWrathDummy.FullTooltip: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and explode for <c val="bfd4fd">550~~0.04~~</c> damage after <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. Each enemy Hero hit by this effect reduces Tyrael's death timer by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ElDruinsMightEldruinsFlash.name: El'druin's Flash
ElDruinsMightEldruinsFlash.FullTooltip: Teleport to El'druin, slowing nearby enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TyraelSalvation.name: Salvation
TyraelSalvation.ShortTooltip: Empower Righteousness, heal if Shield destroyed
TyraelSalvation.FullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> and heal Tyrael for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

TyraelJusticeForAll.name: Justice for All
TyraelJusticeForAll.FullTooltip: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

TyraelArdentRestoration.name: Ardent Restoration
TyraelArdentRestoration.FullTooltip: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> times.

TyraelStalwartAngel.name: Stalwart Angel
TyraelStalwartAngel.ShortTooltip: El'druin's Might grants Armor while active
TyraelStalwartAngel.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after teleporting.

TyraelElDruinsMightBoundByLaw.name: Bound by Law
TyraelElDruinsMightBoundByLaw.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks increase El'druin's Might Slow duration
TyraelElDruinsMightBoundByLaw.FullTooltip: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TyraelDivineVigor.name: Divine Vigor
TyraelDivineVigor.ShortTooltip: Smite causes Basic Attacks to heal
TyraelDivineVigor.FullTooltip: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds heal for <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> of the damage dealt.

TyraelMasteryRighteousnessReciprocate.name: Reciprocate
TyraelMasteryRighteousnessReciprocate.FullTooltip: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

TyraelMasteryPurgeEvil.name: Purge Evil
TyraelMasteryPurgeEvil.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TyraelMasterySwiftRetribution.name: Swift Retribution
TyraelMasterySwiftRetribution.ShortTooltip: Increase Smite Move Speed, grants Attack Speed
TyraelMasterySwiftRetribution.FullTooltip: Smite grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more Movement Speed and also grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TyraelHeroicAbilityJudgement.name: Judgment
TyraelHeroicAbilityJudgement.ShortTooltip: Charge and Stun an enemy Hero
TyraelHeroicAbilityJudgement.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stunning them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage.

TyraelHeroicAbilitySanctification.name: Sanctification
TyraelHeroicAbilitySanctification.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.
