TyraelMasteryElDruinsMightSwordOfJustice.name: Sword of Justice
TyraelMasteryElDruinsMightSwordOfJustice.FullTooltip: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

TyraelMasteryHolyGround.name: Holy Ground
TyraelMasteryHolyGround.ShortTooltip: El'druin's Might teleport makes a blocking field
TyraelMasteryHolyGround.FullTooltip: Create a ring for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

TyraelMasteryLawAndOrder.name: Law and Order
TyraelMasteryLawAndOrder.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

TyraelHoradricReforging.name: Horadric Reforging
TyraelHoradricReforging.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce El'druin's Might cooldown
TyraelHoradricReforging.FullTooltip: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

TyraelBurningHalo.name: Burning Halo
TyraelBurningHalo.ShortTooltip: El'druin and Tyrael damage nearby enemies
TyraelBurningHalo.FullTooltip: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal <c val="bfd4fd">18~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

TyraelSmiteTheWicked.name: Smite the Wicked
TyraelSmiteTheWicked.ShortTooltip: El'druin's Might increases Smite cooldown rate
TyraelSmiteTheWicked.FullTooltip: While El'druin's Might is active, and for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> faster.

TyraelMasteryJudgmentAngelofJustice.name: Angel of Justice
TyraelMasteryJudgmentAngelofJustice.ShortTooltip: Judgment has increased range, reduced cooldown
TyraelMasteryJudgmentAngelofJustice.FullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Judgment by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and reduces the cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds.

TyraelMasterySanctificationHolyArena.name: Holy Arena
TyraelMasterySanctificationHolyArena.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Sanctification by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and increase the damage of allies inside by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

TyraelSealOfElDruin.name: Seal of El'druin
TyraelSealOfElDruin.FullTooltip: Using a Basic Ability grants <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TyraelDefenseOfTheAngels.name: Defense of the Angels
TyraelDefenseOfTheAngels.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Each time Tyrael damages an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Basic Ability, increase the duration of this Armor bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

Tyrande.name: Tyrande
Tyrande.title: High Priestess of Elune
Tyrande.SearchText: Tyrande Whisperwind Priestess Elune Night Elf High Huntress Alliance WoW World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Frozen Throne FT Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS
Tyrande.Description: A Healer who helps her allies lockdown and finish off enemies.
Tyrande.InfoText: Tyrande Whisperwind strikes fear into all who wish ill of the Kaldorei. As the highest ranking Sentinel and High Priestess of Elune, she is not only the night elves' most deadly warrior, but also their most cunning leader.

TyrandeLightofElune.name: Light of Elune
TyrandeLightofElune.FullTooltip: Heal an ally Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">255~~0.04~~</c>. Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds every time Tyrande damages an enemy.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

TyrandeSentinelShot.name: Sentinel
TyrandeSentinelShot.ShortTooltip: Fire a scouting Owl that reveals and damages enemy Heroes
TyrandeSentinelShot.FullTooltip: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for <c val="bfd4fd">5 </c>seconds.

TyrandeLunarFlare.name: Lunar Flare
TyrandeLunarFlare.ShortTooltip: Stun and damage enemies in an area
TyrandeLunarFlare.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, deal <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun enemies in the target area for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75 </c>seconds.

TyrandeShadowstalk.name: Shadowstalk
TyrandeShadowstalk.FullTooltip: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds and heal them for <c val="bfd4fd">380~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

TyrandeStarfall.name: Starfall
TyrandeStarfall.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
TyrandeStarfall.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">92~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> in an area. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

TyrandeHuntersMark.name: Hunter's Mark
TyrandeHuntersMark.ShortTooltip: Lowers Armor and Reveals Marked target
TyrandeHuntersMark.FullTooltip: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

TyrandeRanger.name: Ranger
TyrandeRanger.ShortTooltip: Sentinel pierces and deals more damage
TyrandeRanger.FullTooltip: Sentinel pierces the first Hero hit. Its width is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and deals up to <c val="bfd4fd">250%</c> more damage based on distance traveled.

TyrandeMasteryLunarBlaze.name: Lunar Blaze
TyrandeMasteryLunarBlaze.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Lunar Flare range, damage
TyrandeMasteryLunarBlaze.FullTooltip: Increase Lunar Flare's range by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.<n/><n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

TyrandeTrueshotAura.name: Trueshot Aura
TyrandeTrueshotAura.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Damage, reset Hunter's Mark
TyrandeTrueshotAura.FullTooltip: <c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attack damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.<n/><n/>Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark, increase the bonus of Trueshot Aura to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>, and apply it to other nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

TyrandeLightOfEluneEverlastingLight.name: Everlasting Light
TyrandeLightOfEluneEverlastingLight.ShortTooltip: Increase Light of Elune healing on multiple targets
TyrandeLightOfEluneEverlastingLight.FullTooltip: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c> more.

TyrandeMarkofMending.name: Mark of Mending
TyrandeMarkofMending.FullTooltip: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5%</c> of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of their maximum Health.

TyrandeElunesChosen.name: Elune's Chosen
TyrandeElunesChosen.FullTooltip: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">175%</c> of the damage dealt. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

TyrandeMoonlitArrows.name: Moonlit Arrows
TyrandeMoonlitArrows.ShortTooltip: Increase Light of Elune cooldown reduction
TyrandeMoonlitArrows.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

TyrandeKaldoreiResistance.name: Kaldorei Resistance
TyrandeKaldoreiResistance.ShortTooltip: Light of Elune grants Spell Armor
TyrandeKaldoreiResistance.FullTooltip: Light of Elune grants the target <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. This effect stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> times.

TyrandeHuntressFury.name: Huntress' Fury
TyrandeHuntressFury.ShortTooltip: Hunter's Mark makes Basic Attacks splash
TyrandeHuntressFury.FullTooltip: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemy Heroes.

TyrandeHeroicAbilityShadowstalk.name: Shadowstalk
TyrandeHeroicAbilityShadowstalk.FullTooltip: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds and heal them for <c val="bfd4fd">380~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

TyrandeHeroicAbilityStarfall.name: Starfall
TyrandeHeroicAbilityStarfall.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
TyrandeHeroicAbilityStarfall.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">92~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> in an area. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

TyrandeMasteryLightofEluneQuickeningBles.name: Quickening Blessing
TyrandeMasteryLightofEluneQuickeningBles.ShortTooltip: Light of Elune increases Movement Speed
TyrandeMasteryLightofEluneQuickeningBles.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

TyrandeHarshMoonlight.name: Harsh Moonlight
TyrandeHarshMoonlight.ShortTooltip: Sentinel Slows and reduces damage dealt
TyrandeHarshMoonlight.FullTooltip: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> and reduces their damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TyrandeRangersMark.name: Ranger's Mark
TyrandeRangersMark.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks empower Hunter's Mark, Lunar Flare
TyrandeRangersMark.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

TyrandeCelestialAttunement.name: Celestial Attunement
TyrandeCelestialAttunement.ShortTooltip: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows
TyrandeCelestialAttunement.FullTooltip: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

TyrandeEmpower.name: Empower
TyrandeEmpower.ShortTooltip: Sentinel cooldown reduced, deals percent damage
TyrandeEmpower.FullTooltip: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> of their maximum Health.

TyrandeDarnassianArchery.name: Darnassian Archery
TyrandeDarnassianArchery.ShortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal more damage
TyrandeDarnassianArchery.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> increased Attack Damage bonus for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

TyrandeEyesOfTheHuntress.name: Eyes of the Huntress
TyrandeEyesOfTheHuntress.FullTooltip: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds and heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more.

TyrandeMasteryStarfallCelestialWrath.name: Celestial Wrath
TyrandeMasteryStarfallCelestialWrath.ShortTooltip: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark and Slows more
TyrandeMasteryStarfallCelestialWrath.FullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Starfall to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> and cause it to apply Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

TyrandeShootingStar.name: Shooting Star
TyrandeShootingStar.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically cast Lunar Flare
TyrandeShootingStar.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>. Every <c val="bfd4fd">8th</c> Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

TyrandeIcebladeArrows.name: Iceblade Arrows
TyrandeIcebladeArrows.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, reduce enemy damage dealt
TyrandeIcebladeArrows.FullTooltip: Increase Attack Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">8%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. This effect stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> times.

Uther.name: Uther
Uther.title: The Lightbringer
Uther.SearchText: Uther Paladin Lightbringer Human Alliance WoW War2 WC2 Warcraft2 2 II Tides of Darkness ToD World of Warcraft War3 WC3 Warcraft3 III 3 Reign of Chaos RoC Hearthstone HS
Uther.Description: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.
Uther.InfoText: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.

UtherHolyLight.name: Holy Light
UtherHolyLight.ShortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero and Uther
UtherHolyLight.FullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">362~~0.04~~</c> Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for <c val="bfd4fd">181~~0.04~~</c> Health.

UtherHolyRadiance.name: Holy Radiance
UtherHolyRadiance.ShortTooltip: Heal allies and damage enemies in a line
UtherHolyRadiance.FullTooltip: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for <c val="bfd4fd">177~~0.04~~</c> Health, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">177~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.

UtherHammerOfJustice.name: Hammer of Justice
UtherHammerOfJustice.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">109~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun the target for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

UtherDivineIntervention.name: Divine Shield
UtherDivineIntervention.ShortTooltip: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed<n/>
UtherDivineIntervention.FullTooltip: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

UtherDivineStorm.name: Divine Storm
UtherDivineStorm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

UtherEternalDevotion.name: Devotion
UtherEternalDevotion.ShortTooltip: Uther's healing grants Armor, and when killed his spirit remains
UtherEternalDevotion.FullTooltip: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.<n/><n/><s val="cbe8ff-ffffff" name="StandardTooltipHeader">Eternal Vanguard</s><n/><n/>Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

UtherHolyShock.name: Holy Light
UtherHolyShock.ShortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero and Uther
UtherHolyShock.FullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">362~~0.04~~</c> Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for <c val="bfd4fd">181~~0.04~~</c> Health.

UtherFlashofLight.name: Flash of Light
UtherFlashofLight.FullTooltip: Heal an ally for <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> Health.

UtherHolyLightSilverTouch.name: Silver Touch
UtherHolyLightSilverTouch.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Mitigate damage to improve Holy Light
UtherHolyLightSilverTouch.FullTooltip: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.

UtherMasteryWaveofLightHolyRadiance.name: Wave of Light
UtherMasteryWaveofLightHolyRadiance.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Holy Radiance increases Devotion duration
UtherMasteryWaveofLightHolyRadiance.FullTooltip: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

UtherCombatStyleHammerOfTheLightbringer.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
UtherCombatStyleHammerOfTheLightbringer.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Reduce Hammer of Justice cooldown
UtherCombatStyleHammerOfTheLightbringer.FullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

UtherMasteryHolyShock.name: Holy Shock
UtherMasteryHolyShock.FullTooltip: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, and it refunds <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> Mana.

UtherHammerOfJusticePursuitOfJustice.name: Pursuit of Justice
UtherHammerOfJusticePursuitOfJustice.ShortTooltip: Hammer of Justice grants Move Speed
UtherHammerOfJusticePursuitOfJustice.FullTooltip: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

UtherHolyFire.name: Holy Fire
UtherHolyFire.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">13~~0.04~~</c> damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by<c val="bfd4fd"> 20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. This can stack up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

UtherEternalDevotionArmorOfFaith.name: Armor of Faith
UtherEternalDevotionArmorOfFaith.ShortTooltip: Holy Light recharges faster while disabled
UtherEternalDevotionArmorOfFaith.FullTooltip: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther <c val="bfd4fd">90</c> Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> faster for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> second cooldown.

UtherEternalDevotionGuardianOfAncientKin.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
UtherEternalDevotionGuardianOfAncientKin.ShortTooltip: Increase Devotion's Armor on disabled targets
UtherEternalDevotionGuardianOfAncientKin.FullTooltip: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c>.

UtherHandOfProtection.name: Hand of Protection
UtherHandOfProtection.FullTooltip: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

UtherHeroicAbilityDivineShield.name: Divine Shield
UtherHeroicAbilityDivineShield.ShortTooltip: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed<n/>
UtherHeroicAbilityDivineShield.FullTooltip: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

UtherHeroicAbilityDivineStorm.name: Divine Storm
UtherHeroicAbilityDivineStorm.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c> damage and Stun nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">1.75</c> seconds.

UtherMasteryBlessedChampion.name: Blessed Champion
UtherMasteryBlessedChampion.ShortTooltip: Holy Light makes Basic Attacks heal
UtherMasteryBlessedChampion.FullTooltip: For the next <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

UtherHammerOfJusticeWellMet.name: Well Met
UtherHammerOfJusticeWellMet.FullTooltip: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenericTalentSpellShield.name: Spell Shield
GenericTalentSpellShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

UtherBeaconOfLight.name: Beacon of Light
UtherBeaconOfLight.FullTooltip: While below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, Uther receives <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

UtherHolyRadianceTyrsDeliverance.name: Tyr's Deliverance
UtherHolyRadianceTyrsDeliverance.FullTooltip: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> increased healing from all sources for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

UtherMasteryBenediction.name: Benediction
UtherMasteryBenediction.ShortTooltip: Reduce Mana cost, cooldown of next ability
UtherMasteryBenediction.FullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">50 </c>and its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

UtherMasteryBulwarkOfLightDivineShield.name: Bulwark of Light
UtherMasteryBulwarkOfLightDivineShield.ShortTooltip: Increase Divine Shield duration, applied to nearby allies
UtherMasteryBulwarkOfLightDivineShield.FullTooltip: Divine Shield is also applied to all nearby allied Heroes and lasts <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second longer.

UtherMasteryDivineHurricaneDivineStorm.name: Divine Hurricane
UtherMasteryDivineHurricaneDivineStorm.ShortTooltip: Increase Divine Storm radius, reduce cooldown
UtherMasteryDivineHurricaneDivineStorm.FullTooltip: Divine Storm's radius is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds.

UtherMasteryRedemption.name: Redemption
UtherMasteryRedemption.FullTooltip: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of his maximum Health.<n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">180</c> second cooldown.

UtherEternalDevotionDivineProtection.name: Divine Protection
UtherEternalDevotionDivineProtection.FullTooltip: Increase Devotion's Armor to <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> and its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

Valeera.name: Valeera
Valeera.title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
Valeera.SearchText: Valera Sanguinar Rogue Blood Elf WoW World of Warcraft Legion Hearthstone HS
Valeera.Description: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.
Valeera.InfoText: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.

ValeeraSinisterStrike.name: Sinister Strike
ValeeraSinisterStrike.ShortTooltip: Dash forward, damaging enemies in a line
ValeeraSinisterStrike.FullTooltip: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/><c val="ff5858">Awards 1 Combo Point</c>.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Stealth: Ambush</c><n/>Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.

ValeeraBladeFlurry.name: Blade Flurry
ValeeraBladeFlurry.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage in an area around Valeera. <n/><n/><c val="ff5858">Awards 1 Combo Point</c> per enemy Hero hit.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Stealth: Cheap Shot</c><n/>Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.

ValeeraEviscerate.name: Eviscerate
ValeeraEviscerate.FullTooltip: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per <c val="ff5858">Combo Point</c>. <n/><n/><c val="ff5858">1 Point</c>: <c val="bfd4fd">85~~0.04~~</c><n/><c val="ff5858">2 Points</c>: <c val="bfd4fd">170~~0.04~~</c><n/><c val="ff5858">3 Points</c>: <c val="bfd4fd">255~~0.04~~</c><n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Stealth: Garrote</c><n/>Silence and damage an enemy over time.

ValeeraCloakOfShadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
ValeeraCloakOfShadows.FullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

ValeeraSmokeBomb.name: Smoke Bomb
ValeeraSmokeBomb.ShortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
ValeeraSmokeBomb.FullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

ValeeraStealth.name: Vanish
ValeeraStealth.FullTooltip: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.<n/><n/>After being Stealthed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ValeeraAmbush.name: Ambush
ValeeraAmbush.ShortTooltip: Damage an enemy and reduce their Armor
ValeeraAmbush.FullTooltip: Ambush an enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">130~~0.04~~</c> damage and reducing their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ff5858">Awards 1 Combo Point</c>.<n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Unstealth: Sinister Strike</c><n/>Dash forward, damaging enemies.

ValeeraCheapShot.name: Cheap Shot
ValeeraCheapShot.ShortTooltip: Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy
ValeeraCheapShot.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy, Stun them for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds, and Blind them for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires.<n/><n/><c val="ff5858">Awards 1 Combo Point.</c><n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Unstealth: Blade Flurry</c><n/>Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

ValeeraGarrote.name: Garrote
ValeeraGarrote.ShortTooltip: Deal high damage over time to an enemy
ValeeraGarrote.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">20~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and an additional <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">7</c> seconds, and Silence them for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ff5858">Awards 1 Combo Point.</c><n/><n/><c val="D65CFF">Unstealth: Eviscerate</c><n/>High damage finishing move.

ValeeraVigor.name: Vigor
ValeeraVigor.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Regen Globes increase max Energy
ValeeraVigor.FullTooltip: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

ValeeraVanishSubtlety.name: Subtlety
ValeeraVanishSubtlety.FullTooltip: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Energy per second for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ValeeraCombatReadiness.name: Combat Readiness
ValeeraCombatReadiness.FullTooltip: Each Combo Point spent grants <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

ValeeraCripplingPoison.name: Crippling Poison
ValeeraCripplingPoison.FullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds Slow targets by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

ValeeraSinisterStrikeRelentlessStrikes.name: Relentless Strikes
ValeeraSinisterStrikeRelentlessStrikes.FullTooltip: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by <c val="bfd4fd">15</c>.

ValeeraGarroteHemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
ValeeraGarroteHemorrhage.FullTooltip: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

ValeeraVanishInitiative.name: Initiative
ValeeraVanishInitiative.ShortTooltip: Stealth Abilities award Move Speed, Combo Points
ValeeraVanishInitiative.FullTooltip: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and award <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Combo Points.

ValeeraWoundPoison.name: Wound Poison
ValeeraWoundPoison.ShortTooltip: Spell Damage reduces enemy healing received
ValeeraWoundPoison.FullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds reduce enemy healing received by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

ValeeraSinisterStrikeMutilate.name: Mutilate
ValeeraSinisterStrikeMutilate.ShortTooltip: Increases Sinister Strike damage but reduces range
ValeeraSinisterStrikeMutilate.FullTooltip: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> additional damage, but its range is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>.

ValeeraBladeFlurryFatalFinesse.name: Fatal Finesse
ValeeraBladeFlurryFatalFinesse.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes with Blade Flurry
ValeeraBladeFlurryFatalFinesse.FullTooltip: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

ValeeraEviscerateSliceAndDice.name: Slice and Dice
ValeeraEviscerateSliceAndDice.FullTooltip: Eviscerating an enemy with <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Combo Points grants <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> Attack Speed. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds or <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Basic Attacks.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attacks restore <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Energy.

ValeeraSmokeBomb.name: Smoke Bomb
ValeeraSmokeBomb.ShortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
ValeeraSmokeBomb.FullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> Armor, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

ValeeraCloakOfShadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
ValeeraCloakOfShadows.FullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

ValeeraAmbushDeathFromAbove.name: Death From Above
ValeeraAmbushDeathFromAbove.FullTooltip: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ValeeraCheapShotBlind.name: Blind
ValeeraCheapShotBlind.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

ValeeraGarroteStrangle.name: Strangle
ValeeraGarroteStrangle.FullTooltip: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds.

ValeeraSinisterStrikeSealFate.name: Seal Fate
ValeeraSinisterStrikeSealFate.ShortTooltip: Empower Sinister Strike damage, Combo Points
ValeeraSinisterStrikeSealFate.FullTooltip: Sinister Strike deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

ValeeraAmbushAssassinate.name: Assassinate
ValeeraAmbushAssassinate.ShortTooltip: Ambush deals more damage to isolated Heroes
ValeeraAmbushAssassinate.FullTooltip: Ambush deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> if no other enemy Heroes are within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> range of the victim.

ValeeraThistleTea.name: Thistle Tea
ValeeraThistleTea.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore <c val="bfd4fd">100</c> Energy.<n/><n/>Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

ValeeraSmokeBombAdrenalineRush.name: Adrenaline Rush
ValeeraSmokeBombAdrenalineRush.FullTooltip: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Energy per second.

ValeeraCloakOfShadowsEnvelopingShadows.name: Enveloping Shadows
ValeeraCloakOfShadowsEnvelopingShadows.FullTooltip: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

ValeeraGarroteRupture.name: Rupture
ValeeraGarroteRupture.FullTooltip: Increase Garrote's damage over time by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

ValeeraVanishElusiveness.name: Elusiveness
ValeeraVanishElusiveness.FullTooltip: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

Varian.name: Varian
Varian.title: High King of the Alliance
Varian.SearchText: Varian Wrynn Logosh Lo'Gosh Stormwind Human Alliance WoW World of Warcraft Wrath of the Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords of Draenor WoD Legion
Varian.Description: A Bruiser that can flex into dealing damage or protecting his team.
Varian.InfoText: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.

VarianLionsFang.name: Lion's Fang
VarianLionsFang.ShortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line and heal Varian
VarianLionsFang.FullTooltip: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">150~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c>, increased to <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> against Heroes.

VarianParry.name: Parry
VarianParry.ShortTooltip: Block incoming Basic Attacks for a short duration
VarianParry.FullTooltip: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, reducing their damage by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

VarianCharge.name: Charge
VarianCharge.ShortTooltip: Charge to an enemy and damage them
VarianCharge.FullTooltip: Charge to the target enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

VarianTaunt.name: Taunt
VarianTaunt.ShortTooltip: Gain Health<n/>Force a Hero to attack Varian
VarianTaunt.FullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

VarianColossusSmash.name: Colossus Smash
VarianColossusSmash.ShortTooltip: Gain Damage, Lose Health<n/>Smash enemies and lower their Armor
VarianColossusSmash.FullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage and lowering their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Base Attack Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

VarianTwinBladesOfFury.name: Twin Blades of Fury
VarianTwinBladesOfFury.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose Damage<n/>Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
VarianTwinBladesOfFury.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">9</c> seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Attack Speed increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Base Attack Damage reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

VarianHeroicStrike.name: Heroic Strike
VarianHeroicStrike.ShortTooltip: Deal bonus damage on next Basic Attack
VarianHeroicStrike.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

VarianHeroicStrikeActive.name: Heroic Strike
VarianHeroicStrikeActive.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">18</c> seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

VarianLionsFangLionsMawQuest.name: Lion's Maw
VarianLionsFangLionsMawQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to empower Lion's Fang
VarianLionsFangLionsMawQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

VarianParryOverpower.name: Overpower
VarianParryOverpower.ShortTooltip: Parrying a Hero's attack will refresh Heroic Strike
VarianParryOverpower.FullTooltip: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more damage.

VarianHighKingsQuestQuest.name: High King's Quest
VarianHighKingsQuestQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Complete Quests to gain Attack Damage
VarianHighKingsQuestQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks.Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns.Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

VarianTaunt.name: Taunt
VarianTaunt.ShortTooltip: Gain Health<n/>Force a Hero to attack Varian
VarianTaunt.FullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

VarianColossusSmash.name: Colossus Smash
VarianColossusSmash.ShortTooltip: Gain Damage, Lose Health<n/>Smash enemies and lower their Armor
VarianColossusSmash.FullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.04~~</c> damage and lowering their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Base Attack Damage increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><c val="00ff90">Passive: </c>Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

VarianTwinBladesOfFury.name: Twin Blades of Fury
VarianTwinBladesOfFury.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose Damage<n/>Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
VarianTwinBladesOfFury.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">9</c> seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Attack Speed increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.<n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Base Attack Damage reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

VarianLionsFangLionheart.name: Lionheart
VarianLionsFangLionheart.FullTooltip: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

VarianSecondWind.name: Second Wind
VarianSecondWind.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal, more when low Health
VarianSecondWind.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal Varian for <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of his maximum Health. While below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, they also heal him for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage dealt.

VarianVictoryRush.name: Victory Rush
VarianVictoryRush.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically grant a large heal
VarianVictoryRush.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for <c val="bfd4fd">350~~0.04~~</c> Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

VarianParryShieldWall.name: Shield Wall
VarianParryShieldWall.FullTooltip: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, but it loses <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> charge.

VarianChargeWarbringer.name: Warbringer
VarianChargeWarbringer.ShortTooltip: Reduce Charge cooldown, can be used on allies
VarianChargeWarbringer.FullTooltip: Reduce Charge's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds and Mana cost from <c val="bfd4fd">45</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">22</c>. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

VarianChargeJuggernaut.name: Juggernaut
VarianChargeJuggernaut.FullTooltip: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to <c val="bfd4fd">4%</c> of their maximum Health.

VarianMortalStrike.name: Mortal Strike
VarianMortalStrike.FullTooltip: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> reduced healing for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

VarianShatteringThrow.name: Shattering Throw
VarianShatteringThrow.ShortTooltip: Deal massive damage to enemy Shields
VarianShatteringThrow.FullTooltip: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage, and up to <c val="bfd4fd">1400~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage to their Shields.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to <c val="bfd4fd">200%</c> bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

VarianBannerOfStormwind.name: Banner of Stormwind
VarianBannerOfStormwind.FullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

VarianBannerOfIronforge.name: Banner of Ironforge
VarianBannerOfIronforge.FullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

VarianBannerOfDalaran.name: Banner of Dalaran
VarianBannerOfDalaran.FullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds.

VarianTauntVigilance.name: Vigilance
VarianTauntVigilance.FullTooltip: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> seconds.

VarianColossusSmashMasterAtArms.name: Master at Arms
VarianColossusSmashMasterAtArms.ShortTooltip: Colossus Smash hits enemies near the target
VarianColossusSmashMasterAtArms.FullTooltip: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

VarianTwinBladesOfFuryFrenzy.name: Frenzy
VarianTwinBladesOfFuryFrenzy.ShortTooltip: Increase Twin Blades of Fury bonuses
VarianTwinBladesOfFuryFrenzy.FullTooltip: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

VarianBannersGloryToTheAlliance.name: Glory to the Alliance
VarianBannersGloryToTheAlliance.FullTooltip: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and the cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

VarianDemoralizingShout.name: Demoralizing Shout
VarianDemoralizingShout.FullTooltip: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

Whitemane.name: Whitemane
Whitemane.title: High Inquisitor
Whitemane.SearchText: sally priest human WoW World of Warcraft Mists Pandaria MoP Legion
Whitemane.Description: A versatile Healer who heals her allies by smiting her foes.
Whitemane.InfoText: As the High Inquisitor of the Scarlet Crusade, Sally Whitemane zealously leads her champions in a neverending war against the undead. Under her guiding Light, all who have been touched by the plague of death will be purged by her cleansing flame... no matter how much they protest.

WhitemaneDesperatePlea.name: Desperate Plea
WhitemaneDesperatePlea.FullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> and gain <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c> increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">45</c>, and stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Current Mana Cost:</c> <c val="bfd4fd">45</c>

WhitemaneInquisition.name: Inquisition
WhitemaneInquisition.FullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Removes a stack of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c>.<n/><n/>Shares a cooldown with Clemency.

WhitemaneSearingLash.name: Searing Lash
WhitemaneSearingLash.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for <c val="bfd4fd">82~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/>If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

WhitemaneScarletAegis.name: Scarlet Aegis
WhitemaneScarletAegis.ShortTooltip: Heal and grant Armor to nearby allies
WhitemaneScarletAegis.FullTooltip: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> and granting them <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WhitemaneDivineReckoning.name: Divine Reckoning
WhitemaneDivineReckoning.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, consecrate an area for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds to enemies inside. <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

WhitemaneFanaticalPower.name: Zeal
WhitemaneFanaticalPower.ShortTooltip: Heal marked allies for damage dealt
WhitemaneFanaticalPower.FullTooltip: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds. Allies with <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c> are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.<n/><n/>Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Spell Power and lose <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Can be cast while channeling abilities.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

WhitemaneInquisitionClemency.name: Clemency
WhitemaneInquisitionClemency.FullTooltip: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to <c val="bfd4fd">329~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds while Channeling. Removes a stack of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c><n/><n/>Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

WhitemaneZealPityTheFrail.name: Pity the Frail
WhitemaneZealPityTheFrail.FullTooltip: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds. Allies below <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Health receive <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more healing from Whitemane.

WhitemaneSearingLashRighteousFlame.name: Righteous Flame
WhitemaneSearingLashRighteousFlame.FullTooltip: Searing Lash deals <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage to enemies. If the second strike hits an enemy Hero, they take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> damage and Whitemane gains <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WhitemaneInquisitorsPrayer.name: Inquisitor's Prayer
WhitemaneInquisitorsPrayer.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Searing Lash increases Health and Mana
WhitemaneInquisitorsPrayer.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.

WhitemaneDesperatePleaUnwaveringFaith.name: Unwavering Faith
WhitemaneDesperatePleaUnwaveringFaith.ShortTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range and damage
WhitemaneDesperatePleaUnwaveringFaith.FullTooltip: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by <c val="bfd4fd">1.1</c>. Whitemane gains <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> increased Basic Attack damage for each active <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c> buff.

WhitemaneDesperatePleaMartyrdom.name: Martyrdom
WhitemaneDesperatePleaMartyrdom.FullTooltip: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">30%.</c> Increase this by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> for each active <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c>.

WhitemaneZealIndulgence.name: Indulgence
WhitemaneZealIndulgence.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> for each active <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c>.

WhitemaneDesperatePleaZealousSpirit.name: Zealous Spirit
WhitemaneDesperatePleaZealousSpirit.FullTooltip: Upon reaching <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> stacks of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c>, Whitemane gains <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c>.

WhitemaneSaintlyGreatstaff.name: Saintly Greatstaff
WhitemaneSaintlyGreatstaff.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">55~~0.04~~</c> Spell damage and remove the mark.

WhitemaneIntercession.name: Intercession
WhitemaneIntercession.FullTooltip: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> stack of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c>.

WhitemaneScarletAegis.name: Scarlet Aegis
WhitemaneScarletAegis.ShortTooltip: Heal and grant Armor to nearby allies
WhitemaneScarletAegis.FullTooltip: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for <c val="bfd4fd">250~~0.04~~</c> and granting them <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WhitemaneDivineReckoning.name: Divine Reckoning
WhitemaneDivineReckoning.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, consecrate an area for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds to enemies inside. <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

WhitemaneInquisitionSubjugation.name: Subjugation
WhitemaneInquisitionSubjugation.FullTooltip: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

WhitemaneSearingLashLashingOut.name: Lashing Out
WhitemaneSearingLashLashingOut.FullTooltip: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

WhitemaneZealScarletWrath.name: Scarlet Wrath
WhitemaneZealScarletWrath.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active <c val="FFF5C2">Zeals</c> by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds and lower the cooldown of <c val="FFF5C2">Zeals</c> activation by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

WhitemaneDesperatePleaRadiance.name: Radiance
WhitemaneDesperatePleaRadiance.FullTooltip: Upon reaching <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c>, all allies with <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c> are healed for <c val="bfd4fd">175~~0.04~~</c>. Activating Zeal while at <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> stacks of <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c> now increases her Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> instead of reducing it.

WhitemaneInquisitionSharedPunishment.name: Shared Punishment
WhitemaneInquisitionSharedPunishment.ShortTooltip: Inquisition chains to a nearby enemy, lowers Armor
WhitemaneInquisitionSharedPunishment.FullTooltip: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">35~~0.04~~</c> damage every <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds. Affected enemies lose <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> Armor.

WhitemaneSearingLashHarshDiscipline.name: Harsh Discipline
WhitemaneSearingLashHarshDiscipline.FullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

WhitemaneScarletAegisScarletCrusade.name: Scarlet Crusade
WhitemaneScarletAegisScarletCrusade.FullTooltip: Scarlet Aegis heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

WhitemaneDivineReckoningJudgmentDay.name: Judgment Day
WhitemaneDivineReckoningJudgmentDay.FullTooltip: Divine Reckoning deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

WhitemaneGuidingLight.name: Guiding Light
WhitemaneGuidingLight.ShortTooltip: Activate to cast a free <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c>
WhitemaneGuidingLight.FullTooltip: Activate to cast a permanent <c val="FFF5C2">Zeal</c> on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant <c val="FF8B8B">Desperation</c>. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.

WhitemanePurgeTheWicked.name: Purge the Wicked
WhitemanePurgeTheWicked.FullTooltip: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> and dealing <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WitchDoctor.name: Nazeebo
WitchDoctor.title: Heretic Witch Doctor
WitchDoctor.SearchText: Nazeebo Witch Doctor Witchdoctor Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS WD
WitchDoctor.Description: A sustained damage Mage who gains power when killing enemy minions.
WitchDoctor.InfoText: With cabalistic incantations and vestments of feather and bone, the witch doctor Nazeebo calls upon spirits from the Unformed Land to aid him. Few outlanders encounter a witch doctor in the flesh, without losing their own.

WitchDoctorCorpseSpiders.name: Corpse Spiders
WitchDoctorCorpseSpiders.ShortTooltip: Throw a jar that summons Spiders to attack enemies hit
WitchDoctorCorpseSpiders.FullTooltip: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals <c val="bfd4fd">50~~0.04~~</c> damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create <c val="bfd4fd">3 </c>Corpse Spiders that attack for <c val="bfd4fd">38~~0.04~~</c> damage. Spiders last for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorZombieWall.name: Zombie Wall
WitchDoctorZombieWall.ShortTooltip: Summon a temporary ring of zombies that trap and attack
WitchDoctorZombieWall.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal <c val="bfd4fd">28~~0.04~~ </c>damage and last for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorPlagueofToads.name: Plague of Toads
WitchDoctorPlagueofToads.ShortTooltip: Summon a wave of exploding toads
WitchDoctorPlagueofToads.FullTooltip: Create a wave of <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Toads that explode on contact, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">119~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. This effect stacks.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges.

WitchDoctorGargantuan.name: Gargantuan
WitchDoctorGargantuan.ShortTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area
WitchDoctorGargantuan.FullTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage when summoned, attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

WitchDoctorRavenousSpirit.name: Ravenous Spirit
WitchDoctorRavenousSpirit.FullTooltip: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorVoodooRitualTrait.name: Voodoo Ritual
WitchDoctorVoodooRitualTrait.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Abilities deal damage over time. Killed minions increase Health and Mana.
WitchDoctorVoodooRitualTrait.FullTooltip: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take <c val="bfd4fd">67~~0.04~~</c> additional damage over <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. <n/><n/><c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Mana.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

WitchDoctorGargantuanStomp.name: Gargantuan Stomp
WitchDoctorGargantuanStomp.FullTooltip: Order the Gargantuan to stomp, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorGargantuanStompCommand.name: Gargantuan Stomp
WitchDoctorGargantuanStompCommand.FullTooltip: Order the Gargantuan to stomp, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorRavenousSpiritCancel.name: Ravenous Spirit
WitchDoctorRavenousSpiritCancel.FullTooltip: Cancels the Ravenous Spirit ability and returns control to the Witch Doctor.

WitchDoctorWidowmakers.name: Widowmakers
WitchDoctorWidowmakers.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Corpse Spiders by 10.Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30% and the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

WitchDoctorPandemic.name: Pandemic
WitchDoctorPandemic.FullTooltip: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

WitchDoctorThingOfTheDeep.name: Thing of the Deep
WitchDoctorThingOfTheDeep.ShortTooltip: Increase range, <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase Spell Power
WitchDoctorThingOfTheDeep.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.Reward: After gaining 50 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain 5% Spell Power.Reward: After gaining 100 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain an additional 5% Spell Power.

WitchDoctorHexedCrawlers.name: Hexed Crawlers
WitchDoctorHexedCrawlers.ShortTooltip: Corpse Spiders restore Health and Mana
WitchDoctorHexedCrawlers.FullTooltip: Corpse Spiders restore <c val="bfd4fd">1%</c> of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

WitchDoctorBigVoodoo.name: Big Voodoo
WitchDoctorBigVoodoo.FullTooltip: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

WitchDoctorBloodRitual.name: Blood Ritual
WitchDoctorBloodRitual.ShortTooltip: Voodoo Ritual restores Health and Mana
WitchDoctorBloodRitual.FullTooltip: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c> of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

WitchDoctorSpiritofArachyr.name: Spirit of Arachyr
WitchDoctorSpiritofArachyr.ShortTooltip: More Corpse Spiders against single enemy
WitchDoctorSpiritofArachyr.FullTooltip: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional spiders.

WitchDoctorDeadRush.name: Dead Rush
WitchDoctorDeadRush.ShortTooltip: Zombie Wall deals more damage and uproots
WitchDoctorDeadRush.FullTooltip: Zombie Wall deals <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more damage. When it expires up to <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorToadsofHugeness.name: Toads of Hugeness
WitchDoctorToadsofHugeness.ShortTooltip: Toads become more powerful with each hop
WitchDoctorToadsofHugeness.FullTooltip: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> after each hop, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityGargantuan.name: Gargantuan
WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityGargantuan.ShortTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area
WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityGargantuan.FullTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage when summoned, attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityRavenousSpirits.name: Ravenous Spirit
WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityRavenousSpirits.FullTooltip: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorGuardianToads.name: Guardian Toads
WitchDoctorGuardianToads.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, reducing damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

WitchDoctorSuperstition.name: Superstition
WitchDoctorSuperstition.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor while not being Attacked
WitchDoctorSuperstition.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

GenericTalentIceBlock.name: Ice Block
GenericTalentIceBlock.FullTooltip: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorSpiderColony.name: Spider Colony
WitchDoctorSpiderColony.ShortTooltip: Corpse Spiders reduce other Basic Ability cooldowns
WitchDoctorSpiderColony.FullTooltip: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by <c val="bfd4fd">0.25</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorRingOfPoison.name: Ring of Poison
WitchDoctorRingOfPoison.FullTooltip: Zombie Wall lasts <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of <c val="bfd4fd">319~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

WitchDoctorSoulHarvest.name: Soul Harvest
WitchDoctorSoulHarvest.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase Health and Spell Power
WitchDoctorSoulHarvest.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> seconds.

WitchDoctorHumongoid.name: Humongoid
WitchDoctorHumongoid.ShortTooltip: Reduce Gargantuan cooldown and mana cost
WitchDoctorHumongoid.FullTooltip: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> seconds and its Mana cost by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.

WitchDoctorAnnihilatingSpirits.name: Annihilating Spirit
WitchDoctorAnnihilatingSpirits.ShortTooltip: Increase Ravenous Spirit range and damage
WitchDoctorAnnihilatingSpirits.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>, and each time it damages an enemy Hero increase its damage <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> for the rest of its duration.

GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm.name: Fury of the Storm
GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target, and <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

WitchDoctorVileInfection.name: Vile Infection
WitchDoctorVileInfection.FullTooltip: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67~~0.04~~ to 167~~0.04~~ over 6 seconds.

Wizard.name: Li-Ming
Wizard.title: Rebellious Wizard
Wizard.SearchText: Li-Ming Li Ming LiMing liming Liming LM Leeming Wizard Nephalem D3 Diablo 3 Diablo3 III Reaper of Souls RoS
Wizard.Description: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.
Wizard.InfoText: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?

WizardMagicMissiles.name: Magic Missiles
WizardMagicMissiles.FullTooltip: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing <c val="bfd4fd">147~~0.035~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to Structures.

WizardArcaneOrb.name: Arcane Orb
WizardArcaneOrb.ShortTooltip: Launch an orb that deals increasing damage the further it travels
WizardArcaneOrb.FullTooltip: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">135~~0.03~~</c> damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to <c val="bfd4fd">270~~0.03~~</c> more damage.

WizardDisintegrate.name: Disintegrate
WizardDisintegrate.FullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.05~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">2.6</c> seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

WizardWaveOfForce.name: Wave of Force
WizardWaveOfForce.FullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.05~~</c> damage.

WizardTraitCriticalMass.name: Critical Mass
WizardTraitCriticalMass.FullTooltip: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

WizardArchonPurePowerDisintegrate.name: Disintegrate
WizardArchonPurePowerDisintegrate.FullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">192~~0.05~~</c> damage per second to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

WizardForceArmor.name: Force Armor
WizardForceArmor.FullTooltip: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> charge per cast and store up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> charges.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> while below <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Mana.

WizardAetherWalker.name: Aether Walker
WizardAetherWalker.ShortTooltip: Reduce Teleport's cooldown when out of combat
WizardAetherWalker.FullTooltip: Teleport costs no Mana. If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds. Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> bonus damage.

WizardPowerHungry.name: Power Hungry
WizardPowerHungry.ShortTooltip: Regen Globes give Spell Power and more Mana
WizardPowerHungry.FullTooltip: Regeneration Globes restore <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> more Mana and grant <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> seconds.

WizardMagicMissilesChargedBlast.name: Charged Blast
WizardMagicMissilesChargedBlast.ShortTooltip: Magic Missiles marks enemies for bonus damage
WizardMagicMissilesChargedBlast.FullTooltip: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra <c val="bfd4fd">87~~0.04~~</c> damage.

WizardArcaneOrbTriumvirate.name: Triumvirate
WizardArcaneOrbTriumvirate.ShortTooltip: Reduces Arcane Orb cooldown at max range
WizardArcaneOrbTriumvirate.FullTooltip: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds and <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Mana is refunded.

WizardDominance.name: Dominance
WizardDominance.FullTooltip: Takedowns restore <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of Li-Ming's missing Health.

WizardMagicMissilesSeeker.name: Seeker
WizardMagicMissilesSeeker.FullTooltip: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage.

WizardArcaneOrbZeisVengeance.name: Zei's Vengeance
WizardArcaneOrbZeisVengeance.ShortTooltip: Arcane Orb does more damage from afar
WizardArcaneOrbZeisVengeance.FullTooltip: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

WizardTeleportCalamity.name: Calamity
WizardTeleportCalamity.FullTooltip: Teleport does <c val="bfd4fd">300~~0.03~~</c> damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

WizardHeroicAbilityDisintegrate.name: Disintegrate
WizardHeroicAbilityDisintegrate.FullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">480~~0.05~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">2.6</c> seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

WizardHeroicAbilityWaveOfForce.name: Wave of Force
WizardHeroicAbilityWaveOfForce.FullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal <c val="bfd4fd">160~~0.05~~</c> damage.

WizardTeleportIllusionist.name: Illusionist
WizardTeleportIllusionist.ShortTooltip: Increases Teleport range, damage refreshes cooldown
WizardTeleportIllusionist.FullTooltip: If Li-Ming loses more than <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed. <n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> second cooldown.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Increases Teleport range by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>

WizardCannoneer.name: Cannoneer
WizardCannoneer.FullTooltip: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> and deals Spell damage instead of Physical. Stacks up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> times.

WizardGlassCannon.name: Glass Cannon
WizardGlassCannon.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Power but lose max Health
WizardGlassCannon.FullTooltip: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>, but decrease her maximum Health by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>.

WizardFireflies.name: Fireflies
WizardFireflies.ShortTooltip: Magic Missiles move faster, lower cooldown and Mana cost
WizardFireflies.FullTooltip: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, and its Mana cost is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c>.

WizardMagicMissilesMirrorball.name: Mirrorball
WizardMagicMissilesMirrorball.ShortTooltip: Fires 2 extra Magic Missiles and increases Mana cost
WizardMagicMissilesMirrorball.FullTooltip: Magic Missiles fires an additional <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">5</c>.

WizardArcaneOrbArcaneOrbit.name: Arcane Orbit
WizardArcaneOrbArcaneOrbit.FullTooltip: Arcane Orb travels <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from <c val="bfd4fd">270~~0.03~~</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">371~~0.03~~</c>.

WizardTeleportDiamondSkin.name: Diamond Skin
WizardTeleportDiamondSkin.FullTooltip: Teleport grants a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> of Li-Ming's maximum Health for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

WizardDisintegrateTemporalFlux.name: Temporal Flux
WizardDisintegrateTemporalFlux.FullTooltip: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c>.

WizardWaveOfForceRepulsion.name: Repulsion
WizardWaveOfForceRepulsion.ShortTooltip: Increases cast range and knockback distance
WizardWaveOfForceRepulsion.FullTooltip: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by <c val="bfd4fd">150%</c> and increases its cast range by <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c>.

WizardTalRashasElements.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
WizardTalRashasElements.FullTooltip: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>. This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

WizardArchonPurePower.name: Archon: Pure Power
WizardArchonPurePower.ShortTooltip: Use Disintegrate repeatedly, but no other Abilities
WizardArchonPurePower.FullTooltip: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

Yrel.name: Yrel
Yrel.title: Light of Hope
Yrel.SearchText: Yerel WoW Draenei Warlords of Draenor WoD Alliance Paladin BFA Battle for Azeroth
Yrel.Description: A deliberate melee Bruiser whose heavyweight abilities reward investment and careful timing.
Yrel.InfoText: After traveling to an Alternate Draenor, the forces of Azeroth saved the acolyte Yrel from the Iron Horde. With their aid, she rose to the rank of Exarch and fought back the demonic invasion of her world. Now, she finds herself where time, space, and dimensions converge: the Nexus.

YrelVindication.name: Vindication
YrelVindication.FullTooltip: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">42~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies and healing her for <c val="bfd4fd">96~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c>, and healing up to <c val="bfd4fd">320~~0.04~~</c>.

YrelRighteousHammerChannel.name: Righteous Hammer
YrelRighteousHammerChannel.FullTooltip: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">38~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.<n/><n/>Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c>. Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

YrelAvengingWrath.name: Avenging Wrath
YrelAvengingWrath.ShortTooltip: Leap to an area to damage, Slow enemies
YrelAvengingWrath.FullTooltip: Leap to a location, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">225~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.<n/><n/>Charging up this Ability increases its range.

YrelArdentDefender.name: Ardent Defender
YrelArdentDefender.FullTooltip: Surround Yrel in a barrier for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage received.

YrelSacredGround.name: Sacred Ground
YrelSacredGround.ShortTooltip: Yrel gains Armor in an area
YrelSacredGround.FullTooltip: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor until she leaves the area.

YrelDivinePurpose.name: Divine Purpose
YrelDivinePurpose.ShortTooltip: Make next Basic Ability cast instantly
YrelDivinePurpose.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.
