YrelDivineSteedSummonMount.name: Divine Steed
YrelDivineSteedSummonMount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

YrelVindicationLightOfKarabor.name: Light of Karabor
YrelVindicationLightOfKarabor.FullTooltip: Increase Vindication's radius by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c>. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased to <c val="bfd4fd">80%</c>.

YrelDauntless.name: Dauntless
YrelDauntless.FullTooltip: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Physical Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

YrelMaraadsInsight.name: Maraad's Insight
YrelMaraadsInsight.FullTooltip: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for <c val="bfd4fd">128~~0.04~~</c>.

YrelAvengingWrathAegisOfLight.name: Aegis of Light
YrelAvengingWrathAegisOfLight.FullTooltip: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

YrelDivinePurposeGiftOfTheNaaru.name: Gift of the Naaru
YrelDivinePurposeGiftOfTheNaaru.FullTooltip: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for <c val="bfd4fd">275~~0.04~~</c>.

YrelHandOfFreedom.name: Hand of Freedom
YrelHandOfFreedom.ShortTooltip: Grants Move Speed, removes Slows, Roots
YrelHandOfFreedom.FullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.

YrelRighteousHammerRighteousMomentum.name: Righteous Momentum
YrelRighteousHammerRighteousMomentum.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c> Movement Speed. Yrel is no longer Slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and instead this bonus is quadrupled.

YrelAvengingWrathHolyAvenger.name: Holy Avenger
YrelAvengingWrathHolyAvenger.ShortTooltip: Avenging Wrath cooldown reduced at max charge
YrelAvengingWrathHolyAvenger.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge deals <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> more damage and reduces its cooldown to <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

YrelDivineSteed.name: Divine Steed
YrelDivineSteed.FullTooltip: Mounting is instant and grants <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> Movement Speed that decays over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

YrelArdentDefender.name: Ardent Defender
YrelArdentDefender.FullTooltip: Surround Yrel in a barrier for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage received.

YrelSacredGround.name: Sacred Ground
YrelSacredGround.ShortTooltip: Yrel gains Armor in an area
YrelSacredGround.FullTooltip: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Armor until she leaves the area.

YrelVindicationAldorPeacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
YrelVindicationAldorPeacekeeper.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> less damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

YrelAvengingWrathRepentance.name: Repentance
YrelAvengingWrathRepentance.FullTooltip: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> and duration by <c val="bfd4fd">0.75</c> seconds.

YrelVelensChosen.name: Velen's Chosen
YrelVelensChosen.ShortTooltip: Basic Abilities can grant Spell Power
YrelVelensChosen.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Spell Power for <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

YrelRighteousHammerTemplarsVerdict.name: Templar's Verdict
YrelRighteousHammerTemplarsVerdict.ShortTooltip: Righteous Hammer reduces Armor, deals percent damage
YrelRighteousHammerTemplarsVerdict.FullTooltip: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds and deals bonus damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">7%</c> of their maximum Health.

YrelDivinePurposeDivineFavor.name: Divine Favor
YrelDivinePurposeDivineFavor.ShortTooltip: Basic Abilities reduce Divine Purpose cooldown
YrelDivinePurposeDivineFavor.FullTooltip: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

YrelHolyWrath.name: Holy Wrath
YrelHolyWrath.ShortTooltip: Attacks splash after casting Basic Abilities
YrelHolyWrath.FullTooltip: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased damage around the target.

YrelArdentDefenderWordOfGlory.name: Word of Glory
YrelArdentDefenderWordOfGlory.ShortTooltip: Ardent Defender conversion increased, heals allies in an area
YrelArdentDefenderWordOfGlory.FullTooltip: Increase the amount that Yrel heals from damage received from <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> to <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>. Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for <c val="bfd4fd">100%</c> of the healing received by Yrel.

YrelSacredGroundHallowedGround.name: Hallowed Ground
YrelSacredGroundHallowedGround.FullTooltip: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

YrelBubbleHearth.name: Bubble Hearth
YrelBubbleHearth.ShortTooltip: Activate to become Invulnerable and Hearth
YrelBubbleHearth.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

YrelSeraphim.name: Seraphim
YrelSeraphim.FullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

Zagara.name: Zagara
Zagara.title: Broodmother of the Swarm
Zagara.SearchText: Zagara Broodmother Queen Zerg Swarm HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 SC Star2 Starcraft2
Zagara.Description: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.
Zagara.InfoText: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.

ZagaraBanelingBarrage.name: Baneling Barrage
ZagaraBanelingBarrage.ShortTooltip: Launch a Baneling that explodes on contact with an enemy
ZagaraBanelingBarrage.FullTooltip: Launch <c val="bfd4fd">1 </c>Baneling that deals <c val="bfd4fd">86~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies it hits.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> charges.

ZagaraSummonHydralisk.name: Hunter Killer
ZagaraSummonHydralisk.ShortTooltip: Unleash a Hydralisk on an enemy
ZagaraSummonHydralisk.FullTooltip: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">71~~0.05~~ </c>damage per second. Lasts <c val="bfd4fd">8 </c>seconds.

ZagaraInfestedDrop.name: Infested Drop
ZagaraInfestedDrop.ShortTooltip: Bombard an area with a Zerg Drop Pod that spawns Roachlings
ZagaraInfestedDrop.FullTooltip: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage. <n/><n/>The pod spawns <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Roachlings that deal <c val="bfd4fd">27~~0.04~~</c> damage per second and last for <c val="bfd4fd">8</c> seconds.

ZagaraSummonNydusWorm.name: Nydus Network
ZagaraSummonNydusWorm.ShortTooltip: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms
ZagaraSummonNydusWorm.FullTooltip: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Health and Mana per second.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">4 </c>Nydus Worms at a time.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Creep spreads <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> farther. <n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">0.4</c> seconds.

ZagaraDevouringMaw.name: Devouring Maw
ZagaraDevouringMaw.FullTooltip: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take <c val="bfd4fd">94~~0.04~~</c> damage per second.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Usable on Unstoppable enemies.</c>

ZagaraSummonCreepTumor.name: Creep Tumor
ZagaraSummonCreepTumor.ShortTooltip: Generates Creep allowing Zagara and her minions to move faster
ZagaraSummonCreepTumor.FullTooltip: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> faster. Tumors last <c val="bfd4fd">240</c> seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> charges.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ZagaraMasteryVolatileAcid.name: Volatile Acid
ZagaraMasteryVolatileAcid.FullTooltip: Banelings can travel <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> further before exploding and their damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

ZagaraMasteryCorpseFeeders.name: Corpse Feeders
ZagaraMasteryCorpseFeeders.ShortTooltip: Infested Drop cooldown reduced, increase Roachling Health
ZagaraMasteryCorpseFeeders.FullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and Roachlings have <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more Health.

ZagaraMasteryInfest.name: Infest
ZagaraMasteryInfest.ShortTooltip: Increases nearby allied Ranged Minion's damage
ZagaraMasteryInfest.FullTooltip: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> damage, plus an additional<c val="bfd4fd"> 1%</c> per <c val="bfd4fd">1000</c> Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

ZagaraMasteryEnvenomedSpines.name: Envenomed Spines
ZagaraMasteryEnvenomedSpines.FullTooltip: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply <c val="bfd4fd">230~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.

ZagaraCombatStyleMedusaBlades.name: Medusa Blades
ZagaraCombatStyleMedusaBlades.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c> damage to three nearby targets.

ZagaraMasterySerratedSpines.name: Serrated Spines
ZagaraMasterySerratedSpines.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Basic Attacks against Heroes increase damage
ZagaraMasterySerratedSpines.FullTooltip: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.2%.

ZagaraMasteryBanelingMassacre.name: Baneling Massacre
ZagaraMasteryBanelingMassacre.ShortTooltip: Increase number of Banelings, reduce cooldown
ZagaraMasteryBanelingMassacre.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> additional charges of Banelings, and reduce the cooldown of Baneling Barrage by <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds.

ZagaraViscousAcid.name: Viscous Acid
ZagaraViscousAcid.FullTooltip: Banelings Slow enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

ZagaraMasteryBileDrop.name: Bile Drop
ZagaraMasteryBileDrop.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Increase maximum number of Roachlings
ZagaraMasteryBileDrop.FullTooltip: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

ZagaraHeroicAbilityDevouringMaw.name: Devouring Maw
ZagaraHeroicAbilityDevouringMaw.FullTooltip: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take <c val="bfd4fd">94~~0.04~~</c> damage per second.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Usable on Unstoppable enemies.</c>

ZagaraHeroicAbilityNydusAssault.name: Nydus Network
ZagaraHeroicAbilityNydusAssault.ShortTooltip: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms
ZagaraHeroicAbilityNydusAssault.FullTooltip: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Health and Mana per second.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> charges. Maximum of <c val="bfd4fd">4 </c>Nydus Worms at a time.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Creep spreads <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> farther. <n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by <c val="bfd4fd">0.4</c> seconds.

ZagaraMasteryHydraliskTransfusion.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
ZagaraMasteryHydraliskTransfusion.FullTooltip: Zagara is healed for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

ZagaraMasteryProtectiveCoating.name: Protective Coating
ZagaraMasteryProtectiveCoating.FullTooltip: While on Creep, Zagara gains <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor, taking <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> less damage.

GenericTalentSpellShield.name: Spell Shield
GenericTalentSpellShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

ZagaraMasteryCorrosiveSaliva.name: Corrosive Saliva
ZagaraMasteryCorrosiveSaliva.ShortTooltip: Empowers Hunter Killer, Roachling damage against Heroes
ZagaraMasteryCorrosiveSaliva.FullTooltip: When attacking Heroes, Hunter Killers and Roachlings deal additional damage equal to <c val="bfd4fd">1.75%</c> of their maximum Health.

ZagaraMasteryMutalisk.name: Mutalisk
ZagaraMasteryMutalisk.ShortTooltip: Hunter Killer summons a Mutalisk instead
ZagaraMasteryMutalisk.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds.

ZagaraJaggedBarbsTalent.name: Jagged Barbs
ZagaraJaggedBarbsTalent.ShortTooltip: Gain Attack Damage, range on Creep
ZagaraJaggedBarbsTalent.FullTooltip: While on Creep, Zagara gains <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> more Basic Attack damage and her attack range is increased by an additional <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

ZagaraMasteryTyrantMaw.name: Tyrant Maw
ZagaraMasteryTyrantMaw.ShortTooltip: More damage and cooldown reduction from Takedowns
ZagaraMasteryTyrantMaw.FullTooltip: Devouring Maw deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds.

ZagaraMasteryEndlessCreep.name: Endless Creep
ZagaraMasteryEndlessCreep.ShortTooltip: Increases Creep Tumor's cast range and duration
ZagaraMasteryEndlessCreep.FullTooltip: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">2000%</c>. Creep Tumors now last <c val="bfd4fd">600</c> seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Movement Speed.

GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm.name: Fury of the Storm
GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional <c val="bfd4fd">91~~0.04~~</c> damage to the target, and <c val="bfd4fd">228~~0.04~~</c> damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

Zarya.name: Zarya
Zarya.title: Defender of Russia
Zarya.Description: A Support that can enable deadly allies and is good at preventing burst damage.
Zarya.InfoText: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.

ZaryaParticleGrenade.name: Particle Grenade
ZaryaParticleGrenade.ShortTooltip: Deals damage to enemies in a small area
ZaryaParticleGrenade.FullTooltip: Launch a particle grenade that deals <c val="bfd4fd">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies within the area. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> charges.

ZaryaPersonalBarrier.name: Personal Barrier
ZaryaPersonalBarrier.ShortTooltip: Gain a Shield that absorbs damage
ZaryaPersonalBarrier.FullTooltip: Gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">560~~0.04~~</c> damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZaryaShieldAlly.name: Shield Ally
ZaryaShieldAlly.ShortTooltip: Grant an ally a Shield that absorbs damage
ZaryaShieldAlly.FullTooltip: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">420~~0.04~~</c> damage for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZaryaGravitonSurge.name: Graviton Surge
ZaryaGravitonSurge.ShortTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
ZaryaGravitonSurge.FullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

ZaryaExpulsionZone.name: Expulsion Zone
ZaryaExpulsionZone.ShortTooltip: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
ZaryaExpulsionZone.FullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that deals <c val="bfd4fd">124~~0.04~~</c> damage and creates an expulsion zone for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ZaryaEnergy.name: Energy
ZaryaEnergy.ShortTooltip: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields increase her damage.
ZaryaEnergy.FullTooltip: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">9~~0.04~~</c> damage, her Energy is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c>. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by <c val="bfd4fd">2%</c>. After <c val="bfd4fd">0.5</c> seconds, Energy decays by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> per second.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ZaryaParticleGrenadeDemolitionsExpertQue.name: Demolitions Expert
ZaryaParticleGrenadeDemolitionsExpertQue.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest</c>: Increases Particle Grenade radius and reduces cooldown
ZaryaParticleGrenadeDemolitionsExpertQue.FullTooltip: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds.Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

ZaryaShieldAllyTogetherWeAreStrong.name: Together We Are Strong
ZaryaShieldAllyTogetherWeAreStrong.ShortTooltip: Allied damage dealt with Shield Ally contributes to Energy
ZaryaShieldAllyTogetherWeAreStrong.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">5.35~~0.04~~</c> damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Energy, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Energy per Shield.

ZaryaWeaponFeelTheHeat.name: Feel the Heat
ZaryaWeaponFeelTheHeat.ShortTooltip: Basic Attack deals more damage to close enemies
ZaryaWeaponFeelTheHeat.FullTooltip: Zarya's Basic Attack deals <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> additional damage to enemies in melee range.

ZaryaEnergyMaximumChargeQuest.name: Maximum Charge
ZaryaEnergyMaximumChargeQuest.ShortTooltip: Regen Globes grant Energy<n/><c val="e4b800">Quest</c>: Increases maximum Energy
ZaryaEnergyMaximumChargeQuest.FullTooltip: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

ZaryaPersonalBarrierIAmTheStrongest.name: I Am the Strongest
ZaryaPersonalBarrierIAmTheStrongest.FullTooltip: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional <c val="bfd4fd">140~~0.04~~</c> damage.

ZaryaShieldAllyGiveMeTwentyQuest.name: Give Me Twenty
ZaryaShieldAllyGiveMeTwentyQuest.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest</c>: Increases Shield Ally absorb amount and reduces cooldown
ZaryaShieldAllyGiveMeTwentyQuest.FullTooltip: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

ZaryaShieldAllySpeedBarrier.name: Speed Barrier
ZaryaShieldAllySpeedBarrier.ShortTooltip: Shield Ally increases allied Hero Movement Speed
ZaryaShieldAllySpeedBarrier.FullTooltip: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for the duration.

ZaryaDefensiveShielding.name: Defensive Shielding
ZaryaDefensiveShielding.ShortTooltip: Personal Barrier, Shield Ally grant Physical Armor
ZaryaDefensiveShielding.FullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Physical Armor against the next <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> Hero Basic Attacks for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

ZaryaParticleGrenadePinpointAccuracy.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
ZaryaParticleGrenadePinpointAccuracy.ShortTooltip: Particle Grenade center deals more damage, Slows
ZaryaParticleGrenadePinpointAccuracy.FullTooltip: Particle Grenade deals <c val="bfd4fd">30~~0.04~~</c> more damage and Slows Movement Speed by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

ZaryaPersonalBarrierExplosiveBarrier.name: Explosive Barrier
ZaryaPersonalBarrierExplosiveBarrier.FullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">110~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

ZaryaWeaponToTheLimit.name: To the Limit
ZaryaWeaponToTheLimit.ShortTooltip: Increases Basic Attack size at high Energy
ZaryaWeaponToTheLimit.FullTooltip: While above <c val="bfd4fd">40</c> Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

ZaryaEnergyHitMe.name: Hit Me
ZaryaEnergyHitMe.ShortTooltip: Shield damage absorbed contributes more Energy
ZaryaEnergyHitMe.FullTooltip: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> more Energy.

ZaryaHeroicAbilityGravitonSurge.name: Graviton Surge
ZaryaHeroicAbilityGravitonSurge.ShortTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
ZaryaHeroicAbilityGravitonSurge.FullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for <c val="bfd4fd">2.5</c> seconds.

ZaryaHeroicAbilityExpulsionZone.name: Expulsion Zone
ZaryaHeroicAbilityExpulsionZone.ShortTooltip: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
ZaryaHeroicAbilityExpulsionZone.FullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that deals <c val="bfd4fd">124~~0.04~~</c> damage and creates an expulsion zone for <c val="bfd4fd">3.5</c> seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second.

ZaryaPersonalBarrierUnstoppableCompetito.name: Unstoppable Competitor
ZaryaPersonalBarrierUnstoppableCompetito.FullTooltip: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ZaryaPersonalBarrierSpellBarrier.name: Spell Barrier
ZaryaPersonalBarrierSpellBarrier.FullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Spell Armor for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c>.

ZaryaEnergyEnduranceTraining.name: Endurance Training
ZaryaEnergyEnduranceTraining.FullTooltip: While at or above <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Energy, Zarya gains <c val="bfd4fd">20</c> Armor, reducing all damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

ZaryaPainIsTemporary.name: Pain is Temporary
ZaryaPainIsTemporary.ShortTooltip: Consume Energy to gain a Shield
ZaryaPainIsTemporary.FullTooltip: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="bfd4fd">0.5%</c> of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Zarya may only have one personal Shield active on herself at a time.

ZaryaShieldAllyCleansingShield.name: Cleansing Shield
ZaryaShieldAllyCleansingShield.ShortTooltip: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects
ZaryaShieldAllyCleansingShield.FullTooltip: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZaryaShieldAllyGainTrain.name: Gain Train
ZaryaShieldAllyGainTrain.ShortTooltip: Shield Ally now affects a second ally
ZaryaShieldAllyGainTrain.FullTooltip: Shield Ally now grants an untalented Shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

ZaryaEnergyBornInBattle.name: Born in Battle
ZaryaEnergyBornInBattle.FullTooltip: While at or above <c val="bfd4fd">75</c> Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> faster.

ZaryaGravitonSurgeGravityKills.name: Gravity Kills
ZaryaGravitonSurgeGravityKills.ShortTooltip: Graviton Surge has increased duration and Silences
ZaryaGravitonSurgeGravityKills.FullTooltip: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and it Silences Heroes caught in its area.

ZaryaExpulsionZoneClearOut.name: Clear Out
ZaryaExpulsionZoneClearOut.ShortTooltip: Reduce Expulsion Zone cooldown, increase duration
ZaryaExpulsionZoneClearOut.FullTooltip: Reduce Expulsion Zone's cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">25</c> seconds and increase its duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ZaryaParticleGrenadeGrenadier.name: Grenadier
ZaryaParticleGrenadeGrenadier.ShortTooltip: Particle Grenade charges are returned at once
ZaryaParticleGrenadeGrenadier.FullTooltip: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

ZaryaUnyieldingDefender.name: Unyielding Defender
ZaryaUnyieldingDefender.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

Zeratul.name: Zeratul
Zeratul.title: Dark Prelate
Zeratul.SearchText: Zeratul ZT Dark Templar DT Prelate Protoss HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Brood War BW LotV Legacy Void Wings Liberty WoL SC 1 SC1 Star2 Starcraft2 Star1 Starcraft1
Zeratul.Description: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.
Zeratul.InfoText: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.

ZeratulSingularitySpike.name: Singularity Spike
ZeratulSingularitySpike.ShortTooltip: Slow and damage the first enemy hit
ZeratulSingularitySpike.FullTooltip: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">240~~0.04~~</c> damage after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and Slows the enemy by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZeratulBlinkStorm.name: Blink
ZeratulBlinkStorm.ShortTooltip: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak
ZeratulBlinkStorm.FullTooltip: Teleport to the target location.<n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

ZeratulMightOfTheNerazimDummy.name: Might Of The Nerazim
ZeratulMightOfTheNerazimDummy.FullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more damage.

ZeratulVoidPrison.name: Void Prison
ZeratulVoidPrison.ShortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
ZeratulVoidPrison.FullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

ZeratulPermanentCloak.name: Permanent Cloak
ZeratulPermanentCloak.ShortTooltip: Become Stealthed while not attacking, using Abilities, or taking damage
ZeratulPermanentCloak.FullTooltip: Gain Stealth when out of combat for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

VorpalBladeBlink.name: Vorpal Blade
VorpalBladeBlink.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds. The target is revealed during these <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ZeratulSingularitySpikeMightOfTheNerazim.name: Singularity Spike
ZeratulSingularitySpikeMightOfTheNerazim.ShortTooltip: Slow and damage the first enemy hit
ZeratulSingularitySpikeMightOfTheNerazim.FullTooltip: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals <c val="bfd4fd">120~~0.04~~</c> damage after <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second and slows the enemy by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZeratulBlinkMightOfTheNerazim.name: Blink
ZeratulBlinkMightOfTheNerazim.ShortTooltip: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak
ZeratulBlinkMightOfTheNerazim.FullTooltip: Teleport to the target location. <n/><n/>Using this Ability does not break cloak.

ZeratulSeekerInTheDark.name: Seeker in the Dark
ZeratulSeekerInTheDark.FullTooltip: Teleport to the active Singularity Spike target.

ZeratulMasteryGreaterCleaveCleave.name: Greater Cleave
ZeratulMasteryGreaterCleaveCleave.FullTooltip: Increases the radius of Cleave by <c val="bfd4fd">33%</c>.

ZeratulShadowHunter.name: Shadow Hunter
ZeratulShadowHunter.ShortTooltip: <c val="e4b800">Quest:</c> Gather Regen Globes to empower Blink
ZeratulShadowHunter.FullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

ZeratulMoveUnseen.name: Move Unseen
ZeratulMoveUnseen.ShortTooltip: Gain Stealth faster and Move Speed while Stealthed
ZeratulMoveUnseen.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Gain <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> Movement Speed while Stealthed.

ZeratulRendingCleave.name: Rending Cleave
ZeratulRendingCleave.ShortTooltip: Cleave deals additional damage over time
ZeratulRendingCleave.FullTooltip: Cleave deals an additional <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> damage over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZeratulPsionicStrength.name: Psionic Strength
ZeratulPsionicStrength.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Abilities increase damage dealt
ZeratulPsionicStrength.FullTooltip: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, stacking up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

ZeratulDarknessDescends.name: Darkness Descends
ZeratulDarknessDescends.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> Attack Speed.

ZeratulWormhole.name: Wormhole
ZeratulWormhole.FullTooltip: After <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds.

ZeratulSeekerInTheDark.name: Seeker in the Dark
ZeratulSeekerInTheDark.FullTooltip: Singularity Spike takes <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> increased Move Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZeratulWarpSkirmisherTalent.name: Warp Skirmisher
ZeratulWarpSkirmisherTalent.FullTooltip: Vorpal Blade gains a <c val="bfd4fd">2nd</c> charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> more damage.

ZeratulMightOfTheNerazim.name: Might Of The Nerazim
ZeratulMightOfTheNerazim.FullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> less damage.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds deals <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> more damage.

ZeratulHeroicAbilityVoidPrison.name: Void Prison
ZeratulHeroicAbilityVoidPrison.ShortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
ZeratulHeroicAbilityVoidPrison.FullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

ZeratulShroudofAdun.name: Shroud of Adun
ZeratulShroudofAdun.ShortTooltip: Gain a shield while under Permanent Cloak
ZeratulShroudofAdun.FullTooltip: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c> of his Maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

ZeratulMendingStrikes.name: Mending Strikes
ZeratulMendingStrikes.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c> of the damage dealt.

GenericTalentSpellShield.name: Spell Shield
GenericTalentSpellShield.FullTooltip: Every <c val="bfd4fd">30</c> seconds, gain <c val="bfd4fd">50</c> Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds, reducing the damage taken by <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

ZeratulMasterWarpBlade.name: Master Warp-Blade
ZeratulMasterWarpBlade.ShortTooltip: Bonus damage every third Basic Attack
ZeratulMasterWarpBlade.FullTooltip: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals <c val="bfd4fd">125%</c> bonus damage.

ZeratulVoidSlash.name: Void Slash
ZeratulVoidSlash.FullTooltip: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds.

ZeratulSentencedtoDeath.name: Sentenced to Death
ZeratulSentencedtoDeath.ShortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to marked targets
ZeratulSentencedtoDeath.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c> increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.

ZeratulTwilightFalls.name: Twilight Falls
ZeratulTwilightFalls.ShortTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets cooldowns
ZeratulTwilightFalls.FullTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

ZeratulUnwaveringPressure.name: Unwavering Pressure
ZeratulUnwaveringPressure.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Singularity Spike cooldown
ZeratulUnwaveringPressure.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike reduce its cooldown by <c val="bfd4fd">1.25</c> seconds.

ZeratulShadowStrideTalent.name: Shadow Stride
ZeratulShadowStrideTalent.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Vorpal Blade by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

ZeratulShadowMending.name: Shadow Mending
ZeratulShadowMending.ShortTooltip: Spell Damage dealt to Heroes heals
ZeratulShadowMending.FullTooltip: Heal for <c val="bfd4fd">60%</c> of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

Zuljin.name: Zul'jin
Zuljin.title: Warlord of the Amani
Zuljin.SearchText: Zuljin Axethrower Troll Horde War2 WC2 Warcraft2 Warcraft II 2 Tides of Darkness ToD World of Warcraft WoW Burning Crusade BC
Zuljin.Description: A Physical Damage Assassin that gains power while losing Health.
Zuljin.InfoText: Before the elves and their Alliance, the forests of Lordaeron belonged to the trolls of the Amani empire. As their warlord, Zul'jin has united the tribes into an army that stands ready to take back what is theirs and to slay the elves who stole it from them.

ZuljinGrievousThrow.name: Grievous Throw
ZuljinGrievousThrow.ShortTooltip: Throw an Axe, damaging and marking a target, increasing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage.
ZuljinGrievousThrow.FullTooltip: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">125~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> enemies hit and marking them for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds. Marked enemies take <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> bonus damage from Zul'jin's next <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> Basic Attacks against them.

ZuljinTwinCleave.name: Twin Cleave
ZuljinTwinCleave.ShortTooltip: Throw swirling Axes that Slow enemies
ZuljinTwinCleave.FullTooltip: Throw <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> axes in a large, circular arc, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">112~~0.04~~</c> damage and Slowing affected enemies by <c val="bfd4fd">15%</c> per axe for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds.

ZuljinRegeneration.name: Regeneration
ZuljinRegeneration.ShortTooltip: Zul'jin Channels to regenerate Health over time
ZuljinRegeneration.FullTooltip: Zul'jin channels to regenerate <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c> of his maximum Health over <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

ZuljinTazdingo.name: Taz'dingo!
ZuljinTazdingo.FullTooltip: For the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Health. Taz'dingo!

ZuljinGuillotine.name: Guillotine
ZuljinGuillotine.FullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">330~~0.04~~</c> damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

ZuljinBerserker.name: Berserker
ZuljinBerserker.ShortTooltip: Increased Attack Speed as Health gets lower
ZuljinBerserker.FullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.You Want Axe?Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

Mount.name: Summon Mount
Mount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second, gain <s val="bfd4fd" name="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

ZuljinAmaniRage.name: Amani Rage
ZuljinAmaniRage.ShortTooltip: Activate to lose Health and restore it over time
ZuljinAmaniRage.FullTooltip: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of his current Health and heal for that amount over <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="bfd4fd">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="bfd4fd">1125</c> Health and <c val="bfd4fd">150</c> Mana.

LootSpray.name: Quick Spray Expression
LootSpray.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by marking the ground with your selected spray.

LootYellVoiceLine.name: Quick Voice Line Expression
LootYellVoiceLine.FullTooltip: Express yourself to other players by playing your selected Voice Line.

ZuljinCancelBerserker.name: Cancel Berserker
ZuljinCancelBerserker.FullTooltip: Activate to leave the berserker frenzy, reducing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 25% and no longer consuming 2% of his maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.You Want Axe?Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

ZuljinBoneslicer.name: Boneslicer
ZuljinBoneslicer.FullTooltip: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

ZuljinRecklessness.name: Recklessness
ZuljinRecklessness.FullTooltip: While Zul'jin is below <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> Health, he gains <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> Spell Power. While he is below <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">20%</c>.

ZuljinHeadhunter.name: Headhunter
ZuljinHeadhunter.FullTooltip: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

ZuljinTrollsBlood.name: Troll's Blood
ZuljinTrollsBlood.FullTooltip: Increase Regeneration's healing by <c val="bfd4fd">25%</c>. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c> of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

ZuljinVoodooShuffle.name: Voodoo Shuffle
ZuljinVoodooShuffle.ShortTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows
ZuljinVoodooShuffle.FullTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.<n/><n/><c val="00ff90">Passive:</c> Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

Zul_x0027_jinAmaniRageAmaniHide.name: Amani Hide
Zul_x0027_jinAmaniRageAmaniHide.FullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by <c val="bfd4fd">10</c> seconds and gain <c val="bfd4fd">15</c> Armor while regenerating Health from it.

ZuljinViciousAssault.name: Vicious Assault
ZuljinViciousAssault.ShortTooltip: Increase Grievous Throw duration and damage
ZuljinViciousAssault.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by <c val="bfd4fd">3</c> seconds and its damage bonus by <c val="bfd4fd">35%</c>.

ZuljinArcaniteAxes.name: Arcanite Axes
ZuljinArcaniteAxes.FullTooltip: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

ZuljinFerocity.name: Ferocity
ZuljinFerocity.FullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>.

ZuljinTazdingo.name: Taz'dingo!
ZuljinTazdingo.FullTooltip: For the next <c val="bfd4fd">4</c> seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> Health. Taz'dingo!

ZuljinGuillotine.name: Guillotine
ZuljinGuillotine.FullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">330~~0.04~~</c> damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

ZuljinLacerate.name: Lacerate
ZuljinLacerate.FullTooltip: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by <c val="bfd4fd">10%</c>.

ZuljinEyeOfZuljin.name: Eye of Zul'jin
ZuljinEyeOfZuljin.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin <c val="bfd4fd">6%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="bfd4fd">2</c> seconds, up to <c val="bfd4fd">30%</c>.

ZuljinEnsnare.name: Ensnare
ZuljinEnsnare.ShortTooltip: Throw a net that Roots enemies
ZuljinEnsnare.FullTooltip: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for <c val="bfd4fd">1.5</c> seconds.

ZuljinNoMercyTalent.name: No Mercy!
ZuljinNoMercyTalent.FullTooltip: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

ZuljinWrongPlaceWrongTime.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
ZuljinWrongPlaceWrongTime.ShortTooltip: Bonus Twin Cleave damage at apex
ZuljinWrongPlaceWrongTime.FullTooltip: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional <c val="bfd4fd">100~~0.04~~</c> damage and count as <c val="bfd4fd">5</c> Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

ZuljinLetTheKillingBegin.name: Let the Killing Begin
ZuljinLetTheKillingBegin.FullTooltip: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by <c val="bfd4fd">5%</c>, up to <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c>, for <c val="bfd4fd">12</c> seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.<n/><n/>Hero Takedowns instantly grant <c val="bfd4fd">40%</c> Attack Speed.

ZuljinAmaniResilience.name: Amani Resilience
ZuljinAmaniResilience.FullTooltip: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by <c val="bfd4fd">1</c> second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for <c val="bfd4fd">50%</c> of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

ZuljinBuzzsaw.name: Buzzsaw
ZuljinBuzzsaw.FullTooltip: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing <c val="bfd4fd">75%</c> damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

ZuljinForestMedicine.name: Forest Medicine
ZuljinForestMedicine.FullTooltip: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
